1b1('dul ba): @##/ /'dul ba gzhi/bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ sdom la/ smyug ma'i lo ma gro
1b2('dul ba): bzhin dang / /rjes su gnang dang bsrung phyir dang / /de bzhin bsegs su bcings pa dang / /
1b3('dul ba): rtse mo rnyed pa spu gu can/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis shing gi mchil lham bcang
1b4('dul ba): bar mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs nas de dag smyug lo'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang / de nyid
2a1('dul ba): @##/ /nyes dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smyug lo'i mchil lham bcang bar
2a2('dul ba): mi bya'o/ /de dag rtswa mun dza'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang / de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
2a3('dul ba): stsal pa/ rtswa mun dza'i mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /de dag srad bu'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang / de nyid nyes dmigs su
2a4('dul ba): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srad bu'i mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag dreg gis btab ste
2a5('dul ba): de dag shu ba byung bas ko ba'i mchil lham rlan par gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
2b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dreg gis thebs pa gang yin pa des/ srad bu'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/ gang gi tshe gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa
2b2('dul ba): rab tu byung ba de'i tshe de'i rkang mthil la gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spu sor bzhi tsam yod pa de/ drug sde dag gis mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag gis smras pa/
2b3('dul ba): dga' bo nye dga'/ re zhig mar sar gyi gong bu 'dra ba 'di/ gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas ci zhig byed ces smras pa/ des thos so/ /des
2b4('dul ba): thos nas nga rgyal skyes te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i drung du song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom
2b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par gsungs pa gang lags/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes/ 'chag pas
2b6('dul ba): thob pa yin no/ /de bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song nas 'chag sa bcas so/ /de 'chag pa na/ spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam po dag kyang
3a1('dul ba): @##/ /zad do/ /de'i 'og tu pags pa rdol/ de'i 'og tu khrag byung ste/ de ji srid 'chag sa'i mgo gcig nas gcig shos su song gi bar du
3a2('dul ba): de'i 'chag sa'i mgo gcig na yang khwa dag khrag 'thung la/ gnyis pa na yang 'thung ngo / /chos nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho
3a3('dul ba): la gzhes pa ni/ dus dus su chu bor rgyu ba spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/ skabs 'dir ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du rgyu zhing
3a4('dul ba): gshegs pa yin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i gtsug lag khang gang na ba der gshegs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gro bzhin
3a5('dul ba): skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i 'chag sa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin rmed pa yin pas/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed
3a6('dul ba): de| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa/ kun dga' bo/ gcig tu brtson pa'i 'chag sa 'di/ dge slong gang gi yin/ gro bzhin
3b1('dul ba): skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas rim pa gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/ /rim gnyis pa ma yin/ rim gsum pa ma yin no/ /gal te
3b2('dul ba): rdol bar gyur na/ lhan pas btab ste bcang bar bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste/ son nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad
3b3('dul ba): ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shes par gyis shig /ston pas khyod la mchil lham rim gcig pa rjes su gnang ste/ rim gnyis pa ma yin/ rim gsum pa ma yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ ci/
3b4('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad la'am/ 'on te bdag 'ba' zhig la/ khyod 'ba' zhig la'o/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo/ ston pa'i bka' mi gcog na/ gal te bdag gis bcangs na gzhi des bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
3b5('dul ba): dag| e ma'o 'gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa rab tu byung nas ltogs pa zhig rnyed do/ /gang yang yul tsam pa thun mong ma yin pa dang / glang po che bdun gyi tshogs spangs te rab tu byung la/ deng mchil lham theg gi ba
3b6('dul ba): tsam la chags pa lta zhes gleng bar 'gyur te/ de lta mod kyi/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ltos te dge 'dun thams cad la rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis de bzhin du bcang bar bgyi'o/ /zhes pa'i skabs
3b7('dul ba): de| bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la ltos nas dge 'dun thams cad
4a1('dul ba): kyis rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya ste/ rim gnyis pa ma yin zhes rgyas par sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na rgan zhugs mchil lham
4a2('dul ba): can gzhan zhig 'chag par byed pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong phar song / nga'i spyan snga na ma 'dug cig /de nas bcom ldan
4a3('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ re zhig 'jig rten thams cad kyi zang zing dang 'dres pa'i ston pa gang yin pa/ ston pa de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'di ltar myur
4a4('dul ba): ba myur bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i brtul zhugs mi spyod na/ nga 'jig rten thams cad kyi zang zing dang bral bar gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs
4a5('dul ba): gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag mchil lham 'chang ba yin te/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis mchil lham bcang bar mi
4a6('dul ba): bya'o| |zhes gsungs pa dang / gar mkhan gzhan zhig rab tu byung ba de'i chu snod chag nas/ de rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas su rkang pa bkrus nas kha'i nang du chus bkang ste/ rma bya'i 'gros su song
4a7('dul ba): ba de drug sde rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /rol mo'i sgra med par dge slong gar byed kyi/ rol mo'i sgra bya'o zhes de rnams kyis khas rol mo'i sgra bya bar brtsams
4b1('dul ba): so| |de rnams la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci ma grangs pa byed dam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di la ma grangs su ci zhig yod/ khyed kyis rol mo'i sgra med par dge slong gar byed pa mthong
4b2('dul ba): ngam zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ mkhyen bzhin rmed de/ sangs rgyas bcom
4b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmed pa/ dge slong / khyod kyis bsam pa ci zhig gis de lta bu byas/ btsun pa/ gnas mal bsrung slad du'o/ /dge slong 'di/ gnas mal bsrung ba'i phyir de lta bur byed pa la ltung ba
4b4('dul ba): med do/ /de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ gnas mal bsrung ba'i phyir rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/ /rim gnyis pa ma yin/ rim gsum pa ma yin/ gal te rdol bar gyur na/ lhan pas
4b5('dul ba): btab ste bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig la khyim bdag cig dad par gyur to/ /de nang par sngar langs te
4b6('dul ba): mchil lham med par mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de mchil lham med pa khyim bdag des mthong ngo / /mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa la mchil lham ma mchis sam/ tshur spyon/ lham mkhan
4b7('dul ba): gyi drung du bzhud/ mchil lham zhig 'bul du stsal to/ /de lham mkhan gyi drung du song nas/ des lham mkhan la smras pa/ kye nang rje/ 'phags pa 'di la mchil lham zhig phul cig ces bsgos nas song ngo / /de'i
5a1('dul ba): tshe dge slong rnams dang / shi ba rnams dang gnyis kyi phyir mchil lham rim pa gcig pa dag byas so/ /dge slong de yang dang yang du lham mkhan gyi drung du song yang ma byin no/ /
5a2('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag des yang dge slong mchil lham med pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod la lham mkhan gyi mchil lham ma phul lam/ khyim bdag/ lham mkhan
5a3('dul ba): la bden par smra ba dkon pa khyod kyis ma thos sam/ yang dang yang du song yang ma byin no/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa tshur spyon/ khyim du bzhud/ des de khyim du khrid nas kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas te/
5a4('dul ba): rim pa mang po can gyi mchil lham zhig byin no/ /dge slong gis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /des 'phags pa bsnams te/ bzhud la/ rim gcig pa'i mchil lham
5a5('dul ba): mdzod la gsol cig / des de khyer te gnas khang du song nas des de dang gri blangs te shing drung du 'dug nas dral bar brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der byon nas/ dge slong ci byed/ bcom ldan
5a6('dul ba): 'das kyis rim pa mang po can gyi mchil lham bkag na/ bdag la rim pa mang po can 'di lta bu grub ste/ rim gcig par bgyis la bcang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du
5a7('dul ba): e ma'o/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis rim pa mang po'i mchil lham ster ba lta snyam du dgongs nas/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ mchil lham rim
5b1('dul ba): pa mang po can khyim pa'i dman ma yin phan chad pa bcang bar bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus te zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mchil lham rim pa mang po can khyim
5b2('dul ba): pa'i dman ma yin phan chad bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ khyim pa'i dman ma lags par brjod par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ tha na/ gom pa bdun nam brgyad bgos
5b3('dul ba): par gyur na yang yin no/ /gleng gzhi ni/ yangs pa can no/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na 'di lta bu'i mchil lham dag byed de/ 'di lta ste/ khrig khrig/ tshig tshig chem chem zhes zer ba lug ru 'am/ byang
5b4('dul ba): chub kyi shing gi lo ma lta bu khra bo/ kaR+sha pa Na lnga ri ba dag byed do/ /drug sde dag gis mchil lham dag gyon pa zhig mthong nas de dag gis rting pa rkang pa'i mthe bos mnan nas ltag pa nas phul te/
5b5('dul ba): khyod kyis sbyin pa 'di phul bas sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas nas blangs pa dang / phyogs kun tu
5b6('dul ba): 'phags pa dag ni/ lham de lta bus 'phrog go/ zhes sgra grag go/ /rgan mo zhig gis mag pa zhig 'ongs pa dang de la des mchil lham zhig byin nas 'phags pa dag mchil lham 'phrog gi /ji nas
5b7('dul ba): kyang 'phrog par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig ces bsgo'o/ /bsod snyoms pa zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa/ des mthong nas de khyim zhig tu zhugs so/ /de yang de nyid du zhugs pa
6a1('dul ba): dang | de khyim de nas byung nas khyim gzhan zhig tu zhugs so/ /bsod snyoms pas kyang de nyid du zhugs pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod don ci'i phyir kho bo'i rjes
6a2('dul ba): bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang / ci/ mchil lham 'di 'phrog par bzhed mod/ bzhin bzang / khyod kyi mchil lham kho bo mi 'phrog ste/ 'on kyang kho bo bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /des smras
6a3('dul ba): pa| 'phags pa/ 'phrog kyang rung / mi 'phrog kyang rung ste/ 'on kyang phyogs kun tu 'phags pa khyed cag mchil lham 'phrog go zhes sgra grags so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong
6a4('dul ba): rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag mchil lham khrig khrig ces bya ba nas/ de lta bas na/ dge slong
6a5('dul ba): gis mchil lham khrig khrig zer ba bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par sbyar ro/ /de lta bu bcang bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis de lta bu'i mchil lham bcangs na/ 'gal tshabs can du
6a6('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong rnams mchil lham gyis rkang pa'i bol la rma byung ba/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas khyed cag gis zhabs kyi bol ci zhig
6a7('dul ba): gis rma byung bar gyur/ mchil lham gyis so/ /ci/ khyed cag gis bsegs su bcings nas ma bcings sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das
6b1('dul ba): la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ bsegs su bcings nas bcang bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa
6b2('dul ba): na| rkang pa'i mthe bor rma byung ngo / /de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas smras pa/ khyed cag gi zhabs kyi mthe bong ci zhig gis rma byung / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa na'o/ /ci/ khyed cag gis
6b3('dul ba): mchil lham gyi rtse mo spu gu can ma bcangs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
6b4('dul ba): stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis mchil lham gyi rtse mo spu gu can bcang bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri las babs pa na/ rkang pa'i rting pa rma byung ba/ bram ze dang /
6b5('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed cag rnams kyi zhabs kyi rting pa ci zhig gis rma byung / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs pa na'o/ /ci/ khyed cag gis mchil lham gyi rting
6b6('dul ba): pa sbu gu can ma bcangs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
6b7('dul ba): pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis mchil lham gyi rting pa spu gu can bcang bar bya'o/ /sdom la/ mgul chad dang / ni yu thung lham/ /kha khrod dag tu sgrog gu can/ /dom gyi pags pa
7a1('dul ba): gnang ba dang / /smyung bu 'breng bu chu gri'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong rnams rtswa'i myu gus rkang pa rma byung ba dag /bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong
7a2('dul ba): nas| smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /khyed cag gi zhabs ci zhig gis rma byung / rtswa'i myu gus so/ /ci/ khyed cag gis lham mgul chad ma bcangs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang
7a3('dul ba): ngo| |zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ lham mgul chad bcang bar bya'o/ /
7a4('dul ba): gang gi tshe rtswa'i myu gu cher skyes pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyi rkang pa de bas kyang rma cher byung ba/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ khyed cag gi zhabs ci zhig gis rma byung / de
7a5('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ rtswa'i myu gu dag cher skyes pas bdag cag gi rkang pa de bas kyang rma cher byung ngo / /'phags pa rnams/ ci/ khyed cag gis lham yu thung ma bcangs sam/ bcom ldan
7a6('dul ba): 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/
7a7('dul ba): lham yu thung bcang bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kha btag pa na/ de dag las kha cig nub phyogs su dong pa nas/ kha cig bal
7b1('dul ba): yul gyi bar du dong ngo / /mnyan yod pa'i don mthun dag zong thogs te bal yul du lhags pa dang / de dag gis de rnams mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag gang nas da 'dir lhags/ de rnams
7b2('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ mnyan yod nas so/ /bdag cag gi gnyen 'phags pa kun dga' bo yod na/ lan 'ga' yang 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'dir 'ongs te bdag cag la gtam ma dris so/ /de rnams kyis smras
7b3('dul ba): pa| bdag cag gis/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i drung du song la sbran par bgyi'o/ /de rnams kyis zong rnams bsgyur ba'i zong dag khyer te mnyan yod du lhags nas/ de rnams kyis 'phags pa kun dga' bo
7b4('dul ba): la smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi gnyen bal yul na mchis te/ de dag khyed mthong bar 'tshal lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni gnyen la gdung ba yin pas/ de gnyen dag blta ba'i phyir bal
7b5('dul ba): yul du song ba las/ de lhags pas lag pa dang / rkang pa ser ga byung ba dang / de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma ral ba bzhin du khyod kyi lag pa dang rkang pa
7b6('dul ba): ci zhig gis ser ga byung bar gyur/ de smras pa/ lhags pas so/ /khyod kyi gnyen dag ni/ lham sgro gu can ci ste 'chang / khyod ci'i phyir mi 'chang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i
7b7('dul ba): skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ yul kha ba can rnams su lham sgrog gu can bcang bar
8a1('dul ba): bya'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yul kha ba can rnams lham sgrog gu can bcang bar bya'o/ /
8a2('dul ba): zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis yul kha ba can du brjod par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ gang na snod du chu 'khyag pa yin no/ /dge slong gzhan zhig la rngon pa zhig dad par gyur nas/
8a3('dul ba): rngon pa des dom lpags shig rnyed pa dge slong de la phul ba dang / des ma blangs so/ /des dge slong de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gis dom lpags rnyed pa khyod la 'bul gyi/ bzhes
8a4('dul ba): shig / dge slong des ma blangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed de/ sangs rgyas bcom
8a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa/ kun dga' bo/ /dge slong 'o na'i phyi bzhin du rngon pa pha bi ci ste 'brang / btsun pa/ rngon pa des dom lpags shig rnyed nas/ des dge slong 'o ni la
8a6('dul ba): stsal pa las/ dge slong gis de ma blangs pa dang / rngon pa de dge slong 'o na'i phyi bzhin mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ rngon pa dad pa can ni/ dkon te/ gal te brgya'am
8a7('dul ba): stong zhig dang 'phrad na/ thams cad gsod pa yin pas na/ de bas na gal te rngon pas dom lpags byin na blang bar bya'o/ /blang nas dri gtsang khang gi sgo'am/ rkang pa'i 'og tu gding bar bya ste/ dom lpags
8b1('dul ba): thams cad ni/ mig la phan no/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gi mchil lham ral nas/ de lham ral nas/ de lham mkhan gyi drung du song ste son nas/ smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bdag gi mchil lham ral pa brgyus
8b2('dul ba): te| bdag la byin cig / lham mkhan gyis bsam pa/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong rnams ni/ rngan pa med par tshol gyi/ yun ring du bsgyangs pa dang / rang gi blo slar log par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ 'phags
8b3('dul ba): pa| bdag/ brel gyi/ sang spyon cig /dge slong de yang dang yang du lham mkhan de'i drung du song yang des bsgyangs pa dang / de mdza' bshes dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ ci/ de
8b4('dul ba): na khyod kyi zas sbyor ba'i khyim yod dam/ 'on te gnyen gyi khyim yod/ des smras pa/ de na bdag gi zas sbyor ba'i khyim yang med/ gnyen gyi khyim yang med mod kyi/ bdag gi mchil lham ral nas/ bdag gis
8b5('dul ba): de la brgyus te byin cig ces smras na/ des bsgyangs so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ lham mkhan la bden par smra ba dkon par khyod kyis ma thos sam/ 'on kyang bdag gis shes kyi/ gal te bcom ldan
8b6('dul ba): 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis de la brgyus te khyod la sbyin no zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
8b7('dul ba): gang zhig shes pa yod na/ des gang du gzhan gyis mthong na mi dad par mi 'gyur ba dben pa'i phyogs su 'dug ste brgyu bar bya'o/ /de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang gi/
9a1('dul ba): rgyus shig /des smras pa/ ci/ 'di de bzhin du brgyur rung snyam mam/ de la re zhig smyung bu dang dra gri dang / 'breng bu yang dgos so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
9a2('dul ba): 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang zhig shes pa yod na/ des smyung bu dang 'breng bu ni/ bcang bar bya'o/ /dra gri ni/ bcang bar mi
9a3('dul ba): bya'o| |ko lpags kyi gzhi rdzogs so/ / //sman gyi gzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom la/ sman dag dang ni sde can dang / /rgyal po'i khab dang 'od ma'i tshal/ /shing mkhan id tsa nang ga la/ /kam+pi la dang sngon
9a4('dul ba): rgyal po'i/ /gzhon nu 'phel dang nad pa dang / /gtam du gyur dang sder bsdus pa'o/ /sdom la/ sman ni rjes su gnang ba dang / /tshil dang g.yan pa mig sman dang / /smyon pa dang ni pi lin da/ /nam gru dang ni skyur
9a5('dul ba): khu'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rnams ston ka'i nad kyis thebs te/ de rnams ston ka'i nad kyis
9a6('dul ba): btab pas skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin rmed pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
9a7('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa/ kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir da ltar dge slong 'di rnams skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas par gyur/ tshe dang ldan
9b1('dul ba): pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong 'di rnams ston ka'i bro nad kyis btab ste/ 'di rnams ston ka'i bro nad kyis btab pas/ skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / bro 'tshal
9b2('dul ba): bas nyams dmas par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
9b3('dul ba): dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / de rnams dus su za ba yin pas dus su sten par byed kyi/ dus las yol bar sten par mi byed pas/ de rnams skya bo seng
9b4('dul ba): seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
9b5('dul ba): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa/ kun dga' bo/ ngas dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ 'on kyang da ltar dge slong 'di rnams skya bo seng seng por gyur
9b6('dul ba): cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas par gyur tam/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o/ /
9b7('dul ba): zhes gsungs pa/ 'di dag dus su 'tshal ba lags pas dus su sten par bgyid kyi/ dus las yol bar mi sten te/ de'i slad du skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / bro
10a1('dul ba): 'tshal bas nyams dmas par gyur lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis sman rnam pa bzhi po/ dus su rung ba dang / thun tshod du rung ba dang /
10a2('dul ba): zhag bdun pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba so sor bsten par bya'o/ /de la dus su rung ba ni/ lde gu dang / 'bras can dang / zan dron dang / sha dang / snum khur ro/ /thun tshod du rung ba ni/ btung ba rnam pa
10a3('dul ba): brgyad po/ shing tog tso tsa'i btung ba dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang / rgya shug gi btung ba dang / a shwang+tha'i btung ba dang / u dum ba ra'i btung ba dang / ba ru sha ka'i btung ba dang / rgun 'brum gyi
10a4('dul ba): btung ba dang / 'bra go'i btung ba dang / bar sdom la/ tso tsa chu shing rgya shug dang / /a shwad u dum ba ra dang / /pa ru sha ka rgun 'brum dang / /brgyad pa yang ni 'bra go yin/ /zhag bdun pa ni/ mar dkar dang / til
10a5('dul ba): mar dang / bu ram gyi dbu pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sha kha ra'o/ /'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba ni/ rtsa ba'i sman dang / sdong bu'i sman dang / lo ma'i sman dang / me tog gi sman dang / 'bras bu'i sman dang / trang chu lnga dang /
10a6('dul ba): thal ba lnga dang / lan tshwa lnga dang / bska ba lnga'o/ /de la/ rtsa ba'i sman ni/ gla sgang dang / shu dag dang / yung nga dang / sge'u gsher dang / bong nga dkar po dang / gzhan yang / rtsa ba'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa/
10a7('dul ba): zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ /sdong bu'i sman ni/ tsan+dan dang / dbyi mo dang / shug pa dang / thang shing dang / sle tres dang / skyer pa dang / gzhan yang / sdong bu'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi
10b1('dul ba): don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ /lo ma'i sman ni/ pa to la'i lo ma dang / ba sha ka'i lo ma dang / nim pa'i lo ma dang / ko sha ta ka'i lo ma dang / sap+ta pa rna'i lo ma dang / gzhan yang lo ma'i sman gyi nang du gtogs
10b2('dul ba): pa| zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ /me tog gi sman ni/ me tog lnga po/ ba sha ka'i me tog dang / nim pa'i me tog dang / d+ha ka'i me tog dang / sha ta'i me tog dang / pad+ma ke sa ra'i me tog dang /
10b3('dul ba): gzhan yang / me tog gi sman gyi nang du gtogs pa/ zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ /'bras bu'i sman ni/ a ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / na le sham dang / pi pi ling dang / gzhan yang
10b4('dul ba): 'bras bu'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa/ zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ /trang chu lnga ni/ shing kun dang / sra rtsi dang / rgya skegs dang / spra tshil dang / drod sman no/ /de la/ shing kun ni/ shing kun gyi
10b5('dul ba): shing gi trang chu'o/ /sra rtsi ni/ shing sA la'i trang chu'o/ /rgya skegs ni/ /rgya skegs so/ /spra tshil ni/ spra tshil lo/ /drod sman ni/ de dag las gzhan pa'i shing rnams kyi trang chu'o/ /thal ba lnga gang zhe na/ nas kyi
10b6('dul ba): thal pa dang / nas kyi phub ma'i thal ba dang / shing sa rdzi ka'i thal ba dang / til gyi thal ba dang / shing 'ba' shi ka'i thal ba'o/ /lan tshwa lnga gang zhe na/ rgyam tshwa dang / lan tshwa smug po dang / kha ru tshwa dang /
10b7('dul ba): lan tshwa dang / rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa'o/ /bska ba lnga gang zhe na/ a mra'i bska ba dang / nim pa'i bska ba dang / 'dzam bu'i bska ba dang / shi ri sha'i bska ba dang / ko sham pa'i bska ba'o/ /de la/ dus su
11a1('dul ba): rung ba gang yin pa dang / thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa dang / zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ dus su rung ba dang 'dres par
11a2('dul ba): gyur na/ dus su spyad par bya'i/ /dus ma yin par longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang / thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa dang / zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar
11a3('dul ba): du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ gal te thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres par gyur na/ thun tshod la yongs su spyad par bya'i/ thun tshod las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/ /zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /
11a4('dul ba): 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ zhag bdun pa dang 'dres par gyur na/ zhag bdun du spyad par bya'i/ zhag bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/ /'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba ni/
11a5('dul ba): 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /byin gyis brlab pa ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ zan ma zos pa'i mdun du lag pa gnyis bkrus nas byin len byas te/
11a6('dul ba): dge slong zhig gi 'dun du 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes pa'i sman 'di/ bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams
11a7('dul ba): kyi don du 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlab po/ /de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod do/ /'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlab pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thun tshod du rung ba
11b1('dul ba): dang / zhag bdun pa yang byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de nas dge slong gzhan zhig rlung nad kyis thebs nas sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang / kho bo 'di
11b2('dul ba): 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab na/ sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ tshil sten cig dang / khyod sos par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang / ci/ kho bo 'dre yin nam/ sman pas
11b3('dul ba): smras pa/ dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
11b4('dul ba): stsal pa/ gal te sman pa na re/ dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so/ /zhes smras na/ tshil bsten par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ma shes nas sman pa la dris pa
11b5('dul ba): dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyed cag gi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyi/ de kho na'i drung du bzhud la zhus shig /skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
11b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshil lnga so sor bstan par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ nya tshil dang / sbal pa dkar po'i tshil dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kyi tshil dang / dom tshil dang / phag gi
11b7('dul ba): tshil lo/ /tshil 'di lnga dus ma yin par btsos pa dang / dus ma yin par btsags pa dang / dus ma yin par byin len byas pa dang / dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na/ longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /
12a1('dul ba): dus su btsos la dus ma yin par btsags/ dus ma yin par byin len byas/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na/ longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /dus su btsos/ dus su
12a2('dul ba): btsags la/ dus ma yin par byin len byas/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na/ spyad par mi bya'o/ /dus su btsos/ dus su btsags/ dus su byin len byas la/ dus ma yin par
12a3('dul ba): byin gyis brlabs nas spyad par mi bya'o/ /dus su btsos/ dus su btsags/ dus su byin len byas/ dus su byin gyis brlabs na/ til mar la spyod pa bzhin du zhag bdun du spyad par bya'o/ /de nas dge
12a4('dul ba): slong des tshil longs spyad nas sos par gyur to/ /de sos par gyur pa dang / de tshil gyi lhag ma dag bor ro/ /ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig de 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs nas/ de yang sman pa'i drung du song
12a5('dul ba): nas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / kho bo la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab kyi sman ston cig /des de la yang tshil bstan pa dang / de dge slong de'i drung du song nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyis tshil spyad pa/
12a6('dul ba): kho bo la yang sman pas bstan na/ tshil lhag pa lta cung zad kyang yod dam/ des smras pa/ bdog bdog pa las bdag gis de bor ro/ /ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong
12a7('dul ba): rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis tshil longs spyad pa'i lhag ma bor bar mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bcang bar bya'o/ /ngas dge slong tshil 'chang ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/
12b1('dul ba): tshal 'chang ba'i dge slong gis tshil spyad pa'i lhag ma dge slong gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /gal te ma byin na sman khang du gzhag par bya ste/ su 'dod pa des blang bar bya'o/ /tshil 'chang ba'i dge
12b2('dul ba): slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong
12b3('dul ba): gzhan zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis thebs nas de sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang / kho bo g.yan pa'i nad kyis thebs kyi sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bska ba sten cig dang
12b4('dul ba): khyod sos par 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzang / ci kho bo 'dod pa la spyod pa yin nam/ des smras pa/ dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes pa'i skabs de/
12b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du ste/ khyod kyi ston pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas de kho nas mkhyen par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i skabs
12b6('dul ba): de| bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bska ba ni lnga ste/ a mra'i bska ba zhes bya ba nas/ gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge
12b7('dul ba): slong des bska ba dag lde gur byas te lus la byugs pa las rma mched nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phye ma bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis rlon pa la btab pas ri lur gyur pa dang /
13a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskam par bya'o/ /de dag gis nyi ma la bskams pa dang / mthu nyams par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
13a2('dul ba): stsal pa/ nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis grib ma la bskams pa dang / 'on kyang rul par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma'i grib mar bskam par
13a3('dul ba): bya'o| |dge slong gis bska bas lus byugs nas bkrus te bska ba'i bya ba mi byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pas ji tsam chog gi bar du dril nas khrus bya'o/ /bkrus
13a4('dul ba): nas slar yang bska bas bskus nas bkrus na/ bska ba'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong des bska bas bskus pa dang nad zhi bar gyur to/ /des bska ba'i lhag ma bor ro/ /ji tsam na/
13a5('dul ba): dge slong gzhan zhig de 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs nas de yang sman pa'i drung du song ste zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du ste/ kho bos de ni bor ro/ /ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /zhes pa'i skabs
13a6('dul ba): de| bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas bska ba 'chang ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ bska ba
13a7('dul ba): 'chang ba'i dge slong gis/ bska ba spyad pa'i lhag ma dge slong su slong ba de la sbyin par bya'o/ /gal te ma byin na/ sman khang du gzhag par bya'o/ /bska ba 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod
13b1('dul ba): pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong gzhan zhig mig nad kyis thebs
13b2('dul ba): nas| de sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang / kho bo mig nad kyis thebs par gyur na/ kho bo la sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mig sman so sor sten cig dang / khyod sos
13b3('dul ba): par 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzang / ci/ kho bo 'dod pa la longs spyod dam/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni/ sos par mi nus so/ /zhes bya ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
13b4('dul ba): 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pa na re/ sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes zer na/ mig sman
13b5('dul ba): bsten par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis mig sman gang bsten par bya ma shes nas/ de dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyi zhes
13b6('dul ba): bya ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig sman ni/ lnga ste/ me tog gi mig sman dang / khu ba'i mig sman dang /
13b7('dul ba): phye ma'i mig sman dang / ri lu'i mig sman dang / btsag yug rnams kyi mig sman no/ /de nas dge slong des mig sman de bsten nas sos par gyur to/ /des mig sman gyi lhag ma gar bab bab tu bzhag
14a1('dul ba): pa las/ de chud zos par gyur to/ /ji tsam na/ dge slong gzhan zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas/ des kyang sman pa la dris pa dang / des de la yang mig sman de nyid bstan to/ /de dge slong de'i
14a2('dul ba): drung du song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa/ kho bo yang mig nad kyis btab par gyur na/ khyod la mig sman gyi lhag ma cung zad yod dam/ de btsal bar brtsams pa las/ ma rnyed nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
14a3('dul ba): mig sman de bdog bdog ste/ bzhag pa las de stor to/ /zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis
14a4('dul ba): mig sman gar bab bab tu gzhag par mi bya'o/ /ngas mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis mig sman rnams so sor phye la gzhag
14a5('dul ba): par bya ste/ me tog gi mig sman ni/ snod kyi nang du'o/ /khu ba'i mig sman ni/ gab tshe'i nang du'o/ /phye ma'i mig sman ni/ dong bu'i nang du'o/ /ri lu'i mig sman dang btsag yug rnams kyi mig sman ni/ sgye'u
14a6('dul ba): 'am| thun por skud pas bcing la/ zung nga la gdags par bya'o/ /mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par mi byed na/
14a7('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa bye ma skyes sems 'khrugs te smyos par gyur nas de/ de dang de dag tu 'phyan pa/ ji tsam na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag
14b1('dul ba): dag gis mthong ste/ de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di su'i bu zhig yin/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong mgon
14b2('dul ba): med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu ma byung na/ 'di gnyen rnams kyis gso bar 'gyur pa zhig ces pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
14b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong bye ma skyes kyi dpyad sman pa la dris la byos shig /sman pa'i drung du dong nas/ bzhin bzang / dge slong zhig 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyi/ de'i
14b4('dul ba): sman ston cig / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dang / sha rjen 'tshal du gsol cig /des sos par 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzang / de ci/ 'dre yin nam/ 'phags pa/ de'i sman 'di lags te/ gzhan gyis ni/
14b5('dul ba): sos par mi nus so/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pa na re de'i sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni sos
14b6('dul ba): par mi nus so zer na/ sha rjen pa sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byin pa dang / de zar ma btub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig ras kyis bkab la sbyin par bya'o//
14b7('dul ba): de dag gis byin te byin ma thag tu ras phye ba dang / des lag pa la reg pa mthong nas/ de zhe log pas skyugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mod la ras dbye bar mi byas te/ de lta mod
15a1('dul ba): kyi| bca' ba bzang ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag mdun du bzhag nas gang gi tshe lag pa bkrus pa de'i tshe de dbye bar bya'o/ /de sos par gyur pa dang / de de nyid la sred par
15a2('dul ba): gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe sos par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa
15a3('dul ba): bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya'o/ /longs spyod na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ rgyal po'i khab na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa pi linada'i bu gang gi tshe rab tu byung ba de tshun
15a4('dul ba): chad rtag tu na pa dang / zug gzer mang por gyur pa dang / de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan/ khyod kyi snyun gyi zo ji lta/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag rgyun du na ba
15a5('dul ba): dang | zug gzer mang pas theg pa'i skabs med do/ /gnas brtan/ khyod sngon ci zhig 'chang bar byed/ des smras pa/ sman gyi mchan khug go /de ci'i phyir mi bcang / bcom ldan 'das
15a6('dul ba): kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo / /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang
15a7('dul ba): ste| dge slong gis sman gyi mchan khug bcang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis rtsa ba dang / me tog dang / sdong bu dang / 'bras bu'i sman rags pa dag de'i nang du bcug pa dang / de dag rul nas/ bcom
15b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag sbam pa'am/ bam por byas te zung nga la gdags par bya'o/ /de dag rul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus dus su bskam par bya'o/ /de
15b2('dul ba): dag gis nyi ma la bskams pa dang / de dag mthu chung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis grib ma la bskams pa dang / 'on kyang rul par
15b3('dul ba): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grib ma la bskam par mi bya'o/ /de dag gis gting nas dong ba dang / char pa dang / rlung byung ste/ ma bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
15b4('dul ba): stsal pa/ bsdu bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / de dag gis sus bsdu ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pas so/ /khyim pa
15b5('dul ba): med na/ dge sbyong gis so/ /dge sbyong med na/ dge slong nyid kyis bsdu bar bya'o/ /dge slong gis bsdus pa dang / 'dres par gyur nas/ 'dres so/ /zhes ma zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
15b6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ so sor phye nas longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /ngas/ na ba dag la rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de thams cad mi na ba'i gnas skabs na spyod par mi bya'o/ /spyod na/
15b7('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru gar yang som nyi za bas/ de'i ming nam gru som nyi can nam gru som nyi can zhes bya bar grags so/ /de snga
16a1('dul ba): dro sham thabs bgos/ chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ de rim gyis bu ram byed pa'i grong du phyin pa dang / ji tsam na/ 'bras phye
16a2('dul ba): dang | bu ram 'bru bar byed pa mthong nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bu ram 'bras phye dang ma sbru zhig /'phags pa/ spyi bar bgyid pa gzhan 'ga' mkhyen nam/ kho bos spyi ba gzhan yang mi shes mod
16a3('dul ba): kyi| bdag cag dus ma yin par longs spyod dgos so/ /'phags pa/ dus su'am dus ma yin par gsol yang rung ste/ de'i spyi pa ni/ 'di lags te/ gzhan gyis ni mi 'bru'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan
16a4('dul ba): zhig na/ dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram dag rnyed pa na/ des ma zos so/ /de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag gis smras pa/ slob dpon/ dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed kyi/ longs
16a5('dul ba): spyad du gsol/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / zas dang 'dres so/ /de de dag gis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang / de rnams la dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /dge 'dun gyi bca'
16a6('dul ba): pa bu ram zhig rnyed na/ ci ste longs ma spyad/ de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po'i zhal nas 'di zas dang 'dres so/ /zhes gsung ngo / /de rnams kyis kyang longs ma spyad do/ /'khor phal pho che dang / dge
16a7('dul ba): 'dun ril las kyang phal po ches longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyis zas kyi bya ba mi byed pa ni/ mi
16b1('dul ba): rnyed pas 'byung khungs yongs su dag pas longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru snga dro sham thabs bgos/ chos gos dang / lhung bzed
16b2('dul ba): thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ rim gyis srang zhig tu phyin pa dang / des spos tshong zhig phye la reg nas bu ram la reg par byed pa mthong nas des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / phye la
16b3('dul ba): reg nas bu ram la reg par ma byed/ dus ma yin par yang bdag cag gis longs spyad dgos so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag la yang dang yang du sug chab gtong ba su zhig mchis/ dus gzhan
16b4('dul ba): zhig na| dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed pa dang / des longs ma spyad do/ /lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag gis smras pa/ slob dpon/ dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram dag rnyed na/ ci ste mi
16b5('dul ba): gsol| des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'di zas dang 'dres so/ /de rnams kyis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang / de rnams la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram
16b6('dul ba): zhig rnyed na/ ci ste mi za/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po'i zhal nas 'di zas dang 'dres so zhes gsung ngo / /de dag gis kyang longs ma spyad do/ /'khor phal po che de dang / dge 'dun ril las kyang phal
16b7('dul ba): ches longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyis zas kyi bya ba mi byed pa mi rnyed kyi/ khyim pas yongs su
17a1('dul ba): dag pas longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rlung nad kyis thebs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
17a2('dul ba): gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/ bdag rang gi blos rim gro ni/ lan mang du byas mod kyi/ lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyi/ ma la da ni sman pa la dri'o/ /snyam nas/
17a3('dul ba): de sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs par gyur na/ de'i sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ skyur khu'i nang du lan tshwa stsal la gsol
17a4('dul ba): cig dang / sos par 'gyur ro/ /des skyur khu ni/ rnyed na/ lan tshwa med nas/ de lan tshwa btsal bar brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa po linada'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ nga la
17a5('dul ba): lan tshwa rwa gang 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlabs pa zhig yod kyi/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ sbyin no/ /zhes smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus thos nas des smras pa/ tshe
17a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/ kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dus su rung ba dang 'dres pa longs spyad par mi dbang ngo snyam mo/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das
17a7('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ mi dbang ste/ dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang / thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa
17b1('dul ba): dang | zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ gal te dus su rung ba dang 'dres par gyur la/ gal te byin gyis kyang ma brlabs na/ dus su rung pa dang 'dres pas/
17b2('dul ba): dus su spyad par bya'i/ dus las 'das par mi bya'o/ /thun tshod du rung pa gang yin pa dang / zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang / 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ gal te thun tshod du rung ba dang
17b3('dul ba): 'dres par gyur la/ gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na/ thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres pas thun tshod du spyad par bya'o/ /thun tshod las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/ /zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang / 'tsho
17b4('dul ba): ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de/ zhag bdun pa dang 'dres par gyur na/ zhag bdun pa dang 'dres pas zhag bdun du spyad par bya'i/ zhag bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/ /'tsho ba'i bar
17b5('dul ba): du bcang ba gang yin pa de ni/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spyad par bya ste/ gzhan du spyod na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //sdom la/ sde chen sha dang gzhang 'brum dang / /rlung nad can dang
17b6('dul ba): gang po dang / /mes byin dang ni be'i ra to/ /sprin chen bya rog rnams yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ wA ra NA sir byon nas wA ra NA si na drang srong
17b7('dul ba): smra ba ri dwags kyi nang na bzhugs so/ /wA ra NA si na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so/ /de'i chung ma ni/ sde chen ma zhes bya'o/ /de chung ma dang bcas te
18a1('dul ba): dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi zhes bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ wA ra NA sir byon nas wA ra NA
18a2('dul ba): si na drang srong smra ba ri dwags na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khyim du lan mang du spyan drangs te zhal zas ni/ gsol na/
18a3('dul ba): yo byad thams cad kyis ma bstabs kyi/ ma la bdag gis da bcom ldan 'das la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstab par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
18a4('dul ba): nas| bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag sde chen la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
18a5('dul ba): ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
18a6('dul ba): yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas khyim bdag sde chen/ bcom ldan 'das
18a7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod de/ rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom
18b1('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun spyad
18b2('dul ba): kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams 'bul na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde chen la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag sde chen bcom ldan 'das
18b3('dul ba): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
18b4('dul ba): dang thabs cig tu khyim bdag sde chen gyis zla ba gsum du na bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gsos kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur kho na byas
18b5('dul ba): nas so/ /khyim bdag sde chen gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rnams la lta bar byed pa las/ dge slong na ba/ nad tshabs
18b6('dul ba): che ba/ sdug bsngal ba'i nad pa gzhan zhig yod pa de la/ sman pas sha khu 'thungs shig ces bstan to/ /de nas khyim bdag sde chen dge slong de gang na ba der song ste son nas/ rkang pa gnyis la mgo
18b7('dul ba): bos phyag byas te dris ba/ 'phags pa/ sman pas ci bstan/ des smras pa/ sha khu 'thungs shig lo/ /de nas khyim bdag sde chen rang gi khyim du song ste chung ma la smras pa/ slob dpon che ge mo zhes bya ba la
19a1('dul ba): sman pas sha khu 'thungs shig ces bstan gyi/ sbyor la skur cig /des bu mo zhig la rin bskur nas tshong 'dus su btang ba las/ de'i nyin mo rgyal po'i sras bltams nas/ de
19a2('dul ba): dril sgrog tu bcug ste/ sus kyang srog gcad par mi bya'o/ /gang gis srog bcad na chad pas gcod par bcad do zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas rin gyis kyang tshong 'dus su sha ma rnyed nas de nas bu mo des de
19a3('dul ba): ltar gyur pa dag / khyim bdag sde chen la rgyas par brjod pa dang / khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsam pa/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag cag gis yo byad thams
19a4('dul ba): cad kyis bstabs na/ gal te dge slong zhig sman med pas shi bar gyur na ma legs so zhes de snyam du dpyad nas/ gri rnon po blangs te khyim du zhugs nas/ brla'i sha las bcad de bu mo la byin
19a5('dul ba): nas bu sha 'di khu bar byos la 'phags pa che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer cig / des de khyer nas dge slong gis longs spyad pa las sos par gyur to// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu
19a6('dul ba): rtsa gsum pa/ dge slong des 'di ltar bdag la khyim bdag gi chung ma 'dis rang gis shas bsnyen bkur byas par rig nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyad nas/ glos
19a7('dul ba): phab ste 'dug pa ni/ rigs pa ma yin gyi/ ma la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o//
19b1('dul ba): snyam nas/ de brtson 'grus brtsam par brtsams te/ de brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / rtsal ba byas pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
19b2('dul ba): cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par
19b3('dul ba): gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems/ ste'u dang tsan+dan du mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs
19b4('dul ba): dral cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
19b5('dul ba): mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /skabs de la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ thugs su ma chud pa'am/ rnam par mi
19b6('dul ba): mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
19b7('dul ba): mdun gyis bltas te/ khyim bdag sde chen gyi khyim gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
20a1('dul ba): bdag sde chen la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /khyim bdag gi chung ma sde chen ma mi snang na/ ga re/ bcom ldan 'das spyod lam rdo mi thogs pas phugs na mchis
20a2('dul ba): so| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gang gis na rma de mdog 'dra ba dang / pags pa 'dra ba dang / ba
20a3('dul ba): spu 'dra bar 'gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas khyim bdag sde chen gyis chung ma dad pa skyes te sgor byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das
20a4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci/ khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di/ byang chub sems dpa'i spungs nyams su myong bar byed dam/ des tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sgrim mi dgos par 'khor ba na/ /lus ni
20a5('dul ba): shin tu rnyed par sla'i/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ /sbyin gnas shin tu rnyed par dka'/ /de nas khyim bdag sde chen gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar gshegs
20a6('dul ba): par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed do/ /rnam grangs su mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /rang gi lag
20a7('dul ba): gis bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos
20b1('dul ba): mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag sde chen la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs
20b2('dul ba): bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/
20b3('dul ba): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid
20b4('dul ba): la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sha rnams kyi nang na ni/ 'di lta ste/ mi'i sha tha chad yin no/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis
20b5('dul ba): mi sha bza' bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis mi'i sha zos na/ ltung ba spom por 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / ngas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge
20b6('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dge slong gi sha 'brim par byed na/ 'di ci'i sha zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gnas brtan gyis ma spobs na/ gnas brtan gnyis pas dri bar bya'o/ /dge
20b7('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong thams cad the tshom skyes nas the
21a1('dul ba): tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag sde chen gyi mchis brang gis rang gi shas dge slong 'di la bsnyen bkur bgyis
21a2('dul ba): la| dge slong 'dis kyang sde chen ma la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da
21a3('dul ba): ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang / dge slong 'di la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas te/ 'dis kyang de la brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas
21a4('dul ba): pa de/ shin tu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si'i grong na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i chung ma sde chen ma zhes
21a5('dul ba): bya'o| |ji tsam na/ bram ze tshogs 'don du bcug pa gzhan zhig bram ze'i bu lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug go /de la khyim bdag sde chen dad pa skyes te/ des de 'khor dang bcas
21a6('dul ba): pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te/ khyim bdag sde chen gyis bram ze de 'khor dang bcas pa la bkur sti kho na byas so/ /khyim bdag de'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ nang bar sngar langs te/ nad pa rnams
21a7('dul ba): la lta bar byed pa las/ ji tsam na/ bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig na ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che bar gyur nas/ de la sman pas sha khu 'thungs shig ces bstan to/ /de nas khyim bdag
21b1('dul ba): sde chen bram ze'i khye'u gang na ba der song ste son nas phyag byas te dris pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod la sman pas ci bstan/ des smras pa/ sha khu 'thungs shig lo/ /de nas khyim bdag sde chen khyim du song nas/
21b2('dul ba): chung ma la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u che ge mo zhes bya ba la sha khu 'thungs shig ces sman pas bstan gyi/ de sbyor la skur cig /des bu mo zhig la rin bskur te tshong 'dus su btang ngo / /de nyid kyi nyin mo rgyal
21b3('dul ba): po'i bu btsas nas/ des dril sgrog tu bcug ste/ sus kyang srog gcad par mi bya'o/ /gang gis srog bcad par gyur na/ de chad pas gcod par bcad do zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas tshong 'dus su rin gyis kyang sha
21b4('dul ba): ma rnyed do/ /de nas bu mo des de ltar gyur pa dag /khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma la rgyas par smras pa dang / khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsam pa/ bram ze 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la bdag cag gis
21b5('dul ba): yo byad thams cad bstabs na/ gal te bram ze'i khye'u zhig sman med pas dus byas par gyur na ma legs so/ /zhes de snyam du dpyad nas gri rnon po blangs te/ khyim gyi nang du zhugs nas brla'i sha las bcad
21b6('dul ba): de bu mo la byin nas/ bu/ sha 'di khu bar byos la/ bram ze'i khye'u che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer cig /des khyer nas bram ze'i khye'u des longs spyad nas sos par gyur to/ /bram ze'i khye'u des/ 'di ltar bdag
21b7('dul ba): la khyim bdag gi chung ma des rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas par rig nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyad nas bdag glos phab ste 'dug pa na/ rigs pa ma yin gyi/
22a1('dul ba): ma la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bdag gis 'bad par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas
22a2('dul ba): de zhi ba'i phyogs su song ste/ mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba'i chung ma gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag
22a3('dul ba): sde chen gyi chung ma 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'dis dge slong de la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas te/ 'dis kyang de la
22a4('dul ba): brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/ /da ltar yang 'dis dge slong 'di la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas so/ /dge slong 'dis kyang 'di la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te
22a5('dul ba): dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu gnag pa yin/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/ gcig tu dkar
22a6('dul ba): ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni/ 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ da phyin chad las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma ni/ spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal par bya ste/ dge
22a7('dul ba): slong dag / khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po che tsho rgu kha btag go /mu ge'i dus byung bas/ bram ze dang khyim
22b1('dul ba): bdag rnams kyis glang po che'i sha za bar brtsams so/ /drug sde'i dge slong dag /snga dro sham thabs pa gos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /ji tsam na/ khyim
22b2('dul ba): bdag gzhan zhig gis glang po che'i sha phru bar bcug ste 'tshod cing 'dug pa'i khyim der de dag zhugs pa dang / khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ dbul du cung zad kyang ma mchis kyi/ bzhud
22b3('dul ba): cig / de dag gis smras pa/ phru ba 'di'i nang na 'tshod cing 'dug na/ 'phags pa/ 'di ni/ glang po che'i sha lags na/ ci/ khyed cag kyang glang po che'i sha gsol lam/ kho bo cag ni/ 'tsho ba khyed cag la rag
22b4('dul ba): las pa yin pas/ gal te/ khyed za na/ kho bo cag la yang byin cig /de dag la phul nas/ de dag gis lhung bzed kyi snod bkang ste phyir byung ba/ dge slong gzhan dag cig bsod snyoms la rgyu ba de dag
22b5('dul ba): gis mthong ngo / /mthong nas dris pa/ e ma drug sde dag lhung bzed kyi snod khengs na/ ci yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ glang po che'i sha cung zad rnyed do/ /ci/ khyed cag glang po che'i sha yang za'am/ tshe dang ldan pa
22b6('dul ba): dag / mu ge'i dus byung ba la/ gal te gzhan ma rnyed na/ ci/ kho bo cag ltogs te 'chi'am zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
22b7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rgyal po'i glang po che tsho rgu kha btag la/ gal te khyed kyis glang po'i sha zos pa rgyal pos thos na/ khyed la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / mi dang / mi ma yin
23a1('dul ba): pa gzhan dag kyang yod pas/ 'phags pa dag glang po che'i sha za ste/ des na bdag gi glang po che tsho rgu kha btag go zhes sems par mi 'gyur ram/ dge slong dag /de lta bas
23a2('dul ba): na| dge slong dag gis glang po che'i sha longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /longs spyad na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /glang po che'i sha ji lta ba bzhin rta'i sha yang de dang 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
23a3('dul ba): 'das yul tsam pa na/ drang srong gar ga'i rdzing 'gram na bzhugs so/ /yul tsam pa'i klu dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can de/ tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung ste/ yan lag
23a4('dul ba): brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas/ gnas snang bar lus chen por byas te lus btang nas 'dug cing 'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa dag la cung zad kyang gnod pa'am skrag par
23a5('dul ba): mi byed do/ /mu ge'i dus byung bas las la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang / lug rdzi rnams dang / rtswa thun rnams dang / shing thun rnams dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang / lam gol bas
23a6('dul ba): 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis/ klu'i sha la dum bu dum bur bcad nas longs spyod par brtsams so/ /drug sde'i dge slong dag /snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos dag thogs nas bsod
23a7('dul ba): snyoms la zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na/ khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis klu'i sha phru bar bcug ste 'tshod cing 'dug pa'i khyim der de dag zhugs so/ /khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/ 'phags
23b1('dul ba): pa| dbul du cung zad kyang ma mchis kyi/ bzhud cig /de dag gis smras pa/ phru ba 'di'i nang na 'tshod cing 'dug na/ 'phags pa/ 'di ni/ klu'i sha lags na/ ci/ khyed cag kyang klu'i sha gsol lam/ kho bo cag
23b2('dul ba): ni/ 'tsho ba khyed cag la rag las pa yin pas/ gal te khyed cag za na/ kho bo cag la yang byin cig /de dag la phul nas/ 'phags pa rnams kyang longs spyod do zhes phal mo che spyad par brtsams so/ /de
23b3('dul ba): nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa 'di dag kyang klu'i sha la longs spyad pas/ skye bo'i tshogs phal mo ches longs spyad na/ bdag gi khyim thab kyis yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal
23b4('dul ba): brnag dgos/ bdag gis 'di'i phyir 'di kho na bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma de/ mtshan mo 'das nas kha dog 'phags pas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
23b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de'i tshe na tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma'i kha dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing gi nye 'khor thams cad snang ba rgya chen
23b6('dul ba): pos khyab par byas so/ /tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gi sdum thab dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can de/
23b7('dul ba): tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung ste/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas lus btang ste mchis la/ 'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa la gnod pa dang / skrag pa cung
24a1('dul ba): zad kyang mi bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dus byung bas las la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang / lug rdzi rnams dang / rtswa thun rnams dang / shing thun rnams dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams
24a2('dul ba): dang / lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha dum bu dum bur bkum nas 'tshal ba/ 'phags pa dag gis gzigs nas 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang gsol bar brtsams so/ /'phags
24a3('dul ba): pa rnams kyis gsol la de dag gis kyang phal cher bkum zhing 'tshal bar brtsams nas/ bdag gi sdum thab kyis yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal brnag 'tshal/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das
24a4('dul ba): thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ gang gi phyir 'phags pa dag klu'i sha mi gsol bar dgongs pa'i rgyu cung zhig bca' bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma la cang mi gsung
24a5('dul ba): bas gnang ngo / /de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung mas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de nyid du mi snang
24a6('dul ba): bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
24a7('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mdang sum nga'i spyan sngar tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma mtshan mo 'das nas/ kha dog 'phags pas nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo
24b1('dul ba): bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /yang de'i tshe tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma'i kha dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing gi nye 'khor thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas so/ /tsam pa'i klu'i chung
24b2('dul ba): ma phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gi sdum thab dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can de/ tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la rang gi gnas nas byung ste/
24b3('dul ba): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas lus btang ste mchis la/ 'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa la gnod pa dang skrag pa cung zad kyang mi bgyid pa mu ge'i dus byung bas las
24b4('dul ba): la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang / lug rdzi rnams dang / rtswa thun rnams dang / shing thun rnams dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang / lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha dum bu dum bur
24b5('dul ba): bkum nas 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis 'tshal ba dang / 'phags pa dag gis kyang gsol bar brtsams so/ /'phags pa rnams kyis gsol to zhes de dag gis cher bkum zhing 'tshal bar brtsams na/
24b6('dul ba): bdag gi sdum thab yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal brnag 'tshal/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ gang gi phyir 'phags pa dag klu'i sha mi gsol bar dgongs pa'i rgyu
24b7('dul ba): cung zhig bca' bar gsol zhes zer nas/ ngas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung mas nga cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis
25a1('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang la da lta lha dag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong de rnams ni/ dge ba'i chos rnams las nyams so/ /zhes smod par byed/
25a2('dul ba): 'phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa 'di ni/ bzang po ma yin/ rigs pa ma yin te/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis klu'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o/ /za na/ 'gal tshabs
25a3('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i
25a4('dul ba): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na
25a5('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lan mang du spyan drangs te/ zhal zas gsol na/ lan 'ga' yang zla ga gsum du yo byad thams
25a6('dul ba): cad kyis ma bstabs kyi/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs shing / sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyang dbul lo/ /snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po'i
25a7('dul ba): 'byor ba dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs
25b1('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin tu
25b2('dul ba): 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin
25b3('dul ba): du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos
25b4('dul ba): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
25b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du bsod snyoms dang / na bza' chos gos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams dang /
25b6('dul ba): sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'bul na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /
25b7('dul ba): de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
26a1('dul ba): bos phyag byas nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /
26a2('dul ba): bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad thams cad dang / sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis rim gro kho na byas so/ /yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan
26a3('dul ba): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos yo byad thams cad dang / sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed bstabs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang
26a4('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/ de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yin/ bdag kyang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yin la/ de'i sman pa'i rgyal po ni/ 'tsho byed yin la
26a5('dul ba): bdag gi sman pa'i rgyal po ni/ rgyun shes kyi bu yin gyi/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na byon pa de'i tshe/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la yo byad
26a6('dul ba): thams cad dang / sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu bstab par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /ji tsam na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar zhugs nas/ dbyar gyi zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos byas
26a7('dul ba): pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas/ lhung bzed dad chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas nas/ mnyan
26b1('dul ba): yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa nas mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
26b2('dul ba): na bzhugs so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das yul ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ mnyan yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
26b3('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs
26b4('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin
26b5('dul ba): du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
26b6('dul ba): 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
26b7('dul ba): tu ga bar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
27a1('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad
27a2('dul ba): rnams dang / sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu dbul na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas
27a3('dul ba): gnang ngo / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
27a4('dul ba): phyag byas nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad dang / sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes
27a5('dul ba): kyi bus/ rim gro kho na byas so/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ dge slong nad pa la
27a6('dul ba): blta ba yin no/ /ji tsam na/ dge slong gzhan zhig gzhang 'brum gyis thebs nas de skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas pas
27a7('dul ba): gyur pa de/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod ci'i phyir skya bo seng seng por gyur cing / rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyams dmas
27b1('dul ba): par gyur/ lha/ bdag gzhang 'brum gyis thebs so/ /de nas rgyal pos/ sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu la bsgo ba/ dge slong 'di'i dpyad byos shig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'chel/ de
27b2('dul ba): ma dad pas/ de ma byas so/ /ji tsam na/ rgyal pos yang dge slong de mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod rgyun shes kyi bus dpyad ma bgyis sam/ lha/ ma bgyis so/ /de nas rgyal po
27b3('dul ba): khros te/ rgyun shes kyi bu pho nyas bkug nas bsgo ba/ gal te khyod kyis dge slong 'di'i dpyad byas na/ de lta na legs/ gal te ma byas na/ khyod kyi dbang thang gcad do/ /de rang bzhin gyis
27b4('dul ba): ma dad pa zhig pas ches 'khrugs nas dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i phyir lhas bdag gi dbang thang gcod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes/ des dge slong de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor bzo bcos
27b5('dul ba): byas nas/ de dang de nas mtshon gyi las bya bar brtsams so/ /de nas dge slong de/ nyam nga ba dang / dog pa dang / gnod pa thob cing sdug bsngal rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi bzad pa/ yid du mi 'ong
27b6('dul ba): ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong nas bsam pa/ nyam nga ba/ dog pa/ gnod pa thob pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs pa lta zhig/ skabs de la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen
27b7('dul ba): pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bskul nas phyogs der gshegs pa dang / sman
28a1('dul ba): pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs der gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang kun nas dkris pa drag pos/ bcom ldan 'das
28a2('dul ba): la smras pa/ dge sbyong bran mo'i bu tshur shog /nyan thos rkub phye ba ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid slar log ste/ gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas gdan bshams
28a3('dul ba): pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa
28a4('dul ba): de'i tshe/ zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag 'byung zhing / kha cig ni/ 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni/ steng du 'gro'o/ /gang dag 'og tu song ba
28a5('dul ba): dag ni/ yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol
28a6('dul ba): ba dang / so tham tham dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a chu zer ba dang / ut+pal ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po rnams su song ste/ tsha ba'i sems can
28a7('dul ba): dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la ni/ bsil bar 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams gang dag yin pa de dag la ni/ dro bar 'bab bo/ /des sems can de rnams
28b1('dul ba): kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par dag so sor zhi bar byas so/ /de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos par gyur tam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes par gyur snyam pa
28b2('dul ba): la| de rnams dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa zhig btang ngo / /de rnams kyis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag ni/ 'di nas shi 'phos
28b3('dul ba): pa med la gzhan du skyes pa med kyis kyang / sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnams so sor zhi bar byas so/ /zhes de rnams sprul pa la sems
28b4('dul ba): mngon par dad par gyur pas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/ gang du bden pa rnams mthong ba'i snod du gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba bzung
28b5('dul ba): ngo| |gang dag steng du song ba de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /
28b6('dul ba): tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal ba dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang /
28b7('dul ba): bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal dang /
29a1('dul ba): stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i dbyangs sgrog cing / tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyang bsgrags so/ /brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par
29a2('dul ba): bya| |'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas/ /chos 'dul 'di la brtson gyur na/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug
29a3('dul ba): bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams byul nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'gro'o//
29a4('dul ba): de la/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las rnams lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni/
29a5('dul ba): mdun logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par
29a6('dul ba): nub par 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi pus mor nub par 'gyur ro/ /
29a7('dul ba): stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag
29b1('dul ba): g.yas pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams su lung ston par bzhed na ni/ sku'i lte bar nub par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal gyi nang du nub par
29b2('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdzod spur nub par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tu nub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
29b3('dul ba): 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthil du nub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar
29b4('dul ba): nas zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/ /tshogs rnams zhal gyi nang nas byung gyur la/ /ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//
29b5('dul ba): yang tshigs su bcad pa dag gsol pa/ rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par/ /rtsa lag dung ltar
29b6('dul ba): dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/ /de slad bstan pa nyid slob dus mkhyen nas/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog /nyan par 'tshal ba'i nyan pa po rnams kyi/ /the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa
29b7('dul ba): dang / /dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol/ /tshwa chu ri bo lta bur brtan pa'i mgon/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pa ci slad 'jum pa ston mdzad pa/ /skye bo phal chen
