59a5('dul ba): mdzad de/ de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po dag rtogs te/ kha cig gis ni/ thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/ kha cig gis ni/ nges par
59a6('dul ba): 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa/ kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni/ lhan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
59a7('dul ba): 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis
59b1('dul ba): ni| rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o/ /kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o/ /'khor de phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la
59b2('dul ba): bab par bkod do/ /de nas shing gi rna cha can dang / rgya skegs kyi rna cha can dang / zha nye'i rna cha can gyis/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas gdan
59b3('dul ba): bshams te/ nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la
59b4('dul ba): bab par dgongs su gsol/ de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / gau ta ma zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de gnyis kyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer slo ma lta bu na chos 'chad
59b5('dul ba): kyi dong nas mnyan par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas de gnyis klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang grong khyer slo ma lta bur chu bo lnga brgya phab nas chas so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi
59b6('dul ba): mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang ge ta ma 'di gnyis gal te grong khyer slo ma lta bur 'ongs par gyur na/ yul phung par byed par
59b7('dul ba): 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rings pa'i bsod snyoms
60a1('dul ba): longs shig / mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rings pa'i bsod snyoms ni/ lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ glo bur ba dang / 'gro bar chas pa dang /
60a2('dul ba): nad pa dang / nad g.yog dang / dge bskos so/ /skabs 'dir ni/ bcom ldan 'das dge bskos su dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis de nyid nas steng gi nam
60a3('dul ba): mkha' las gshegs so/ /bcom ldan 'das dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / go'u ta ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa/ klu'i
60a4('dul ba): dbang po/ grong khyer slo ma lta bu la soms la/ yul phung par ma bya zhig /de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag cag gang srog chags grog sbur la yang gnod pa mi
60a5('dul ba): bgyid pa de lta bu'i dad pas mchis na/ slo ma lta bu na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang go'u ta
60a6('dul ba): ma la de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas
60a7('dul ba): gsol ba'i mdzad pa brtsams pa dang / klu re re nas bsam pa/ kye ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis chu'i btung ba gsol lo snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/
60b1('dul ba): gal te gcig gi chu gsol na ni/ des na gzhan dag gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
60b2('dul ba): 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu song la/ gang na chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de las chus lhung bzed khongs la khyer te shog cig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/
60b3('dul ba): zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gang du chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de nas cus lhung bzed bkang nas khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
60b4('dul ba): der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed bkang ba'i chu phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te gsol lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/
60b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ pha dang mas ni/ bu gsos/ bsrings bskyed de nu mas bsnun/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshogs ston par byed pa yin pas shin tu
60b6('dul ba): dga' ba byed pa ste/ bus/ phrag pa gcig la ni ma bzhag/ gcig shos la ni pha bzhag nas lo brgya tshang bar khur du thogs sam/ sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUr+ya
60b7('dul ba): dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/ de lta bu'i dbang phyug la bdag por bcug kyang bus
61a1('dul ba): pha ma la de tsam gyis phan thogs pa'am/ lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis/ pha ma dad pa med pa dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du
61a2('dul ba): 'jug la/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de/ so sor 'god par byed pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang / ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
61a3('dul ba): shes rab 'chal ba shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de/ so sor 'god par byed na/ de tsam gyis/ bus pha dang ma la phan thogs
61a4('dul ba): pa dang lan lon pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs na/ bdag gis ni/ ma la lan ci yang ma lon gyi/ ma la bdag gis bdag gi ma gang du skyes pa bsam mo snyam nas/ bsam pa la zhugs
61a5('dul ba): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes par mthong ngo / /des na/ de sus gdul ba yin par brtags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yin par mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du
61a6('dul ba): sems te/ bdag lam ring po nas 'dir 'ongs pas/ ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la don 'di gsol lo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
61a7('dul ba): btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sngon dge slong dag /pha dang ma ni/ bu la shin tu dga' ba byed pa yin no zhes gsungs na/ bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes
61b1('dul ba): te| de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'dul bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
61b2('dul ba): mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dong / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ri rab kyi rtse mo la gom pa por zhing
61b3('dul ba): gshegs pa dang / zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du byon to/ /bu mo bzang mo des/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga'
61b4('dul ba): ba dang bcas pas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ kye ma'o/ /yun ring po zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo / /kye ma'o/ /yun ring mo ring mo zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo / /de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos smras pa/
61b5('dul ba): shes ldan dag /rab tu byung ba 'di ni/ rgan na/ ji ltar bu mo 'di/ de'i ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bo'i lus 'di 'dis bskyed de/
61b6('dul ba): des na kho bo'i ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun par 'phags pa'i bden pa
61b7('dul ba): bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bu mo bzang mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
62a1('dul ba): mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi rnams su rab tu bzhag ces bya ba'i bar
62a2('dul ba): gong ma bzhin no/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pas mi bzad pa'i/ /ngan song lam ni khyod kyi mthus bcad do/ /mtho ris 'gro ba bsod nams bzang ldan phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam
62a3('dul ba): yang bdag gis thob/ /khyod la brten nas shin tu rnam dag mig /nyes dang bral bas dag pa deng 'dir thob/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang zhi thob nas/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol
62a4('dul ba): bdag gis brgal/ /'gro bar lha min lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye rga 'chi dang na dang rnam bral ba/ /srid pa stong du rnyed par rab dka' ba/ /thub pa khyod mthong deng 'dir 'bras bur bcas/ /
62a5('dul ba): btsun pa/ bdag ni/ 'phags shing mngon par 'phags te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan
62a6('dul ba): chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsam pa thag pas skyabs su mchi bar mngon par spro lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang thabs cig tu deng bsod snyoms sbyor zhing
62a7('dul ba): mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo bzang po de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bu mo bzang mos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig
62b1('dul ba): ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gdan la bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag
62b2('dul ba): nas stob cing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag /rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol
62b3('dul ba): zin nas/ phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bting nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang / de la bcom
62b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis chos bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos blangs te 'khru bar byed pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u
62b5('dul ba): 'gal gyis bu/ 'dong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das/ gshegs so/ /su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi'o/ /gal te de lta na/ rgyal byed kyi tshal soms shig /bcom ldan 'das/ 'o
62b6('dul ba): skol byon lags sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ yu bu phyin zin to/ /de nas ngo mtshar du dad pa'i yid kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming ci lags/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu
62b7('dul ba): yid mgyogs yin no/ /btsun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo de lta bu ni/ bdag gi glo bar ma chud do/ /gal te bdag gis glo bar chud par gyur na/ bdag gi lus til gyi phye ma ltar bgyis kyang bla na
63a1('dul ba): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ni/ shing tshig pa bzhin cir bgyir yang ma mchis so/ /dge slong rnams the
63a2('dul ba): tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa/
63a3('dul ba): nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des bran mo'i mngal du skyes shing rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon
63a4('dul ba): sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gang po nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi
63a5('dul ba): za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/ gang pos las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags
63a6('dul ba): pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/ las dge ba dang
63a7('dul ba): mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs
63b1('dul ba): dang dus/ /rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs
63b2('dul ba): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
63b3('dul ba): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA sir nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas sde snod
63b4('dul ba): gsum par gyur te/ chos bzhin gyis dge 'dun gyi zhal ta pa byed do/ /re zhig cig na dgra bcom pa zhig la dge bskos bab ste/ des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang / rlung
63b5('dul ba): langs pas phyag dar phan tshun du khyer bar gyur to/ /des bsam pa/ re zhig rlung zhi bar gyur gyi bar du gzhag go snyam pa las/ ji tsam na gtsug lag khang de ma phyags pa zhal ta pa des mthong
63b6('dul ba): nas| de kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngag rtsub po'i las phyung ba/ bran mo'i bu gang zhig dge bskos byed/ dgra bcom pa des mthong nas/ des bsam pa/ 'di kun nas dkris pa yin pas
63b7('dul ba): re zhig bzhag la phyis go bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ khyod kyis kho bo su yin shes sam/ des smras pa/ shes te/ khyod
64a1('dul ba): dang kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin no/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta yin mod kyi/ kho bos ni/ rab tu
64a2('dul ba): byung ba'i bya ba byas te/ /kho bo ni/ 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol ba yin la/ khyod ni/ 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin pas/ khyod kyis ngag rtsub po'i las phyung gi/ nyes pa la
64a3('dul ba): nyes par shogs shig dang / des na las de srab pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /des nyes pa las nyes par bshags pa/ sems can dmyal bar skye zhing bran
64a4('dul ba): mo'i bur 'gyur ba las/ de sems can dmyal bar ma skyes par tshe rabs lnga brgyar bran mo'i mngal du skyes te/ da ltar gyi bar du srid pa tha ma la yang bran mo'i mngal du skyes par gyur to/ /
64a5('dul ba): gang yang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ phyug pa dang / nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes so/ /gang yang de na bklags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang /
64a6('dul ba): khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par byas pa des na/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra
64a7('dul ba): bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gcig tu gnag pa yin/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin
64b1('dul ba): pa ni/ gcig tu dkar ba yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni/ 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni/ spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar
64b2('dul ba): ba la brtsam par bya ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
64b3('dul ba): pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gleng gzhi ni/ rgyal po'i khab na'o/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na/ klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo gnas so/ /de nyid kyi mthus/ dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang rtag
64b4('dul ba): tu 'bab la/ chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang skam par mi 'gyur/ lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/ lo tog rnams kyang lhag par legs par 'gyur ro/ /
64b5('dul ba): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis btul ba na/ de gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas/ nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed du 'ong
64b6('dul ba): ngo| |de nas klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang / ri bo 'di snyam du sems te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo 'di gnyis/ ri rab kyi bang rim nas nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la
64b7('dul ba): bsnyen bkur byed cing 'ong na/ bdag cag 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni/ bzang po ma yin gyi/ ma la bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das
65a1('dul ba): la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/
65a2('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de gnyis la de 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas de gnyis sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong
65a3('dul ba): zhing / chos dang dge 'dun la'ang skyabs su dong nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa
65a4('dul ba): de'i tshe lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur to/ /de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
65a5('dul ba): nas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis shing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos pa de'i tshe/ lus dang longs spyod lhag
65a6('dul ba): par 'phel bar gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ bdag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
65a7('dul ba): stsal pa/ klu'i dbang po dag /khyed rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa yin gyi/ rgyal po la rtogs shig /de gnyis kyis bsam pa dang / don gyis na/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis
65b1('dul ba): rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes smras nas/ de nyid na gnas so/ /klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang / ri bo'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ gal te nub mo bcom ldan 'das bltar 'gro na ni/ lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis so/
65b2('dul ba): 'on te nyin par na ni/ khyim bdag gi cha byad kyis so/ /de gnyis khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas shing nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal
65b3('dul ba): rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi kun du spyod pa ni/ de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ 'ga' zhig bdag mthong na/ ldang bar mi byed pa med grang zhes mi gnang chen
65b4('dul ba): gtong bar byed de/ des mi gnang chen zhig mngags te/ kye/ nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed ltos shig /de song ba las ji tsam na/ khyim bdag gnyis shig
65b5('dul ba): mthong nas des bsam pa/ 'di gnyis ni/ lha'i yul na gnas pas ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed snyam nas/ des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha khyim bdag gnyis shig mchis pa ni/ lha'i yul
65b6('dul ba): nyid na gnas pa lags so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bsam pa/ de gnyis kyis bdag mthong na ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed kyi/ 'gro'o/ /snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na
65b7('dul ba): ba der song ba dang / klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang / ri bos rgyal po gzugs can snying po mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal
66a1('dul ba): po gzugs can snying po mchis na/ ci/ re zhig rgyal po la bsti stang bgyi'am/ 'on te chos la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i
66a2('dul ba): dbang po dag / chos la bsti stang byos shig /dam pa'i chos la ni/ 'di ltar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bla mar byed la/ chos la ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyang bla mar byed
66a3('dul ba): do| |tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang / /ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin dang / /da ltar sangs rgyas gang yin pa/ /mang po'i mya ngan 'joms mdzad
66a4('dul ba): pa| |bzhud dang bzhugs dang 'byon 'gyur ba/ /thams cad dam chos bla mar byed/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin/ /de bas 'dir bdag phan 'dod pa/ /bdag nyid chen por 'dod pa
66a5('dul ba): yis| |sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te/ /dam pa'i chos la bkur sti bya/ /de gnyis kyis ldang ba ma byas so/ /de nas rgyal po mi bzod pa skyes te/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
66a6('dul ba): kyis chos bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang dang ni 'khrug pa dang / /ma dad pa yi sems kyis ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
66a7('dul ba): kyis bshad pa'i/ /dam chos shes par mi nus so/ /gang gis khros dang bag med pa'i/ /sems ni dul bar byas pa dang / /'di la mnar sems spangs pa des/ /legs par gsungs
66b1('dul ba): pa shes par 'gyur/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ khyim bdag 'di gnyis 'ongs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi chos nyan pa'i bar yang chad par gyur to snyam nas/ de stan las langs
66b2('dul ba): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo / /de song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ khyim bdag 'di gnyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas
66b3('dul ba): dong ba de'i tshe khyed gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug cig ces sgos shig / de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ba dang / blon po bdag gis bsgo ba/
66b4('dul ba): lha'i zhal nas/ khyed cag gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug cig ces gsung ngo / /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal mchi'o/ /bsam pa/ bdag cag gnyis kyis/ yun ring po
66b5('dul ba): zhig nas bsam pa gang yin pa de ni tshegs chung dus grub bo/ /snyam mo/ /de nas 'od pa'i chu chen po nas phyung nas grog mo chung ngu'i nang du zhugs so/ /grog mo chung du nas grog mo chen por ro/ /grog mo
66b6('dul ba): chen po nas chu bran du'o/ /chu bran nas chu chen por ro/ /chu chen po nas rgya mtsho chen por te/ gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ de gnyis phyir zhing lus dang longs spyod shin tu 'phel bar
66b7('dul ba): gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur la
67a1('dul ba): thug / lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma bab pas lo nyes par gyur te/ mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar
67a2('dul ba): gyur to/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ rgyal po'i khab 'di na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang grog mkhar gnas te/ de gnyis kyi mthus/ dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang 'bab/ chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u
67a3('dul ba): rnams kyang chu che/ lhas kyang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pa nyid kyis lo tog legs par rgyas par gyur na/ da ni/ dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams
67a4('dul ba): kyang chung ba dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur la thug /lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pas lo nyes par gyur te/ mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo bas
67a5('dul ba): zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / grog mkhar shi'am/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis khyer ba'am/ sbrul khas sdigs kyis bzung ba'am/ des
67a6('dul ba): 'jigs nas bros par ma gyur grang / de lta mod kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin gyi/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
67a7('dul ba): la zhu'o/ /snyam du bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
67b1('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de gnyis ni/ shi
67b2('dul ba): ba yang ma yin/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis kyang ma khyer/ sbrul khas sdigs kyis kyang ma bzung / des 'jigs pas kyang ma bros mod kyi/ rgyal po khyod nyid kyis yul nas bskrad do/ /
67b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de gnyis mthong bar yang mi dran na/ de gnyis yul nas bskrad pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po/ ngas khyod dran par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis
67b4('dul ba): khyim bdag gnyis shig yul nas bskrad pa dran nam/ bcom ldan 'das/ dran lags so/ /de gnyis ni/ klu'i rgyal po ri po dang grog mkhar yin no/ /btsun pa/ de gnyis gang du mchis/
67b5('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen por dong ngo / /bdag gi yul ma rung bar gyur lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de gnyis la bzod pa byin cig dang / ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po na mchis na/
67b6('dul ba): ji ltar bzod pa stsal/ de gnyis tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi la khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang / ngas rtags bstan gyis/ khyod kyis
67b7('dul ba): bzod pa byin cig / bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ bdag gis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi'am/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang lag pa rkyongs la klu'i dbang po bzod par
68a1('dul ba): gsol lo/ /zhes smros shig dang bzod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos de gnyis 'ongs pa la 'bad de sdod cing 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na/ de gnyis khyim bdag
68a2('dul ba): gi cha byad du byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang / de ma thag tu rgyal po yang 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags bstan pa dang / rgyal pos lag pa mngon du brkyangs
68a3('dul ba): nas smras pa/ klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod par gsol lo/ /rgyal po chen po/ bzod par bgyi'o/ /gal te bzod par gyur na/ 'dir spyon cig /rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
68a4('dul ba): las bdag cag gis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas de nyid kyi tshe bdag cag gi lus dang longs spyod skyes te/ gal te da che bzhin du 'dir 'ongs na/ yul ma
68a5('dul ba): ga d+ha ru yang mi shong bar 'gyur ro/ /'o na yul ma ga d+ha ma rung bar 'gyur mod/ ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar mi 'gyur/ khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khang bzang gnyis brtsigs la/
68a6('dul ba): zla ba drug cing dus mchod kyis shig dang / kho bo cag gi 'khor bzhag la/ dus mchod kyi tshe yang 'du bar bya'o/ /rgyal pos de bzhin du byed pa dang / de gnyis kyis 'khor dag kyang
68a7('dul ba): bzhag la/ dus mchod kyang rang nyid nyams su myong bar byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ de dag gi 'khor bag med par gnas pa na/ klu gdug pa dag gis glags rnyed nas/
68b1('dul ba): de dag gis ser ba dbab par brtsams so/ /rgyal po'i khab na/ bram ze ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod de/ des de bab cing bab pa dag bcad pa dang / de la yul ma ga d+ha na gnas
68b2('dul ba): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis dbang thang byin no/ /lho phyogs na/ bram ze mes byin zhes bya ba ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa zhig yod pa des/ byang phyogs na/ yul nus pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/
68b3('dul ba): de na rgyal po sde mchog ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /de'i yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yod de/ de na sman mthu che ba pha rol gnon pa yod par thos nas/ de'i ched 'gro'o/ /zhes
68b4('dul ba): de chas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ bram ze ser ba'i sngags 'chang ba de'i gnas su zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na/ ser ba chen po 'bab pa bram ze gnyug mar gnas pa des gcad
68b5('dul ba): par ma nus nas/ de phyir byung / nang du zhugs par byed pa dang / bram ze mes byin gyis dris pa/ mkhan po/ ci'i slad du mkhan po 'di phyir byung / nang du zhugs par mdzad des smras pa/ bu/ ser ba
68b6('dul ba): chen po bab pa gcad par ma nus par bas mod/ bdag gis dgum mo/ bu legs so/ /de chu nyung zhig la bzlas te gtor bas tshal pa brgyar gyes so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim
68b7('dul ba): bdag rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas rngan pa thogs te/ bram ze de'i khyim du dong nas smras pa/ mkhan po/ rgyal po'i khab kyi skye bo'i tshogs mngon par dga' bar gyur gyi/ rngan pa
69a1('dul ba): longs shig / ci'i phyir/ khyod kyis ser ba chen po khums pa'i slad du'o/ /des smras pa/ kho bos ni/ ma bcad de/ 'on kyang bram ze 'dis bcad do/ /de
69a2('dul ba): dag bram ze de'i drung du dong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug cig dang / dbang thang sbyin no/ /de bzhin du gnas par bya'o/ /zhes de gnas so/ /des ser ba de dus tha gi tsam zhig gi bar
69a3('dul ba): du sngags kyis bgags te mi 'bab par gyur to/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag nyid kyi bsod nams kyis ser ba mi
69a4('dul ba): 'bab na/ ci'i phyir de la dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do/ /bram ze des sngags brtul nas yul nus pa can du song ba dang phyir yang ser ba 'bab par gyur to/ /de rnams bram ze
69a5('dul ba): de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ mkhan po/ bram ze'i khye'u de gar mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag gis de la bkur sti ma byas pas de song ngo / /mkhan po/ gal te mchis na/ bdag cag
69a6('dul ba): la sbron cig / de bzhin du bya'o/ /de yang rim gyis rgyal po sde mchog gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po sde mchog la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba dag byas nas smras pa/ lha khyod kyi
69a7('dul ba): yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis pa de'i gnas na/ mod la mthu skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sman mchis kyi/ lhas de ston cig dang / lha'i skal ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /
69b1('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/ kye bram ze/ klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes ni/ gtum po yin pas des khyod brlag par mi byed grang / lha/ re zhig bdag la sngags kyi mthu dang sman gyi mthu mchis te/ gal te
69b2('dul ba): klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes dang 'dra ba'i klu rnams kyis dzam+bu'i gling 'di lta ste/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin gang bar gyur kyang / bdag gi ba spu gcig kyang bskyod par
69b3('dul ba): rngo mi thogs na/ klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'on kyang lha'i mi dgum pa la thug pa 'ga' mchis sam/ bram ze/ yod do/ /lha/ dkri zhig dang / des de'i gnas ston par
69b4('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal pos mi de la bos te bsgo ba/ kye nang rje/ bram ze 'di la klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas ston cig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po'i ltar mnyan
69b5('dul ba): nas bram ze de khrid de chas so/ /ji tsam na/ mi ring ba zhig tu bsdad nas de la smras pa/ bram ze/ tshal sngo zhing sngo ba dag sbrengs pa pha bi mthong ngam/ mthong ngo / /de ni/ klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes
69b6('dul ba): kyi gnas yin no/ /de song ste/ des der mod la mthu bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman las khur du sbrags nas des de thogs te/ yul nus pa can du song nas rgyal po sde mchog gi skal pa byin te/
69b7('dul ba): rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ bram ze de nyid kyi khyim du zhugs so/ /de nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la sbran pa dang / de dag mchod yon thogs te lhags
70a1('dul ba): nas| bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug cig / dbang thang sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ khyed cag gis bkur sti ma byas pas kho bo mi 'dug go /de rnams kyis de gzhag
70a2('dul ba): par gal gyis 'chu bar brtsams te gsol ba btab pa dang / khas blangs nas de dag gis 'tsho ba'i ris bcad do/ /'jig rten ni/ phun sum tshogs pa 'dod kyi/ rgyud pa dang mi mthun pas/
70a3('dul ba): des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa
70a4('dul ba): na| khye'u zhig btsas te/ des de'i ming ri bo can zhes bya bar btags so/ /de/ yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i ming ni/ ser
70a5('dul ba): ba zhes bya bar btags so/ /bram ze mo ni/ 'khor bral zhes bya'o/ /mna' ma ni/ klog ces bya'o/ /des bsam pa/ yang dang yang du ser ba gcod cing ci las med yun ring rab tu sngags kyis
70a6('dul ba): bgag par bya'o/ /zhes des yun ring por sngags kyis bgag pa byas te bzhag pas ser ba mi 'bab par gyur to/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag
70a7('dul ba): kho na'i bsod nams kyi mthus ser ba mi 'bab na/ ci'i phyir dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do/ /bram ze de phrag dog gis zil gyis non pas bu yang sngags kyi tshig rnams 'dzin
70b1('dul ba): du ma bcug go / bde ba la chags pas kha ton yang ma byas la/ sman yang skam du ma bcug go /des sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/ bsam na brjed/ sman ni/ ma bskams pas rul bar gyur
70b2('dul ba): to| |de rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la snying na ches nas/ de rnams la klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mu stegs kyi gnas dang / dka' thub kyi tshal de dang de dag tu song nas dris pa/ shes
70b3('dul ba): ldan dag / gang gis gang bsam pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ mer zhugs shig /kha cig gis smras pa/ dug
70b4('dul ba): zo zhig / kha cig gis smras pa/ g.yang sa nas bdag nyid mchongs shig /kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag rang gi ske la thag pa thogs te/ shing gi yal ga las 'phyang du chug cig /ces thams cad
70b5('dul ba): kyis 'chi ba'i thabs bstan gyi/ nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ni/ ma yin pas/ de rim gyis 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo / /des dge slong zhig mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ gang gis gang bsam pa
70b6('dul ba): dang gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta 'ga' mchis sam/ de smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu phyung zhig /der ci zhig bgyi/ der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
70b7('dul ba): tshangs par spyod pa yang spyad par bya/ bsam gtan dang gdon pa dang ldan par yang gnas par bya ste/ gal te re zhig mthong ba'i chos nyid la kun shes pa thob pa na/ des na de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal
71a1('dul ba): gyi mthar phyin pa yin no/ /'on te sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin dus byed na/ gang bsam pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
71a2('dul ba): ro| |'phags pa/ /de ni rngo mi thogs na/ gzhan yang cung zad ci mchis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol cig /de yang rngo mi thogs na/
71a3('dul ba): gzhan bstan du gsol/ bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol te/ smon lam thob cig dang / gang bsam pa dang gang don du gnyer ba de
71a4('dul ba): thams cad 'grub bo/ /'phags pa/ de ni/ rngo thogs kyi/ bgyi'o/ /zhes bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drangs te/ gdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab pa/
71a5('dul ba): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag der skye zhing de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig /ces smon lam btab bo/ /de la chung mas
71a6('dul ba): dris pa/ rje'i sras/ smon lam ci zhig btab/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ rab mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag der skye zhing de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par
71a7('dul ba): gyur cig / ces smon lam btab bo/ /legs te/ bdag kyang khyod kyi chung mar gyur cig /bus smras pa/ bdag kyang khyod kyi bur gyur cig /de bzhin du bu mos smras pa/ bdag kyang
71b1('dul ba): khyod kyi bu mor gyur cig/ de bzhin du mna' mas smras pa/ bdag kyang mna' mar gyur cig/ ces byas nas/ de rnams khyim rnying pa zhig tu zhugs te nyal ba dang / sprin kha dog lnga pa las
71b2('dul ba): char babs te/ rtsig pa 'gyel bas non te kha btag go /klu rab mdzes shi 'phos nas 'khor drug khri dang skyes nas/ de yang rab mdzes zhes bya bar grags so/ /chung ma 'khor bral zhes
71b3('dul ba): bya'o| |bu ni/ ri bo can zhes bya'o/ /bu mo ni/ ser ba zhes bya'o/ /mna' ma ni/ klog ces bya'o/ /chos nyid kyis/ klu'am/ klu'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon par gnas gsum dran par 'gyur te/
71b4('dul ba): gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o/ /des bltas na/ mi las shi 'phos so/ /gang du skyes she na/ klu rnams su'o/ /las gang gis she na/ smon lam
71b5('dul ba): gyi dbang gis so/ /ci'i phyir snyam na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir ro/ /des bsam pa/ ci/ lo tog ji lta ba bzhin du skyes pa la bya na/ mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal skye bar
71b6('dul ba): 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma skyes pa rnams la 'gyur snyam na/ des ji ltar skyes pa la byas pa ltar ma skyes pa la ni de ltar ma yin par mthong nas/ des 'khor rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan tshur
71b7('dul ba): shog/ yul ma ga d+har dengs la char pas lo tog thams cad skrun cig/ de rnams kyis lo tog thams cad bskrun pa dang / de nas drug stong gi 'khor dang / gshol mda' tsam gyi char
72a1('dul ba): gyi rgyun gyis ji ltar yul ma ga d+har sog ma yang khyer ba de lta bu'i char gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams so/ /de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/ sog ma yang klu 'dis
72a2('dul ba): 'phrog go/ zhes de'i ming sog ma med ces bya bar thogs so/ /sdom la/ rgyal po'i khab dang nA lan+da/ /'od ma'i dbyug pa dmar bu'i grong / /chu bo gang+gA sprin brtsegs dang / /sgra chen yangs pa
72a3('dul ba): tha ma yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe gzhon nu ma skyes dgra lhas sbyin gyis rbad nas/ pha chos kyi rgyal
72a4('dul ba): po| chos dang ldan pa bsad de rang nyid kyis cod pan bcings nas/ rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa mang po bya bar brtsams te/ dgongs pa man chad
72a5('dul ba): bya ba'i phyir glang po che nor skyong dang / khyi gtum po za ba dag rbad pa dang / de'i ma/ lus 'phags mas smras pa/ bu/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa ma byed cig /sangs
72a6('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin gyi/ rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de gnod par gyur ta re/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus yul ang+ga dang / ma
72a7('dul ba): ga d+ha rnams 'byor cing nyams dga' ba yin no/ /snying rnyog pa can des smras pa/ ci/ gang na bcom ldan 'das med pa'i yul de dag zhig pa dang / stongs par gyur tam/ de nas
72b1('dul ba): thams cad kyi thams cad du bzlog kyang ma btub nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gzhon nu ma skyes dgra 'di/ bsod nams ma yin pa mang du gsog gi/ ngas 'di gzhi med pa'i
72b2('dul ba): dad pa la gzhag tu re zhig de'i dus la ma bab pas mnyan yod du gshegs so/ /snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu
72b3('dul ba): zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mtha'i rgyal phran
72b4('dul ba): dag gis bcom ldan 'das la ma skyes dgras bkur sti ma yin pa byas pas de bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs nas rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te mnyan yod du byon to/ /zhes thos nas/ de
72b5('dul ba): dag 'di snyam du sems te/ re zhig rgyal po sdig can des/ pha chos kyi rgyal po/ chos dang ldan pa bsad na/ des kyang mchog nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi rnams
72b6('dul ba): kyis mchod pa de la yang bkur sti ma yin pa byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas
72b7('dul ba): gshegs te mnyan yod du byon par gyur pas/ de yong ye rgyal srid las dbyung bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de dag gis phan tshun pho nyas bzlugs nas blo gros gcig tu byas te/ dpung gi
73a1('dul ba): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon pa/ glang po che ba'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang rgyal po'i
73a2('dul ba): khab tu dong ste/ lo bcom nas phru mar bskor te 'khod de/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyis kyang ser ba'i rgyun phab pas lo tog lhag ma rnams ma rung par byas so/ /dka' thub kyi chu
73a3('dul ba): lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams bskams la thug pas mu ge byung bar gyur to/ /chu lhag ma gzhan dag kyang mtha'i rgyal phran dag gis dug gis ma rung bar
73a4('dul ba): byas so/ /de nas ma skyes dgra /sdug bsngal mi bzang pa/ rtsub pa/ nyam nga bar gyur pa la mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de rma la thal bas btab pa ltar mi ngas gyung ste/ khyogs
73a5('dul ba): dang khyogs 'drud par gyur te/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ gnod pa brgya phrag du mas snying dkrugs pas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de nas
73a6('dul ba): lus 'phags mas smras pa/ bu/ ci'i phyir sems khong du chud/ yum/ gnod pa brgya phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to/ /bu/ kho mos sngar khyod la bcom ldan 'das la
73a7('dul ba): bkur sti ma yin pa ma byed cig/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu drug pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa yin gyi/
73b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de gnod par gyur ta re zhes ma smras sam/ de ni/ 'di yin no/ /yum/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bu/ bcom ldan 'das la bzod par
73b2('dul ba): gsol cig/ yum/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bu/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ khong khro ba
73b3('dul ba): dang rjes su chags pa spangs pa yin no/ /zhes ma thos sam/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dpung pa gcig la ste'us 'jog par byed la/ gcig shos la
73b4('dul ba): tsan+dan sa mchog gis nyug par byed na/ de la/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags pa yang mi mnga'/ khong khro ba yang mi mnga'o/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi
73b5('dul ba): zhig la smras pa/ kye nang rje tshur shog/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la son nas/ kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ gnod
73b6('dul ba): pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa mi mnga'am/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par bzhugs sam zhes snyun gsol la/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol
73b7('dul ba): cig| btsun pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mchid nas/ btsun pa/ bu ngan pa ni/ mchis kyi/ pha ngan pa ni/ ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs
74a1('dul ba): brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na/ ring por mi thogs pa kho nar rgyal
74a2('dul ba): po'i khab kyi grong khyer stongs te ming lus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsol cig/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas chas te/
74a3('dul ba): rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
74a4('dul ba): go |phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan
74a5('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas bde ba la reg par bzhugs sam/ zhes snyun gsol lags so/ /zhes
74a6('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /kye/ mi khyod dang / lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga
74a7('dul ba): d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mchid nas/ btsun pa/ bu ngan pa ni/ mchis kyi/ pha ngan pa ni/ ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal po'i
74b1('dul ba): khab tu gshegs su gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na zhes bya ba nas ming lus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas mi de la
74b2('dul ba): gnang ngo / /de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ji srid bzhed kyi bar du mnyan yod du bzhugs nas/
74b3('dul ba): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yul ma ga d+har byon to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus rlung gtong ba'i
74b4('dul ba): lha'i bu rnams kyis ni/ dug gis ma rung bar byas pa'i chu de dag bskams so/ /char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis ni/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ngo / /lha rnams ni/ char pa
74b5('dul ba): 'bebs pa la zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis ni/ rgyal po'i khab nas mi ma yin pa rnams bskrad nas mi ngas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mtha'i rgyal phran dag gis ni/ bcom
74b6('dul ba): ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong nas grong khyer bskor ba btang ste dong ngo / /tshong pa rnams kyis ni/ zong dag bkram mo/ /bzo phal pa gzhan dag gis ni/ rang rang byed par brtsams so/ /yul so
74b7('dul ba): so na gnas pa'i tshong pa rnams dang / ded dpon rnams ni/ zong dang 'jug par brtsams so/ /lo ni/ legs par gyur to/ /lam po che dang / srang dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo rnams su
75a1('dul ba): ni| bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid chen po sgrog par gyur to/ /mu stegs pa rnams ni bag 'khums par gyur to/ /skye bo'i tshogs rnams ni/ rab tu dga'
75a2('dul ba): bar gyur to/ /lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+har gshegs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang snying dga' ba dang / mgu
75a3('dul ba): ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ dengs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir dpag tshad phyed
75a4('dul ba): dang gsum gyi lam bstar ba dang / grong khyer dag bzang por byos shig /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad kyang rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo sel te tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag
75a5('dul ba): thob la dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po pyongs shig / dri zhim po'i pog phor dag shoms la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dag tshugs shig /bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med mdzes pa dag byos
75a6('dul ba): shig| lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas thams cad rgyas par byed du bcug go/ de
75a7('dul ba): nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pa dang / rgyal po chen po'i mthus/ bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bsur song
75b1('dul ba): ngo| |de nas bcom ldan 'das dul pa 'khor du ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra
75b2('dul ba): bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral/ mdzes par 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang
75b3('dul ba): po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi
75b4('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo dmag gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam
75b5('dul ba): mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshong dpon rang gi skye bos bskor ba lta bu/ rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs
75b6('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los bsgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri
75b7('dul ba): pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lus 'phags po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor
76a1('dul ba): ba lta bu/ thag bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi
76a2('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu rgya mtsho mi g.yo ba lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po che dam pa rgyags pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bsam g.yeng pa'i spyod
76a3('dul ba): pa can/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong gi 'od zer
76a4('dul ba): bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa gsum dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / thugs rje chen po
76a5('dul ba): dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang po dang lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / lha brgya stong phrag du mas zham ring byas te rgyal po'i khab kyi
76a6('dul ba): grong khyer du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas
76a7('dul ba): mnan pa de'i tshes rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / shar phyogs
76b1('dul ba): mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho
76b2('dul ba): na mtha' dma' bar gyur to/ /'jig rten 'di/ 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas pa thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /lhas kyang bar snang la rnga brdungs so/ /nam mkha'
76b3('dul ba): la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / gur
76b4('dul ba): gum gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / gos dag 'thor bar byed de/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ de lta bu'i ya mtshan dag
76b5('dul ba): byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang / dog pa dag ni/ yangs par gyur to/ /dma' ba dag ni/ mtho bar gyur to/ /mtho ba dag ni/ phya le bar gyur to/ /glang po che dag ni/ skad 'byin par gyur
76b6('dul ba): to| |rta dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to/ /khyu mchog dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to/ /khyim gyi nang na bzhag pa'i snod sna tshogs dag ni/ ma brdungs par rang sgra 'byin par gyur te/ long
76b7('dul ba): ba rnams kyis ni/ mig thob par gyur to/ /'on pa rnams ni/ rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/ /lkugs pa rnams ni/ smra nus par gyur to/ /dbang po lhag ma ma tshang ba rnams ni/ dbang po so sor
77a1('dul ba): thob par gyur to/ /chang gis myos pa rnams ni/ myos pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /dug 'thungs pa dag zhi bar gyur to/ /phan tshun 'khon byung ba rnams ni/ mdza'
77a2('dul ba): bar gyur to/ /sbrum ma dag ni/ bde bar btsas par gyur to/ /btson du bcings pa dag ni/ thar par gyur to/ /nor med pa dag ni/ nor rnyed par gyur to/ /de lta bu'i 'byor pa de mthong nas/
77a3('dul ba): dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yul gang zhig tu 'jig rten gtso bor gshegs pa der/ /lo nyes mi ngas dang ni phyi dgra'i 'jigs pa med/ /lha rnams char 'bebs
77a4('dul ba): skye bo bsod nams rab tu byed/ /der ni ya mtshan rgya phrag gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/ skye bo'i tshogs dbugs phyung nas
77a5('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste 'od ma'i tshal du gshegs so/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
77a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga
77a7('dul ba): d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad ces bya
77b1('dul ba): ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
77b2('dul ba): stsal pa la mngon par bstod de/ rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
77b3('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang /
77b4('dul ba): snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi
77b5('dul ba): gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
77b6('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/
77b7('dul ba): zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de nas sangs rgyas la mngon par dga'
78a1('dul ba): ba'i lha rnams kyis/ mi ngas de bskrad nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas sgra sgrog ces bya ba'i nang du byung ste yangs pa can du 'dug nas/ yangs pa can gyi skye bo'i
78a2('dul ba): tshogs la mi ngas byung bar gyur te khyogs dang khyogs 'drud par gyur to/ /yangs pa can na bram ze mdun na 'don mda' bo che zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i rmi lam na/ yangs pa can na gnas
78a3('dul ba): pa'i lha zhig gis smras pa/ gal te mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog /shAkya'i rigs dag pa yi bcom ldan 'das/ /yangs pa can du gshegs par gyur na ni/ /gnod pa rnams ni rnam par 'jig
78a4('dul ba): par 'gyur/ /des nam langs nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag gi rmi lam 'di 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/
78a5('dul ba): de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya su zhig gtang zhes phan tshun bgro bar brtsams pa dang / mdun na 'don dma' bo che 'di nyid thams cad du nus pa
78a6('dul ba): yin la/ bdag cag la byams pa yin gyi/ gtang ngo / /de la de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin nas/ bdag cag gi tshig gis bcom ldan 'das
78a7('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas snyun gsol la zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di skad ces kyang gsol
78b1('dul ba): cig |btsun pa/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs su gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du ma gshegs na/ ring por mi thogs pa
78b2('dul ba): kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur zhes gsol cig / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ni/ khyed la yun ring du
78b3('dul ba): gnod pa byed pa'i phyir rgol ba dgra bor gyur pa yin pas/ bdag la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur grang / de dag gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yul 'khor gzhan dang 'gyed par yang //
78b4('dul ba): pho nya mi gsod ces grag na/ /khyod ni rgyal ba'i pho nya yin/ /kun gyis mi gsod smos ci dgos/ /de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo che/ dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su
78b5('dul ba): 'gyur ba dag byas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de lam gyis dub pa bsal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du
78b6('dul ba): yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mdun na 'don mda'
78b7('dul ba): bo ches/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye go'u ta ma/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa
79a1('dul ba): chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol lags
79a2('dul ba): so| |mda' bo che khyod dang / yangs pa can gyi tshogs bde bar gyur cig /kye go'u ta ma/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs su gsol/
79a3('dul ba): gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du ma gshegs na/ ring por mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stong shing ming tsam lus par 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
79a4('dul ba): stsal pa/ mda' bo che/ 'dir nga nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs
79a5('dul ba): pas rgyal po la rtogs shig / gal te rgyal pos gnang na/ nga de bzhin du gshegs par bya'o/ /des yangs pa can du bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'di skad ces gsung ngo / /zhes spring ngo / /
79a6('dul ba): de rnams kyis kyang spring pa/ de nyid kyi phyir khyod lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song la son nas bdag cag gi tshig gis lus 'phags ma'i
79a7('dul ba): bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang / bde ba la reg par gnas
79b1('dul ba): sam zhes kyang dris la/ 'di skad ces/ lha/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ lhas gal te bcom ldan 'das la rjes
79b2('dul ba): su ma gnang na/ ring por mi thogs pa kho nar yangs par can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smros shig /de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo ches bsam pa/ ci/ re zhig rgyal po la
79b3('dul ba): bsnyen par bya'am/ 'on te blon po rnams la bya snyam du bsam pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'ga' zhig gi ngag las bsnyen par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bsnyen par byed pa la bsnyen par bya'o/
79b4('dul ba): zhes 'byung bas/ mdor na/ blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya bar brtsams so/ /de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ mdun na 'don dgos
79b5('dul ba): pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ kho bo ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha la gsol ba 'debs su mchis kyi/ khyed cag gis grogs mdzod cig /de rnams kyis smras
79b6('dul ba): pa| de bzhin du bya'i/ kho bo cag gis ji tsam na bos pa de'i tshe khyod shog cig/ de nas de dag gis skabs shes nas bos pa dang / de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo che/ lus 'phags ma'i
79b7('dul ba): bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song ste son nas/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la rgyal ba dang / tshe spel ba dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu
80a1('dul ba): 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mdun na 'don mda' bo ches/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras
80a2('dul ba): so| |lha/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/ lha la gnod pa chung ngam/ reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba rgyas par snyun gsol lo/ /mda' bo che/ khyod dang / yangs pa can gyi tshogs
80a3('dul ba): bde bar gyur cig / lha/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mchid nas/ 'di skad ces/ lha/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang ba mdzad du
80a4('dul ba): gsol/ lhas gal te bcom ldan 'das la rjes su ma gnang na/ ring por mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/
80a5('dul ba): mda' bo che/ kho bos yun ring mo zhig nas/ kye ma/ yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsam pa ste/ gal te yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs par gyur na/ kho bo yid
80a6('dul ba): la bsam pa tshegs chung ngus rdzogs par ma gyur tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mda' bo che song ngo / /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gcig kyang yangs
80a7('dul ba): su btang ba lta mchis sam/ shes ldan dag/ med do/ /de lta na/ lhas/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis so/ /lhas/ bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang yang rung /
80b1('dul ba): ma gnang yang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ yangs pa can gyi sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gshegs par 'gyur ba nyid do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ kho bos ma shes kyi/ gal
80b2('dul ba): te de ltar na khug cig / de dag gis mda' bo che bkug nas rgyal po smras pa/ mda' bo che/ kho bos dam bca' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su gnang bar bya'o/ /gal te kho bos bcom ldan
80b3('dul ba): 'das la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ji 'dra ba byas pa de kho na 'dra bar yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi bya na/ de lta na kho bos rjes su gnang ngo / /des/ yangs pa can rnams la rgyal pos 'di skad
80b4('dul ba): ces gsung ngo / /zhes spring ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po mi gcig pur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / bkur sti byed na/ bdag cag tshogs su gyur pas ci ste mi bya zhes
80b5('dul ba): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol cig dang / bdag cag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang ches khyad par 'phags pa'i mchod pa dang / bkur sti bgyi'o/ /zhes spring
80b6('dul ba): ngo| |de nas mda' bo ches don de dag rgyal po la rig par byas so/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
80b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/
81a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos
81a2('dul ba): gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par spro lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la thugs
81a3('dul ba): brtse bas gnang bar mi 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma
81a4('dul ba): ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig
81a5('dul ba): nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo / /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas
81a6('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das la
81a7('dul ba): gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni/ btul lags na/ btsun pa/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med/
81b1('dul ba): 'di| yun ring mo zhig nas bdag cag la sha 'khon ma mchis par ni/ sha 'khon bgyid/ 'gran zla ma mchis par ni/ 'gran zlar gyur/ gnod pa ma mchis par ni/ gnod pa bgyid par gyur
81b2('dul ba): te| lo tog gang dag skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gzon par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste klu'i rgyal po sog ma med legs par gdul bar gsol/
81b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i
81b4('dul ba): rgyal po ma skyes dgra la yon bsngo ba mdzad nas gshegs te gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan
81b5('dul ba): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo / /byang phyogs na ni/ phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ me
81b6('dul ba): tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsod snyoms mod pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs drang po yod do/ /zhes gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das
81b7('dul ba): nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/ /de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ rgyal po'i khab nas chu bo gang+gA'i bar gyi lam dang grong khyer
82a1('dul ba): dag che thang du stor du bcug ste/ lam rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo thams cad bsal nas tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi pog phor
82a2('dul ba): dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/ bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med khang dag byas so/ /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis/ chu bo gang+gA nas yangs pa can gyi bar du de
82a3('dul ba): bas lhag par khyad par du 'phags par lam dang grong khyer dag stor du bcug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
82a4('dul ba): bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nA lan+da gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de
82a5('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ nA lan+dar byon nas/ nA lan+da na a mra'i tshal dgag dbye can zhes bya ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe nA lan+da
82a6('dul ba): na kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa zhes bya ba/ rgas pa/ 'khogs pa/ gtugs pa/ btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa zhig gnas pa la/ nA lanada'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams pa kur sti
82a7('dul ba): byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed de/ dgra bcom par bkur ro/ /de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa'i sngon gyi grogs po dang / blon po dang / gnyen dang / snag gi gnyen
82b1('dul ba): mtshams su gyur pa'i lha gang yin pa de/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di skad ces/ drang srong khyod tshur shog /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
82b2('dul ba): tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig / ces smras na/ gang yang bdag gi tshig mi snyan pa de srid pas ma la bdag de'i drung du song ste/ yid kyi dri ba 'dzin du gzhug go /snyam nas/ de nas lha de/ kun tu
82b3('dul ba): rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas kun tu 'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong tshur shog /kho bo las yid kyi dri ba longs la kun chub par gyis shig /ji ltar
82b4('dul ba): mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya/ ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya/ ci'i phyir spong / ji ltar nad med pa 'thob/ drang srong gang zhig
82b5('dul ba): khyod kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa 'di dag tshig gis lung bstan pas sems rangs par byed pa de'i thad du khyod tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig / ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur
82b6('dul ba): to| |de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pas/ lha de las yid kyi dri ba bzung ste kun chub par byas nas/ 'od srung rdzogs byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'od srung rdzogs byed kyi drung du/ yid kyi dri ba
82b7('dul ba): yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas ji ltar nad med pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
83a1('dul ba): bzhin du'o/ /'od srung rdzogs byed kyis/ de'i yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par mi shes na/ lan glan pa lta smos kyang
83a2('dul ba): ci dgos/ de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa/ 'di snyam du sems te/ 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis/ bdag gi yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par
83a3('dul ba): mi shes na/ lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam nas/ de kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka
83a4('dul ba): ta'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i mdun du yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ ji ltar mdza' bo
83a5('dul ba): ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gyis kyang / bdag gis yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa
83a6('dul ba): rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par mi shes na/ lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba/ 'di snyam du sems
83a7('dul ba): te/ gang la yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa 'di dag tshig gis lung bstan pa mi thob pa de 'dra ba'i rab tu byung bas bdag la ci zhig bya/ bdag gi nye du rnams la
83b1('dul ba): longs spyod rgya cher yod pas/ ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa la yang longs spyod cing / sbyin pa yang gtang / bsod nams kyang bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /yang de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la bdag/ dge
83b2('dul ba): sbyong go'u ta ma gang na ba der 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de chas pa dang / yang bsam pa/ re zhig/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rgan rabs gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs byed nas gcer bu
83b3('dul ba): pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ de rnams kyis re zhig yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus pa rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par mi shes na/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ gzhon pa/
83b4('dul ba): gsar du rab tu byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsam ste slar ldog par 'dod pa las/ yang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi kun tu rgyu rnying pa/ rgan po/ 'khogs pa/ spyod pa'i slob
83b5('dul ba): dpon dag las bdag gis dge slong gzhon nu la brnyas par mi bya/ dge slong gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya ste/ dge slong gzhon nu yang de ni/ dbang che ba/ mthu che bar gyur pa yin no/ /
83b6('dul ba): zhes thos so snyam du bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid kyi zhu ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ ji ltar mdza' bo ma
83b7('dul ba): yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas ji ltar nad med pa 'thob ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis kun tu rgyu 'dam
84a1('dul ba): bu'i tshong pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mdza' bo gzhan la rnam par smod byed cing / /de ni bdag tu zad do zhes
84a2('dul ba): smra la| |las kyang sla rgu 'dam zhing byed pa da/ /bdag gi bshes ma yin par shes par bya/ /gang zhig bden pa ma yin tshig /mdza' bo dag la smra byed cing / /smra la las su mi byed
84a3('dul ba): pa'ang / /mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs shes te/ /de lta bu ni/ mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par
84a4('dul ba): rig par bya zhe na/ gang zhig rtag tu bdag med dbye ba yi/ /bsam pas glags lta de ni mdza' min gyi/ /gang zhig 'dir ni snying dang 'dra gyur par/ /gzhan gyis mi phyed de ni mdza' bo
84a5('dul ba): yin| |de lta bu ni/ bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir spong zhe na/ skyes bu gces pa mthar 'byin cing / /'bras bu lta bar byed pa ni/ /rab tu dga' ba
84a6('dul ba): bskyed pa'i gnas/ /rab bsngags 'dren pa'i zhi ba bsgom/ /de don du gnyer bar bsgom mo/ /ji ltar nad med 'thob ce na/ /rab tu dben pa'i ro dang ni/ /nye bar zhi ba'i ro shes nas/ /
84a7('dul ba): chos la dga' ba'i ro 'thung ba/ /nad med sdig pa med par 'gyur/ /de ltar na/ nad med pa 'thob bo/ /de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta
84b1('dul ba): ma'i thugs kyis ni/ bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen no/ /snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /go'u ta ma/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang
84b2('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i spyan sngar bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshang pa legs
84b3('dul ba): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa des zhes bya ba nas sems shin tu rnam par
84b4('dul ba): grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dmar bu can gyi
84b5('dul ba): grong du 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
84b6('dul ba): cig tu dmar bu can gyi grong khyer dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na rgyal po'i gnas 'od ma'i dbyug pa can na nub mo nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
84b7('dul ba): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga dang / khyed cag kho nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas/ lam ring po
85a1('dul ba): 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to/ /bzhi po de dag /gang zhe na/ nga dang khyed cag kho nas zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes/ ma
85a2('dul ba): mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /nga dang khyed cag kho nas zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
85a3('dul ba): ma shes/ ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ngas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs pas srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad
85a4('dul ba): de/ da ni/ srid pa gzhan med do/ /ngas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing
85a5('dul ba): so sor rtogs pas/ srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de/ da ni/ srid pa gzhan med do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bde bar gshegs pas de
85a6('dul ba): skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga dang khyed cag kho na yis/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag /ji lta ba bzhin ma mthong bas/ /lam ring
85a7('dul ba): du ni 'khor bar gyur/ /bden pa de dag mthong nas ni/ /srid pa'i sred pa bcad nas su/ /'khor ba'i skye ba zad pas na/ /da ni srid pa gzhan med do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
85b1('dul ba): ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
85b2('dul ba): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /dmar bu can gyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas
85b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs so/ /dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim
85b4('dul ba): bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas dmar bu can gyi grong du byon te dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas
85b5('dul ba): kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas khyur 'phrad cing 'dus nas/ dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
85b6('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces
85b7('dul ba): bka' stsal to/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /lnga po 'di dag ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag/ 'di la/ bag med pa bag
86a1('dul ba): med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i
86a2('dul ba): rgyus| longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dang po yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag med pa
86a3('dul ba): bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur
86a4('dul ba): te| bram ze dang khyim bdag dag / bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa'i
86a5('dul ba): sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gnyis pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag med pa
86a6('dul ba): bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang rung / bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung / khyim bdag gi 'khor du'ang rung / dge sbyong gi 'khor du'ang rung / 'khor gang
86a7('dul ba): dang gang du 'gro ba'i 'khor de dang der zhum zhum por gyur nas dga' ba med pa dang / bag tsha bas 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/
86b1('dul ba): gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas bag tsha bas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gsum pa'o/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag med
86b2('dul ba): pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas bag med pa'i rgyus yid la gcags bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag med pa bag med pa la
86b3('dul ba): gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs bzhi pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag med pa bag med pa
86b4('dul ba): la gnas pa'i rgyus/ lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag med pa bag
86b5('dul ba): med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag med pa'i nyes dmigs
86b6('dul ba): lnga pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /lnga po 'di dag ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/
86b7('dul ba): longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa
87a1('dul ba): 'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon dang po yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ phyogs mtshams
87a2('dul ba): su dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang
87a3('dul ba): phyogs mtshams su dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no/ /bram
87a4('dul ba): ze dang khyim bdag dag / gzhan yang / bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang rung / bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung / khyim bdag gi 'khor du'ang
87a5('dul ba): rung / dge sbyong gi 'khor du'ang rung / 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der zhum zhum por ma yin pa dang / dga' ba dang / bag tsha ba med pas 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang
87a6('dul ba): khyim bdag dag / bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus zhes bya ba nas bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon
87a7('dul ba): gsum pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag /gzhan yang / bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ yid la gcags pa med bar 'chi bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang
87b1('dul ba): khyim bdag dag/ bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no/ /bram ze dang khyim
87b2('dul ba): bdag dag / gzhan yang / bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus/ lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skyes par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag
87b3('dul ba): dag |bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skyes par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bag yod pa'i phan yon lnga pa
87b4('dul ba): yin no/ /de nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
87b5('dul ba): sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi gnas su do mod bzhugs par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi grong
87b6('dul ba): gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom
87b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dbyar byed kyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ma ga d+ha'i
88a1('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ dmar bu can gyi grong du gshegs nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs te/ de
88a2('dul ba): la dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur sti byas so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rta rgod ma dang ldan pa'i shing rta thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs
88a3('dul ba): nas| gser gyi bya ma bum dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs te/ bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / bram ze'i tshogs kyi mdun gyis bltas nas dmar bu can gyi grong
88a4('dul ba): nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo / /de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas
88a5('dul ba): kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar
88a6('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i
88a7('dul ba): bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang
88b1('dul ba): dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab
88b2('dul ba): tu dga' bar mdzad de/ cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
88b3('dul ba): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs
