88b4('dul ba): tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna
88b5('dul ba): chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
88b6('dul ba): m a ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed song nas ring po ma lon par thugs su chud nas 'dug gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas 'dug gnas kyi phyi rol du zhabs
88b7('dul ba): gnyis bkrus te 'dug gnas su zhugs nas/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go /bcom
89a1('dul ba): ldan 'das 'dug gnas na nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na/ lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'phags pas dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba
89a2('dul ba): mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'bre ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te 'dug gnas nas byung nas 'dug gnas kyi grib ma la
89a3('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod
89a4('dul ba): kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig par brtson pa su yin ci thos/ btsun pa/ bdag gis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed lags par thos so/ /kun
89a5('dul ba): dga' bo/ legs so/ /legs so/ /ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed ni/ mkhas pa yin te/ 'di ltar/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig
89a6('dul ba): bgros pa lta zhig / kun dga' bo/ /'di na nga 'dug gnas na nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na/ lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu
89a7('dul ba): che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'bre ba gzigs so/ /kun dga' bo/ /phyogs gang du mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyis bres ba'i phyogs der 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi
89b1('dul ba): phyir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gang du lha bar ma dang phal bas gnas kyis bres pa'i phyogs der ni/ 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi phyir mi bar ma
89b2('dul ba): dang phal pa rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ phyogs 'dir ni/ mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyis bres pas phyogs 'dir 'di lta ste/ gnas
89b3('dul ba): kyi phyir dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo/ ya rabs kyi gnas kyi gnas dang / ya rabs kyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang /
89b4('dul ba): zong 'grem pa rnams kyi nang na yang 'di lta ste/ dmar bu can gyi grong khyer 'di mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ /'di la bar chad gsum 'byung bar rig par bya ste/ me dang / chu dang /
89b5('dul ba): nang 'khrug gis so/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig
89b6('dul ba): nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ gser gyi bya ma bum thogs te gsol ba 'debs shing spyan sngar 'dug go /'di skad ces kyang gsol te/ kye go'u ta ma/ sbyin pa 'di las bsod
89b7('dul ba): nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi ci mchis pa de/ dmar bu can na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du
90a1('dul ba): yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gang zag dad pa can/ /gang zhig lha
90a2('dul ba): rnams mchod byed pa/ /ston pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa ste/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/ /mkhas shing yid ni gzhungs pa yis/ /gang gi phyogs su gnas 'cha' ba/ /
90a3('dul ba): tshul khrims ldan pa bshos gsol nas/ /de yi 'og tu yon bsngo bya/ /de rnams rjed pas rjed 'gyur zhing / /mchod pas kyang ni mchod par 'gyur/ /de nas lto nas byung ba yin/ /bu la ma
90a4('dul ba): bzhin 'di la brtse/ /lha rnams brtse bas skyes bus ni/ /bde ba bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la
90a5('dul ba): chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs
90a6('dul ba): te gshegs so/ /de nas ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis/ der rgyus lhag gang yin pa de thams cad sbyin par btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin
90a7('dul ba): rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'di snyam du sems te sems las mngon par 'du byed de/ bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgo gang nas phyir gshegs pa de ni/ bdag
90b1('dul ba): gis go'u ta ma'i sgo zhes gdags so/ /chu bo gang+gA'i 'jug ngogs gang nas brgal ba de yang go'u ta ma'i 'jug ngogs zhes gdags so/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga
90b2('dul ba): d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ dmar bu can gyi grong gi dbus thog thag gshegs nas byang phyogs su rgyu ste chu bo gang+gA gang na bar gshegs so/ /de
90b3('dul ba): nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar bya'o snyam du bsam nas/
90b4('dul ba): rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ba dang / yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bsam pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i
90b5('dul ba): rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la rang nyid lhag par spro bar gyur na/ ci'i phyir bdag cag gis spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de rnams kyis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs
90b6('dul ba): lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo / /klu rnams kyis bsam pa/ re zhig mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la lhag par spro bar gyur na/ bdag cag klu rnams
90b7('dul ba): ni| rnam par ltung ba'i lus can yin na/ ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo /
91a1('dul ba): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsam pa/ re zhig mi bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong ba 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la lhag par spro
91a2('dul ba): bar gyur na/ mngon sum du mthong ba bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug
91a3('dul ba): gi steng du bzung ngo / /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsam pa/ lha dang mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la spro bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/
91a4('dul ba): de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ji ltar/ 'di dag phyir zhing dad pa
91a5('dul ba): mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab po/ /snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ji ltar/ re re'i yid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na bdag
91a6('dul ba): gdugs 'dzin to/ /snyam pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya/ lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i
91a7('dul ba): gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin
91b1('dul ba): las ci zhig mdzad na/ des na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya/ lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur lags/ bcom
91b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis/ sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan na las byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ /lus can rnams la
91b3('dul ba): 'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po/ mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po/
91b4('dul ba): rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/ legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po de la bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba zhig yod do/ /rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ bu btsas shing btsas pa
91b5('dul ba): dag phyi bzhin khrid de 'khyam par byed do/ /btsun mo rnams kyis bsam pa/ rgyal po 'di'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ sras btsas shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid nas 'khyam par mdzad pas
91b6('dul ba): bdag cag bu yod bzhin du bu med pa dang 'dra'i/ da ni/ nad khrims shig bca' ste/ gal te bdag cag las 'ga' zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur na/ des rgyal po la gdags par
91b7('dul ba): mi bya'o/ /zhes bcas so/ /ji tsam na/ btsun mo gzhan zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de de dag gis phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag ste/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /
92a1('dul ba): khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs lta bu/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/
92a2('dul ba): smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzengs mtho ba/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /ji tsam na/ chen por gyur pa dang / btsun mo de dag thams cad khye'u de la bu'i
92a3('dul ba): sdug pa skyes so/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu bdun pa/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po legs mthong chen po shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling nas rin po che sna
92a4('dul ba): bdun gyis sna drangs shing khams kyi rgyal phran stong gis yongs su bskor te/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas/ gzi brjid nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas
92a5('dul ba): lhag par spa zhing 'ongs pa/ gzhon nu khang bzang gi steng na 'dug pa des mthong nas/ des ma la dris pa/ yum/ mchi ba pha bi su lags/ bu/ khyod kyi yab rgyal po legs mthong chen
92a6('dul ba): po yin no/ /yum/ de 'das na/ bdag rgyal por 'gyur ram/ bu/ rgyal po de'i sras stong du gcig gis ma chang ba zhig yod pa de dag thams cad kyi phu bo gang yin pa de/ de 'das na
92a7('dul ba): rgyal por 'gyur na/ khyod ni/ thams cad kyi nu bo yin no/ /des smras pa/ yum/ gal te de 'das na bdag rgyal por mi 'gyur na/ gnang bar mdzod cig dang / bdag dad pa yang dag pa
92b1('dul ba): kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ bu/ khyod la bdag cag gi bu'i sdug pa nyams su myong gi /de ltar ma byed cig /yum/
92b2('dul ba): gdon ma 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /de dag gis de gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas smras pa/ bu/ gal te de lta na/ dam zhig bcas nas gnang bar bya ste/ gang yang
92b3('dul ba): khyod kyi yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs na/ de khyod kyis bdag cag la smros shig /de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de de dag gis gnang nas/ de mtha' gcig tu song ste mkhan po dang slob dpon med
92b4('dul ba): par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtswa bdun gyi chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa/ bdag gis ma de rnams la khas blangs pa smra dgos pas/
92b5('dul ba): song la sngon gyi dam bcas pa mthar dbyung ngo / /snyam nas/ bdag nyid chen po de dag ni/ ngag gis chos mi ston gyi/ lus kyis yin pas/ des de rnams kyi mdun du 'bar ba dang / gsal ba
92b6('dul ba): dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa dag gi cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /so so'i skye bo ni/ rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas/ de dag shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin
92b7('dul ba): rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam/ rtogs so/ /'phags pa/ khyod ni/ bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la/
93a1('dul ba): bdag cag kyang bsod nams 'tshal ba lags na/ khyod 'di nyid du skyed mos tshal du bzhugs shig dang / bdag cag gis rgyun du bsod snyoms dbul
93a2('dul ba): bar bgyi'o/ /rang sangs rgyas des khas blangs nas/ de dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so/ /rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa/ bdag gi lus
93a3('dul ba): rnag can 'dis/ bya ba gang yin pa de ni byas kyi/ ma la bdag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug go /snyam nas/ de nas de ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma
93a4('dul ba): brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag kyang bstan nas phung po lhag ma
93a5('dul ba): med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs so/ /de nas de dag gis shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs te/ spungs nas bsregs te me'i phung po de 'o mas bsad nas rus pa
93a6('dul ba): de dag / gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste skyed mos tshal de nyid du rus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ mgul gdub dang / gdu bu rgyan can dang / gzhan yang / rgyan rnam pa sna
93a7('dul ba): tshogs kyis brgyan cing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag btsugs so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po legs mthong chen po btsun mo'i 'khor gyis bskor nas
93b1('dul ba): sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/ me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / bya ko ki la dang / shang shang te'u skad 'byin pa'i
93b2('dul ba): tshal gseb tu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir song nas de skyed mos tshal du 'khyams pa las/ dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten de mthong ngo / /des skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mi la smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ 'di
93b3('dul ba): ci yin/ des smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis ni/ ma 'tshal te/ 'on kyang 'di'i don ni/ btsun mos 'tshal to/ /de nas des btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la smras pa dang / de dag gis rkang pa gnyis
93b4('dul ba): la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/ /des smras pa/ de bzhin du sbyin no/ /de dag gis skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed cag gis/ bu rgyal
93b5('dul ba): srid la mngon par dga' na/ de kho bo la ma gsol ba bzang po ma yin pa zhig byas so/ /gal te gsol bar gyur pa dang / kho bo de kho na la rgyal srid dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur
93b6('dul ba): ba zhig / 'on kyang ngas bdag nyid chen po de mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs gdags so/ /zhes de nas de bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi
93b7('dul ba): mchod rten de la gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs rnams btags so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po chen po legs mthong gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid
94a1('dul ba): yin no/ /gang yang ngas de na bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs btags te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ ngas
94a2('dul ba): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya byas so/ /las de kho na'i lhag mas/ da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyis rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs nyis
94a3('dul ba): stong lnga brgya/ dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur to/ /gal te/ ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu ma rtogs par gyur na/ gzhan du yang / ngas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong
94a4('dul ba): lnga brgya byed par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ nga'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa can gang yin pa de/ ngas nyan thos rnams kyi longs spyod du rnam par smin par bsngos te/ gal te mu tig bre gang
94a5('dul ba): gis 'bras bre gang khugs kyang / 'on kyang nga'i nyan thos rnams ni/ bsod snyoms kyis phongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par
94a6('dul ba): smin pa ni/ gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsam par bya ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
94a7('dul ba): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /lus 'phags ma'i bu/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras
94b1('dul ba): gru zam 'jugs su bcug pa dang / yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gru zam btsugs so/ /klu rnams kyis bsam pa/ bdag cag klu rnams ni/
94b2('dul ba): rna ma par ltung ba'i lus can yin pas/ ma la bdag cag gis gdengs ka'i zam pas/ bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+gA las bsgral bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de rnams kyis gdengs ka'i zam pa btsugs
94b3('dul ba): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyed cag las/ gang zhig lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam
94b4('dul ba): las chu bo gang+gA brgal bar spro ba de ni/ de las rgol cig /gang zhig yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis gru zam btsugs pa las spro ba gang yin pa de yang / de las rgol cig /nga yang dge
94b5('dul ba): slong kun dga' bo dang thabs cig klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las chu bo gang+gA brgal bar bya'o/ /de na kha cig ni/ lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las
94b6('dul ba): brgal to/ /kha cig ni/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi gru zam las so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las
94b7('dul ba): brgal to/ /de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kha cig zam pa btsugs nas chu bran bor te rgya mtsho brgal/ /skye bo rnams ni gzings 'cha' mkhas pa'i skye bo
95a1('dul ba): rnams chu brgal/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bram ze brgal bar gyur nas skam la bzhugs/ /dge slong dag 'dir khrus byed nyan thos rnams ni gzings 'cha' na/
95a2('dul ba): gal te kun na chu yod khron pa'i chus ni ci zhig bya/ /sred pa'i rtsa ba bcad nas su zhig spyod pa tshol bar byed/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sa phyogs gzhan zhig na mtho zhing mtho ba'i sa
95a3('dul ba): phyogs shig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod rgyal po sgra chen gyi lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod la/
95a4('dul ba): sbom du 'dom drug cu yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig yod de/ sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas chu bo gang+gA'i nang du bor ba
95a5('dul ba): gang yin pa de/ lta bar 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ba de'i dus la bab lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de'i tshod la bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang mchod
95a6('dul ba): sdong de bsgrengs na/ dge slong rnams lta bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / dra bas 'brel pa/ bsod
95a7('dul ba): nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'i phyag gis sa la reg par mdzad pa dang / klu rnams kyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i
95b1('dul ba): phyir sa la reg par mdzad snyam na/ mchod sdong gzigs par bzhed par mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis bsgrengs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mchod sdong lta bar brtsams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
95b2('dul ba): legs ldan ni/ 'dod pa chung ba yin pas mtha' gcig tu song nas phyag dar khrod pa dag 'tshem mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mchod
95b3('dul ba): sdong nub par 'gyur gyi/ rtags zungs shig /ces pa las/ de nub par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong rnams mchod sdong la
95b4('dul ba): lta ba bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni/ 'dod pa chung bas mtha' gcig tu mchis nas phyag dar khrod pa 'tshem pa la gzigs/ ci lags/ re zhig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad
95b5('dul ba): du'am/ 'on te sngon bsten pa'i slad du lags/ gal te re zhig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du lags na ni/ /gzhan yang / 'dod chags bral ba zhig mchis lags so/ /'on te sngon
95b6('dul ba): bsten pa'i slad du lags na ni/ 'dis gang du bsten lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir yang yin la/ sngon bsten pa'i phyir
95b7('dul ba): yang yin no/ /'dis sngon gang du bsten lags/ dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba rgyal po rab sgrog ces bya ba zhig byung ste/ de lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang grogs por gyur to/ /de bu 'dod kyang bu
96a1('dul ba): med nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste/ nor rdzas mang po zhig bsags na/ bdag la bu med pas/ bdag shi na rgyal
96a2('dul ba): po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /de nas brgya byin gyis mthong nas dris pa/ grogs po/ khyod ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug/
96a3('dul ba): des smras pa/ ko'u shi ka/ nor rdzas 'di snyed cig bsags na/ bdag la bu med pas/ bdag shi na rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur bas so/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po/
96a4('dul ba): khyod sems khong du chud par ma byed cig /gal te lha'i bu 'ga' zhig 'chi 'pho'i chos byung bar gyur na/ de khyod kyi bur bsko bar bya'o/ /chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'chi 'pho'i chos 'byung
96a5('dul ba): ba la ni/ ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gos ma rnying pa rnams rnying par 'gyur ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba ma rnying pa dag rnying par 'gyur ba dang / lus las dri mi zhim pa 'byung bar 'gyur
96a6('dul ba): ba dang / mchan khung gnyis nas rdul 'dzag pa dang / rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/ /ji tsam na/ lha'i bu zhig la snga ltas lnga byung bar gyur nas/ de la lha'i dbang po brgya
96a7('dul ba): byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po/ rgyal po rab sgrog gi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor cig /des smras pa/ ko'u shi ka/ de ni/ bag med pa'i gnas yin te/ ko'u shi ka/
96b1('dul ba): rgyal po rnams ni/ nyes pa mang po byed pa yin pas/ chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur na/ mi rung ngo / /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po khyod la ngas dran
96b2('dul ba): par bya'o/ /ko'u shi ka/ lha rnams ni/ dga' ba mang pos bag med pa yin no/ /grogs po de ni/ bden na/ 'on kyang kho bos khyod la dran par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po rab sgrog gi btsun mo dam pa'i
96b3('dul ba): mngal du nying mtshams sbyar to/ /gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams blangs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas te
96b4('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /de'i nye du dag 'dus shing tshogs nas ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u'i ming cir gdags/ gnyen rnams kyis smras
96b5('dul ba): pa| gang gi nyi ma kho na la khye'u 'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur pas/ de bas na/ khye'u'i ming sgra chen zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes de'i
96b6('dul ba): ming sgra chen zhes bya bar btags te/ khye'u sgra chen ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas zhes bya ba nas brtag pa brgyad dang / dbye ba dang / klog pa la mkhas shing shes nyen can du gyur to/ /zhes
96b7('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur cing / yul gyi dbang phyug dang / mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis mnan
97a1('dul ba): nas gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta'i thabs
97a2('dul ba): dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang / lcags kyu'i sgyur thabs dang / zhags pas gdab pa dang / mda' bo che 'phen pa dang / dbyug
97a3('dul ba): pas brdeg pa dang / 'dzin stangs dang / gom stangs dang / gcad pa dang / dral ba dang / dbyug pa dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra drag par phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / mi
97a4('dul ba): tshor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dag ste/ gnas lnga po/ de rnams la shin tu byang bar gyur to/ /chos nyid kyis/ re zhig pha ji tsam gson gyi bar du bu'i ming mi grags pa yin no/ /
97a5('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po rab sgrog shi nas sgra chen rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang / des tha gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal
97a6('dul ba): srid byed du bcug par gyur to/ /de nas brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po/ kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrog gi bur bskos te/ chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig /sems
97a7('dul ba): can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgos sam/ des tha gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas slar yang chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du
97b1('dul ba): bcug par gyur to/ /lan gnyis su yang brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po/ kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrog gi bur bskos te/ chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig /sems can
97b2('dul ba): dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgos sam/ des smras pa/ ko'u shi ka/ bdag cag rgyal po rnams ni/ dga' ba mang pos bag med pas skad cig tu brjed par 'gyur gyi/ bdag
97b3('dul ba): la khyod kyis mtshan ma zhig zhog cig dang / bdag gis mthong nas nges par sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bgyi'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu las thams cad pa
97b4('dul ba): la bsgo ba/ las thams cad pa/ song la khyod kyis rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang / lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod pa/ sbom du 'dom drug cu yod pa/ thams
97b5('dul ba): cad gser las byas shing / rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul cig /de nas lha'i bu las thams cad pas rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang / lha'i mchod sdong
97b6('dul ba): srid du 'dom stong yod pa/ sbom du 'dom drug cu yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul to/ /de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis mchod sbyin gyi khang
97b7('dul ba): ba rtsig tu bcug nas rang gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba mchod sdong gi zhal ta bar bzhag go/ de nas mchod sdong la 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i mi thams cad lta bar spro bas lhags
98a1('dul ba): nas/ zan zos shing mchod sdong lta bas rang gi las sgrub par mi byed do/ /de nas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad byas pas rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin ming du
98a2('dul ba): par gyur to/ /blon po rnams kyis dpya nyung du phul ba dang / rgyal po sgra chen gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci'i phyir dpya nyung zad cig dbul/ lha/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i
98a3('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs mchis nas 'tshal ma 'tshal zhing mchod sdong la lta zhing mchis te/ rang gi las grub par mi bgyid pas/ zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas/ dpya thang
98a4('dul ba): bzhin mi 'du lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ mchod sbyin gyi khang pa drol cig /de rnams kyis de dral na yang de bzhin du skye bo'i tshogs de rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas za zhing mchod
98a5('dul ba): sdong la rtog cing 'dug ste/ rang gi las sgrub par mi byed pas/ zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad byas pas de bzhin rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'du bar gyur to/ /rgyal pos dris
98a6('dul ba): pa| shes ldan dag / mchod sbyin gyi khang pa dral na/ ci phyir da dung dpya nyung bar gyur/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ skye bo'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas 'tshal zhing
98a7('dul ba): mchod sdong la rtog cing mchis te/ rang gi las sgrub par mi bgyid pas/ zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas des na dpya nyung bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis
98b1('dul ba): sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas mchod sdong de chu bo gang+gA'i nang du bor ro/ /dge slong dag /de ji snyam du sems/ rgyal po rab sgrog gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong
98b2('dul ba): legs ldan 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis sngon 'di bsten to/ /btsun pa/ mchod sdong 'di gang du zhig par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ma 'ongs pa na mi
98b3('dul ba): rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur te/ mi tshe lo brgyad khri ba rnams kyi rgyal po dung zhes bya ba yang dag par sdom pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa
98b4('dul ba): chos kyi rgyal po/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che
98b5('dul ba): dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni/ blon po rin po che nyid do/ /de la/ bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi
98b6('dul ba): gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par ba sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa
98b7('dul ba): 'di nyid 'tshe ba med cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa med la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dung gi mdun na 'don bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe zhes
99a1('dul ba): bya ba zhig 'byung ste/ de'i chung ma ni/ tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ngo / /de byams pa chad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas pas/ bu byams
99a2('dul ba): pa zhes bya ba zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe/ bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go /des bram ze'i khye'u de rnams byams pa la
99a3('dul ba): gtad nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas/ bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri po rnams/ bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis gter chen po bzhi
99a4('dul ba): po| ka ling+ka nas dmar ser te/ /mi thi la nas skya bo'o/ /sa 'dzin nas ni e la'i 'dab/ /wA ra NA si'i grong na dung / /mchod sdong 'di yang khyer nas rgyal po dung la dbul bar 'gyur ro/ /
99a5('dul ba): rgyal po dung gis kyang bram ze tshangs pa'i che la sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /bram ze tshangs pa'i tshes kyang bram ze'i khye'u byams pa la'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u byams pas kyang bram ze'i khye'u de rnams
99a6('dul ba): la'o| |de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis mchod sdong de dum bu dum bur bcad nas 'gyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas/ mchod sdong de'i mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas
99a7('dul ba): de nyid kyis skyo ba skyes nas nags su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi nyi ma kho na la lags su song ba de kho na'i nyi ma la byams pa tshad med pa'i yang lag gis rgyas par byas nas bla na med
99b1('dul ba): pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mtshan/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
99b2('dul ba): gang gi nyi ma kho na la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba de kho na'i nyi ma la rgyal po dung gi rin po che sna bdun nub par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po
99b3('dul ba): dung yang khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri'i 'khor dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i chung ma rin po che sa ga
99b4('dul ba): zhes bya ba yang / bud med brgyad khri'i 'khor dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe yang /
99b5('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri'i 'khor dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
99b6('dul ba): rgyas byams pa/ 'khor dge slong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang ri bya gag rkang gang na ba der gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de na dge slong 'od srung gi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa 'dug pas/ ri bya
99b7('dul ba): gag rkang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la kha dbye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas/ dge slong 'od srung gi
100a1('dul ba): rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa phyag g.yas pas blangs nas/ phyag g.yon par bzhag ste nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces/ dge slong dag /skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo
100a2('dul ba): brgya thub pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du byung ba de'i nyan thos rnams las chog shes pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mchog ni/ 'od srung
100a3('dul ba): yin no/ /zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'di yin te/ shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i bstan pa yang 'dis yang dag par bsdus so/ /zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de
100a4('dul ba): rnams kyis mthong nas skyo ba skyes te/ 'di 'dra ba'i lus kyis ji ltar 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs thob par gyur snyam nas/ de rnams skyo ba skyes pa de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa mngon
100a5('dul ba): sum du byed par 'gyur te/ 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dgra bcom pa nyid dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan mngon du bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro/ /mchod sdong de ni/ der zhig par 'gyur
100a6('dul ba): ro| |btsun pa/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis dkon mchog gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so/ /bcom
100a7('dul ba): ldan 'das gang du smon lam btab lags/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ yul dbus su rgyal po gos sbyin zhes bya ba/ 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang /
100b1('dul ba): skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog rnams
100b2('dul ba): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur to/ /byang phyogs na rgyal po nor ldan zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du
100b3('dul ba): 'jug go/ /de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur to/ /ji tsam dus
100b4('dul ba): gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyi mdun na 'don las khye'u spyi gtsug rin po ches brgyan pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ de'i ming rin chen gtsug tor can zhes
100b5('dul ba): btags so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas skye ba skyes te nags su song ngo / /gang gi nyi ma kho na la nags su song ba de kho na'i nyi ma la des bla
100b6('dul ba): na med pa'i ye shes thob nas de'i ming yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de
100b7('dul ba): nas gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po nor ldan steng gi khag bzang gi gzhir song ste blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug go/ /de blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga'i ci 'dra ba de
101a1('dul ba): ltar rgyal po gzhan 'ga'i yul na 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dang / shing rnams me
101a2('dul ba): tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ yul dbus nas tshong pa zong thogs te
101a3('dul ba): byang phyogs su 'ongs pa de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ yul dbus na rgyal po gos sbyin zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis so/ /rgyal po nor ldan gyis thos ma thag tu mi bzod pa chen po skyes te/
101a4('dul ba): de mi bzod pa skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig dang yul 'khor gzhom par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan dpung
101a5('dul ba): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che pa'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ yul dbus su dong nas chu bo gang+gA'i
101a6('dul ba): lho phyogs kyi 'gram du 'khod do/ /rgyal po gos sbyin gyis/ rgyal po nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che pa'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs
101a7('dul ba): dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ yul dbus su 'ongs te chu bo gang+gA'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram na 'khod do/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag
101b1('dul ba): bzhi pa/ glang po che ba'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ chu bo gang+gA'i byang phyogs kyi 'gram na 'dug go /de nas yang
101b2('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis/ de gnyis kyi 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram du nub mo nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs
101b3('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i
101b4('dul ba): tshe| brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams/ yang
101b5('dul ba): d ag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
101b6('dul ba): phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de rnams kyi kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen po byung bar gyur pa/ rgyal po nor ldan gyis mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la dris pa/
101b7('dul ba): shes ldan dag /rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul na snang ba chen po byung ba 'di/ ci yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
102a1('dul ba): chen gtsug tor can byung ste/ de la blta ba'i phyir brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa mchis pa des na/ snang ba chen po 'di byung ste/ de ni/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing
102a2('dul ba): mthu che ba lags pas/ 'di ni/ de'i mthu lags so/ /rgyal po nor ldan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gi yul du gang la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i phyir 'ong
102a3('dul ba): ba'i rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing de lta bu byung ba de la/ bdag gis gnod pa ci 'dra ba zhig bya zhes/ des de la pho nya btang ste/ grogs po khyod la bdag cung zad kyang mi byed kyi/ tshur spyon/
102a4('dul ba): khyod ni/ bsod nams kyi mthu chen po can zhig pas khyod kyi yul na gang la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba/ rkang gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing / yang dag
102a5('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can bzhugs so/ /'on kyang khyod kyi mgul nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/ de lta na/ bdag cag phan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes
102a6('dul ba): spring ngo / /rgyal po gos sbyin yid ma ches nas/ de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
102a7('dul ba): chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
102b1('dul ba): rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag la rgyal po nor ldan gyis spring pa/ grogs po sdug pa khyod la bdag cag ci yang mi byed kyi/ tshur shog /khyod kyi mgul pa
102b2('dul ba): nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/ de lta na/ bdag cag phan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur zhes mchi na/ de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
102b3('dul ba): gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po song zhig dang / khyod la legs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi'am/
102b4('dul ba): rgyal po chen po/ rgyal po dpung chen po rnams la ni/ gtugs par bya dgos so/ /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can
102b5('dul ba): gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas chas te/ rgyal po nor ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po nor ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyi mgul pa
102b6('dul ba): nas 'khyud de yid gcugs par byas te btang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs
102b7('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs
103a1('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ rgyal po thams cad kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa'i rgyal po gang lags/
103a2('dul ba): rgyal po chen po/ 'khor los bsgyur ba yin no/ /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug
103a3('dul ba): tor can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
103a4('dul ba): 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal
103a5('dul ba): po gos sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ yang dag
103a6('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /sta
103a7('dul ba): gon byas te/ nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol
103b1('dul ba): pa| btsun pa/ gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug
103b2('dul ba): tor can snga dro sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas rgyal po
103b3('dul ba): gos sbyin gyi bkad sa ga na ba der gshegs te/ byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs
103b4('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / rang gi lag nas stob
103b5('dul ba): cing tshim par byed de/ rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
103b6('dul ba): gtsug tor can gyis gsol nas phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ btsun pa/ sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
103b7('dul ba): 'dis| bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cig ces smras nas/ de ma thag tu dung yang bus so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal
104a1('dul ba): po gos sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po khyod/ skye rgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dung zhes bya bar 'gyur
104a2('dul ba): ro| |de nas skad chen po'i sgra dag byung ngo / /rgyal po nor ldan gyis ca co'i sgra dag thos nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /rgyal po gos sbyin gyi/ yul na ca co'i sgra grags
104a3('dul ba): pa de| ci zhig yin/ de rnams kyis legs par brtags nas smras pa/ lha/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po gos sbyin 'khor los bsgyur
104a4('dul ba): ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas/ des na/ ca co'i sgra grags pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs
104a5('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te
104a6('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po nor ldan gyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
104a7('dul ba): pa| 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi ba gang lags/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
104b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas yin no/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba de logs su thal
104b2('dul ba): mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du
104b3('dul ba): gsol| yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po nor ldan la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
104b4('dul ba): rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ yang
104b5('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag/
104b6('dul ba): sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod
104b7('dul ba): gsol pa/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
105a1('dul ba): chen gtsug tor can snga dro sham thabs mnams/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun
105a2('dul ba): gyis bltas te rgyal po nor ldan gyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis
105a3('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba
105a4('dul ba): dag / rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed de/ rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /yang
105a5('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po chen gtsug tor can gyis gsol nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ 'jig rten 'di dag thams
105a6('dul ba): cad la byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten gyi ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
105a7('dul ba): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces btab bo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
105b1('dul ba): po khyod/ skye rgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na/ smon lam
105b2('dul ba): gyi dbang gis dkon mchog gnyis gcig car 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ grong spyil
105b3('dul ba): bu can zhes bya ba gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yul
105b4('dul ba): spong byed ces bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / grong spyil bu can du byon te grong spyil bu can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi shiM sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
105b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'di dag ni/ tshul khrims yin no/ /'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin yin no/ /'di ni/ shes rab yin no/ /dge slong dag/ tshul khrims goms
105b6('dul ba): par byas na/ ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin goms par byas na/ shes rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab goms par byas na/ 'di lta ste/
105b7('dul ba): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag las sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol ba'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos
106a1('dul ba): kyis ni/ bdag gi zag pa ni/ zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa ni/ bsten to/ /bya ba ni/ byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes yang dag pa kho
106a2('dul ba): nar shes par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /de nas bcom
106a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ sgra can gang na ba der 'dod ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
106a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang sgra can du byon nas/ sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrog gi gnas na bzhugs so//
106a5('dul ba): de'i tshe sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung nas/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi/ nye ba dang / lhag par brtson pa dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes
106a6('dul ba): dang / yid 'ong dang / nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin tu bzang dang / grags pa dang / grags byin dang / dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang
106a7('dul ba): po snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bas sgra can
106b1('dul ba): gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung ste/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi/ nye ba dang / lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes dang / yid 'ong dang
106b2('dul ba): nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin tu bzang dang / grags pa dang / grags sbyin dang / dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang sgra can du bsod snyoms
106b3('dul ba): la rgyus te/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing / lhung bzed dang chos gos 'khos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas
106b4('dul ba): lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ dge slong rab tu mang pos bcom ldan 'das
106b5('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang pos 'dir snga dro sham thabs 'tshal/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas sgra can du bsod
106b6('dul ba): snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ btsun pa/ bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na/ sgra can 'dir skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung nas/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen
106b7('dul ba): brtan pa yang gum/ nye ba dang / lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes dang / yid 'ong dang / nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin
107a1('dul ba): tu bzang ba dang / grags pa dang / grags sbyin dang / dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang gum mo/ /zhes thos lags na/ btsun pa/ de rnams kyi 'gro ba ni/
107a2('dul ba): gang | skye ba ni/ gang / mngon du 'gro ba ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge bsnyen brtan pa ni/ tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs
107a3('dul ba): pas rdzus te skyes te/ /der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing / 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /nye ba dang / lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i
107a4('dul ba): khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes dang / yid 'ong dang / nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin tu bzang dang / grags pa dang / grags sbyin dang / dge bsnyen grags
107a5('dul ba): mchog kyang tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas rdzus te skyes te/ der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing / 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi
107a6('dul ba): 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen nyis brgya lnga bcu lhag cig shi ba de dag kyang tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas rdzus te skyes
107a7('dul ba): te| der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing / 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen sum
107b1('dul ba): brgya shi ba de dag ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum yang spangs la/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag kyang bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin te/ 'jig rten 'dir
107b2('dul ba): lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /grong khyer sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen lnga brgya lhag cig shi ba de dag ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs
107b3('dul ba): pas rgyun du zhugs pa/ rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par gzhol ba/ re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa yin te/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du nying mtshams
107b4('dul ba): sbyar zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /khyed dus las 'das shing shi bar gyur pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs
107b5('dul ba): pa la mtho 'tsham pa yin te/ des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang skye ba yod na 'chi ba'i dus byed pa yin te/ ngo mtshar ci zhig yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
107b6('dul ba): byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings 'di ni/ gnas pa ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mngon par mkhyen pas mngon
107b7('dul ba): par byang chub nas gsungs te/ 'dogs par mdzad/ rab tu 'jog par mdzad/ rnam par 'byed par mdzad/ rnam par 'grel bar mdzad/ gsal bar mdzad/ 'chad par mdzad/ yang
108a1('dul ba): dag par rab tu 'chad par mdzad pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pas 'di skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i
108a2('dul ba): rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched
108a3('dul ba): drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis
108a4('dul ba): rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen
108a5('dul ba): po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'di med na 'di mi 'byung la/ 'di 'gag na 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gag pas 'du byed 'gag /
108a6('dul ba): 'du byed 'gag pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gag pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gag pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gag
108a7('dul ba): pas reg pa 'gag / reg pa 'gag pas tshor ba 'gag /tshor ba 'gag pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa 'gag pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gag pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gag
108b1('dul ba): pas skye ba 'gag / skye ba 'gag pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ sdug
108b2('dul ba): bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /'on kyang khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyi/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la
108b3('dul ba): zungs shig dang bshad do/ /chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa ni/ chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin
108b4('dul ba): no| |'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims ni/ chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin te/ ngas khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do/ /zhes gang gsungs pa bshad
108b5('dul ba): pa ni/ de yin no/ /a mra skyong mas/ bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na sgra can du byon nas sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrog gi gnas na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /
108b6('dul ba): thos nas kyang a mra skyong ma de la/ ne tso bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba mi skad shes pa zhig yod de/ ne tso bzhin rgyas la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzhin rgyas tshur shog /khyod bcom ldan 'das gang
108b7('dul ba): na ba der song la phyin nas/ kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/
109a1('dul ba): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang / bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces/ a mra skyong ma'i mchid nas/ btsun pa/ bcom
109a2('dul ba): ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ thog mar bdag gi a mra'i tshal du gshegs par gsol zhes kyang gsol cig /de nas ne tso bzhin
109a3('dul ba): rgyas kyis a mra skyong ma'i ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba de/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi'i khye'u dag gis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ne
109a4('dul ba): tso 'gro ba 'di ni/ smad 'tshong ma'i yin no/ /zhes de dag gis de la mda' 'phangs par brtsams pa na/ de yang de dag gi steng du babs so/ /de nas ne tso des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
109a5('dul ba): yul 'khor gzhan dang 'gyed par yang / /pho nya mi gsod ces grags na/ bdag lta rgyal ba'i pho nya bas/ lus can kun gyis ga la gsod/ /de rnams kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de
109a6('dul ba): smras pa/ khyod kyi tshig gis mda' 'phangs pa'ang / /ldog na bdag cag smos ci dgos/ /khyod ni rdzu 'phrul ches bskyabs pas/ /'jigs pa med par 'gro bar gyis/ /de nas ne tso bzhin
109a7('dul ba): rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/
109b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la a mra skyong ma mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs
109b2('dul ba): dang / bde ba la reg par gnas zhes snyun gsol lags so/ /bzhin rgyas/ khyod dang a mra skyong ma bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa/ a mra skyong ma'i mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das nam yangs
109b3('dul ba): pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ thog mar bdag gi a mra'i tshal du gshegs su gsol/ /zhes de skad mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ne tso bzhin
109b4('dul ba): rgyas la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
109b5('dul ba): te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de bcom ldan 'das la dad pa bskyed nas song ba las ring po ma lon pa kho nar 'ol bas srog dang phral te dus byas nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
109b6('dul ba): ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so/ /chos nyid kyis/ skyes nas ring por ma lon pa'i lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo ni/ sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang /
109b7('dul ba): las gang gis yin pa'o/ /des bltas nas/ dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pas so/ /
110a1('dul ba): de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/ bdag rigs pa ma yin gyi/
110a2('dul ba): ci nas kyang bdag zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs shing /
110a3('dul ba): se mo do dang / do shal gyis lus brgyan nas de nyid kyi nub mo lha rnams kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba'i me tog gis thu ba bkang
110a4('dul ba): nas| shin tu 'phags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog gis/ de'i nub mo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/
110a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de'i tshe sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen pos sgra sgrog gi 'dug gnas thams cad gsal bar gyur to// //
110a6('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de
110a7('dul ba): dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas/ ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho
110b1('dul ba): ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa/ 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la mas
110b2('dul ba): ma bgyis te/ phas ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang / /gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang /
110b3('dul ba): bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams nas ni/ rkang pa drangs/ lha dang mi
110b4('dul ba): rnams la ni/ rab tu bzhag /'khor ba las ni/ ring du mdzad/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni/ bkum/ mtho
110b5('dul ba): ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni/ phye/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
110b6('dul ba): bu mngon sum du bgyis lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag /bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi
110b7('dul ba): lags kyi/ bdag /dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ /deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i
111a1('dul ba): bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas/ tshong pa zong rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul ngor
111a2('dul ba): rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa bzhin du/ 'byor ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid dang rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas
111a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ yangs pa can gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
111a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi a mra'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /a mra
111a5('dul ba): skyong mas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi bdag gi a mra'i tshal kho na na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyan
111a6('dul ba): thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas yangs pa can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir
111a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ des ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan
111b1('dul ba): 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang / yang dge slong rnams
111b2('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ a mra skyong ma pha bi 'ong gi/ brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig /ngas rjes su bstan pa ni/ 'di yin no/ /ji ltar na/ dge
111b3('dul ba): slong brtson 'grus la gnas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la/ dge slong gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin
111b4('dul ba): to| |rab tu 'jog go/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /rab tu 'jog go/ /dge ba'i chos
111b5('dul ba): ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /rab tu 'jog go/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / nyams par mi
111b6('dul ba): 'gyur ba dang / goms pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba dang / ye shes rgya chen po mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems
111b7('dul ba): rab tu 'dzin cing rab tu 'jog pa ste/ de ltar na/ dge slong brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ dge slong shes bzhin can yin zhe na/ 'di la/ dge slong gis 'gro ba dang ldog pa la shes bzhin
112a1('dul ba): gyis gnas shing lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang pa dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa dang / 'gro ba dang /
112a2('dul ba): 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / gnyid ma log pa dang / smra ba dang / mi smra ba dang / gnyid kyis snyoms pas dub pa rnams la shes bzhin gyis gnas pa ste/ de ltar na/ dge
112a3('dul ba): slong shes bzhin can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la/ dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran
112a4('dul ba): pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so/ /phyi'i lus dang / nang dang phyi'i lus dang / nang gi tshor ba rnams dang / phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / nang
112a5('dul ba): dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / nang dang phyi'i sems dang / nang gi chos rnams dang / phyi'i chos rnams dang / nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes
112a6('dul ba): su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang yi mi bde ba spangs nas gnas pa ste/ de ltar na/ dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa
112a7('dul ba): yin no/ /dge slong dag /ngas a mra skyong ma pha bi 'ong gi/ brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan par gnas par gyis shig /ngas rjes su bstan pa ni/ 'di yin no/ /zhes
112b1('dul ba): ngas gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni/ de yin no/ /de nas a mra skyong ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs
112b2('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par
112b3('dul ba): mdzad| yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin
112b4('dul ba): tu bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de nas a mra skyong ma stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
112b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi
112b6('dul ba): sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das cang
112b7('dul ba): mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis/ bcom
113a1('dul ba): ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / yangs pa can du byon te yangs pa can gyi a mra skyong ma'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos
113a2('dul ba): nas kyang so so nas shing rta dang rta rnams la zhon te/ kha cig ni/ rta sngon po dang / shing rta sngon po dang / srab skyogs dang / lcag sngon po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs dang / ral gri
113a3('dul ba): shubs sngon po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa sngon po dang / 'khor sngon po/ kha cig ni/ rta ser po dang / shing rta ser po dang / srab skyogs dang /
113a4('dul ba): lcag ser po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs dang / ral gri shubs ser po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa ser po dang / 'khor ser po/ kha cig
113a5('dul ba): ni| rta dmar po dang / shing rta dmar po dang / srab skyogs dang / lcag dmar po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs dang / ral gri shubs dmar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /
113a6('dul ba): gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa dmar po dang / 'khor dmar po/ kha cig ni/ rta dkar po dang / shing rta dkar po dang / srab skyogs dang / lcag dkar po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs
113a7('dul ba): dang / ral gri shubs dkar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa dkar po dang / 'khor dkar por chas te/ skad mthon po dang / skad chen por slar
113b1('dul ba): khyed| slar khyed ces zer zhing yangs pa can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can
113b2('dul ba): gyi li tsa byi rnams rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed cag las/ sus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed
113b3('dul ba): mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro ba ma mthong ba de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la ltos shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi yangs pa can
113b4('dul ba): gyi li tsa byi dag bzhin du rdzu 'phrul 'di dang / 'byor pa 'di dang / cha lugs 'dis skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro'o/ /ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/ bzhon pa las
113b5('dul ba): babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
113b6('dul ba): bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston
113b7('dul ba): par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
114a1('dul ba): yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /de'i tshe bram
114a2('dul ba): ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
114a3('dul ba): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ spobs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag ni/ spobs lags
114a4('dul ba): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ser skya'i bu/ khyod spobs par gyis shig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ang+ga'i
114a5('dul ba): rgyal po nor bu'i go 'chang ba/ /ma ga'i rgyal pos rnyed pa rab rnyed de/ /de yi yul du byung ba'i sangs rgyas ni/ /grags pa'i sgra dag gangs kyi ri bo bzhin/ /ji ltar pad+ma bzang po legs
114a6('dul ba): 'khrungs pa/ /dgongs ka kha bye dri zhim ldan pa bzhin/ /bar snang la ni nyi ma lhag ge bar/ /snang ba lta bur nyi ma'i rgyud la ltos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shes rab stobs/ /ji
114a7('dul ba): ltar mtshan mo me 'bar lta bu ltos/ /de ni mig byed snang bar byed pa ste/ lhags pa rnams kyi the tshom rnam par 'dul/ /le tsa byi lnga brgyas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras
114b1('dul ba): so| |bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so/ /zhes bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir byin no/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos
114b2('dul ba): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
114b3('dul ba): dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ gnas 'jog dag /nga sngar a mra skyong mas spyan drangs so/ /btsun pa/ a mra skyong ma
114b4('dul ba): dman pa/ shes rab dman pa des/ bdag cag bslus lags te/ des na/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das thog ma nyid du blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi ba'i rngo ma thogs
114b5('dul ba): mod kyi/ da dung yang bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dag 'dun la bsnyen bkur 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gnas 'jog /de ni/ legs par smras so/ /zhes
114b6('dul ba): bka' stsal to/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
114b7('dul ba): phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas dong ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu ni/ de nyid du 'dug go /de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams dong nas
115a1('dul ba): ring po ma lon par shes nas stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
115a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'dir bdag la li tsa byi lnga brgyas bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir stsal ba 'di dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs
115a3('dul ba): brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bla gos lnga brgya bzhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
115a4('dul ba): kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos
115a5('dul ba): rnam pa lnga/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ ser skya'i bu/ 'di la/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
115a6('dul ba): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig
115a7('dul ba): rten du 'byung zhing / de chos thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su
115b1('dul ba): byang ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ston par 'gyur te/ ser skya'i bu/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad
115b2('dul ba): du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang po yin no/ /gang dag chos de zhes dang bcas pas nyan cing bla mar byed/ dam par byed/ yid la byed cing sems rtse gcig tu rna ba blags nas
115b3('dul ba): sems thams cad bsdus nas nyan par byed pa 'di ni/ ser skya'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung
115b4('dul ba): ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gnyis pa yin no/ /chos de gang dag gis thos nas de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa 'di ni/ ser skya'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
115b5('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gsum pa yin no/ /chos de gang dag gis thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / nges par
115b6('dul ba): 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba rgya chen po 'thob pa 'di ni/ ser skya'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung
115b7('dul ba): ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba bzhi pa yin no/ /chos de gang gis thos nas don zab mo'i gzhi shes rab kyis so sor rtog par byed pa 'di ni/ ser skya'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
116a1('dul ba): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba lnga pa yin no/ /ser skya'i bu/ skyes bu
116a2('dul ba): dam pa dag ni/ byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba can yin no/ /de dag cung zad tsam byas na yang chud gzon par mi byed na/ mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de lta bas na/ ser skya'i bu/ khyod kyis
116a3('dul ba): 'di ltar byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba can du bslab par bya ste/ cung zad tsam byas na yang chud mi gzon na/ mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ ser skya'i bu/ khyod kyis de lta bur bslab
116a4('dul ba): par bya'o/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
116a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas a mra skyong mas de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /sta gon byas te/ nang par sngar langs nas gdan
116a6('dul ba): bshams te nor bu'i chu snod dag bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol ba/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod bshams lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ da de'i dus
116a7('dul ba): la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs man pas/ lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos dag bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
116b1('dul ba): cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas/ a mra skyong ma'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//
116b2('dul ba): de nas a mra skyong mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par
116b3('dul ba): byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /rang gis lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung
116b4('dul ba): bzed gyu bar rig nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong mas sbyin pa phul ba de la rjes
116b5('dul ba): su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang par mdzad de/ sbyin la dga' 'gyur skye bo sten byed na/ /snyan pa thob cing de yi grags pa 'phel/ /ser sna med cing tshogs par 'gro ba dang / /zhum par mi 'gyur
116b6('dul ba): 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa bde 'dod pas/ /ser sna'i dri ma spangs te sbyin pa gtong / /de dag yun ring sum cu rtsa gsum gnas/ /lha rnams dang ni skal pa mnyam par
116b7('dul ba): dga'/ /sbyin gtong dge byed de ni shi 'phos nas/ /rang gi 'od kyis dga' ba'i tshal na rgyu/ /de na de gnyis rtse zhing dga' byed pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag dang ldan/ /ma bcings skyob pa
117a1('dul ba): de yi gsung thos nas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos mtho ris dga'/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
117a2('dul ba): bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ stan las langs te song ngo / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams
117a3('dul ba): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na gal te lha rnams su skyes na yang lha mthu che bar gyur la/
117a4('dul ba): gal te mi rnams su skyes na yang mi mthu chen por gyur cing / da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dper yang bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/
117a5('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/
117a6('dul ba): 'di dag nyid kyis/ las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam
117a7('dul ba): par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i
117b1('dul ba): phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu
117b2('dul ba): dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
117b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
