117b4('dul ba): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/ de 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang grong khyer wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags na nye bar bsten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe wa ra NA si na dge bsnyen lnga
117b5('dul ba): brgya gnas so/ /de rnams kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas rim gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis rin po che'i
117b6('dul ba): gling du phyin to/ /de nas rin po che rnams kyis gru bo che yongs su bkang nas chas pa dang / de nas rlung gis bdas nas rgya mtsho chen po'i gling zhig tu phyin to/ /de rnams bred cing re ba med par gyur nas/
117b7('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi phyir bye ma las mchod rten byas nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byas so/ /de nas gnyid log pa dang / lha zhig gis smras pa/ khyed cag ma
118a1('dul ba): 'jigs par bag yod par byos shig dang / zhag bdun gyi nyin par dus rlabs 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de nas khyed cag bde legs su 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur
118a2('dul ba): ro| |nam nangs nas de rnams phan tshun du smra zhing gros bya bar brtsams te/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag la lhas mi 'jigs pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
118a3('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung gi mthus yin pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bdag cag gis rin po che phul ba dag slar blangs te 'dong ba ni/ mi rigs so/ /zhes de
118a4('dul ba): rnams kyis gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ gang yang bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa la
118a5('dul ba): bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ gal te bdag cag lha rnams su skyes par gyur na/ bdag cag mthu che ba kho nar gyur cig /gal te mi'i nang du mi rnams su skyes par gyur na/ mthu
118a6('dul ba): che ba dang / mi rnams su skyes na yang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi dper rung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ dge bsnyen lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag
118a7('dul ba): ni| li tsa byi lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi phyir bye ma'i mchod rten byas shing rin po che dag gis mchod pa byas pas/
118b1('dul ba): des na mi mthu chen po rnams su skyes par gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yang dper rung bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par
118b2('dul ba): smin pa ni/ gcig tu gnag pa yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyi 'dren ma yin/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/ gcig tu dkar ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ gang yang las gcig tu
118b3('dul ba): gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams ni/ spongs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
118b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer du song la sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog la/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di smros
118b5('dul ba): shig| bi sa ra ta/ bi sar ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams
118b6('dul ba): cad kyis dgongs pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsam pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsam pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsam pa/ bden pa'i tshig smra ba thams cad kyis bsam pa/
118b7('dul ba): chos rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsam pa/ tshangs pas bsam pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsam pa/ dbang pos bsam pa/ lhas bsam pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsam
119a1('dul ba): pa| lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsam pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsam pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsam pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi
119a2('dul ba): sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ yams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'dug par gyur cig /nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/
119a3('dul ba): nir gats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs te/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams
119a4('dul ba): dang / skye rgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lha brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin brgya
119a5('dul ba): stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug ste/ de dag gis
119a6('dul ba): khyed rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyi/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni/ brlag
119a7('dul ba): par gyur cig / gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar 'dod pa de dag ni/ 'khod cig /dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la
119b1('dul ba): thugs brtse ba can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /su mu su mu/ /su mu su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mi ri mi ri
119b2('dul ba): mi ri mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/
119b3('dul ba): rI rI rI rI rI rI ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri ti/ ha sa/ mi ri mi ri ti/ mi rI mi rI/ sI sI mi/ kang+ka ra/ kang+ka ra ta/ kang+ka ra ta/ kang+ka ra ta/ kang+ka ra ta/ ka tsA kang+ka rA kang+ka ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/
119b4('dul ba): kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA/ kang+ka rA ti/ ku rI she/ kang+ka rI she/ kang+ka rI she/ ri ri ri ri ri/ re phA sA ri/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu ri phu ri phu ri phu/ nA thA nA thA thA/ ri phu ri phu/ nA thA thA nir rir gats+tsha ta/ ri
119b5('dul ba): phu ri phu/ nir gats+tsha ta/ pa la ya te/ ri phu ri phu/ pa la ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs
119b6('dul ba): rje dang dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs te/ lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi bla ma sangs rgyas kyis chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig grub
119b7('dul ba): ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang gis sred pa'i chags pa dag /rnam par bcom nas 'dul mdzad pa/ /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur
120a1('dul ba): 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi
120a2('dul ba): rten| |sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu
120a3('dul ba): gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi skyob gyur pa/ /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la
120a4('dul ba): bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing sa ba mi mnga' ba/ /gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo
120a5('dul ba): chen po gang skyes pas/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams dang / /nags
120a6('dul ba): tshal bcas par rab g.yos nas/ /sems can thams cad rab dga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /
120a7('dul ba): bdud yid mi bder gyur ba de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa gsungs pa gang / /thub pa grags pa byung ba de/ /khyed la bde
120b1('dul ba): legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kyi yid 'phrog pas/ /mu stegs byed rnams pham mdzad la/ /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed
120b2('dul ba): la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni
120b3('dul ba): bsam pa yis/ /khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs
120b4('dul ba): shog| phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog / nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la gnas par shog /khyed cag kun la bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /
120b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyi/ /sdang sems can rnams byer gyur cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams
120b6('dul ba): dang | |dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /
120b7('dul ba): bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad ni med gyur cig /kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa'am
121a1('dul ba): 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams/ /skye rgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /ces rjod cig/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin
121a2('dul ba): 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa can du song ste/ grong khyer gyi them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang /
121a3('dul ba): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
121a4('dul ba): dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsam pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsam pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsam pa/ bden
121a5('dul ba): pa'i tshig smra ba thams cad kyis bsam pa/ chos rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsam pa/ tshangs pas bsam pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsam pa/ dbang pos bsam
121a6('dul ba): pa| lhas bsam pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsam pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsam pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsam pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsam pa/
121a7('dul ba): bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug cig /yams kyi nad nye bar zhi
121b1('dul ba): bar 'dug par gyur cig / nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs te/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
121b2('dul ba): tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye rgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /
121b3('dul ba): lha brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po
121b4('dul ba): brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug ste/ de dag gis khyed rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyi/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha
121b5('dul ba): ta| myur du byer cig / khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni/ brlag par gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung ba byed
121b6('dul ba): par 'dod pa de dag ni/ 'khod cig /dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /su mu/ su mu/ su mu/
121b7('dul ba): su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/
122a1('dul ba): mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri mu ru/ mi ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/
122a2('dul ba): rI rI rI rI rI rI ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri ti/ ha si mi ri mi ri ti/ mi ri mi ri/ si si mi/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra/ ka tsA kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/
122a3('dul ba): kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA tI/ ku rI she/ kaM ka rI she/ kaM ka rI she/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ re phA sA ri/ ri phu ri phu ri phu/ ri bu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ nA thA thA/ ri phu ri phu/
122a4('dul ba): nA thA thA/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ nir gats+tsha ta/ pa la ya thA/ ri phu ri phu/ pa la ya thA/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la
122a5('dul ba): phan par lhag par dgongs pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs te/ lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad kyi
122a6('dul ba): bla ma| sangs rgyas kyis chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig grub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang gis sred pa'i chags pa dang / rnam par bcom nas 'dul
122a7('dul ba): mdzad pa/ /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad
122b1('dul ba): ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par
122b2('dul ba): 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du brtag bskyangs de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor
122b3('dul ba): ba yi| |sems can kun gyi skyob gyur pa/ /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' ba//
122b4('dul ba): gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa ste/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa
122b5('dul ba): de| |khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams dang / /nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos nas/ /sems can thams cad rab dga' de/ /khyed la bde legs
122b6('dul ba): mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa rnams rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi
122b7('dul ba): 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa gsungs pa gang / /thub pa grags pa 'byung ba de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang gis chos kyi yid 'phrog pas/ /mu
123a1('dul ba): stegs byed rnams pham mdzad la/ /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs
123a2('dul ba): mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni
123a3('dul ba): bsam pa yis/ /khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam
123a4('dul ba): 'gro bde legs shog / phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyin ma'i gung la gnas par shog /khyed cag kun kyang bde legs shog/
123a5('dul ba): khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyi/ sdang sems can rnams byer gyur cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can
123a6('dul ba): rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom pa yi bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig /sems can
123a7('dul ba): kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad ni med gyur cig /kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig /gang yang
123b1('dul ba): sdig par ma gyur cig / 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams/ /skye rgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang
123b2('dul ba): spyod gyur cig / ces brjod pa dang / der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus mi ngas zhi bar gyur to/ /sdom la/ 'od ma dang ni dbus kyi grong / /
123b3('dul ba): mi thi la dang lus 'phags dang / /sA la khron pa ngan spong bu/ /ngur smrig gtsug phud bsngags ldan dang / /gnag lhas dang ni sdig can dang / /ku sha'i grong khyer tha ma yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
123b4('dul ba): gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'od ma can gyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
123b5('dul ba): 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / 'od ma can gyi grong du byon nas/ 'od ma can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi grong shiM sha ba'i tshal na
123b6('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mu ge nyam nga ba/ dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'dir
123b7('dul ba): mu ge nyam nga ba/ dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung gi /dge slong dag /tshur khyed las smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang / gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang / 'grogs bshes
124a1('dul ba): ji lta bu yod pa de dag ni/ yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor gyi spong byed kyi grong du dbyar gnas par dam chos shig /nga yang bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang /
124a2('dul ba): 'od ma can gyi grong 'di nyid du dbyar gnas par dam bcas na thams cad bsod snyoms kyis phongs par mi 'gyur grang / btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis
124a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas smos 'drin ji lta bu yod pa dang / gtam 'dres pa ji lta bu yod pa dang / grogs bshes ji lta bu yod pa dag ni/ yangs pa can gyi nye 'khor spong byed
124a4('dul ba): kyi grong du dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang bsnyen bkur ba dge slong kun dga' bo dang 'od ma can gyi grong de nyid du dbyar bzhugs par dam bcas so/ /
124a5('dul ba): dbyar gyi gnas der bcom ldan 'das snyun tshabs chen po/ mi bzod pa/ drag po grongs la thug pa zhig gis thebs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag
124a6('dul ba): nad tshabs chen po/ mi bzod pa/ drag po shi la thug pas thebs la/ dge slong gis dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thor ba na/ bdag yongs su mya
124a7('dul ba): ngan las 'das pa ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ ma la bdag gis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis bcil la/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar sems kyis ting
124b1('dul ba): nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa lus kyis mngon sum du bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil
124b2('dul ba): nas| mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad pas/ sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa skus mngon sum du mdzad de bsgrubs nas bzhugs te/ des na bcom ldan 'das lhag par spyod pa
124b3('dul ba): dang / lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
124b4('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
124b5('dul ba): btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das snyun tshabs chen po/ mi bzad pa/ drag po grongs la thug pas thebs pa glo bar chud nas/ bdag gi lus dug 'tshal ba bzhin du phyogs kyang bslad/
124b6('dul ba): bdag gis thos pa'i chos rnams kyang bskyud par gyur lags te/ de la bdag glo ba re ba na re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi slad du zhal chems cung zad bka'
124b7('dul ba): ma stsal gyi bar du/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o snyam du bgyid do/ /kun dga' bo/ gang zhig 'di snyam du/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni/ bdag gi yin te/ bdag gis dge
125a1('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun bstan par bya'o/ /bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun drang ngo snyam du sems pa de ni/ dge 'dun gyi phyir kha chems cung zad smra bar 'gyur
125a2('dul ba): ba nyid na/ kun dga' bo/ nga la ni 'di snyam du dge slong gi dge 'dun ni/ nga'i yin te/ ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun bstan par bya'o/ /ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun drang ngo snyam du
125a3('dul ba): dgongs pa mi mnga' na/ ngas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir zhal chems kho na cung zad bstan du ci yod/ gzhan yang / kun dga' bo/ nga la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rag lus pa
125a4('dul ba): ci zhig yod/ kun dga' bos/ ngas rtag tu goms par bya ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
125a5('dul ba): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ bshad zin to// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi
125a6('dul ba): shu rtsa dgu pa/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ gang zhig gzhan dag gis shes na mi rung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pas bcab bo/ /snyam du dgongs pa'i slob
125a7('dul ba): dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi mnga'o/ /kun dga' bo/ 'on kyang gang gi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa snyun tshabs chen po/ mi bzad pa/ drag po grongs la thug pas thebs/ de la nga 'di snyam
125b1('dul ba): du sems te/ bdag nad tshabs chen po/ mi bzod pa/ drag po shi la thug pas thebs la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun yang 'thor bar gyur na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thor ba na/ bdag yongs
125b2('dul ba): su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ ma la bdag gis tshor ba gcig po de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil la/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar sems kyi ting nge 'dzin
125b3('dul ba): mtshan ma med pa lus kyis mngon sum du bsgrubs nas gnas par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ ngas tshor ba gcig pu de brtson 'grus kyis slar bcil nas/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi mdzad par
125b4('dul ba): sems kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa skus mngon sum du bsgrubs te bzhugs te/ des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhag par spyod pa dang ldan zhing lhag par 'tsho bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang
125b5('dul ba): kun dga' bo/ da ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pas/ sku bgres 'khogs gtugs par gyur te/ rnam pa gnyis la brten nas 'tsho'o/ /dper na/ shing rta rnying
125b6('dul ba): pa rnam pa gnyis la brten nas brtan pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pas/ sku bgres 'khogs gtugs par gyur te/ rnam pa gnyis la brten
125b7('dul ba): nas 'tsho'o/ /de lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed cig /nyon mongs par ma byed cig /smre sngags ma 'don cig /skye ba dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang / 'dus byas pa dang /
126a1('dul ba): bsags pa gang yin pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ rnam par 'gyes pa'i chos can de la mi 'jig pa de lta bu lta ga la rnyed de/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /
126a2('dul ba): kun dga' bo/ gang yang ngas khyod la sdug pa dang / phangs pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang 'bral ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'gyes pa dang / mi ldan par 'gyur
126a3('dul ba): bar snga nas bshad zin to/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ da lta'am/ nga 'das kyang rung / bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis
126a4('dul ba): gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan dang skyabs gzhan gyis ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ da lta'am/ nga 'das kyang rung / gang su dag bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid
126a5('dul ba): skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par byed kyi/ gling gzhan dang / skyabs gzhan gyis ni/ ma yin pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ nga'i nyan thos bslab pa
126a6('dul ba): 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ ji ltar na/ dge slong gis bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/
126a7('dul ba): gling gzhan dang / skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di la dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa
126b1('dul ba): dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gnod sems dang / yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so/ /phyi'i lus dang / nang dang phyi'i lus dang / nang gi tshor ba rnams dang / phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / nang dang phyi'i tshor ba
126b2('dul ba): rnams dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / nang dang phyi'i sems dang / nang gi chos rnams dang / phyi'i chos rnams dang / nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus
126b3('dul ba): dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la gnod sems dang / yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas pa ste/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong 'di lta bu ni/ bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid
126b4('dul ba): skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas kyi/ gling gzhan dang / skyabs gzhan gyis ni/ ma yin pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
126b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dbus kyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom
126b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od
126b7('dul ba): zer sngon pa dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag byung zhing / kha cig ni/ 'og tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/ /gang dag 'og tu song ba de dag ni/ yang sos dang / thig
127a1('dul ba): nag dang / bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol ba dang /
127a2('dul ba): so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a chu zer ba dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su song nas/
127a3('dul ba): tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la ni/ bsil bar 'bab bo/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la dro bar 'bab bo/ /des sems can de rnams
127a4('dul ba): kyi gnod pa'i khyad par dag so sor bcil lo/ /de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /ci/ bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan tu skyes snyam pa dang / de
127a5('dul ba): rnams dang pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa zhig btang ngo / /de rnams kyis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag
127a6('dul ba): ni| 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang med la/ gzhan du skyes pa'ang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnams so
127a7('dul ba): sor bcil lo/ /zhes de rnams sprul pa la sems mngon par dang par gyur pas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/ gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar
127b1('dul ba): 'gyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba bzung ngo / /gang dag steng du song ba de dag ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga'
127b2('dul ba): ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal
127b3('dul ba): dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod rnams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong
127b4('dul ba): ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i dbyangs sgrog cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis kyang bsgrags so/ /
127b5('dul ba): brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas/ /
127b6('dul ba): chos 'dul 'di la brtson gyur na/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
127b7('dul ba): gyi khams byul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin du 'gro'o/ /de la gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs
128a1('dul ba): su nub par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi
128a2('dul ba): mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par nub par 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor nub
128a3('dul ba): par 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi pus mor nub par 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i
128a4('dul ba): mthil du nub par 'gyur/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur/ lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar
128a5('dul ba): nub par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal gyi nang du nub par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdzod spur nub par
128a6('dul ba): 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tu nub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
128a7('dul ba): bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra
128b1('dul ba): ba yi| |tshogs rnams zhal gyi nang nas byung gyur pa/ /ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/ /yang tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
128b2('dul ba): gsol pa/ rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis pa/ /rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/ /
128b3('dul ba): de slad brtan pa nyid blos dus mkhyen nas/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog /nyan par 'tshal ba'i nyan pa po rnams kyi/ /the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang / /dam pa bzang po
128b4('dul ba): dag gis bsal du gsol/ /tshwa chu'i ri bo lta bur brtan pa'i mchog /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston/ /brtan pa ji slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ /skye bo phal chen 'di dag
128b5('dul ba): de nyan 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
128b6('dul ba): sangs rgyas ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ 'di mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ phyogs 'dir yang
128b7('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsum bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos myur ba myur bar bla gos bzhi ltab tu byas te bting nas bcom ldan 'das la
129a1('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa kho na la bzhugs shig dang / sa phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
129a2('dul ba): bzhis yongs su longs spyad par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /skad cig gcig la bzhugs nas/ tshe ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
129a3('dul ba): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ grong khyer mi thi la gang na bar 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas
129a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags kyi ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ mi thi lar byon nas/ mi thi la'i lha chen po a mra'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa phyogs
129a5('dul ba): gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
129a6('dul ba): pa| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ btsun pa/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i rgyu gang
129a7('dul ba): lags/ rkyen gang lags/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med
129b1('dul ba): par 'jum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ sngon byung ba mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub par gyur te/ mi tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling 'di 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang /
129b2('dul ba): lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba grong dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi bar bya gag gi 'phur stabs kyis chod par byung bar gyur to/ /mi tshe lo brgyad
129b3('dul ba): khri pa rnams la/ lus kyi gnod pa ni/ 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'dod pa dang / yi ga chus pa dang / rga ba yin no/ /mi tshe lo
129b4('dul ba): brgyad khri pa rnams kyi bu mo ni/ btsas nas lo lnga brgya lon pa dang / khyo la gtong bar byed de/ dper na/ da ltar gyi lo bco lnga'am/ lo bcu drug lon pa bzhin no/ /kun dga' bo/ /mi rnams kyi
129b5('dul ba): tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba/ mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo / /de'i
129b6('dul ba): rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta bu byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni/ blon
129b7('dul ba): po rin po che nyid yin no/ /de la yang bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar byung ste/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa
130a1('dul ba): chen po ma lus pa gnod par bsdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa/ 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par phab ste
130a2('dul ba): gnas so/ /de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu 'breg mkhan gyi mis 'chos pa na/ 'breg mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje/ nga'i dbu la skra dkar po skyes pa khyod kyis mthong
130a3('dul ba): ba dang lha'i pho nya byung ba yin gyi/ de'i tshe nga'i snyan du gsol cing / lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'breg mkhan gyi mis/ rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar mnyan to/ /dus gzhan zhig na 'breg
130a4('dul ba): mkhan gyis rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na/ rgyal po lha chen po'i mgo la skra dkar po skyes pas lha'i pho nya byung bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang rgyal po lha chen po la 'di skad ces
130a5('dul ba): smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ khyed kyi dbu la skra dkar po skyes pas lha'i pho nya byung lags so/ /des smras pa/ kye nang rje/ khyod kyi skra dkar po de dag mi 'breg par dal gyis
130a6('dul ba): dal bu dal bus phyung la nga'i lag tu byin cig/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'breg mkhan gyis rgyal po lha chen po'i ltar mnyan nas/ skra dkar po de gser gyi smang tsher gyis mi 'breg
130a7('dul ba): par dal gyis phyung nas/ rgyal po lha chen po'i lag par bzhag go /de nas rgyal po lha chen pos skra dkar po de lag pa gnyis kyis drangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ da ni bdag gi mgo
130b1('dul ba): bo la| |na tshod 'joms pa'i skra skyes te/ /lha yi pho nya byung gyur pas/ /bdag gi rab byung dus la bab/ /bdag gis mi rnams kyi 'dod pa ni/ spyad zin gyi/ bdag gis lha'i 'dod pa
130b2('dul ba): dag btsal ba'i dus la bab kyi/ ma la bdag gis gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug la/ rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /snyam nas/ de nas
130b3('dul ba): rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu gzhon nu shes par gyis shig/ nga'i mgo la skra dkar po skyes pas lha'i pho nya byung bar gyur to/ /ngas mi rnams
130b4('dul ba): kyi 'dod pa spyad zin pas/ ngas lha'i 'dod pa dag btsal ba'i dus la bab ste/ ngas bu gzhon nu khyod la rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas pa'i sa chen po 'di gtad kyi/ de khyod kyis chos bzhin gyis
130b5('dul ba): rjes su bskyang bar bya'i/ chos ma yin pas ni/ ma yin no/ /'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam 'dren mar spyod na/ khyod kyis yul 'khor du gnas su ma gzhug cig /bu gzhon nu gang gi
130b6('dul ba): tshe khyed kyang mgo la skra dkar po skyes pa mthong ba dang lha'i pho nya 'ongs pa yin gyi/ de'i tshe khyod kyis kyang gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du chug la/ rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs
130b7('dul ba): par spyad pa spyod cig / 'di ltar/ bu gzhon nu khyod kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes bsam par bya'i/ rgyun chad par ma byed cig /skyes bu tha shal du gyur ta re/ bu gzhon
131a1('dul ba): nu 'ga' zhig 'di lta bu'i skyes bu bzang po rgyun du byung ba'i dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes mi 'tsho ba gang yin pa de/ de rnams kyi rgyun gcod
131a2('dul ba): pa yin zhing / de de rnams kyi nang na skyes bu tha shal du gyur pa yin no/ /de lta bas na/ nga khyod la 'di skad ces/ gang gi tshe khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i skyes bu bzang po rgyun du byung ba'i dge ba'i lam
131a3('dul ba): nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes sobs la rgyun chad par ma byed cig / skyes bu tha shal du gyur par ma byed cig ces smra'o/ /de nas rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
131a4('dul ba): la dbang byed du bcug nas mi thi la'i lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal de nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /kun dga' bo/ rgyal po lha chen pos gzhon nu thu bo gang yin pa de/
131a5('dul ba): rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug la/ de'i ming yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba/ mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal pa zhes bya ba nas gnas so/ /zhes bya ba'i
131a6('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i skra dang kha spu 'breg mkhan gyis mis 'chos pa na zhes bya ba nas de de rnams kyi nang na skyes bu tha shal du gyur ba yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i
131a7('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas rgyal po lha chen po'i gzhon nu tho bo rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug nas rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ kun dga' bo/ bu
131b1('dul ba): dang tsha bo dang yang tsha dang gsum tsha la sogs pa de ltar brgyud pas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong mi thi la'i lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal de nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /de
131b2('dul ba): rnams kyi tha ma rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po zhig byung ste/ de btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / khrom gyi ru
131b3('dul ba): ba dang / grong mi dang / yul mi dag dang chos spyod de sbyin pa dag gtong / bsod nams dag byed cing bsnyen gnas la gnas te tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug go /de'i tshe lha'i
131b4('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin/ lha'i mdun sa chos bzang du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams kyi mdun du bsngags pa rjod par byed de/ grogs po dag /lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi rnyed
131b5('dul ba): pa legs par rnyed de/ lus 'phags kyi mi de rnams kyi rgyal po mu khyud ni/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po de/ btsun mo dang zhes bya ba nas tshul khrims
131b6('dul ba): yang dag par blangs te 'dug go / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /grogs po dag /khyed cag rgyal po mu khyud lta bar 'dod dam/ ko'u shi ka/ shin tu 'tshal lo/ /grogs po dag /de'i phyir
131b7('dul ba): khyod cag sdod cig dang / kho bos re zhig rgyal po mu khyud lta'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las bskum
132a1('dul ba): pa tsam gyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mdun sa chos bzang nas mi snang bar gyur te/ mi thi lar rgyal po mu khyud kyi khang bzang du 'dug go /'di skad
132a2('dul ba): ces kyang smras te/ mu khyud/ khyod la lha'i mdun sa chos bzang du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dus shing 'dug pa rnams bsngags pa brjod pa ni/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /grogs po
132a3('dul ba): lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyis rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug par byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /mu khyud/ khyod sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
132a4('dul ba): lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro 'dod dam/ ko'u shi ka/ bdag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i phyir mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /mu khyud/ de'i phyir sdod cig dang / re zhig kho bos
132a5('dul ba): khyod la rta cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta bskur gyi/ de'i nang du khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog cig /de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes rgyal po mu khyud kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi
132a6('dul ba): ltar mnyan to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdu la smras pa/ ma la gdu/ khyod song la myur ba kho nar rta cang shes
132a7('dul ba): stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta bshams te/ rgyal po mu khyud gang na ba der song la phyin nas 'di skad ces/ mu khyud/ khyod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rta cang shes stong ldan pa'i shing rta
132b1('dul ba): bskur ba 'di yin gyi/ 'dir khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog cig ces smros shig /ko'u shi ka/ khyod kyis gsungs pa shin tu bzang ngo / /zhes kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus lha'i dbang po brgya byin
132b2('dul ba): gyi ltar mnyan nas/ myur ba kho nar rta cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta bshams nas/ rgyal po mu khyud gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang 'di skad ces smras so/ /mu khyud khyod la lha'i dbang
132b3('dul ba): po brgya byin gyis rta cang shes stong dang ldan pa'i shing rta bskur ba 'di yin gyi/ 'dir khyod zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog cig ces zer ro/ /kun dga' bo/ rgyal po mu khyud rta cang shes stong dang
132b4('dul ba): ldan pa'i shing rta'i nang du mi g.yo bar zhugs pa dang / de nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus rgyal po mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mu khyud/ khyod kyi shing rta gang logs su drang / gang na sems
132b5('dul ba): can sdig pa'i las can rnams/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba logs su'am/ gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams/ las dge ba'i rnam par
132b6('dul ba): smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba logs su drang / ma la gdu/ de'i phyir kho bos gang du gnyi ga mthong bar 'gyur ba/ gang na sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las
132b7('dul ba): kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba dag yod pa dang / gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams/ las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba dag yod pa der shing rta
133a1('dul ba): drongs shig / de nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdus/ rgyal po mu khyud kyi shing rta/ gang na sems can sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su
133a2('dul ba): myong ba dag yod pa dang / gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams/ las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong ba dag yod pa gnyi ga rgyal po mu khyud kyis ji ltar mthong
133a3('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba de ltar drangs so/ /kun dga' bo/ rgyal po mu khyud sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ rgyal po mu khyud lha'i mdun sa chos bzang du zhugs pa dang lha'i dbang po
133a4('dul ba): brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud la stan phyed bstabs nas/ rgyal po mu khyud dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan phyed phyed la 'khod do/ /kun dga' bo/ rgyal po mu khyud dang lha'i dbang po brgya
133a5('dul ba): byin stan phyed phyed la 'khod pa na/ khyad par ram/ bsam pa'am/ tha dad du bya ba med kyi/ gzhan du na lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni/ mig 'dzum par mi byed do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
133a6('dul ba): byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mu khyud/ 'di nyid du 'dug la mu khyud khyod dga' bar spyod cig /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pa la rtsed mo byos shig/
133a7('dul ba): dga' bar spyod cig /dga' mgur spyod cig /de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar snod dang shing rta dag /re zhig dus kyi brnyan po ltar/ /gzhan dag
133b1('dul ba): dbang sgyur gang yin pa'i/ /gnas kyang de dang 'dra ba yin/ /'di nas mi thi lar song la/ /dge ba mang po rnams bya ste/ /bsod nams byas shing 'byor byas nas/ /mtho ris su ni 'gro bar bya/ /kun
133b2('dul ba): dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba gang gis dge ba'i lam nges pa de la zhugs shing / gang dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa la brten nas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong mi
133b3('dul ba): thi la'i lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad par gyur pa byung ba gang yin pa de/ gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i
133b4('dul ba): phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya bar gyur te/ nga nyid kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa de srol btod cing / dge ba'i las nges pa srol dod pa la brten nas lha
133b5('dul ba): chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis mi thi la 'di nyid na lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ /de'i tshe nga 'dod chags
133b6('dul ba): dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas par gyur te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
133b7('dul ba): dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol lo zhes gsung ngo / /kun dga' bo/ da ni/ nga nyid 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
134a1('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
134a2('dul ba): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur nas/ 'dod chags dang bral/ zhe sdang dang bral/ gti mug dang bral bas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
134a3('dul ba): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongs su grol lo zhes gsung ngo / /kun dga' bo/ de ltar na yang ngas dge ba'i lam nges
134a4('dul ba): pa srol gtod pa de la brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni/ skye ba'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
134a5('dul ba): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni/ 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs shing / dge
134a6('dul ba): ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa de la brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can nas sems can 'khrug pa'i chos can gyi bar dag 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
134a7('dul ba): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i
134b1('dul ba): 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di ni/ ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa/ dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa de la brten
134b2('dul ba): nas sems can skye ba'i chos can nas gong ma bzhin du 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i bar yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis kyang de bzhin du dge ba'i lam nges pa srol
134b3('dul ba): dod pa de lta bu'i rjes bsab par bya yi/ rgyun chad par ma byed cig /skyes bu tha shal du gyur par ma byed cig /kun dga' bo/ gang la la de lta bu'i nyan thos bzang po rgyun du byung ba'i dge ba'i lam nges
134b4('dul ba): pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes mi 'tshob pa de ni/ de rnams kyi rgyun gcod pa yin zhing / de de rnams kyi skyes bu tha shal du gyur ba yin no/ /de bas na/ nga khyod la 'di skad du/ ci nas kyang khyod kyis de lta
134b5('dul ba): bu'i nyan thos bzang po rgyun du byung ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu de'i rjes su sobs shig / rgyun chad par ma byed cig /skyes bu tha shal du gyur par ma byed cig ces smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
134b6('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ lus 'phags gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das
134b7('dul ba): kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags su byon nas lus 'phags kyi phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan yin no zhes bya ba dang /
135a1('dul ba): skad cig bzhugs nas zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ sa la gang na bar 'dong ngo / /
135a2('dul ba): btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / sa lar
135a3('dul ba): byon nas sa la'i bram ze'i grong na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de
135a4('dul ba): nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'dis la'i bram ze'i grong na 'dug ste/ snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te sa lar bsod snyoms
135a5('dul ba): la zhugs kyi/ ma la bdag gis sa la'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams ji ltar dge sbyong go'u ta mas lhung bzed bkrus te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/ bkrus pa de kho na bzhin
135a6('dul ba): bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed par phyir ldog pa de lta de ltar byin gyis pa brlab bo/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis sa la'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis
135a7('dul ba): ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/ bkrus pa de kho na bzhin du bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed par slar byon pa de lta de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ /
135b1('dul ba): de nas bdud sdig can gyis bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /dge sbyong dge sbyong / bsod snyoms
135b2('dul ba): kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed dam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma/ nye bar 'ongs pa 'di ni/ bdud sdig can yin te/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par dkrug pa'i las byed do/ /snyam du thugs su
135b3('dul ba): chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs la khyad bsad pas/ /khyod kyis bsod nams min mang bsags/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni brgal dka' bar/ /sdig can ji ga mi shes sam/ /
135b4('dul ba): dge sbyong / de'i phyir na slar yang sa lar bsod snyoms la bzhud cig dang / ci nas kyang bsod snyoms rnyed pa de ltar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga
135b5('dul ba): la ci yang mi bdog pa/ /skye ma shin tu bder 'tsho ste/ /'od gsal lha rnams ji lta bar/ /dga' ba yin ni zas bza' 'o/ /nga la ci yang mi bdog pa/ /kye ma shin tu bder 'tsho ste/ /'jig tshogs lta la mi
135b6('dul ba): brten pas/ /dga' ba yin ni zas bza' 'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i sems kyi bdag gi bsam pa shes so/ /snyam du rig nas/ sdug bsngal dang / yid
135b7('dul ba): mi bde ba dang / 'gyod pas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan sa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khron pa can gang na par 'dod do/ /btsun pa/
136a1('dul ba): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khron pa can du byon to/ /khron pa can
136a2('dul ba): na bud med gzhan zhig 'phyang thag dang chu snod khyer te khron pa'i drung du song ba dang / skyes pa gzhan zhig de la chags pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba
136a3('dul ba): dang / de yang lhag par de la chags pas de gnyis phan tshun du 'tham zhing khron par dong ngo / /de'i bu khye'u chung ngu ma zhig de dang lhan cig phyi bzhin 'brang zhing song ngo / /de nas de skyes pa la
136a4('dul ba): rtog cing chu snod btang ngo snyam ste/ khye'u chung de'i mgul na thag pas btags te btang ba las shi bar gyur to/ /de sngon ma thos pa'i tshigs su bcad pa thos pa/ 'dod pa khyod rtsa ngas shes te//
136a5('dul ba): rtog pa las ni 'dod pa skyes/ /khyod la rtog pa ma byas dang / /de nas nga la mi 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyang lam de nas gshegs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
136a6('dul ba): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di zungs shig /tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni/ 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin te/
136a7('dul ba): 'di so so'i skye bo'i lag tu 'ongs pas mi snang / mi gsal/ rnam par mi gsal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas ji ltar sems 'di myur du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ni/
136b1('dul ba): gcig kyang ma mthong ngo / /de nas bud med de bu'i mya ngan gyis gdungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal
136b2('dul ba): dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas bud med des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas
136b3('dul ba): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa/ bdag la 'di lta bu ni/ mas ma bgyis te/ phas ma lags/
136b4('dul ba): rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug bas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs
136b5('dul ba): kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bkum/ mtho ris
136b6('dul ba): dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags nas ni/ rkang pa drangs/ lha dang mi rnams su ni/ rab tu bzhag /'khor ba las ni/ thag bsrings/ khrag dang
136b7('dul ba): mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni/ bsgral/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ni/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun
137a1('dul ba): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong
137a2('dul ba): gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis lags kyi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /
137a3('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ phyogs 'di nyid du drang srong ngan spong gi bus gdan dang rtsa ba
137a4('dul ba): dang 'bras bu la spyan drangs so/ /phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ rga ba la sogs pas yid byung
137a5('dul ba): ste| phyogs 'di nyid du lha'i dbang po brgya byin rngon pa'i cha byad du byas pa la ka shi ka'i ras phran byin nas gos ngur smrig blangs pa yin te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis
137a6('dul ba): ngur smrig blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ da dung du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang ka shi ka'i ras phran sum cu rtsa gsum
137a7('dul ba): pa'i lha'i nang du khyer te bzhag nas ka shi ka'i dus mchod chen po btsugs te/ da dung du yang de la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag bya ba byed do/ /phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
137b1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ phyogs 'dir ral gri ut+pa la sngon po 'dra bas dbu skra bregs nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'phangs pa yin te/ bram ze dang khyim
137b2('dul ba): bdag dad pa can rnams kyis dbu skra blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ da dung du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang dbu
137b3('dul ba): skra sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du khyer te bzhag nas gtsug phud kyi dus mchod chen po btsugs te/ da dung du yang de la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bya ba byed do/ /phyogs gzhan zhig
137b4('dul ba): tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ phyogs 'dir rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan 'dun pas khrid nas slar btang ba yin te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can
137b5('dul ba): rnams kyis bsngags ldan slar btang ba zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ da dung ngu yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul gnag
137b6('dul ba): lhas can du byon nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gnag lhas can 'dir rigs kyi bu 'dun pa btsas nas 'di nyid du chen
137b7('dul ba): por gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sdig can du byon te/ sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das sdig can du gshegs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgan rabs rgan rabs
138a1('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu gang yin pa de dag gis lam bzang por byos shig /bdag cag gis ni/ grong khyer bzang por bya'o/ /de nas gzhon nu rnams kyis
138a2('dul ba): lam bzang por bya bar brtsams pa na/ de rnams kyi pha bong zhig mthong nas de rnams kyis de dor bar brtsams pa las/ 'dor bar ma nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs de nyid du gshegs
138a3('dul ba): nas bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog dag /'di ci bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du bshul bzang por bgyi lags na/ pha bong 'di/ dor bar rngo ma thogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
138a4('dul ba): stsal pa/ gal te de lta na ngas 'dor ram/ bcom ldan 'das 'dor du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos pha bong steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te/ mig
138a5('dul ba): rgyang gis kyang mi sod par bor ba dang / de'i sgras gyad rnams sdangs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog dag /ma 'jigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
138a6('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis pha bong de phye mar brlags nas rdul dbab par brtsams so/ /gyad rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdul ga las 'bab lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
138a7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas pha bong de phye mar brlags pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ma legs pa zhig bgyis so/ /ci/ slar mtshams sbyar ram/ bcom ldan 'das/ slar
138b1('dul ba): mtshams sbyar du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mos pa'i stobs kyis slar sbyar nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid na bzhugs so/ /gyad lnga brgya po de
138b2('dul ba): dag kyang de nyid du tshogs nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pha bong de stobs gang gis 'phangs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog dag
138b3('dul ba): yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs kyis so/ /de rnams kyis gsol pa/ stobs gang gis phye mar brlags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis so/ /gang gis
138b4('dul ba): slar mtshams sbyor lags/ mos pa'i stobs kyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs kyi tshad ji tsam lags/ gnas 'jog dag /mi bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/
138b5('dul ba): glang phal ba gcig gi yin no/ /glang phal pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ ba med sngon po gcig gi yin no/ /ba men sngon po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che phru gu gcig gi yin no/ /
138b6('dul ba): glang po che phru gu bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che mo gcig gi yin no/ /glang po che mo bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che phal gcig gi yin no/ glang po che phal bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ glang po che
138b7('dul ba): mche ba med gcig gi yin no/ glang po che mche ba med bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ sngon po gcig gi yin no/ /sngon po bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ ser po gcig gi yin no/ /ser po bcu'i gang yin
139a1('dul ba): pa de ni/ dmar po gcig gi yin no/ /dmar po bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ dkar po gcig gi yin no/ /dkar po bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ 'bigs byed kyi
139a2('dul ba): glang po gcig gi yin no/ /'bigs byed kyi glang po che bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ spos kyi glang po che gcig gi yin no/ spos kyi glang po che bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ tshan po che gcig gi yin
139a3('dul ba): no| |tshan po che bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ tshan po che chen po gcig gi yin no/ /tshan po che chen po bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ rab gnon gcig gi yin no/ /rab gnon bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/
139a4('dul ba): stobs mchog gcig gi yin no/ /stobs mchog bcu'i gang yin pa de ni/ sred med kyi bu'i stobs phyed do/ /sred med kyi bu'i stobs phyed gnyis gang yin pa de ni/ sred med kyi bu'i stobs
139a5('dul ba): yin te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshigs dang tshigs phran dag na yod pas gnas 'jog dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ sred
139a6('dul ba): med kyi bu'i stobs kyi tshogs can yin no/ /bar sdom la/ mi dang glang dang ba men dang ni de bzhin glang chen phru gu dang / /glang chen mo dang phal dang mche ba med dang de bzhin bzhi tshan dang / /
139a7('dul ba): 'bigs byed glang chen spos kyi glang chen dang ni tshan po che gnyis dang / /rab gnon dang ni stobs mchog dag dang sred med bu yi stobs gnyis so/ /sred med kyi bu'i stobs gang lags
139b1('dul ba): pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yab yum las byung ba'i stobs lags na/ btsun pa/ yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / mos pa'i stobs las/ stobs
139b2('dul ba): gzhan mchis sam/ gnas 'jog dag/ yod de/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyi stobs zhes bya ba yin te/ gnas 'jog dag /bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pas
139b3('dul ba): byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'khor 'byung po bye ba sum cu rtsa drug can bcom nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so/ /btsun pa/ yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
139b4('dul ba): dang / mos pa'i stobs dang / bsod nams kyi stobs 'di bas lhag pa'i stobs gzhan lta mchis lags sam/ gnas 'jog dag /yod de/ 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba
139b5('dul ba): yin te/ ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs por/ spangs /bsal te so sor spangs so/ /btsun
139b6('dul ba): pa| yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / mos pa'i stobs dang / bsod nams kyi stobs dang / ye shes kyi stobs 'di bas lhag pa'i stobs gzhan lta mchis
139b7('dul ba): lags sam/ gnas 'jog dag /yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zhes bya ba yin te/ gnas 'jog dag /rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'od
140a1('dul ba): srung rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par thams cad mkhyen par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa dag spobs pa med par byas so/ /btsun
140a2('dul ba): pa/ 'di ltar/ yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / mos pa'i stobs dang / bsod nams kyi stobs dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di
140a3('dul ba): bas lhag pa'i stobs gzhan lta mchis lags sam/ gnas 'jog dag /yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i stobs zhes bya ba yod de/ gnas 'jog dag /mi rtag pa'i stobs dang
140a4('dul ba): ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yab dang yum las byung ba'i stobs gang yin pa dang / bsod nams kyi stobs gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs gang yin pa dang / mos pa'i
140a5('dul ba): stobs gang yin pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs gang yin pa de dag thams cad/ shing sA la zung gi bar du gzi med par 'gyur ro/ /tshigs su
140a6('dul ba): bcad de yang bka' stsal pa/ ye shes stobs dang bsod nams stobs dang ni/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs dang sku yi stobs pas kyang / /nga yi gzi brjid 'joms par byed pa yi/ /mi rtag nyid ni
140a7('dul ba): ches stobs ldan par 'dod/ gang du gser gyi ri dbang rtse mo lta bur 'dug pa'i sku/ /'di 'dra mi rtag nyid kyi gzi yis bcom nas 'jig 'gyur ba/ /mi rtag shin tu stobs dang ldan par
140b1('dul ba): mkhas pas shes bya ste/ /gang du mi rtag nyid kyi rdzi ba med pa de thob bya// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po sum cu pa/ gnas 'jog dag /da ltar gyi mi rnams tshe dang / kha dog dang /
140b2('dul ba): stobs dang / longs spyod kyi bar dag nyams pa la ltos/ rdo 'di ni/ bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi pang tshad kyi rdo yin te/ 'di la lag rjes kyang snang ngo / /de rnams shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ de
140b3('dul ba): rnams kyi stobs kyi dregs pa gang yin pa de/ med par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ /de dang mthun
140b4('dul ba): pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
140b5('dul ba): mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa/ 'di lta bu ni/ bdag cag la mas ma bgyis te/ phas ma lags/ rgyal pos
140b6('dul ba): ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang
140b7('dul ba): lags pa bdag cag la mdzad de/ bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams kyi gnas nas ni/
141a1('dul ba): rkang pa drangs/ lha dang mi rnams su ni/ rab tu bkod/ 'khor ba las ni/ ring du mdzad/ thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo
141a2('dul ba): nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa/ bdag cag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /de lta bas na/ bdag
141a3('dul ba): cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang
141a4('dul ba): yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ ku sha'i grong khyer gang na bar 'dod
141a5('dul ba): ngo| |btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sdig pa can du ma bzhud par ku sha'i
141a6('dul ba): grong khyer gang na bar rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang ku sha'i grong khyer du byon nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
141a7('dul ba): kun dga' bo/ ku sha'i grong khyer 'dir shing sA la zung gi bar du ring po mi thogs pa kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /sdom la/ ste'u dang lhas
141b1('dul ba): bltas lum+bi ni/ /ser skya dang ni shing 'da' dang / /gser thub zhing pa chos gos dang / /khrus dang bye can bcu tshogs yin/ /bcom ldan 'das sgra ngan na sgra ngan rnams kyi grong rdal khra bo 'dul na bzhugs
141b2('dul ba): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ngas zag pa zad pa shes shing mthong nas gsungs te/ rgyas par yang dag par ldan pa'i lung las phung po'i
141b3('dul ba): le'u las ste'u lta bu'i mdo 'byung ba yin no/ /lhas bltas su byon nas der tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ lhas bltas 'dir shAkya shin tu blo
141b4('dul ba): gsal btsas te/ 'di nyid du chen por gyur to/ /lum+bi nir gshegs nas de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ lum+bi ni'i tshal 'dir nga btsas nas ring po ma lon
141b5('dul ba): zhing sus kyang ma bslangs par gom pa bdun por nas ngas phyogs bzhir bltas te/ nga'i srid pa'i skye ba'i mtha' ni/ 'di yin no/ /zhes tshig tu smras so/ /ser skya'i gnas su byon nas/ des tshe dang
141b6('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ ser skya'i gnas 'dir rgyal po zas gtsang btsas te 'di nyid du chen por gyur to/ /shing bal gyi 'da' ba can du byon nas/ de nas bcom
141b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ chos bzhin ma yin pa dang / chos kyi 'khor bshad kyi/ legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /chos ma yin
142a1('dul ba): pa'i 'khor gang zhe na/ 'khor gang zhig 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni/ chos ma yin pa'i 'khor
142a2('dul ba): zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor gang zhe na/ 'khor gang zhig 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni/ chos kyi
142a3('dul ba): 'khor zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ ngas khyed la chos ma yin pa dang / chos kyi 'khor ngas bshad do/ /zhes gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni/ de yin no/ /mtshams can gyi grong du byon nas/ de
142a4('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ mtshams can gyi grong 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub bltams te/
142a5('dul ba): 'di nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /zhing pa'i grong khyer du byon nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nga byang chub sems
142a6('dul ba): dpar gyur pa na zhing pa'i grong 'dir yab zas gtsang gi las kyi mtha' rnams la bltas nas/ shing dzam+bu'i grib ma la zag pa med pa dang 'dra bar bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par bzhugs
142a7('dul ba): so| |phyogs gzhan zhig na yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ phyogs 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis na bza' chos gos
142b1('dul ba): brkyang pa yin no/ /khrus kyi grong du byon nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khrus kyi grong 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
142b2('dul ba): gser thub kyis khrus mdzad pas/ de bas na/ 'di'i ming khrus kyi grong / khrus kyi grong zhes bya bar grags so/ /bye ma can du byon nas bye ma can du shing 'dzeg gi shing lta bu'i mdo'i lam gyi tshogs
142b3('dul ba): rgyas par bsdus so/ /sdom la/ 'dod pa mthun dang shas che dang / /lo ma bdun dang 'char ka dang / /mnyan yod gdu bu sa can dang / /seng ge'i grong dang grong gsar dang / /grong khyer dang ni khri'u
142b4('dul ba): brtsegs/ /phyi ma n+ya gro d+ha grong ste/ /grong khyer de dag bcu gnyis gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa mthun pa na 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
142b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed kyi/ nga la bsod snyoms stob pa dang bco lnga pa'i gso sbyong de nyid ma gtogs par
142b6('dul ba): dge slong su yang ma 'ong zhig / bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum po de la nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs nas bsod snyoms stob pa'i dge slong dang / bco lnga pa'i gso sbyong de nyid ma gtogs par
142b7('dul ba): dge slong su yang der mi 'gro'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum po de kho na 'das nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gud la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas
143a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed la gal te gzhan mu stegs can dang / kun tu rgyu rnams nye bar lhags nas
143a2('dul ba): 'di skad ces 'di ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma gnas pa gang zhig gis zla ba gsum po 'di la nang du yang dag bzhag par gyur ces 'dri na/ de skad ces dris pa la dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung
143a3('dul ba): bas bzhugs so/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag/ nga ni/ zla ba gsum po 'di la dbugs rngub pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba dran pa'i gnas pas nang du yang dag
143a4('dul ba): bzhag ste/ ngas dran bzhin du dbugs rngubs na yang dran bzhin du rngubs so/ /snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dran bzhin du dbugs phyung na yang dran bzhin du dbugs
143a5('dul ba): phyung ngo / /snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /ring po dang / thung ngu dang / lus thams cad yang dag par myong nas dbugs rngubs na/ lus thams cad yang dag par myong nas
143a6('dul ba): dbugs rngubs so/ /snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /lus thams cad yang dag par myong nas dbugs phyung na yang lus thams cad yang dag par myong nas dbugs phyung
143a7('dul ba): ngo| |snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs rngubs pa dang / lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung na yang dbugs
143b1('dul ba): phyung ngo / /dbugs rngubs so/ /snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhes bya ba nas/ 'gog par rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo / /snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
143b2('dul ba): shes so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag/ de la nga 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gnas pa rags pa mngon par 'dus byas shing bsam gyi/ ma la bdag gis
143b3('dul ba): gnas pa de nyid las yang dag par 'das te bor nas/ ches phra ba 'dis lan mang du gnas par bya'o/ /snyam nas ngas gnas pa de nyid las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bor nas gnas
143b4('dul ba): pa ches phra ba 'dis lan mang du gnas so/ /de nas lha gsum zhig nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas lha gcig ni/ 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma nongs so/ /zhes zer ro/ /gnyis pa ni/
143b5('dul ba): 'di skad ces/ 'di nongs pa ni/ ma yin te/ 'on kyang nongs par mdzad pa yin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /lha gsum pa ni/ 'di skad ces/ nongs pa yang ma yin/ nongs par mdzad pa yang ma yin te/
143b6('dul ba): 'on kyang dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gnas pa ni/ 'di lta bur zhi ba kho na yin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge slong dag/ gang yang dag par smra ba na 'phags pa'i gnas pa dang / lha'i gnas pa dang /
143b7('dul ba): tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang / mi slob pa'i gnas pa zhes smra bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa yin te/ slob pa'i gang zag rnams ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /
144a1('dul ba): ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ mi slob pa'i gang zag rnams mthong ba'i chos kho na
144a2('dul ba): la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /de yang dag par smra ba na dbugs rngub pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba'i dran pas gnas pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge
144a3('dul ba): slong dag/ dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pas gnas pa ni/ 'phags pa'i gnas pa dang zhes bya ba nas mi slob pa rnams mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin
144a4('dul ba): no| |zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ 'dod pa mthun par byon nas 'dod pa mthun pa na 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags
144a5('dul ba): khrod na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bram ze pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba la/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dpya rgyu rtswa dang / shing dang / chur bcas par bram ze'i sbyin gtong du byin nas shas
144a6('dul ba): chen po rgyas pa la longs spyod do/ /bram ze pad+ma'i snying po slob ma bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug ces bya ba mang du thos pa/ tshig gsal ba/ thags thogs med par smra ba zhig yod de/ bram ze
144a7('dul ba): pad+ma'i snying po'i bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig 'don du 'jug go/ bram ze'i pad+ma'i snying pos dge slong go'u ta ma shAkya'i sras/ shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu
144b1('dul ba): bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
144b2('dul ba): shes ldan go'u ta ma de'i dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su grags te/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das go'u ta
144b3('dul ba): ma de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
144b4('dul ba): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i skye rgu dang bcas/ lha
144b5('dul ba): dang mi'i skye rgu dang bcas pa 'di la mthong ba'i chos kho na la rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas nga'i zag pa zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /
144b6('dul ba): 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go bar byed pa de/ gsang tshig las kyang 'byung ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba ni/
144b7('dul ba): gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ gal te khyim na gnas na ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po/ mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po/ rin po che sna bdun dang
145a1('dul ba): ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta bu dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor
145a2('dul ba): bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni/ blon po rin po che nyid yin no/ /de la yang bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang
145a3('dul ba): ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par bsdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med
145a4('dul ba): cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa
145a5('dul ba): kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur pa de/
145a6('dul ba): ko sa lar ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'dod pa mthun par byon nas/ 'dod pa mthun pa na 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug
145a7('dul ba): la smras pa/ ma sdug shes sam/ kho bos dge sbyong go'u ta ma shAkya'i sras/ shAkya rigs las sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
145b1('dul ba): med par rab tu byung nas zhes bya ba nas tshangs par spyod pa rab tu bsten to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ kho bos de gsang tshig dag las bton pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag
145b2('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba ni/ gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ gal te khyim na gnas na ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/
145b3('dul ba): chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'dod pa mthun par byon nas 'dod pa mthun
145b4('dul ba): pa na 'dod pa mthun pa'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos kyi/ bram ze'i khye'u/ tshur khyod shes ldan go'u ta ma gang na ba der song zhig dang phyin nas ji ga shes ldan go'u ta ma de'i dge ba
145b5('dul ba): dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su ji ltar grags pa de kho na bzhin yin nam ma yin pa dang / de'i mtshan rnams grags pa yang
145b6('dul ba): dag pa yin nam ma yin/ rang nyid kyis rab tu shes par 'gyur grang / bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug gis bram ze pad+ma'i snying po ltar mnyan nas/ shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs mang
145b7('dul ba): po dang lhan cig tu shas che ba nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang ba na der dong ste lhags nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams bcom ldan
146a1('dul ba): 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//
146a2('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par
146a3('dul ba): 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams la
