202a6('dul ba): pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba gyis la/ bu yul
202a7('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs la 'di skad ces/ gang gi slad du rje'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha'i bu mo ji lta bu zhig /ces kyang smros shig /de
202b1('dul ba): nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor gyi chung mas/ ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan
202b2('dul ba): rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / sngon khyim par gyur pa na/ dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar
202b3('dul ba): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa
202b4('dul ba): rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /rje'i sras gang gi slad du bcom ldan
202b5('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha mo de/ ji lta bu zhig lags/ sring mo/ kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa ni/ lha'i bu mo'i ched du ma yin no/ /de
202b6('dul ba): nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ sngon gyi chung ma la sring mo/ zhes tshig tu smras pas/ brgyal nas sa la 'gyel te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pha dang ma la smras pa/ yab
202b7('dul ba): yum/ gal te kha zas btang ba lags na/ ci/ mi stsal tam/ btang snyoms su bzhag ste/ ci mtho 'tsham lags sam/ bu yul 'khor skyong / longs spyod cig /ces/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul
203a1('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed
203a2('dul ba): de/ rnam grangs du mas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag pas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis zos nas lag pa bkrus
203a3('dul ba): te| lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ltos
203a4('dul ba): shig lus ni nor bu dang / /rna rgyan gyis ni bkra byas kyang / /nad dang slu ba'i chos can de/ /brtan par gnas pa yod ma yin/ /skra yi lan bu brgyad lhas shing / /mig ni mig sman gyis
203a5('dul ba): bskus pa'ang / /byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/ /pha rol tshol ba ma yin no/ /dri rnams kyis ni lus bskus la/ /rkang pa btsag gis byugs pa yang / /byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/ /pha rol
203a6('dul ba): tshol ba ma yin no/ /mig sman gser gyis bkra byas shing / /rul pa'i lus ni brgyan pa yang / /byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi/ /pha rol tshol ba ma yin no/ /ri dwags 'chor bas rnyi btsugs
203a7('dul ba): nas/ /ri dwags bzung bar ma nus ltar/ /rngon pa 'o dod 'bod bcug la/ /zos nas gnas su 'gro bar bya/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ pha dang ma la chos dang ldan pa'i
203b1('dul ba): gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' la song ngo / /de nas tshe dang
203b2('dul ba): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung du nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug go / de'i tshe rgyal po ko'u rab bya/ tshe dang ldan pa yul
203b3('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi snyan pa yang sgrog cing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na/ bdag
203b4('dul ba): phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po ko'u rab byas/ tshal srung ba'i mi la bsgo ba/ kwa ye nang rje/ khyod song la myur du bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal phyag dar byos shig /sang nga
203b5('dul ba): der skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro'o/ /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skyes pa des/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal thams cad phyag dar byed pa na/ mi des tshe dang
203b6('dul ba): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung na nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya/ gang gi snyam pa yang dang yang du
203b7('dul ba): sgrog cing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur
204a1('dul ba): snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni/ 'di yin te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu phyin gyi/ ma la bdag gis rgyal po ko'u rab bya la sbran par
204a2('dul ba): bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas skyes pa de rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrog cing bzhugs la/
204a3('dul ba): nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phye na/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam
204a4('dul ba): pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni/ de lags te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu mchis lags te/ lhas de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab
204a5('dul ba): byas/ mi gzhan zhig la bsgo ba/ kwa ye nang rje tshur/ bzhon pa bzang po myur du sdogs shig /de la nga zhon nas deng kho nar shes ldan yul 'khor skyong blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /lha/ bka'
204a6('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po myur du bsdogs te/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rgyal po ko'u rab bya la 'di
204a7('dul ba): skad ces smras so/ /lha/ chibs pa bzang po bsdogs lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas bang mdzod stug
204b1('dul ba): po can nas byung ste tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song nas/ de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun
204b2('dul ba): dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po ko'u rab bya rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so/ /
204b3('dul ba): tshur spyon/ rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul lags pas/ bzhed na bdag kyang stan la g.yar drongs shig /kye yul 'khor skyong / bdag gi yul lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag yul 'khor skyong gis
204b4('dul ba): bdag stan la g.yar drang bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po/ gdan mchis kyi/ gal te bzhed na/ bzhugs shig/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang lhan cig /mngon du
204b5('dul ba): yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po ko'u rab byas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul
204b6('dul ba): 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / gal te rigs dman pa'am/ longs spyod rnams yongs su zad pa'am/ gtugs par gyur na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos
204b7('dul ba): ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba yod na/ bdag cag rigs ni/ ko'u rab bya yin la/ longs spyod ni/ rgya che ba yin gyi/ 'di ltar/ kho bos
205a1('dul ba): shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la longs spyod kyi skal ba bdag las bgo bsha' bya'i/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong tshur/ khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yongs
205a2('dul ba): su spyod cig / sbyin pa dag thong zhig /bsod nams dag gyis shig /rgyal po chen po/ cha ma lags pa'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du 'bod kyi/ 'tsham pas ni/ ma lags so/ /khyod lta bus bdag 'dra
205a3('dul ba): ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa 'di lta bu'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du yang ma 'bod cig / bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong dang 'tsham pa'i mgron du 'bod pas mgron du 'bod pa ji lta bu zhig lags
205a4('dul ba): rgyal po chen po tshur spyon/ khyod kyis 'di skad ces/ kye yul 'khor skyong / kho bo'i yul 'byor cing gnod pa med pa/ bsdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med la/ slong ba po'i bsod snyoms rnyed sla ba
205a5('dul ba): yin gyi/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / bang mdzod stug po can 'dir mnos shig dang / bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong chos bzhin gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar
205a6('dul ba): bya'o| |zhes bgyi ba lags na/ rgyal po chen po/ sems mngon par dad pa gang lags pa de tsam gyis bgyis lags te 'tshal lo/ /gzhan yang / gal te zhus pa lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs
205a7('dul ba): phye na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la bdag zhu lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ /gsungs shig /thos nas khyod la rig par bgyi'o/ /kye yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po 'di dag ni/ yongs su nyams pa
205b1('dul ba): lags te/ de dag gis yongs su nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dag /skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur
205b2('dul ba): ro| |bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rga bas yongs su nyams pa dang / nad kyis yongs su nyams pa dang / nye dus yongs su nyams pa dang / longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa'o/ /kye yul 'khor
205b3('dul ba): skyong / rga bas yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la/ rigs kyi bu rgas 'khogs/ gtugs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni/ bdag rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pas/ bdag
205b4('dul ba): gis re zhig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyad par sla ba ma yin na/ mi bdog na/ lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha sbu bregs la/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag
205b5('dul ba): pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo / /snyam nas/ de rga ba'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim
205b6('dul ba): nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/ 'di ni/ rga bas yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs
205b7('dul ba): te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni/ gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ skra nag pa/
206a1('dul ba): na tshod dar la bab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ gang gi tshe/ rtsed mo dang / dga' ba dang / ma gu ba dang / cha ba dang / brgyan pa'i gnas la brtson pa dang ldan pas gnas
206a2('dul ba): par bya ba de'i tshe/ nye du rnams mchi mas brnangs shing ngu bzhin dang bcas pas ma rangs bzhin/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
206a3('dul ba): med par rab tu byung na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis/ ci zhig shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
206a4('dul ba): khyim med pa rab tu byung / de la ni/ kho bo rangs pa ma yin te/ mi bzod do/ /kye shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / nad kyis yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la/ rigs kyi bu na ba/ sdug bsngal
206a5('dul ba): pa| nad tshabs che bar gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni/ na ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che bas/ bdag gis re zhig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang / longs spyad par sla ba ma yin na/
206a6('dul ba): mi bdog na/ lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nad kyis
206a7('dul ba): yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni/ nad kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /
206b1('dul ba): shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni/ nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung ngo / /
206b2('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / gnod pa med cing / nad med pa'i rang bzhin can dang / ran par 'jug pa'i drod dang ldan pa ste/ ha cang bsil ba
206b3('dul ba): ma yin pa dang / ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa dang / khams snyoms pas gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas khyod kyis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar
206b4('dul ba): 'ju bar 'gyur na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / de la ci zhig shes/ mthong zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la ni/ kho bo rangs pa ma yin te/ mi bzod do/ /
206b5('dul ba): kye yul 'khor skyong / nye dus yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la/ rigs kyi bu'i nye du rnams rabs chad/ nye du rnams kha btag nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye du rnams rabs
206b6('dul ba): chad| nye du rnams kha btags pas/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nye dus yongs su nyams pas yongs
206b7('dul ba): su nyams pa skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni/ nye dus yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni/ nye
207a1('dul ba): dus yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab
207a2('dul ba): tu byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong gi nye du ni/ ko'u rab bya'i rigs nas bzung ste brgyud pa/ bang mdzod stug po can 'di nyid na rgyas par yod na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong
207a3('dul ba): gis/ ci zhig shes/ mthong zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la ni/ kho bo rangs pa ma yin te/ mi bzod do/ /kye yul 'khor skyong / longs spyod kyis
207a4('dul ba): yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la/ rigs kyi bu'i longs spyod bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi longs spyod ni/ bsrabs
207a5('dul ba): pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur gyi/ ma la bdag skra dang / kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs su
207a6('dul ba): nyams pa skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /'di ni/ longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong
207a7('dul ba): ni/ longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni/ bang mdzod stug po can
207b1('dul ba): 'di na/ rigs mchog dang / rigs bzang po yin pas 'di lta ste/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa yin na/ 'di la shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis/ ci zhig shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang
207b2('dul ba): kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de la ni/ kho bo rangs pa ma yin te/ mi bzod do/ /rgyal po chen po/ bzhi po 'di dag /bcom
207b3('dul ba): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ yid 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs te/ yid 'byung ba de dag gis yid byung nas/ rigs
207b4('dul ba): kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni/ rga bas
207b5('dul ba): nye bar khrid pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ ngoms
207b6('dul ba): mi shes te/ sred pas 'khol bas chog mi shes pa yin par bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
207b7('dul ba): med par rab tu byung ngo / /bdag gis/ mdor bsdus te gsungs shing rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i don rgyas par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis/ don de nyid ci nas/ bdag gis
208a1('dul ba): shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing rnam par ma phye ba 'di ni don rgyas par 'tshal bar 'gyur bar rgyas par bshad du gsol/ shes ldan
208a2('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni/ rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te
208a3('dul ba): gsungs/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe khyod lo nyi shu'am/ nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par
208a4('dul ba): gyur pa na/ na tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu/ lang tsho la bab pa/ skra nag pa/ nyams rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang / da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste/ tshe'am/ kha dog gam/ stobs sam/ shugs
208a5('dul ba): sam/ smra dngags sam/ srid du'am/ sbom du mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong ngam/ kye yul 'khor skyong / gang gi tshe bdag lo nyi shu'am/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa na/ na tshod kyis
208a6('dul ba): gzhon nu thor bu/ lang tsho la bab pa/ skra nag pa/ nyams rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang / da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste/ tshe'am/ kha dog gam/ stobs sam/ shugs sam/ srid du'am/ sbom
208a7('dul ba): du'am/ smra dngags su mnyam zhing mtshungs par ma mthong ste/ da ni/ bdag na tshod kyis lo brgyad cu lon pas/ rgas 'khogs/ gtugs ta/ bar 'ga' bdag 'dug pa dang / langs pa
208b1('dul ba): yang gzhan gyi bya dgos so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ 'di las dgongs nas 'jig
208b2('dul ba): rten 'di thams cad ni/ rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas
208b3('dul ba): khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni/ bdag rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do/ /gang yang shas ldan yul 'khor
208b4('dul ba): skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa/ bdag la ni/ bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra
208b5('dul ba): mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta rkya dang / shing rta pa dang / bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long bgyid pa dang /
208b6('dul ba): bro gar len pa rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa/ gang dag bdag gi gshed ma phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba dag mchis pa slar 'joms par
208b7('dul ba): bgyid pa mchis na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis
209a1('dul ba): ci la dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod ba de bzhin du lan thob cig /rgyal po chen po/ da ltar khyod la lus
209a2('dul ba): kyi gnod pa 'ga' mchis sam/ kye yul 'khor skyong / bdag la mchis te/ da ltar rlung gis rgyab tu gnod do/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang gi tshe rlung gis rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag
209a3('dul ba): gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta rkya dang / shing rta pa dang
209a4('dul ba): bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag
209a5('dul ba): yin pa tshur/ bdag la skyes shing byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag po/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig /ces bgyis na/ 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor
209a6('dul ba): skyong / ma lags so/ /gang gi tshe rlung gis bdag gi rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang /
209a7('dul ba): khrus mkhan dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta rkya dang / shing rta pa dang / bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long bgyid pa dang /
209b1('dul ba): bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur bdag la byung zhing skyes pa'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi
209b2('dul ba): bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig /ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub kyi/ de'i tshe bdag 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal drag po/ rtsub ba/ tsha ba/ mi bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams
209b3('dul ba): myong ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa de 'di las dgongs nas/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ rjes su 'gro ba med de
209b4('dul ba): skyabs med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
209b5('dul ba): ste| de la ni/ bdag rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang rangs te bzod do/ /gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten
209b6('dul ba): 'di ni/ thams cad bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong / bdag cag la bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang zhes
209b7('dul ba): bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu rnams mchis te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang dag bdag mtshan rje bzhin 'breng la/ 'greng na 'greng ba dang / nyal na zhugs tshe bgyid pa dag mchis na/ 'on kyang
210a1('dul ba): shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul
210a2('dul ba): 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gang
210a3('dul ba): gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de
210a4('dul ba): 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu dag tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu
210a5('dul ba): 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin shog cig / ces bgyis na/ 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor skyong ma lags so/ /kye yul 'khor skyong / gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye
210a6('dul ba): bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang /
210a7('dul ba): bran dang / las bgyid pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu'i bar gang dag yin pa tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /bdag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi ba'i phyi bzhin shog
210b1('dul ba): cig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub ste/ bdag 'ba' zhig 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
210b2('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni/ thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ bdog pa med pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de/
210b3('dul ba): bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni/ bdag rangs te bzod do/ /
210b4('dul ba): shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / gang yang 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol
210b5('dul ba): bas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong / bdag sgra ngan rgyas pa'i 'di nyid la yongs su spyod cing / btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su longs
210b6('dul ba): spyod na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor
210b7('dul ba): skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'di na sgra ngan rgyas pa
211a1('dul ba): la yongs su spyod cing / btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su spyod pa las/ shar phyogs nas mi yid gcugs pa/ yid ches pa
211a2('dul ba): brtan po/ 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas/ de 'di skad ces/ lha/ bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir mchi ba na/ de na bdag gis ljongs 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs
211a3('dul ba): pa| skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dag cig mthong ste/ lha/ ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs te/ bzhon pa dang choms
211a4('dul ba): nas rnal du dgod par rung ngo / /zhes smra na/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod yul der dra ma drangs shing / drangs nas bcom ste rnal du dgod dam/ khyod ljongs de dag 'dod dam/ kye
211a5('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong / gal te bdag gis ljongs de dag/ 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di lta bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs pa dang / dra ma drangs nas choms pa dang / bcom
211a6('dul ba): nas rnal du dgod du rung bar shes na/ ljongs de dag tu dra ma drangs shing / dra ma drangs nas bcom la/ bcom nas rnal du 'god do/ /bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tshal lo// //'dul
211a7('dul ba): ba gzhi/ bam po sum cu lnga pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ de las
211b1('dul ba): dgongs nas/ 'jig rten 'di ni/ ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos
211b2('dul ba): ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni/ bdag rangs te bzod do/ /shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / khyod gang la rangs te bzod pa de la/ bdag
211b3('dul ba): kyang rangs te bzod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de skad ces smras nas/ gnas brtan dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jig rten dag na nor dang ldan pa'i mi/ /de dag chags
211b4('dul ba): dang bcas pas gsog byed cing / /nor rnams rnyed nas gtong bar mi byed la/ /phyir zhing 'dod pa don du gnyer ba mthong / /mi dbang rgya mtsho mtha' yis gtugs pa'i sa/ /thag bcug bcom ste cham du phab
211b5('dul ba): nas ni/ /rgya mtsho tshun chad kyis kyang mi chog ste/ /chags pas pha rol don du gnyer bar 'bad/ /mi dbang de bzhin mi gzhan mang po dag /yongs su gzung la ngoms pa yod min pas/ /chog mi shes pas
211b6('dul ba): rang gi lus por te/ /sred dang ma bral bar ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /srog ni ther zug ma yin tshe thung ste/ /rga bas gzir ba la ni skyabs yod min/ /'chi ba la ni nor rjes 'brang mi 'gyur/ /nye du ma yin grogs
211b7('dul ba): min bu ma yin/ /spun dang sring mo de bzhin grogs kun dang / /snying du sdug pa'i tshogs ni 'dus nas ni/ /kye ma kye hud 'di ni lhar gyur ces/ /skra bshig mchi ma can gyi gdong gis ngu / /de ni ras
212a1('dul ba): kyis dkris te phyung nas ni/ /me 'bar nas ni de nas sreg par byed/ /rang gi las kyis sems can de khrid nas/ /de yi nor rnams bgo skal spyod pas 'phrog /'di ni skye ba na
212a2('dul ba): yang gcig pu skyes/ /'chi ba na yang gcig pu 'chir 'gyur zhing / /gcig pus sdug bsngal nyams su 'dir myong 'gyur/ /skye bo 'khor bar grogs yod ma yin no/ /phyug po'am yang na bkren
212a3('dul ba): ba'am brtan po'am/ /bus pa de bzhin gnyis kas reg myong nas/ /brtan po de yis nam yang g.yogs mi 'gyur/ /bus pa bus pa yin phyir rtag tu g.yo/ /blo chung mi mkhas rjes su slob byed
212a4('dul ba): cing / /de nas las rnams gsum po byed 'gyur zhing / /mngal dang 'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'khon dang rjes 'brel sdug bsngal las mi 'grol/ /shes rab nor rnams kun gyi
212a5('dul ba): mchog tu gsungs/ /de yis bdag nyid shes pas bdag nyid rig /srid dang srid min bdag nyid ma rtogs pas/ /blun po sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa yin/ /phran tshegs thabs sam yang na
212a6('dul ba): chos min pa'am/ /mthu yis gzhan dag las ni gang 'phrog pa/ /nyes byas las byed 'khor ba la brten nas/ /nying tor brgyud pas grol bar 'gyur ma yin/ /ji ltar rkun po khyim 'bigs
212a7('dul ba): bzung nas ni/ /sdig pa'i las can rang gi las kyis bcom/ /de bzhin skye rgu nyes byed 'di dang ni/ /'jig rten pha rol rang gi las kyis bcom/ /shing las shing thog bzhin du mi rnams ni/ /
212b1('dul ba): gzhon dang bar ma rgan po rnams kyang ltung / /'dod pa sna tshogs stug cing yid 'ong ba/ /rang bzhin de lta bu yis sems rab 'joms/ /'dod pa rnams kyis 'di 'ching chags par 'gyur/ /'dod pa yod
212b2('dul ba): na 'khon dang 'jigs pa skye/ /de ltas rgyal po 'di nas rab byung ste/ /dge sbyong nyid ni nyams pa med mchog yin/ /de nas rgyal po chen po ko'u rab bya/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa la
212b3('dul ba): mngon par dga' ste/ yi rang nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das glang po che'i grong rdal du byon pa dang / bram ze zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das
212b4('dul ba): sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i
212b5('dul ba): ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang pa de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas tshigs su bcad pas bstod par brtsams pa/ gser gyi mdog can
212b6('dul ba): mig tu sdug pa dang / /dga' ba'i 'byung gnas yon tan kun dang ldan/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lha yi lha/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol byon pa lags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa
212b7('dul ba): mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa na zhes bya ba nas mdzod spur nub par gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
213a1('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yis/ /zhes bya ba nas kun dga' bo/ de de
213a2('dul ba): bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par
213a3('dul ba): 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis bram ze de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa gang yin pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /'di dge
213a4('dul ba): ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal ba nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ 'on kyang lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang / skye gnas phyi ma dang /
213a5('dul ba): lus phyi ma dang / bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la/ rang sangs rgyas bstod 'os zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
213a6('dul ba): 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bram ze 'dis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa la gzigs/ bcom
213a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nga la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas grong mchog
213b1('dul ba): lnga byin pa de/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde
213b2('dul ba): ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba la rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ de lhag par snyan dngags la dga' bar gyur to/ /wA ra NA si na bram ze snyan dngags mkhan gzhan
213b3('dul ba): zhig yod pa de la/ bram ze mos smras pa/ bram ze/ grang ba'i dus la bab kyi/ rgyal po de'i spyan sngar song la rjes su mthun pa'i legs par smra ba 'ga' byos dang / gal te na grang ba'i skyabs cung zad
213b4('dul ba): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de song ba las ji tsam na/ rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas byung ngo / /bram ze des bsam pa/ ci/ bdag gis rgyal po la bstod dam/ 'on te glang po che dam pa la snyam pa las
213b5('dul ba): de 'di snyam du sems te/ glang po che dam pa 'di ni/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin la/ rgyal po la ni khyad par du yin pas/ re zhig glang po che dam pa mngon par bstod
213b6('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa srung bu yi lus kyi sha tshugs ltar/ /mtshan mchog ldan pa'i gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/ /mdog dang tshad kyis lus kyi gzugs
213b7('dul ba): legs pa/ /glang chen dbang po bkra shis rab tu bsngags/ /de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kho bo'i glang chen sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ /mi rnams mig 'phrog dga'
214a1('dul ba): ba skyed pa gang / /de la khyod kyis bstod pa'i tshig smras kyi/ /khyod la grong gi mchog ni lnga sbyin no/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni/
214a2('dul ba): nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni/ bram ze 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas 'di la grong mchog lnga byin no/ /
214a3('dul ba): da ltar yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas yang 'dir rang byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /grong khyer chen por gshegs nas grong khyer chen por sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan
214a4('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yul srug nar gshegs pa dang / yul srug na na bram ze dbang po zhes bya ba/ gzugs dang / lang tsho dang / thos pas rgyags par gyur nas
214a5('dul ba): bdag dang 'dra ba ni/ 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/ /zhes sgrog cing rnam par sgrog go /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la
214a6('dul ba): bzhugs te chos 'chad do/ /bram ze dbang po zhes bya bas/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma yul srug nar byon to/ /zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/
214a7('dul ba): blta na sdug pa zhes thos kyi/ ci/ bdag las lhag par gzugs bzang ba yin nam/ 'on te ma yin bltar 'gro'o/ /snyam nas de byung ba dang / ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i
214b1('dul ba): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun
214b2('dul ba): nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ bdag pas gzugs lhag par bzang mod kyi/ tshad ni/ lhag par ring ba ni/ ma yin no/ /snyam nas/ bcom
214b3('dul ba): ldan 'das de'i gtsug tor blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na ma mthong nas de phyogs shin tu mtho ba zhig la 'dzegs na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze dbang po la
214b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ bram ze nyon mongs kyi/ thong zhig /gal te ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzegs te bltas kyang 'on kyang ches nyon mongs su zad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor ni/ mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
214b5('dul ba): gzhan yang / khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug tor mi mthong ngo / /zhes thos sam/ 'on kyang gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad
214b6('dul ba): mthong bar 'dod na/ khyod kyis khyim na me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i 'og na/ tsan+dan sa mchog las byas pa'i mchod sdong nyid yod kyi/ de phyung la gzhol cig dang de bzhin gshegs pa yab dang yum las
214b7('dul ba): 'khrungs pa'i sku'i tshad ni/ de yin no/ /bram ze dbang pos bsam pa/ de yang ngo mtshar zhig ste/ bdag gis lan 'ga' yang ma thos na/ song ste blta'o/ /snyam nas/ de rings pa rings par song nas me'i
215a1('dul ba): sbyin sreg byed pa'i thab kyi 'og tu brko bar brtsams pa las/ de thams cad du de bzhin du gyur to/ /de mngon par dad par gyur nas bsam pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma
215a2('dul ba): ni/ gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyi/ song la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das dang lhan
215a3('dul ba): cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa
215a4('dul ba): dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes
215a5('dul ba): bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das
215a6('dul ba): dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon
215a7('dul ba): par dad lags so/ /de nas bram ze dbang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
215b1('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis tsan+dan sa mchog gi mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze
215b2('dul ba): gnang gi / song la shoms shig /de nas des sa phyogs dben pa skabs yod pa zhig tu rim gro chen pos mchod sdong de bsgrengs nas dus mchod chen po bshams so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan
215b3('dul ba): dag gis kyang / rten dge bar gyur cig /ces bya bar rig nas rtswa ku sha btags te/ bram ze dbang pos mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams pas na/ dbang po'i dus mchod ces bya bar grags so/ /
215b4('dul ba): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas/ mu stegs can rnams ni/ spa bkong / lha dang mi rnams ni/ dga' bar mdzad/ skye bo dam pa rnams ni/ yi rang par mdzad
215b5('dul ba): pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams bros nas mtha' 'khob tu gnas shing / kha cig ni/ bram ze'i grong zhes bya bar dong nas gnas so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa
215b6('dul ba): na bram ze'i grong du gshegs so/ /mu stegs can rnams kyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ong ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rings pa rings par bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du dong ste lhags
215b7('dul ba): nas smras pa/ chos thob par gyur cig /chos thob par gyur cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /de ci zhig /kho bo cag gis khyed kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni/ mthong gi /ji srid rgud pa mi
216a1('dul ba): mthong ba de'i bar du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bdag cag gi rgud pa gang lags/ shes ldan dag /dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'khor
216a2('dul ba): stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing 'ong ste/ bu dang bcas pa du ma bu med par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /gang gi tshe kho nar bzhugs shing grogs
216a3('dul ba): bgyi ba la thug pa de kho na'i tshe bzhud pa ni/ bzang po ma lags te/ bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du ma rung ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma
216a4('dul ba): gsod na ni/ 'khod par bya'o/ /bzhugs shig /gsad par bgyi'o/ /zhes de rnams lag na dbyug pa dang gzhu thogs/ khu tshur bcangs/ go bgos te byung ba dang / lam gyi dbus na
216a5('dul ba): shAkya rgan po zhig 'dug pas mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gang du 'dong / de rnams kyis smras pa/ dgra gsad pa'i phyir ro/ /khyed cag gi dgra su yin/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'o/ /
216a6('dul ba): shes ldan dag /gal te bcom ldan 'das dgra yin na/ byams pa gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ /shes ldan dag /slar log cig /de rnams ldog tu ma btub pa dang / des bsam pa/ 'di
216a7('dul ba): dag ni/ chos bshad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad du pha rol gnon pa zhig bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des ri brag tu zhugs nas me btang ba dang / ri brag kun tshig
216b1('dul ba): nas ca co dang / ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba/ de rnams kyis thos nas sdangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag dang dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ thag ring po kho na yin gyi/ ri brag 'dir ni phung
216b2('dul ba): po chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brag bsregs kyi/ me gsad kyi/ slar ldog go /zhes de rnams kyis gsad par brtsams pa dang / gsad par ma nus pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du byon
216b3('dul ba): nas bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog dag/ 'di ci byed/ bcom ldan 'das/ ri brag rnams zhugs kyis tshig na/ dgum par rngo ma thogs lags so/ /ngas gsad dam/
216b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das/ 'gum du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung phyung ma thag kho nar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de zhi bar gyur to/ /de rnams
216b5('dul ba): mngon par dad par gyur nas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci zhig gi slad du gshegs lags/ khyed cag kho na rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa
216b6('dul ba): dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus
216b7('dul ba): nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong
217a1('dul ba): rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ shAkya rgan po 'dis nye du la chags pas/ bsod nams ma lags pa
217a2('dul ba): mang du bsags te ri brag bsregs pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang gnyen la chags
217a3('dul ba): pas/ bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags te ri brag bsregs pa de/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ri brag cig na spre'u lnga brgya'i
217a4('dul ba): tshogs gnas pas/ lo tog skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gzan to/ /ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /spre'u rnams kyis
217a5('dul ba): lo tog la gnod pa byed na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ spre'u rnams gsad mod/ de rnams ji ltar gsad par bya/ ri brag gi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad bcad de/
217a6('dul ba): shing tin tu ka gcig pu zhig bzhag la nye 'khor rnams tsher mas bskor dang / de la bza' ba'i phyir spre'u rnams 'dzeg par 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur dang / der de rnams gsad par bya'o/ /de
217a7('dul ba): nas de rnams kyis ri brag gi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad bcad de/ shing tin tu ka gcig pu bzhag nas nyen kor rnams tsher ma'i ra bas bskor te/ srung ma pa'i mi bzhag nas bsgo ba/ khyed kyis
217b1('dul ba): gang gi tshe spre'u rnams tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la sbron cig / de nas dus gzhan zhig na shing tin tu ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu chags te smin pa dang spre'u rnams kyis sde dpon la
217b2('dul ba): smras pa/ sde dpon/ shing tin tu ka smin cing mchis kyi/ gsol du gshegs so/ /de nas sde dpon 'khor lnga brgya dang shing tin tu ka de la 'dzegs te shing tin tu ka la bza' bar brtsams
217b3('dul ba): so/ /de nas srung ma'i mis ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /shing tin tu ka la spre'u thams cad 'dzegs nas za bar byed kyi/ khyed cag gi bya ba'am byed pa
217b4('dul ba): gang yin pa de/ gyis shig /de nas ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lag na mda' gzhu dang dgra sta thogs/ khu tshur bcangs te rings par song nas shing tin tu ka gcad par brtsams pa dang /
217b5('dul ba): de nas spre'u de rnams bred de mchong brgal zhing shing ka phan tshun rgyu bar byed do/ /sde dpon ni/ sems las chung ngus za bar byed pa dang spre'u de rnams kyis de la smras pa/ sde dpon/ bdag cag ni/
217b6('dul ba): sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga ba thob cing mchis te phan tshun du rgyu lags na/ khyod ci'i slad du thugs khral chung ngur bzhugs/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bya ba mang po'i mi rnams la/ /
217b7('dul ba): bya ba min pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /shing gi 'phro ni mang yod pas/ /sems las bskyungs te bza' bar gyis/ /de nas yang sde dpon gyi phru gu zhig ri brag de na bcings te 'dug pa de lag pa 'gram pa
218a1('dul ba): la gtad nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na spre'u bzang po zhig phyogs der 'ongs pa dang / de sems khong du chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ grogs
218a2('dul ba): po/ ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud/ des smras pa/ da ltar ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kho bo'i nye du gsod du dong na/ ci'i phyir sems
218a3('dul ba): khong du chud par mi 'gyur/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis pha rol gnon pa ma byas/ bcings na/ ji ltar pha rol gnon par bya/ kho bos khyod dgrol lo/ /zhes des de bkrol ba dang / de nas des ri
218a4('dul ba): brag der me btang ste ri brag kun tshig pas/ ca co dang / ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sdangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag dang / spre'u rnams ni/ thag ring po kho
218a5('dul ba): na yin gyi/ phung po chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brag bsregs kyi/ me gsad kyi/ slar ldog go /zhes de rnams me gsad pa'i phyir rgyugs pa dang / spre'u rnams kyang shing tin tu ka las
218a6('dul ba): babs nas bros so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ spre'u'i phru gu gang yin pa de ni/ shAkya rgan po 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brag bsregs la/ da ltar
218a7('dul ba): yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brag bsregs so/ /nag po'i grong khyer du gshegs nas nag po'i grong khyer du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ro hi ta
218b1('dul ba): kar byon nas ro hi ta ka na gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyi gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe gnod sbyin glang chen stobs/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar song ba dang / gnod sbyin
218b2('dul ba): glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bskyed par byon nas ro hi ta ka na bdag gi gnas kho na na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der song ste phyin pa
218b3('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la/
218b4('dul ba): chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i
218b5('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
218b6('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das do mod bdag gi gnas su bzhugs par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi
218b7('dul ba): gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang lnga brgya sprul te/ stan nang tshangs can dang / sngas nang tshangs can dang / gor bu lnga brgya
219a1('dul ba): dang / zhugs ling lnga brgya bshams so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun thabs gcig tu sang
219a2('dul ba): bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas gnod sbyin
219a3('dul ba): glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te song nas de'i ne'u zla kha che yul gyi gnod sbyin sgra sgrog ces bya ba de la des bsgo ba/ kho bos
219a4('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyi/ byang phyogs kyi 'bras bu rnams skur cig /ces des pho nya btang nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing
219a5('dul ba): b sod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gtsug lag khang chag chag dang phyag dar byas nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas khang skyong gis
219a6('dul ba): gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / gnod sbyin sgra sgrog gis rgun 'brum gyis skon pa bkang ste/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi lag tu bskur te/ de dag gis gtsug lag khang gi dbus su phung por spungs te
219a7('dul ba): bzhag go / dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu 'di dag ci'i yin pa dang / ji ltar brtag par bya ba mi shes nas de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
219b1('dul ba): pa/ dge slong dag /byang phyogs kyi nags kyi 'bras bu rgun 'brum zhes bya ste/ mes brtag pa byos la rims shig /dge slong rnams 'brum bu re re nas byed pa dang / shin tu yun ring du thogs par
219b2('dul ba): gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phung po gnyis sam gsum du byos la mes reg par byos shig /de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
219b3('dul ba): 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas zhes bya ba nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan
219b4('dul ba): pa'i phyir 'dug go / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin
219b5('dul ba): du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs pa dang / rgun 'brum mang du lhag par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
219b6('dul ba): rgun 'brum rnams mnyes la khu ba brim par bya'o/ /'on kyang lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dro 'jar byas te bzhag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dus ma yin pa'i btung bar 'gyur
219b7('dul ba): ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus nas gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs
220a1('dul ba): te/ nga ni tshe thung ngu'i dus la byung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la bab na/ gdul ba'i don bya ba ni/ rab tu mang bas gal te nga dge slong kun dga' bo dang thabs
220a2('dul ba): gcig tu byang phyogs su gshegs na ni/ gdul ba rnams kyi don bya dka' bar 'gyur gyi/ ma lang nga gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang lhan cig gshegs par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan
220a3('dul ba): 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje bos pa/ dran dang ldan rnams bzang por shog /dran dang ldan rnams rtag tu bzang / zhi ba
220a4('dul ba): thob pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dran dang ldan pa bde bar nyal/ /dran dang ldan rnams bzang por shog /dran dang ldan rnams rtag tu bzang / /rgyal dang pha rol rgyal spangs nas/ /dran dang ldan pa
220a5('dul ba): bde bar nyal/ /bar sdom la/ spungs pa can na sangs rgyas stobs/ /re tu ka na chos stobs te/ /sin+d+hu na ni phor chen zhabs/ /mgo reg spyi blugs sog ma med/ /hu lu klu dang de bzhin
220a6('dul ba): nags/ /gnyis 'grogs drang srong nyams pa dang / /kan tha 'bras kyi grong khyer du/ /mchog gi ma btul dbang ldan rdza/ gsing ma'i gnod sbyin chen po dang / de bzhin brtsegs skyong
220a7('dul ba): dga' 'phel dang / srid pa'i lha dang gtum byed kyi/ /bu bdun rnams ni btul ba dang / /gnod sbyin phyugs skyong 'gro mgyogs dang / /nab so'i klu la gzugs brnyan btang / spu bu can
220b1('dul ba): dang sbubs can btul/ /mdung can gyi ni grong khyer na/ /mdung can zhes bya'i gnod sbyin mo/ /'bra go can dang rdul mchod rten/ /sog med tshogs su bsdus te brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
220b2('dul ba): gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje tshur/ byang phyogs su klu sogs ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das
220b3('dul ba): kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na zhig na
220b4('dul ba): tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags
220b5('dul ba): so/ /de ni/ u sha'i ri yin te/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na zhig nas dang rjes su mthun pa rnams kyi gnas mal gyi mchog /ta ma sa'i tshal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
220b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das spungs pa can du gshegs so/ /de'i tshe spungs pa can na gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs zhes bya ba 'dug pa/ sdig pa'i bsam pa can zhig gnas pas/ spungs can na gnas
220b7('dul ba): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis mgu bar byas kyang de dus dus su gnod pa byed do/ /spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das spungs pa can du gshegs nas phyogs che ge mo na
221a1('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te
221a2('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston
221a3('dul ba): par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad ces bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i
221a4('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
221a5('dul ba): btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to/ /btsun pa/ gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs 'di/ bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas sha 'khon ma mchis par ni/ sha 'khon bgyis/
221a6('dul ba): 'gran zla ma lags par ni/ 'gran zla bgyis/ glags ma btsal bar ni/ glags tshol bar bgyid lags na/ kye ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ gnod
221a7('dul ba): sbyin sangs rgyas stobs gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshe gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin sangs rgyas
221b1('dul ba): stobs la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas stobs/ khyod kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis thos lags so/ /sangs rgyas stobs/ khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bar gshegs pa/
221b2('dul ba): bdag gis thos lags so/ /dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa de las log cig /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ldog lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs
221b3('dul ba): skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bzhag go /de nas des spungs pa can zhes bya ba'i gnas mal brtsigs so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis kyang yo byad thams
221b4('dul ba): cad ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs zhabs 'bring du chas pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis slar bzlog nas bka' stsal
221b5('dul ba): pa| skye bo'i tshogs 'di srungs shig ngas kyang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ci nas spyan ldings te 'bab par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gzhan dag gis kyang phyogs der
221b6('dul ba): mchod rten brtsigs pas/ mchod rten spungs pa can zhes bya bar grags so/ /re tu kar byon nas re tu kar gnod sbyin chos stobs zhes bya ba btul te/ des re tu ka zhes bya ba'i gnas mal brtsigs
221b7('dul ba): so| |sin+d+hur gshegs pa dang / sin+d+hu na mnyan pa gzhan zhig yod pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis dad pa bskyed de/ de nas dad pa skyes nas bden pa rnams la bzhag
222a1('dul ba): go| gnod sbyin phor chen btul nas zhabs gnyis kyis bcags pas/ phor chen zhabs kyis bcags pa zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
222a2('dul ba): drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas su gshegs nas/ der drang srong mgo reg dang ril ba spyi blugs can btul nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gnas mal ril ba spyi blugs
222a3('dul ba): can zhes bya ba brtsigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/
222a4('dul ba): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas su gshegs so/ /klu'i rgyal po
222a5('dul ba): sog ma med kyis bcom ldan 'das gnas su gshegs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang khros/ 'khrugs/ rngam/ yi ma rang nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ ser ba
222a6('dul ba): dang / rdul gyi char dbab par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'khrugs so/ /zhes byams pa la snyoms par bzhugs pa dang / char pa de dag a ka ru'i phye ma dang / ta ma la'i
222a7('dul ba): phye mar gyur nas 'bab par brtsams so/ /de nas 'khor lo dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung thung la sogs te/ mtshon cha rnams dbab par brtsams pa/ de dag kyang
222b1('dul ba): lha'i ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra bar gyur nas 'bab par brtsams so/ /de nas sog ma med kyis khro ba'i mes du ba dbyung bar brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan
222b2('dul ba): 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis dud pa dbyung bar brtsams so/ /de nas de spungs dang / rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal bcom par gyur nas gnas su zhugs te 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ klu
222b3('dul ba): gdug pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba ni/ rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis te/ 'jigs pa dang / 'khrugs pas yin gyi/ ma la ngas 'di 'jigs su gzhug go /snyam du thugs su chud nas gnod sbyin lag
222b4('dul ba): na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'jigs par gyis shig /de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ rdo rje ri'i rtse mo la 'phangs
222b5('dul ba): nas ri'i rtse mo bshig ste lhung ba des/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas non par gyur to/ /de nas sog ma med sdangs/ skrag /phongs nas 'bros par brtsams pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das
222b6('dul ba): kyi me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas phyogs thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na zhi zhing bsil
222b7('dul ba): bar gyur pa ma gtogs par de gang dang gang du song ba de dang de na mi mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs
223a1('dul ba): nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ bdag la mtho 'tsham lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rga ba'i chos can/ ci ngas mtho
223a2('dul ba): 'tsham mam/ gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu dag ma thob na khyod kyis nga ming lus par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang /
223a3('dul ba): g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang / dra bas 'brel pa/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas spyi bo la reg par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/
223a4('dul ba): bzhin bzang / khyod kyis bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi la zas byin te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gya nom pa dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba las/ khyod kyis smon lam log
223a5('dul ba): bar btab pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes te/ rdeg pa dang gsod pa la zhen cing pha rol gyi srog 'phrog pa dang / pha rol gyi srog la gnod par byed pas 'tsho bar byed na/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas
223a6('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba ma gtogs par khyod kyi 'gro ba ni/ gang zhig yin/ skye ba ni/ gang zhig yin/ tshe phyi ma ni/ gang zhig yin/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ci zhig bgyi ba bka'
223a7('dul ba): stsal du gsol/ bzhin bzang tshur/ nga las skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung la yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la mi 'jigs pa byin cig /btsun pa/ bdag
223b1('dul ba): deng slan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su mchi ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos nas yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la yang mi 'jigs pa stsal bar bgyi'o/ /
223b2('dul ba): de nas de'i chung ma dang / bu mo dang / mna' ma rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag cag kyang skyabs su mchi zhing bslab pa'i gzhi
223b3('dul ba): rnams nod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams byin no/ /de'i bu ri bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang skyabs su mchi
223b4('dul ba): ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams nod lags so/ /sog ma med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag klu rnams ni/ mi mdza' ba mang ba lags kyi/ ri bo la skyabs su mchi ba stsal
223b5('dul ba): cing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams ni/ mi dbog par gsol/ 'di dag cag srung bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la skyabs su 'gro ba byin no/ /de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo
223b6('dul ba): rjes/ sog ma med grogs po dang / gnyen med pa dang / mdza' bshes rnams 'dul bar gyur pa mthong nas yid rab tu dga' bas gar byas te smras pa/ khros pas lce bskyod mgo mang bskul
223b7('dul ba): nas mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'bebs/ /rang gnas skyes bu rang la phyogs pa ri mtho rtse lta bu/ /du ma'i tshogs lhags ngal chad dbugs brdzangs bzur cing lta byed pa/ /sbrul bdag sog ma med de
224a1('dul ba): drang srong bka' btsan rnams kyis btul/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sog ma med 'khor drug khri dang bcas pa btul nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs pa
224a2('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa
224a3('dul ba): dag mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /lag na rdo rje/ de ni/ kha che'i yul yin te/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon nas dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa/ dge
224a4('dul ba): slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des klu gdug pa hu lu du btul nas thabs bshams te/ de las skyil mo krung shong ba'i sa blangs nas kha che'i yul kun tu bstan pa 'jog par
224a5('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /nga'i lhag mthong dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mal gyi nang na 'di lta ste/ kha che'i yul mchog tu 'gyur te/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal drug khri dang / grong rdal drug stong dang / grong rdal
224a6('dul ba): drug cu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams ni/ kha che'i yul yin no/ /yul gnyis 'grogs su drang srong dang gnod sbyin nyams pa 'khor dang bcas pa btul lo/ /yul kan thar gnod sbyin mo 'khor dang
224a7('dul ba): bcas pa btul to/ /'bras kyi grong khyer du byon nas 'bras kyi grong khyer du rgyal po sde mchog gi ma bden pa rnams la rab tu bzhag go /yul dbang ldan du byon te dbang ldan na rdza mkhan gzhan
224b1('dul ba): zhig yod pa de/ bzos shin tu rgyags te/ snod rnams bskams nas 'khor lo las 'gogs par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ rdza mkhan gyi cha byad nyid du mngon
224b2('dul ba): par sprul te/ de dang lhan cig gtam bya bar brtsams pa/ khyod kyis snod ci 'dra ba dag cig 'khor lo las 'bebs par byed/ des gsol pa/ bskams nas 'bebs so/ /nga yang bskams nas
224b3('dul ba): 'bebs so/ /khyod dang bdag mnyam lags so/ /'di kho nar zad dam ci/ nga ni/ so btang nas kyang 'bebs so/ /khyod lhag go /so btang ba 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad do/ /'o na ci zhe na/ gser
224b4('dul ba): dang / dngul dang / baiDUr+ya dang / shel gyi rang bzhin du yang byed do/ /de mngon par dad par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdza mkhan gyi cha byad mi snang bar mdzad de/ rang bzhin gyi cha byad du
224b5('dul ba): zhugs nas de 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas te bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod do/ /gsing ma can du gshegs nas gsing ma can du gnod sbyin chen po 'khor dang bcas pa skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab
224b6('dul ba): pa'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bzhag go / brtsegs skyong du klu ba lang skyong dang dgar ba gnyis so/ /dga' 'phel du gshegs nas dga' 'phel du rgyal po srid pa'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gtum
224b7('dul ba): byed kyi bu bdun dang / gnod sbyin sa 'tsho bden pa dag la rab tu bkod do/ /de na mtsho chen po yod pa gang yin pa de na 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis klu'i skye gnas su skyes te lo bcu gnyis 'das
225a1('dul ba): shing steng du byung ste 'khrug pas 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la chos ma bshad pas/ des na bdag cag rnam par lhung ba klu'i skye gnas su skyes
225a2('dul ba): kyi| ci nas kyang bdag cag gis de'i bstan pa zhig par bya'o/ /zhes smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ klu 'gro mgyogs dang nab so ni/ 'di ltar mthu che zhing / rdzu 'phrul
225a3('dul ba): che ba yin pas/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas nga'i bstan pa thal bar brlag par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod do/ /snyam du mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das klu 'gro mgyogs
225a4('dul ba): dang nab so gnyis ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis la bka' stsal pa/ 'gro mgyogs dang nab so/ /tshig bzhi pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba yod pa
225a5('dul ba): bshad kyi/ shes par byos shig /btsun pa/ bdag cag dam pa'i chos 'tshal bar bgyid pa su zhig mchis snyam du rig nas de nyid du slar zhugs te/ de gnyis 'di snyam du sems so//
225a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la chos bshad na/ bdag cag gis rnam par ma shes so/ /snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs der sku'i gzugs brnyan btang nas 'gro mgyogs
225a7('dul ba): dang nab so gnyis kyis de la bltas shing bcom ldan 'das da dung bzhugs pa lta zhes slar yang dang yang du zhugs so/ /phyogs de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo spu bu can dang
225b1('dul ba): sbubs can gnyis btul to/ /mdung can gyi grong khyer du gshegs so/ /mdung can gyi grong khyer na gnod sbyin mo mdung can zhes bya ba khro zhing gtum la gzu lums can zhig gnas pas/ mdung
225b2('dul ba): can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag za bar byed do/ /mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das 'das mdung can
225b3('dul ba): gyi grong khyer du gshegs nas phyogs che ge mo na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas khyur 'phrad cing 'dus nas mdung can gyi grong khyer nas byung ste bcom
225b4('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
225b5('dul ba): kyis mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar
225b6('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
225b7('dul ba): ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po so drug pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag cag gdugs
226a1('dul ba): tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas
226a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis klu
226a3('dul ba): gdug pa dang gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni/ btul lags na/ btsun pa/ gnod sbyin mo mdung can zhes bgyi ba 'di/ bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas sha 'khon ma mchis par ni/
226a4('dul ba): sha 'khod du bgyis/ 'gran zla ma lags par ni/ 'gran zla bgyid/ glags ma btsal bar ni/ glags tshol bar bgyid de/ byis pa btsas shing btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na/ kye ma'o/ /
226a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste/ gnod sbyin mo mdung can gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshe gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
226a6('dul ba): 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo mdung can la bka' stsal pa/ mdung can khyod kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis thos lags so/ /mdung chen/ khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bar gshegs
226a7('dul ba): pa| bdag gis thos lags so/ /dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa de las log cig /btsun pa/ dam zhig bcas te/ gal te 'di dag bdag cag gi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig par bgyid na/
226b1('dul ba): bdag ldog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag /khyed kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das/
226b2('dul ba): thos lags so/ /khyed cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan 'das/ rtsig lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ rtsig lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor
226b3('dul ba): dang bcas te btul nas gshegs so/ /'bra go can du gshegs pa dang / 'bra go can na byis pa chung ngu dag cig rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa chung ngu dag rdul
226b4('dul ba): gyi mchod rten la rtse ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang / yang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis byis pa chung ngu rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse ba dag mthong ngam/ btsun pa/
226b5('dul ba): mthong lags so/ /lag na rdo rje/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bzhi brgya lon pa na/ 'dir ku sha na'i rigs kyi rgyal po ka ni ska zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur pa des/ phyogs 'dir mchod rten brtsigs par
226b6('dul ba): 'gyur te/ de'i ming ka ni ska'i mchod rten zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing / nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang sangs rgyas kyis bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro hi ta ka nas klu'i
226b7('dul ba): rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du srog chags sa ya phrag bdun dang 'bum phrag bdun btul nas ro hi ta kar gshegs te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas nang du yang dag bzhag go /bcom ldan
227a1('dul ba): 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ dang po'i rgyal srid gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /
227a2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ni/ 'di skad ces/ kun dga' bo/ byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog
227a3('dul ba): ma med 'dul du 'dong / byang phyogs na ni/ phan yon rnam pa lnga yod do/ /zhes gsungs la/ da bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ kun dga' bo/ dang po'i rgyal srid gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /
227a4('dul ba): zhes gsungs na/ de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /nga gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu byang phyogs su gshegs nas ta ma sa'i tshal
227a5('dul ba): rnams lung bstan to/ /zhes bya ba nas rdul gyi mchod rten lung bstan to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /kun dga' bo/ ro hi ta ka nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs
227a6('dul ba): pas| srog chags sa ya phrag bdun dang / 'bum phrag bdun btul to/ /byang phyogs na ni/ nyes dmigs lnga yod do/ /mtho na dman can dang / sdong dum dang / tsher mas gang ba dang / rdo ba
227a7('dul ba): dang | gseg ma dang / gyo mo mang ba dang / khyi za ba dang / bud med gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa'o/ /sdom la/ dang po'i rgyal srid rtag bzang dang / bcom dang ni o ta la'i/ /kun dga'
227b1('dul ba): ra ba dgra mtha' dang / /tshugs par dka' dang gang+gA'i chu/ /yi dwags dus dpag phyi ma yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dang po'i rgyal srid du gshegs
227b2('dul ba): nas| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bskur ba/ dang por rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba de
227b3('dul ba): ni| dang po'i rgyal po yin no/ /de'i phyir 'di dang po'i rgyal srid ces bya bar grags so/ /rta bzang du gshegs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
227b4('dul ba): dga' bo/ phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i rta bzang po rin po che byung ste/ de'i phyir 'di rta bzang zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
227b5('dul ba): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /bcom brlag gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
227b6('dul ba): bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na zhig na tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
227b7('dul ba): pa| kun dga' bo/ /khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa pha bi mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de ni/ ri bo rtse mthon zhes bya ste/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo
228a1('dul ba): brgya lon pa dang bcom brlag nas gar mkhan dang / dpa' bo zhes bya ba spun gnyis kyis de la gtsug lag khang rtsig par 'gyur te/ de'i ming gar mkhan dpa' bo
228a2('dul ba): zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing / lhag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mal rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ bcom brlag 'dir spos tshong gi khye'u sbas pa zhes bya ba
228a3('dul ba): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i bu nye sbas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi mtshan med pa zhig byung ba de/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed
228a4('dul ba): par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa nyi ma'i gung zhes bya bas/ nye sbas de rab tu 'byin par 'gyur te/ gdams ngag ston pa rnams kyi phyi ma ni/ nye sbas yin par 'gyur
228a5('dul ba): ro| |gar mkhan dpa' bo de la phug/ srid du khru bco brgyad pa/ zheng du khru gnyis pa/ 'phang du khru bdun pa zhig yod par 'gyur te/ des gang dang gang dag la gdams ngag bstan nas dgra
228a6('dul ba): bcom pa mngon sum du byas pa de dang de rnams kyis/ thur ma sor bzhi tsam pa re re phug de'i nang du 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe phug de/ dgra bcom pa'i thur mas gang bar gyur pa de'i tshe/
228a7('dul ba): nye sbas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dgra bcom pa'i thur ma de dag nyid spungs nas de rnams kyis sreg par byed do/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes
228b1('dul ba): nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa na skye bo mang po la snying brtse ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas lung bstan pa la
228b2('dul ba): gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de'i tsher ma zad/ ji ltar 'di 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa de/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la
228b3('dul ba): zungs shig dang bshad do/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ri rtse mthon po 'di nyid kyi ngos gsum la rang sangs rgyas dang / drang srong dang / spre'u rnams gnas te/ ngos gcig na ni/ rang sangs rgyas lnga
228b4('dul ba): brgya'o/ /gnyis pa la ni/ drang srong lnga brgya'o/ /gsum pa la ni/ spre'u lnga brgya'o/ /spre'u'i sde dpon gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ spre'u'i phru gu btsas shing btsas pa dag gsod par byed pa yin no/ /de nas
228b5('dul ba): spre mo de dag phru gu'i mya ngan gyis non pas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan spre mo dag/ nyon cig /bdag cag gi phru gu btsas shing btsas pa dag /sde dpon 'dis gsod par byed kyi/
228b6('dul ba): de la thabs shig bsham bar bya ste/ bdag cag las spre mo gang zhig sbrum par gyur ma/ des sde dpon la brjod par mi bya'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nas spre mo zhig sbrum par gyur nas/ de de
228b7('dul ba): rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu sbas nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bus bsnyod de spre'u'i phru gu byung nas/ de yang de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu bsnun gsos bskyed de/ de gang gi tshe chen
229a1('dul ba): por gyur pa de'i tshe/ des sde dpon de rang gi khyu nas bskrad nas ri bo rtse mthon na phan tshun du 'khyams par brtsams so/ /de 'khyams pa na rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra
229a2('dul ba): thos nas/ de de rnams kyi drung du song ste/ gang gi tshe bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de rnams la rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / so shing dag 'bul bar byed
229a3('dul ba): do| |de rnams kyis kyang de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do/ /rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa ni/ zos shing zos nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ spre'u des kyang
229a4('dul ba): de rnams kyi spyod lam mthong nas skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi lus rnag can 'dis thob par
229a5('dul ba): bya ba gang yin pa ni/ thob zin gyi/ bdag cag gis zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs 'jug go/ snyam nas/ de rnams 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog
229a6('dul ba): 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de rnams ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de'i tshe mi ldang nas spre'u
229a7('dul ba): des de rnams ma mthong bas mi dga' bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na spre'u de phug tu zhugs nas rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyi chos gos rnams nas bsigs par brtsams so/ /de nas phug de na gnas pa'i
229b1('dul ba): lha gang yin pa de/ 'di snyam du sems te/ spre'u 'dis rang sangs rgyas kyi sku bshig ni/ mi rung ngo / /snyam nas rdo leb chen pos sgo bcad nas 'dug go/ /de nas spre'u de/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal dang /
229b2('dul ba): smre sngags bton te song nas ri bo rtse mthon la kun nas 'khyams pa na/ mi rnams 'dod pas mi dga' bar gyur te rna ba gtod cing mi'i sgra thos par 'dod pa las/ des drang srong de rnams smra ba'i sgra
229b3('dul ba): dag thos nas/ de mgron po lam stor ba bzhin du rings pa rings par de rnams kyi drung du song ngo / /drang srong de dag kyang dka' thub drag pos gdung bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/ lag pa bsgrengs nas
229b4('dul ba): 'dug go/ kha cig ni/ rkang pa ya gcig gis so/ /kha cig ni/ gdung ba lngas gdung bar byed do/ /gang gi tshe spre'u de de rnams dang lhan cig bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ drang srong
229b5('dul ba): de rnams la rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / so shing dag sbyin par byed do/ /de rnams kyang de la zas kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do/ /des de rnams kyi spyod lam dkrugs
229b6('dul ba): shing / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam ston par byed de/ de na gang dag lag pa bsgreng ba de rnams kyi lag pa dag phab nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste sbran nas mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/
229b7('dul ba): gang dag rkang pa ya gcig pa de rnams kyi rkang ba phab nas mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/ gang dag gdung ba lngas gdung bar byed pa de rnams kyi me bsad nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste mdun
230a1('dul ba): du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go / de nas drang srong de rnams kyis gdams ngag 'bogs pa la smras pa/ mkhan po/ spre'u 'di bdag cag gi dka' thub la bar chad
230a2('dul ba): bgyid do/ /zhes de rnams kyis de la rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ spre'u de dag ni/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ gdon mi za bar 'dis drang srong kha cig gi spyod lam
230a3('dul ba): de lta bu mthong gi/ khyed cag gis kyang skyil mo krung chos la 'dug cig/ de rnams kyi skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang / de rnams sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur nas/ de rnams
230a4('dul ba): kyis mkhan po dang slob dpon med pa'i shes pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang mthun pa'i chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas de rnams spre'u de
230a5('dul ba): la chos las byung ba'i dad pa skyes nas de rnams kyis ljongs nas bsod snyoms lo thog gsar pa dang / 'bras bu gsar pa dang / dus gsar gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams las de la
230a6('dul ba): thog mar byin nas/ bdag nyid longs spyod par byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spre'u de dus las 'das so/ /de nas rang byang chub de rnams kyis/ yul khams dang phyogs sna tshogs na
