230a7('dul ba): yod pa'i shing dri zhim po rnams blangs te/ shing dri zhim po thams cad kyis phung por spungs nas bsregs so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ rang byang chub rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas
230b1('dul ba): pa'i spre'u gang yin pa de ni/ nye sbas 'di nyid yin te/ 'di de'i tshe yang skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs so/ /da ltar na yang ngas 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / snying brtse bar lung bstan to/ /
230b2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs na/ bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis/ dge slong go'u ta ma bcom brlag tu phyin nas de shin
230b3('dul ba): tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag par 'dod de/ 'chad par byed/ 'dogs par byed/ rab tu 'jog par byed/ rnam par 'jog par byed/ bye brag tu 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ ston
230b4('dul ba): par byed/ yang dag par rab tu bstan par byed do/ /zhes thos nas/ gal te de bcom brlag tu 'dug na/ bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i bar chad du 'gyur la/ de ni/ bkur sti ma yin
230b5('dul ba): pas skrag go / zhes grag gi /gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma yin pa byas na/ de lta na de bcom brlag tu 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te de la mi smad rigs kyis bkur sti ma yin pa
230b6('dul ba): byas na/ ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin gyi/ gal te de la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma yin par byas na/ des ni/ legs par 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi nang na skyes bu gtso bo su
230b7('dul ba): zhig yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe bcom brlag na bram ze sngor gyur ces bya ba/ rig byed dang / rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed pa/ pha rol gyi rgol ba tshar
231a1('dul ba): gcod par nus pa/ de'i tshig bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhig yod do/ /de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze rnam 'dus shing tshogs te/ sngor gyur gyi drung du song nas mkhan
231a2('dul ba): po| |'dir dge sbyong go'u ta ma mchis nas/ der shin tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu ston par byed do/ /zhes thos zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de ni/
231a3('dul ba): bkur sti ma yin pas skrag go /zhes gda' na/ gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na/ de lta na de bcom brlag tu mchis par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te de la mi smad rigs
231a4('dul ba): kyis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na/ ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin gyi/ gal te de la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na legs par 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi skyes bu gtso
231a5('dul ba): bo mkhan po ma lags pa su zhig mchis/ khyod kyis de la bkur sti ma lags pa'i tshig gi rgya lcag gis spyo bar gsol/ sngor gyur gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag gi lce 'di ni/ bden
231a6('dul ba): pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ gal te spyo bar 'os pa zhig na/ spyo'o/ /'on te bstod par 'os pa zhig na/ bstod do/ /de nas bram ze sngor gyur/ bcom brlag na gnas pa'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan
231a7('dul ba): rabs rnams kyis mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba na/ bram ze sngor gyur gyis rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
231b1('dul ba): kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba/ shing drung zhig na
231b2('dul ba): brten cing zhi ba'i spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang ya mtshan skyes te mig bgrad de bltas nas bstod par brtsams pa/ lus dang ngag dang dbang por bcas pa yi/ /yid kyis tshul bzhin
231b3('dul ba): rtse gcig bgyis nas ni/ yon tan rang bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho che/ /khyod kyi yon tan phyogs gcig brjod par bgyi/ /smra ba rnams kyi dam pa rab mchog lags/ /skyon med dbang po shin tu mnyam
231b4('dul ba): par bzhag / pha rol rgol ba brtson pa thams cad kyis/ /don dam thugs su chud la bskyod mi nus/ /khyod kyi spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa nyid/ brtul zhugs bsgrubs pas brtul zhugs shin tu rdzogs/
231b5('dul ba): stobs ldan khyod kyi ting 'dzin zad med pas/ /sred med bu dang ri yi rgyal po bzhin/ /skyes bu khyu mchog khyod la gnod mi mnga'/ /mi zhum bsnyengs pa mi mnga' dub mi mnga'/ /'byung po rnams la'ang
231b6('dul ba): mi bzod 'ga' mi mnga'/ /khyod ni ma chags 'thab pa ga la mnga'/ /brtabs pa med cing ha cang zhum mi mnga'/ /gdung ba med cing dgyes pa'ang yod mi mnga'/ /ri yi bdag po lhun po rab brtan ltar/ /
231b7('dul ba): khyod kyi thugs ni rtag tu dge ba nyid/ /thub pa skyes mchog khams rnams thams cad nas/ /khyod kyi ye shes yangs pa sgrib mi mnga'/ /skye mched rnam pa sna tshogs dag la ni/ /ma thogs nyams shing zad
232a1('dul ba): pa med par 'jug / thub pa khyod la gang la'ang som nyi med/ /yid gnyis yod min the tshom yod ma yin/ /khyod nyid kyis ni mchog dang mchog min pa/ /rig pas
232a2('dul ba): thugs su chud nas thams cad mkhyen/ /mthong na dga' bar 'gyur la mthong na legs/ /mthong na legs pas mthong na mkhas pa dga'/ /khyod la dga' ba dang mi dga' mnyam pas na/ /rtag tu
232a3('dul ba): dga' ba'i spyod lam de bzhin mdzod/ /khyod ni snyan pa'i spobs par ldan pa lags/ /'dzum pa'i gsung dang dran ldan bsnyengs pa med/ /mkhas rnams 'dod pa rab tu 'chad pas na/ /'jig rten
232a4('dul ba): gsum du khyod kyi grags pa 'byung / /mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang / /srin po mang dang 'jig rten 'dir mkhas dang / thub pa'i drung du yang dang yang lhags nas/ /khyod la yang dang yang zhu
232a5('dul ba): mi bzod med/ /khyod ni snyan pa'i gsung gis dga' mdzad pas/ /mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang / /srin po yid gnyis bsal rnams thub pa che/ /khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal slar
232a6('dul ba): mchi'o/ /bzhengs dang bzhugs dang gshegs dang bzhud pa dang / /mnal dang mi gsung yang na gsung ba 'am/ /'on te lhung bzed chos gos bsnams ba dag /go'u ta ma khyod kyi thams cad
232a7('dul ba): mdzes pa nyid/ /thogs pa med mnga' mi myur mnyam pas na/ /gsung ni snyan pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan/ /mi yi mchog ni dus su gsung bas na/ /gsung gi zlos pa rnam par spangs pa
232b1('dul ba): lags/ /'jig rten na ni stobs dang ldan par grags/ /skyes bu mkhyen pa skyes bu khyu mchog gtso/ /'jig rten lhar bcas 'di ni mtha' dag la/ /nga rgyal mi mnga' khyad du gsod mi mdzad/ /mdza' ba
232b2('dul ba): dang ni mdza' ba ma lags dang / /mthun pa dang ni mthun pa ma lags dang / /g.yo dang mi g.yo rang bzhin gnas pa la/ /ngo mtshar 'dzin pa nam yang mi mnga'o/ /smre sngags 'don cing snying brtser smra ba
232b3('dul ba): dang / /kha chu 'dzag pas nyam thag skad 'byin dang / /yongs su gdungs dang rnam par gdungs ldan dang / /'jigs dang rims nad mya ngan gyis nyen pa/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa brgya yis gtses pa dang /
232b4('dul ba): yun ring nas ni mgon med bde ba med/ /srid pa'i sred par zhugs shing mun bsgribs pa'i/ /'gro ba 'khrugs pa la ni rab gzigs nas/ /bdag nyid rnam pa sna tshogs mthu dag gis/ /thub pa
232b5('dul ba): thugs rje chen po 'jug mdzad cing / /shAkya skyes kyi mchog ni khyod nyid kyis/ /phongs par gyur rnams dgrol phyir brtson pa mdzad/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas 'di dang / /srid pa'i sdug
232b6('dul ba): bsngal zad pa gang min dang / /srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba yi/ /lam ni mtshungs pa med pa khyod kyis bshad/ /rnam par 'dren pa chen po brtson 'grus che/ /rab mchog pha rol smra ba
232b7('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog / 'jig rten gsum na khyod mtshungs ma mchis na/ /khyod las lhag pa lta zhig ga la mchis/ /khyod la khong khro rjes su chags mi mnga'/ /thub pa khyod la yongs su zad mi mnga'//
233a1('dul ba): sdug dang 'gal dang rtsod pa brtul zhugs bzang / /khyod la mi mnga' rtag tu mi mnga' lags/ /thub pa sdug dang mi sdug bde ba dang / /sdug bsngal mnyam dang de bzhin mi mnyam
233a2('dul ba): spangs/ /dga' dang mi dga' ba dag bzod mdzad de/ /yang dag bsdams shing 'di na nyer zhi spyod/ /smad pa byas kyang gnod pa mi mnga' la/ /rab tu bsngags pas khengs par mi 'gyur pas/ /grags pa
233a3('dul ba): grags pa ma yin khyod la mnyam/ /glang chen mche bar ldan pa g.yul ngo ru/ /'dor ba drag tu 'phangs pa'i mda' dag ltar/ /skye bo sdig can rnams kyis smras pa yi/ /tshig ngan tshig rtsub dag kyang
233a4('dul ba): bzod par mdzad/ /drang srong khyod snyan gsung zhing tshig kyang bzod/ /shin tu ngan du smras kyang mi bzod med/ /smad par smras sam dge bar smras kyang rung / /thub pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa lags/ /mchod
233a5('dul ba): 'os rtag par mi dang lha dag dang / /lha min gnod sbyin srin po rnams dang ni/ /drang srong bdag nyid chen pos rtag mchod na/ /khyod ni thugs brtan gzhan du 'gyur mi mnga'/ /'di bas bdag mchog
233a6('dul ba): ces kyang rlom mi mnga'/ /'di bas bdag chung zhes kyang rlom mi mnga'/ /bdag ni 'di dag mnyam zhes mi rlom pas/ /khyod la nga rgyal rnam pa gsum mi mnga'/ /brtan dang ldan pa bong ba gser dang
233a7('dul ba): mtshungs/ /bai DUr+ya dang gseg ma gyo mor mtshungs/ /thub pa chen po lha dang bcas pa yi/ /'gro ba 'di ni rtswa shing 'dra bar spyod/ /zla ba nyi ma'i 'od zer dang phrad nas/ /grang dang tsha ba'i rlung dag langs na
233b1('dul ba): yang / /ri yi dbang po lta bur bzod mdzad de/ /thugs brtan khyod la rab tu gnod mi mnga'/ /gzims cha dang ni stsang nas bshos dang ni/ /bla gos sham thabs rnam pa sna tshogs dag /thub pa zag med so/ /
233b2('dul ba): sor brtags nas ni/ /de yi don du ston par mdzad pa lags/ /mgon po bdag la med ces thugs ngan med/ /ma bcings legs gsungs bdag gir 'dzin mi mnga'/ /gnod pa sna tshogs dag las yongs
233b3('dul ba): su grol| rnyed pa rnyed na'ang dgyes par mi 'gyur la/ /de ma rnyed pas kyang ni zhum mi 'gyur/ /khyad du gsod pa bzod pa mdzad cing 'dir/ /bkur sti dag la'ang chags pa mi mnga' lags/ /lha gnas ri yi
233b4('dul ba): ngos las 'khrungs pa yi/ /khrag ltar dmar pa'i tsan+dan mchog dag dang / /mda' dang ral gri rnon pos khyod kyi thugs/ /lan 'ga' yang ni 'gyur ba mi mnga' lags/ /don med gtam ni gsung bar mi mdzad
233b5('dul ba): gang / /skye bo ngan pas bsten pa'i gtan ma lags/ rnyed pas gtam min zang zing bcas gtam min/ /bdag nyid che rnams mi 'dod ma lags kyi/ /gtam gang rab dben bde ba skyed byed cing / /rab tu zhi
233b6('dul ba): ba 'ga' zhig rab brjod pa/ /lha las 'das pa'i gtam ni gang dag cig /gsung nas sdig pa rnam par 'dul ba gsung / /snyan pa rnams dang 'brel pa rnams dang ni/ /legs par bshad dang snying por ldan pa/
233b7('dul ba): yi| |rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag thub pa che/ /'gro ba'i don slad rab tu gsung bar mdzad/ /mi mkhas dag dang log par lta rnams dang / /gzu lums can dang dga' bar ldan rnams dang / /phra ma can dang
234a1('dul ba): tshig rtsub rgyu can gang / /de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen/ /mi ni gang dag drang zhing sgyu med pa/ /bden la dga' zhing dbang po thul ba dang / /rtag tu legs par brtags
234a2('dul ba): nas byed pa ni/ /de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen/ /chos mkhyen lugs mkhyen gang zag mkhyen pa dang / /drug po mngon mkhyen khyed la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /thub pa zhing mkhyen mchog dang mchog min
234a3('dul ba): mkhyen| |tshul dang tshul min mkhyen khyod mgos phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho rgya chen legs mthong nas/ /bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig yongs su brjod par bas/ /'phags pa khyod kyi
234a4('dul ba): yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol ni/ /rtogs par rngo thogs 'gro ba'i nang na mi ma mchis/ /de lta bu la sogs pa bstod pa lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pa dang /
234a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngor gyur ji ltar stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /de nas bram ze sngor gyur gyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas song ste
234a6('dul ba): de lam du zhugs pa na bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis tshig gi rgya lcag gis pags pa las thal ba tsam du brgyad de/ mkhan po khyod la kho bo cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma la bkur sti ma
234a7('dul ba): yin pa byos shig / ces smras na/ khyed da gzod slar bstod bstod de 'ong ngam/ shes ldan dag /kho bos sngar kho bo'i lce ni/ bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ gal te smad par 'os pa zhig na/
234b1('dul ba): smod la/ bstod par 'os pa zhig na/ bstod do/ /zhes ma smras sam/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ bstod par 'os bas kho bos bstod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/
234b2('dul ba): lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas bcom brlag tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de'i tshe bcom brlag na rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bab bo/ /de nas bcom brlag na gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de/
234b3('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma bcom brlag tu 'ongs na/ bdag gi rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bar chad byed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar sgren
234b4('dul ba): mor byung nas 'dug go / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo/ re zhig bud med ni/ shin tu bkab kyang bzang ba ma yin na/ sgren mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas lha mo de skyengs nas phyogs
234b5('dul ba): gcig tu song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam las gzur te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
234b6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bcom brlag na ni/ nyes dmigs lnga po 'di dag yod do/ /lnga gang zhe na/ mtho na dman dang / sdong dum dang tsher mas gang ba dang / rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo mang
234b7('dul ba): ba dang / dgongs ka za ba dang / bud med mang ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs par bcom brlag gi gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas gang na ba de logs su gshegs te byon nas gnod sbyin
235a1('dul ba): bong bu'i gnas byul te shing drung zhig tu brten cing nyin mo'i gnas pa'i phyir bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu bong bu'i gzugs su byas nas 'phyan pa dang / de la khye'u
235a2('dul ba): dang / bu mo dag zhon pa dang / des de dag rtser bcug /dga' bar byed du bcug nas nags thibs por song nas za bar byed pas/ de'i ming gnod sbyin bong bu/ gnod sbyin bong bu zhes bya
235a3('dul ba): bar grags so/ /bcom brlag gi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las/ lha mo zhig gis mtho ba tsam pas/ bcom
235a4('dul ba): brlag tu ma gshegs par gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas su gshegs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bcas dag so so nas snod du btsos shing bsdogs te/
235a5('dul ba): shing rtar bcug nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug
235a6('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas
235a7('dul ba): cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
235b1('dul ba): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis slad du 'dir gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bca' ba dang / bza' ba
235b2('dul ba): dag gis shing rta bkang ste 'tshal te mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ de bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
235b3('dul ba): pa| kun dga' bo/ song la gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na/ dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su sdus shig /bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod du gzhug
235b4('dul ba): go |btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na/ dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing gnas pa de dag thams
235b5('dul ba): cad rim gro'i gnas su bsags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs
235b6('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing mchis pa de dag thams
235b7('dul ba): cad rim gro'i gnas su bsags lags te/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge
236a1('dul ba): 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa
236a2('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas zhes bya ba nas/ phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
236a3('dul ba): sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni/ btul lags na/ btsun
236a4('dul ba): pa| gnod sbyin bong bu 'di/ bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas/ sha 'khon ma mchis par ni/ sha 'khon bgyid/ 'gran zla ma lags par ni/ 'gran zla bgyid/ glags ma btsal bar
236a5('dul ba): ni| glags tshol bar bgyid de/ nges bu btsas shing btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na/ kye ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ gnod sbyin bong bu gdul
236a6('dul ba): bar gsol| de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu la bka' stsal pa/ bong bu/ khyod kyis thos sam/
236a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis thos lags so/ /bong bu/ khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag gis thos lags so/ /dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa las log cig /bcom
236b1('dul ba): ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gi slad du phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs par dam 'cha' bar bgyid na/ bdag ldog go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
236b2('dul ba): bcom brlag gi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag /khyed cag gis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ thos lags te/ rtsig go /de nas bcom
236b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor lnga brgya dang btul to/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis de'i ched du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin mda'
236b4('dul ba): can dang / gnod sbyin nags ldan dang / gnod sbyin mo bslang rnyed ma dang / mchu rnams btul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom brlag tu zhugs so/ /zhugs nas gnod sbyin mo
236b5('dul ba): 'gran zla ma 'khor lnga brgya dang btul nas de'i don du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi nang dang phyi rol du gnod sbyin nyis stong lnga brgya btul nas
236b6('dul ba): de'i ched du bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lhag khang nyis stong lnga brgya brtsigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das o ta lar gshegs te/ o ta la na o ta la'i nags khrod na
236b7('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bu zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so/ /zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro
237a1('dul ba): na bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ o ta la ra bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / phyogs gzhan zhig na zhing pa lnga brgya
237a2('dul ba): tsam mgo bo rdul gyis g.yogs shing sha na'i ras kyis smad g.yogs nas zhing rmod pa las/ zhing pa de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
237a3('dul ba): kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ gzi brjid kyis mdzes par mthong ngo / /zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de rnams la chos bshad pas zhes bya ba nas mchod par bya ba dang / rjed
237a4('dul ba): par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas rmon pa stong po de dag gnya' shing dang / ru dag bcad nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ste
237a5('dul ba): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor te 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes nas
237a6('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
237a7('dul ba): zhus pa/ btsun pa/ zhing pa lnga brgya bo 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur nas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skyes shing / 'di rnams ni/
237b1('dul ba): rmon par gyur lags/ dge slong dag/ 'di rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ 'di rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin
237b2('dul ba): te| 'di rnams kyis de na le los dus 'das par byas pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur to/ /rmon pa 'di rnams kyis kyang de nyid la rab tu byung ba nas bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo
237b3('dul ba): rnams la gus par ma byas pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes so/ /'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de'i las
237b4('dul ba): kyi rnam par smin pas nga las bden pa mthong bar byas so/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bus dge sbyong
237b5('dul ba): shAkya'i sras/ shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
237b6('dul ba): rgyas nas dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang o ta lar byon nas o ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs te/ shes ldan dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad
237b7('dul ba): pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su grags par gyur te/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
238a1('dul ba): dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
238a2('dul ba): ldan 'das de/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i skye rgu dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams la rang gi mngon par
238a3('dul ba): shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas bdag gi zag pa zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go bar byed cing / de chos
238a4('dul ba): bshad pa ni/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang ba 'ba' zhig ston to/ /
238a5('dul ba): zhes thos nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze de lta bu lta ba ni/ legs pa yin/ nye bar 'gro ba ni/ legs pa yin/ bsnyen bkur byed pa ni/ legs pa yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas/ shing rta rta rgod ma
238a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas gser gyi 'khar ba dang / ril
238a7('dul ba): ba spyi blugs thogs te o ta la nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas
238b1('dul ba): song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zhugs nas/ bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta las bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom
238b2('dul ba): ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/
238b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu o ta las 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye go'u ta ma/ dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa dang / yul tha dad pa can/ rang rang gi spyod yul dang / yul
238b4('dul ba): nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyi/ gzhan gyi spyod yul dang / yul gzhan nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang
238b5('dul ba): lus kyi dbang po gang dag lags pa de rnams kyi spyod yul dang / yul nyams su myong bar bgyid pa ni/ gang lags/ de rnams kyi rton pa yang gang lags/ bram ze/ dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa
238b6('dul ba): dang / yul tha dad pa can 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po gang dag yin pa de rnams kyis spyod yul dang / yul nyams
238b7('dul ba): su myong ba ni/ yid yin no/ /de rnams kyi rton pa yang yid yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ yid kyi rton pa gang lags/ bram ze/ yid kyi rton pa ni/ dran pa yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ dran pa'i rton pa gang lags
239a1('dul ba): bram ze/ dran pa'i rton pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze/ dran pa nye bar
239a2('dul ba): gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rton pa gang lags/ bram ze/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rton pa ni/ rig
239a3('dul ba): pa dang / rnam par grol ba yin no/ /kye go'u ta ma/ rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze/ rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rton pa ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /kye
239a4('dul ba): go'u ta ma/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze/ ha cang thal ches so/ /ha cang thal ches so/ /dri ba rnams kyi mtha' gzung bar mi nus te/ nga'i drung du ni/ yang dag par sdug
239a5('dul ba): bsngal zad par bya ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi mthar bya ba'i phyir tshangs par spyod pa mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa can spyod par byed do/ /de
239a6('dul ba): nas bram ze o ta la'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la gnod pa ci zhig bya snyam mo/ /des kyang sngon dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol nas smon
239a7('dul ba): lam btab na/ des ci bsam pa dang / ci gsol ba de thams cad so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes thos so/ /de nas bram ze o ta la'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
239b1('dul ba): gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang
239b2('dul ba): bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /
239b3('dul ba): stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas smon lam log par gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag gi shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong ji snyed cig bshos gsol ba 'di thams
239b4('dul ba): cad bdag gi slad du gyur cig / snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bram ze o ta la'i bu'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bram ze o ta la'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bram ze/
239b5('dul ba): khyod kyis mi rung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni/ 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar/ dge slong 'di thams cad ni/ yang srid pa zad pa yin gyi/ sems gzhan skyed cig ces bka' stsal nas bcom
239b6('dul ba): ldan 'das yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs
239b7('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa / dge slong dag /bram ze o ta la'i bus smon lam log pas bslang ba'i sems sdig pa can bskyed kyi/ khyed cag gis zan zos
240a1('dul ba): nas gtsug lag khang gi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cig dang / log pa'i smon lam 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas phyi bzhin
240a2('dul ba): 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yul o ta lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / o ta la na bran mo rgan mo ka tsang ga la zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de bum pa thogs nas chu 'chur
240a3('dul ba): khron pa'i drung du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
240a4('dul ba): kun dga' bo/ /song la rgan mo pha bi la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyi/ /chu phul cig ces sgos shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi
240a5('dul ba): ltar mnyan nas rgan mo ka tsang ga la gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgan mo ka tsang ga la la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ka tsang ga la/ bcom ldan 'das skyems kyi /chu phul cig /des smras pa/
240a6('dul ba): 'phags pa/ bdag nyid 'tshal te mchi'o/ /de nas ka tsang ga las chu bum pa bkang nas rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang / ka tsang ga las sangs rgyas
240a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong bas
240b1('dul ba): lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu yang de'i bu'i sdug pa skyes nas des lag pa bsgrengs te bu bu zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud par brtsams pa dang /
240b2('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis de bzlog go /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyod kyis rgan mo 'di ma zlog cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang / /rtag tu nga yi yum gyur pas//
240b3('dul ba): nga yi sku la reg pa las/ /gal te 'di ni bzlog byas na/ /de'u re mod la khrag dron dag /'di yi kha nas skyug par 'gyur/ /bu la gdung ba 'di mthong nas/ /byas pa gzo ba rjes dgongs te/ /thugs rje dang ni thugs
240b4('dul ba): brtse bas/ /sku la reg tu gnang bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la mgul nas 'khyud du gnang bas/ de bu la chags pa dang bral nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /de nas
240b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos
240b6('dul ba): bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas ka tsang ga las 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas
240b7('dul ba): lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa/ 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas ma bgyis te/ mas ma lags zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
241a1('dul ba): ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa
241a2('dul ba): dag gis kyang gsol ba/ ma la lan du phan 'dogs pa'i/ /bu mchog gis ni bgyi ba gang / /thar la sems gzhol 'gyur ba de/ /khyod kyis de ring bdag la mdzod/ /khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro
241a3('dul ba): la| |drangs te mtho ris thar la bzhag / khyod kyis rtsol ba chen po yis/ /dka' ba legs par mdzad pa lags/ /ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
241a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas dus gzhan zhig na ka tsang ga las jo bo la gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
241a5('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
241a6('dul ba): 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
241a7('dul ba): skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do/ /de nas des rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin no/ /de brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas nas nyon mongs pa
241b1('dul ba): thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom mar gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas rjed par bya bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
241b2('dul ba): du'o|| ||'dul ba gzhi/ bam po so bdun pa/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bsdus te mdor bka' stsal nas/ gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i
241b3('dul ba): phyir 'jug par mdzad pa de'i tshe/ ka tsang ga las de rgyas par lung ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga'i nyan thos dge slong ma mdo sde rnam par 'byed
241b4('dul ba): par byed pa rnams kyi nang na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma ka tsang ga la 'di mchog yin no/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun
241b5('dul ba): pa| ka tsang ga las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na/ rgas nas rab tu byung bar gyur/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na/ dbul ba dang / bran mor gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi srid pa tha ma pa de'i mngal du ma
241b6('dul ba): bzung bar gyur/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
241b7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ dge slong ma ka tsang ga la nyid kyis las byas shing tshogs rnyed pa dag ces bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bu 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong
242a1('dul ba): dag/ sngon byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa na/ 'di nga'i yum du gyur te/ gang gi tshe nga rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ 'dis nga bzlog pas/ las de'i
242a2('dul ba): rnam par smin pas rgas nas rab tu byung ngo / /nga sbyin pa gtong ba na/ 'dis bar chad byas pas/ des na/ dbul bar gyur to/ /ji ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo ltar 'dis bsod nams dbang che bar grags par
242a3('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i las ma byas te/ des na/ nga'i srid pa tha ma 'di'i mngal du ma bzung ngo / /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las rab tu byung nas/ dge slong ma slob pa dang / mi slob pa rnams
242a4('dul ba): la bran mo/ zhes tshig tu brjod pas/ des na/ bran mor gyur to/ /de na 'dis gang dag bklags shing ston pas phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
242a5('dul ba): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pas/ des na nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom
242a6('dul ba): pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /rab tu 'byin pa'i mkhan po gang yin pa de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog
242a7('dul ba): tu bstan pa dang / des na 'dis kyang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yon gnas bla na med pa la tshe ji srid
242b1('dul ba): cig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa na/ yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis/ bram ze'i
242b2('dul ba): khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze khye'u khyod skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /
242b3('dul ba): zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po 'di/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis mdo sde rnam par 'phyed par byed pa
242b4('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu ston par gyur cig /ces byas te/ de'i smon lam
242b5('dul ba): gyi dbang gis/ ngas da ltar mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ gcig tu nag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa
242b6('dul ba): yin la zhes bya ba nas brtson par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
242b7('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ yul dgra mtha' gang na ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das
243a1('dul ba): kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na kun dga' ra ba zhig na bram ze zhig khron pa nas chu bcus shing kun dga' ra ba bcu bar
243a2('dul ba): brtsams so/ /bram ze des rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bsam pa/ gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma kun dga' ra bar zhugs na/ kun dga' ra ba dang / chu
243a3('dul ba): ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam nas/ sgo bcad de/ dpyad thag dang chu snod sbas nas 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis kun dga' ra bar zhugs pa dang / gnod sbyin
243a4('dul ba): gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis khron pa de bzung nas/ kun dga' ra ba de thams cad chus g.yogs par byas so/ /de nas bram ze/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin
243a5('dul ba): no| |snyam du rig nas mngon par dad par gyur te gsol pa/ shes ldan go'u ta ma tshur spyon/ dpyad thag ni/ 'di lags/ chab snod ni/ 'di lags kyi/ chab ci bder bzhes su gsol/
243a6('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te kun na chu yod na/ khron pa'i chus ko ci zhig bya/ /'dir ni srid pa'i rtsa bcad nas/ /gang zhig yongs su
243a7('dul ba): brtsal bar spyod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs
243b1('dul ba): pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /skra
243b2('dul ba): phyi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /de nas brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal pa
243b3('dul ba): byas nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /
243b4('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang yul dgra mthar gshegs te dgra mtha' na sbu gu can gyi shing nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so/ /
243b5('dul ba): de'i tshe dgra mtha' na rgyal po bram ze me sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /rgyal po bram ze me sbyin
243b6('dul ba): gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / dgra mthar byon nas dgra mtha' na sbu bu can gyi shing nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'di snyam
243b7('dul ba): du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ mtha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas te dgra bcom par bkur la/ gal te bdag gis dge sbyong
244a1('dul ba): go'u ta ma la bkur sti ma byas na/ mtha'i rgyal phran rnams/ shes ldan dag/ kye ma rgyal po bram ze me sbyin ni/ byis pa yin te/ de'i grong dang zhing na dge sbyong
244a2('dul ba): go'u ta ma nye bar brten cing bzhugs na/ bsnyen bkur ma byas so/ /zhes smod par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams
244a3('dul ba): cad kyis bstab bo/ /snyam du bsam nas/ rgyal po chen po'i 'byor ba dang / rgyal po chen po'i mthus dgra mtha' nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan
244a4('dul ba): 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu
244a5('dul ba): 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar
244a6('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom lda
244a7('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /shes ldan go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun
244b1('dul ba): dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po
244b2('dul ba): bram ze me sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te song ngo / /de rang gi
244b3('dul ba): khyim du song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sna bco brgyad dang / sran tshod sna tshogs dang / tshod ma ro dang ldan pa dang / 'bras chan rab tu mang por
244b4('dul ba): chos shig / dgra mthar dril sgrog tu bcug pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma zla ba gsum du gzhan gyis gdugs tshod ma gsol cig /gang zhig gis gdugs tshod gsol na/ de ni/ chad par gsad do/ /
244b5('dul ba): zhes des de skad du dril bsgrags nas nub mo nyal ba dang / rmi lam na bdag gi rgyu mas dgra mtha'i grong khyer thams cad bskor bar rmis so/ /rmis nas kyang sngangs skrag byed cing spu zing zhes byed
244b6('dul ba): nas myur ba myur bar mal chen po nas langs te/ lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam du sems khong du
244b7('dul ba): chud cing 'dug pa las/ de nam nangs nas bram ze mdun na 'don la smras pa/ mkhan po/ /bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i rmi lam zhig mthong na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bram ze mdun na
245a1('dul ba): 'don gyis bsam pa/ ji ltar lhas rmi lam bzang po zhig rmis te/ gal te bdag de dang mthun par bsnyad na/ 'di lhag par yang dge sbyong go'u ta ma
245a2('dul ba): la dad pa skyed par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di ngan par bsnyad do/ /snyam du bsam nas smras pa/ lha/ rmi lam mi bzang lags so/ /mkhan po/ 'di'i 'bras bu cir 'gyur/ lha/
245a3('dul ba): gdon mi 'tshal bar rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ e ma'o/ /kyi hud bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ srog gi bar chad
245a4('dul ba): du mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsam nas/ bram ze mdun na 'don la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gis na/ kho bo rgyal srid las nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur
245a5('dul ba): ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/ des smras pa/ lha/ gal te mi gda' ba'i phyogs su zla ba gsum bzhugs na/ de nas lha rgyal srid las mi nyams shing / srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur
245a6('dul ba): lags so/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis bsam pa/ gal te de lta na/ de bya sla bas dril sgrog tu gzhug go/ snyam nas/ des yul thams cad du dril sgrog tu bcug pa/ nga la zla ba
245a7('dul ba): gsum du blta zhing nye bar su yang ma 'ong zhig/ gang zhig 'ongs na/ de ni chad par gsad do/ /zhes dril sgrog tu bcug nas zla ba gsum du mi snang ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug go/ tshe dang
245b1('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba las/ ji tsam na rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi zho shas 'tsho ba rnams sems las chung ngus 'khod pa dag mthong
245b2('dul ba): ngo| |mthong nas kyang smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci/ sems las chung ngus 'khod dam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci zhig bgyir mchis/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs
245b3('dul ba): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis mi bstab bam/ khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod nas gdugs tshod kyang sta gon mi byed/ gdan yang mi shom na/ ci/ sangs rgyas
245b4('dul ba): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod gcod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ lhas lnga brgya rnams kyi ched du zhal zas bsod pa mang du sta gon byos shig ni/
245b5('dul ba): bka' stsal gyi/ che ge mo zhig gi don du'o/ /zhes bka' ma stsal lags so/ /shes ldan dag/ deng lha la zhus shig /'phags pa/ lhas dril sgrog tu stsal pa/ da la zla ba gsum du lta zhing nye
245b6('dul ba): bar su'ang ma 'ong zhig / gang zhig 'ongs na/ de chad par gsad do/ /zhes bsgrags na/ ci/ bdag cag la mgo bo gnyis mchis sam/ bdag cag ni/ mi zhu lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
245b7('dul ba): dga' bo/ /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyal par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
246a1('dul ba): dga' bo/ song la snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams
246a2('dul ba): su shes ldan dag / khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba des/ zhal zas gsol cig ces sbron cig /btsun
246a3('dul ba): pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i lam po che
246a4('dul ba): dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol
246a5('dul ba): bar spro ba des/ zhal zas gsol cig /dgra mtha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ bdag cag lta zhig /re res kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
246a6('dul ba): dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro lags mod kyi/ rgyal po sdig pa can 'dis dril sgrog tu stsal pa/ gzhan sus kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
246a7('dul ba): dge 'dun spyan drangs te zla ba gsum du zhal zas ma gsol cig / gang zhig gis zhal zas gsol na/ de ni/ chad par gsad do/ /zhes bsgrags lags so/ /ji tsam na byang phyogs nas ded
246b1('dul ba): dpon zhig rta lnga brgya la khal bkal te dgra mthar phyin nas des bsam pa/ gal te mod la chas na/ rta rnams kyi rmig pa dub pas 'theng bar 'gyur zhing / lom par yang mi 'gyur bas 'di
246b2('dul ba): nyid du gnas par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de de nyid du 'dug nas/ des rta cang shes la ni/ chas nas bre'u chung do/ /rta lhag ma rnams la ni/ bre'u chung re re thang chad do/ /des rgyal po rtsis mgo 'di
246b3('dul ba): dang 'di dag byas so/ /zhes thos la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad du smras pa yang thos nas/ des bsam pa/ bdag ni/ rgyal po 'di'i yul na gnas pa ma yin pas/ bdag la rgyal pos ci byar
246b4('dul ba): yod snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa kun dga' bo/ /bdag gis rta cang shes la ni/ chas nas bre'u chung do/ /rta lhag ma rnams la ni/ bre'u chung re re'i thang
246b5('dul ba): lags na/ gal te bcom ldan 'das nas gsol bar spro na/ bcom ldan 'das la ni/ bdag gis nas bre'u chung ngo / /dge slong lhag ma rnams la ni/ bre'u chung re re dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang
246b6('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas par gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga nyid kyis las
246b7('dul ba): tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i las nga nyid kyis byas shing bsags pas/ nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag
247a1('dul ba): gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur te/ las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ lus can
247a2('dul ba): dag la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /song la dge slong rnams la tshul shing brims te/ khyed cag
247a3('dul ba): las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig dgra mthar zla ba gsum du longs spyad par spro ba des/ tshul shing longs shig ces sgos shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang
247a4('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas tshul shing brim par brtsams pa na/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga ba rgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang bas tshul shing blangs
247a5('dul ba): so| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ bser ma'i bro nad mchis pas/ dgung zla gsum du stsang nas kyis longs spyad par mi spro lags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
247a6('dul ba): dgal gyi bu chen pos gsol ba/ bdag ni/ 'di'i bro g.yog lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu dbyar dgra mthar bzhugs
247a7('dul ba): par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu ni/ ri bo rtse gsum gyi khar song ste dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bdud
247b1('dul ba): rtsis bstabs so/ /de nas ded dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la ni/ nas bre'u chung do do 'bul lo/ /dge slong gzhan rnams la ni/ nas bre'u chung re re'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
247b2('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su byos shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
247b3('dul ba): mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skal blangs te bud med rgan mo gzhan zhig gang na yod pa der song nas phyin pa dang / bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du
247b4('dul ba): nas la ci legs su bya na/ khyod nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag rgan mos rngo thogs te/ 'on kyang bu mo 'di gzhon lags kyi/ 'di la stsol cig dang / 'dis ni/ ci legs su bgyid
247b5('dul ba): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de'i drung du song ste phyin nas smras pa/ sring mo/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du nas la ci legs su byed nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag
247b6('dul ba): dang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag la tshig 'di 'ga' gsung ba lta na/ ci legs su bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ byi dor gyis shig dang smra'o/ /de nas 'dru zhing dris pa/ 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas zhes bgyi
247b7('dul ba): pa 'di ci lags/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsam pa/ gal te 'di la bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ zab pa yin pas/ 'dis shes par mi 'gyur ba'i
248a1('dul ba): gnas gang yin pa yod kyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/ snyam du bsam nas smras pa/ sring mo/
248a2('dul ba): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ rin po che sna bdun yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bdun po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang
248a3('dul ba): po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni/ blon po rin po che yin no/ /sring mo/ 'khor los
248a4('dul ba): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo/ 'di la rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la mgo
248a5('dul ba): khrus byas te smyung ba byas nas/ de steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug pa na/ shar phyogs nas 'khor lo rin po che lte ba dang bcas pa/ rtsibs
248a6('dul ba): stong dang ldan pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ mdzes pa/ mkhan bzos ma byas pa/ bzang po/ thams cad gser las byas pa zhig
248a7('dul ba): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gang yin pa 'dis/ gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba nas thams cad gser las byas zhes bya
248b1('dul ba): ba nas de ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes thos so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bdag ni/ gdon mi za bar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por
248b2('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'khor lo rin po che de brtag par 'dod nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
248b3('dul ba): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'khor lo rin po che de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas lag pa g.yon par bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas pas spor zhing / kye 'khor lo rin po che/ sngon gyi 'khor
248b4('dul ba): los bsgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig / rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig /ces smra'o/ /de nas 'khor lo rin po che de/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
248b5('dul ba): rgyal pos spar ba dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas shar phyogs su sngon gyi 'khor los bsgyur nga 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo rin po che
248b6('dul ba): de'i rjes bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin po che de sdod pa der 'khor los bsgyur
248b7('dul ba): ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par 'gyur zhing / shar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang na
249a1('dul ba): ba der song ste lhags pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces/ lha tshur gshegs/ lha byon pa legs so/ /yul 'khor 'byor pa dang /
249a2('dul ba): rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba gang lags pa 'di ni/ lha'i lags kyi/ lhas rjes su bskyang du gsol/ bdag cag ni/ lha'i bka' bzhin
249a3('dul ba): bgyid pa lags so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de'i phyir sna bo dag /khyed cag rang rang gi yul 'khor chos kyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'i/ chos ma yin pas ni/ ma yin no/ /'ga' zhig
249a4('dul ba): chos ma yin pa spyod dam/ 'dren mar spyod pa zhig yod na/ khyed kyis de yul 'khor du ma bzhag cig /de lta na khyod cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yin no/ /de nas 'khor lo rin po che
249a5('dul ba): des shar phyogs mngon par phab nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas slar log ste/ lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang sngon gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba 'phags pa'i lam srol gang
249a6('dul ba): yin par 'gro bar 'gyur pas/ de nas 'khor lo rin po che de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos sbar ba dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas byang phyogs su sngon gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba
249a7('dul ba): 'phags pa'i lam srol gang yin par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo rin po che de'i rjes bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
249b1('dul ba): phyogs gang du 'khor lo rin po che de sdod pa der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig gnas 'debs par 'gyur zhing / byang phyogs kyi khams kyi
249b2('dul ba): rgyal phran gang dag yin pa de dag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces/ lha tshur gshegs/ lha byon pa legs
249b3('dul ba): so| |yul 'khor 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba gang lags pa 'di ni/ lha'i lags kyi/ lhas rjes su bskyang du gsol/ bdag cag
249b4('dul ba): ni| lha'i bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de'i phyir sna bo dag /khyod cag rang rang gi yul rnams chos kyis rjes su bskyang bar bya'i/ chos ma yin pas ni/ ma yin no/ /
249b5('dul ba): 'ga' zhig chos ma yin pa spyod dam/ 'dren mar spyod na/ khyod kyis yul 'khor du ma bzhag cig /de lta na khyed cag kho bo'i bka' bzhin byed pa yin no/ /de nas 'khor lo rin po che des byang
249b6('dul ba): phyogs mngon par phab nas byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po nas slar log ste rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin nas dkor khang gi steng du srog shing btsugs pa bzhin du gnas so/ /sring mo/ /'khor
249b7('dul ba): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ 'khor lo rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ glang po rin po che ji
250a1('dul ba): lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo/ 'di la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i glang po ni/ thal kar me tog ku mu da'i mdog lta bu/ yan
250a2('dul ba): lag bdun legs par gnas pa/ gzugs bzang pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa yin no/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'di mthong nas sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/
250a3('dul ba): kye ma'o/ glang po rin po che bzang po zhig yin gyi/ myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos glang po 'dul sbyong mkhan mkhas pa/ pho nyas
250a4('dul ba): bkug nas 'di skad ces smra'o/ /des pa/ khyod kyis glang po rin po che 'di myur ba kho nar legs par dul bar byos la nga la phul cig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang po 'dul sbyong
250a5('dul ba): mkhan mkhas pas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ltar mnyan nas/ glang po rin po che de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob par byed de/ de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa
250a6('dul ba): thams cad slob pa na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs nas dper na/ glang po che gzhan rnams lo du ma dang / lo khyud skor du mar bslab pa thams cad bslab nas bslab
250a7('dul ba): pa thams cad lobs pa de bzhin du/ glang po che rin po che de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab pa thams cad bslab pa na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs so/ /de dul bar rig nas
250b1('dul ba): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bul bar byed de/ lha/ glang po rin po che bzang po ni/ dul lags te/ da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
250b2('dul ba): rgyal pos glang po rin po che de brtag par 'dod nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe glang po rin po che che de la zhon nas rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i sa chen po bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin pa na zhal
250b3('dul ba): tshus la 'bab ste/ sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ glang po rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig
250b4('dul ba): rten du byung na/ rta rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo/ 'di la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rta ni/ thams cad sngo ba/ mgo nag cing / rngog mjug
250b5('dul ba): stug pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa yin te/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos de mthong nas sems mngon par dad par gyur nas kye ma rta rin po che bzang po zhig yin
250b6('dul ba): gyi| myur du dul bar 'gyur bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas bkug ste 'di skad ces smra'o/ /des pa/ khyod kyis rta rin po che 'di myur
250b7('dul ba): ba kho nar legs par dul bar byas la nga la phul cig / lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rta mkhan mkhas pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po las mnyan nas rta rin po che de la bslab pa thams cad
251a1('dul ba): nyin zhag gcig la slob par byed de/ de la bslab pa thams cad nyin zhag gcig la slob na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs pa ni/
251a2('dul ba): dper na/ rta gzhan rnams lo du ma dang / lo khyud skor du mar bslab pa thams cad bslabs nas bslab pa thams cad lobs pa de bzhin du/ rta rin po che de la nyin zhag gcig la bslab
251a3('dul ba): pa thams cad slob pa na/ nyin zhag gcig gis bslab pa thams cad lobs so/ /de dul bar rig nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la 'bul bar byed de/ lha/ rta rin po che bzang po
251a4('dul ba): ni/ dul lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos rta rin po che brtag par 'dod nas/ nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tshe rta
251a5('dul ba): rin po che la zhon nas rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas pa'i sa chen po bskor te rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du phyin pa na zhal tshus la 'bab ste/ sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung
251a6('dul ba): na/ rta rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ nor bu rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar
251a7('dul ba): 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor bu ni/ zur brgyad yod pa/ bai DUr+ya bzang po'i rigs can/ dang ba/ gsal ba/ rnam par dang ba yin te/ 'khor
251b1('dul ba): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang na me mar gyi bya ba thams cad nor bu de'i 'od kyis byed de/ /de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos nor bu rin po che brtag par 'dod nas/ mun nag smag tu
251b2('dul ba): gyur la/ lhas mtshan mo char gyi rgyun dal bu dal bus 'bebs shing glog 'gyu ba'i dus su nor bu rin po che de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhag nas skyed mos tshal gyi nang du dpung gi
251b3('dul ba): tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig dong ba na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi bo ji snyed pa thams cad dang / rgyang grags phyed kho ra khor yug tu
251b4('dul ba): nor bu'i 'od kyis gsal bar gyur te/ sring mo/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ nor bu rin po che de lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sring mo/ 'khor
251b5('dul ba): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na/ btsun mo rin po che ji lta bu zhig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ sring mo/ 'di la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo
251b6('dul ba): ni/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ ha cang mi dkar ba/ ha cang mi sngo ba/ nya khar pa ltar pags pa 'jam pa/ ha cang mi ring ba/ ha cang mi thung ba/ bong ran pa/ ha
251b7('dul ba): cang mi sbom pa/ ha cang mi skam pa/ ha cang mi tsho ba/ sha bri ran pa gang yin pa ste/ sring mo/ de ni/ grang ba'i tshe lus la reg na/ do ba/ tsha ba'i tshe lus la reg na/ bsil ba/ yul
252a1('dul ba): ka ling+ka'i gos ltar reg na 'jam pa'o/ /sring mo/ /de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ni tsan+dan gyi dri 'byung ngo / /kha nas ni ut+pal sngon po'i dri 'byung
252a2('dul ba): ngo / /ji srid kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun mo rin po che'i bar du bshad pa de srid kyis bu mo des kyang nas kyi bya ba zin nas des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab
252a3('dul ba): par brtsams pa/ 'phags pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo rin po cher gyur cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nas byi dor byas pa
252a4('dul ba): khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/ sangs
252a5('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo/ nas 'di su zhig gis byi dor byas/ btsun pa/ bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig gis bgyis
252a6('dul ba): lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod bram ze'i bu mo de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam dag byas sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ bgyis lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ des na/ khyod
252a7('dul ba): bram ze'i bu mo de dang lan gcig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad nga la rgyas par gsol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bram ze'i bu mo dang lhan cig
252b1('dul ba): skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad
252b2('dul ba): ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir bu mo de la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa ma brjod/ btsun pa/ bdag gis 'di snyam du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ni/ zab
252b3('dul ba): pa lags pas/ bu mo 'dis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis so/ /snyam du bsam nas/ de'i slad du bdag gis de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod
252b4('dul ba): lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis ma legs pa zhig byas te/ khyod kyis gal te de la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod pa byas na/ des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
252b5('dul ba): chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod pa zhig/ kun dga' bo/ 'on kyang bu mo de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher
252b6('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /kun tu bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi don du nas byi dor byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher
252b7('dul ba): lung bstan to/ /zhes sgra grags pa dag bu mo lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba zhig gis thos nas dge slong lnga brgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba rnams kyi nas byi dor byas te/
253a1('dul ba): de rnams kyis kyang smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag de'i 'khor du gyur cig/ ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das kyis nas kyi bshos gsol
253a2('dul ba): par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi mug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku che ba rgyud pa de dang de rnams su phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbu la sogs pa bcad
253a3('dul ba): cing sbyin pa btang nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa de/ da ni/ nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba lta zhes mchi ma dbyung bar brtsams
253a4('dul ba): so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod ci'i phyir mi dga' zhing mchi ma glog/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan
253a5('dul ba): 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su 'khrungs nas rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ste phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbu la sogs pa bkum zhing sbyin pa btang nas bskal pa
253a6('dul ba): grangs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa de/ da ni/ stsang nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba lta snyam bgyid lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
253a7('dul ba): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mche ba'i bar nas phyung ba'i nas kyi zan za bar 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lags so/ /de nas bcom
253b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi mche ba'i bar nas nas kyi zan phyung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bza' bar brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
253b2('dul ba): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis sngon 'di lta bu'i ro myong bar dran nam/ btsun pa/ bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su skyes shing 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs las chen por gyur
253b3('dul ba): lags na/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mche ba'i bar nas phyung ba'i nas kyi bshos 'di lta bu'i ro ni/ sngon myong bar mi dran lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
253b4('dul ba): la ni/ ro bro ba'i mchog ces bya ba/ ro rnams 'phrog pa yongs su dag pa yod de/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas kha zas phal pa la longs spyad na/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ro brgya par
253b5('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ni/ dgra mtha'
253b6('dul ba): na nas gsol lo/ /zhes sgra grags so/ /mtha'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs
253b7('dul ba): su 'dug go / bcom ldan 'das ni/ dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo/ /zhes thos nas de rnams kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la pho nya btang ba las/ de rnams nang du ma chud de/ sgo na sdod do/ /
254a1('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas 'bras sA lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste bskur ro/ /de nas bdud sdig can de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge
254a2('dul ba): sbyong go'u ta ma la bdag gis lan mang po zhig mtho btsam par byas na/ lan 'ga' yang skabs ma rnyed kyi 'dir yang re zhig 'di la brgal bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bor
254a3('dul ba): bdag nyid mngon par sprul te shing rta lnga brgya po de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gar 'dong / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin
254a4('dul ba): gyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ni/ dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo/ /de nas khyim bdag
254a5('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don du 'bras sA lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya po 'di bskur ba lags so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bcom ldan
254a6('dul ba): 'das la ni/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams mngon par dad de/ gal te nam mkha' la bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed zed na/ der yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdud
254a7('dul ba): rtsis 'gengs par byed na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nas gsol/ slar log cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ bdag cag chas lags na/ da ci ste ldog /mchi'o/ /
254b1('dul ba): bdud kyis bsam pa/ bdag gis 'di dag bzlog par ma nus kyi/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /zhes de steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas char pa shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams
254b2('dul ba): te/ des re zhig rta de dag gi lte ba man chad nub pa tsam gyi bar du char phab bo/ /de nas shing rta de dag gi glang rnams bkrol te dong ngo / /de na bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba
254b3('dul ba): dang thabs cig tu dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis ni/ ri rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas lha'i bdud rtsi la longs spyod do/ /
254b4('dul ba): de nas ded dpon des zla ba gsum 'das nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas
254b5('dul ba): gnang ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis ri bo rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas pa yang 'ongs so/ /de nas ded dpon gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba
254b6('dul ba): dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs
254b7('dul ba): te smon lam btab par brtsam pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cing / rta cang shes ni/ bu rgyal tshab tu gyur cig /rta lnga brgya bo 'di dag kyang bu lnga brgyar gyur cig /
255a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo btsun mo rin po cher lung bstan pa gang lags pa de ni/ bdag gi btsun mo rin po cher gyur cig /bud med lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba gang
255a2('dul ba): lags pa de ni/ de'i 'khor du gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ded dpon de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas ded dpon de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ ded dpon/ khyod ni/ 'khor los
255a3('dul ba): bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /rta cang shes ni/ khyod kyi bu rgyal tshab tu 'gyur ro/ /rta lnga brgya po de dag kyang bu lnga brgyar 'gyur ro/ /bu mo ni/ btsun mo rin po cher 'gyur ro/ /bu mo bud med lnga brgyar
255a4('dul ba): gnyis kyis ma tshang ba de dag kyang de 'khor du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
255a5('dul ba): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ bram ze me sbyin gyi drung du song la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la 'di skad ces/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul du kho bos zla ba gsum gnas zin te 'gro'i
255a6('dul ba): shes par gyis shig ces smros shig / btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba
255a7('dul ba): dang / de'i tshe rgyal po bram ze me sbyin bkra shis 'ong ba la sdod cing 'dug go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sgo ba'i skyes pa la smras pa/ kye nang rje tshur/ khyod rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gang na ba der
255b1('dul ba): song la phyin nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la 'di skad ces dge slong kun dga' bo lha mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so/ /zhes smros shig/ 'phags pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sgo ba'i skyes
255b2('dul ba): pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i ltar nyan nas/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ dge slong 'phags pa kun dga' bo lha'i
255b3('dul ba): zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so/ /des smras pa/ kye skyes bu/ nga bkra shis 'ong ba la sdod cing 'dug gi/ dge slong kun dga' bo ni/ bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin
255b4('dul ba): te/ de nyid nga'i bkra shis su gyur cig /de la ni/ bzang po lnga yod de/ ming bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / kha dog bzang ba dang / spobs pa bzang ba dang / sgrub pa bzang ba yin gyi/ nang du
255b5('dul ba): spyon cig / shes ldan kun dga' bo la su zhig 'gog /sgo bas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la de bzhin du smras nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang du zhugs so/ /mtha'i rgyal phran gyi pho nya de rnams kyang de nyid
255b6('dul ba): dang lhan cig nang du zhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la nad med par gyur cig/ ces byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan
255b7('dul ba): pa kun dga' bos/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod nad med par gyur cig /rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul du ngas zla ba gsum du
256a1('dul ba): gnas zin te 'gro'i shes par gyis shig / ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /'phags pa kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa kun
256a2('dul ba): dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das dang ji ga yul dgra mthar dbyar bde bar bzhugs sam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal bar ma gyur grang / mtha'i rgyal phran gyi pho nya de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ khyod ni/
256a3('dul ba): rgyal srid la mi rtog pa lags te/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das ni/ zla ba gsum
256a4('dul ba): du nas rul ba'i bshos gsol lags so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum du nas rul ba'i bshos gsol ba mad dam/ rgyal po chen po/ mad
256a5('dul ba): lags so/ /de brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang po zhig gtor nas dbugs slar byung ba dang blon po rnams bkug ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ngas khyed cag rnams nyin re zhing lnga brgya'i
256a6('dul ba): bza' ba dang / bca' ba bsod pa rab tu mang po sta gon gyis shig par ma bsgos sam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de kho na skad bka' stsal pa mchis kyi/ che ge mo zhig la stsol cig ces ni/ khyod
256a7('dul ba): kyis bka' ma stsal to/ /'on kyang da dung zhal zas sta gon kho na bgyid do/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
256b1('dul ba): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad ces bya
256b2('dul ba): ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan
256b3('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nongs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ nongs lags so/ /ji ltar yang byis pa lags/ ji ltar yang rmongs pa lags/ ji ltar yang mi
256b4('dul ba): gsal ba lags/ ji ltar mi mkhas pa lags te/ 'di ltar/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dgung zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas mi gda' ba'i phyogs su mchis
256b5('dul ba): lags so/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po so brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nongs pa de glo bar chud cing nongs par mthong lags na/ thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ nongs
256b6('dul ba): pa la nongs par gzung du gsol/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis nyes pa la nyes par khas blangs na/ bden te/ ji ltar na yang byis pa yin/ ji ltar na yang rmongs pa yin/ ji ltar na yang mi gsal ba yin/
256b7('dul ba): ji ltar na yang mi mkhas pa yin te/ gang yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas mi snang ba'i phyogs na 'dug gam/ rgyal po chen po/ gang gi phyir khyod kyis nyes pa shes
257a1('dul ba): shing mthong la/ de mthong nas 'chags par byed na/ khyod kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur gyi/ 'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ /de
257a2('dul ba): ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yang 'ga' zhig nyes pa shes shing mthong la/ de mthong nas 'chags shing phyir sdom par byed na/ dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur gyi/ 'phel ba kho nar
257a3('dul ba): shes par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag gis ji srid 'tsho ba'i
257a4('dul ba): bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
257a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tshe thung ngu'i dus su byung zhing / gdul ba'i don bya ba ni/ rab tu mang la mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la yang 'bab pas mi gnang ngo / /
257a6('dul ba): gal te de lta lags na/ bcom ldan 'das lo bdun nas zla ba bdun dang / dgung bdun zhig gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis der yang ma gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
257a7('dul ba): bram ze me sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de
257b1('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ngas gal te 'di'i zas gcig kyang gsol bar ma gnang na/ rgyal po bram ze me sbyin khrag dron du skyugs nas dus las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i gnas
257b2('dul ba): yod do/ /snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
257b3('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te rang gi gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gis na zhal zas 'di thams cad sangs
257b4('dul ba): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ zhal zas thams cad dogs la bkram la/ dge slong rnams kyi zhabs kyis
257b5('dul ba): bcags na/ de de ltar na/ yongs su longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /kha zas ji snyed yod pa 'di thams cad sa la kun tu khrom zhig /de rnams
257b6('dul ba): kyis thams cad du kun tu bkram mo/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das dge
257b7('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ji tsam na/ rgan zhugs shig mi bzod pa skyes te bdag cag zla ba gsum du nas rul pa zos na/
258a1('dul ba): da ni| rgyal po sdig can 'di'i 'byor pa ston to/ /snyam du bsam nas/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba sa la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/
258a2('dul ba): 'phags pa rnams ni/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed do/ /zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
258a3('dul ba): 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag bza' ba dang / bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas reg
258a4('dul ba): par byed pa yin no/ /snyam nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong rgan zhugs che ge mo zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas sa la
258a5('dul ba): bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pas/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams smod par byed/ 'phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis bza' ba dang / bca'
258a6('dul ba): ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas bcag par mi bya'o/ /bcags na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar
258a7('dul ba): bzhugs pa rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed de zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma'
258b1('dul ba): ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
258b2('dul ba): yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i
