334b2('dul ba): zhugs la ma g.yo bar shog cig / ces mchi'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ rgyal po mu khyud cang shes rta stong ldan gyi shing rtar zhugs pa dang / de nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdu rgyal po mu khyud la
334b3('dul ba): smras pa/ khyod kyi shing rta gang nas drang / gang na/ sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba nas sam/ gang na/ sems
334b4('dul ba): can dge ba'i las can rnams las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba nas drang / ma la gdu/ de'i phyir gang na/ sems can sdig pa'i las can rnams/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i
334b5('dul ba): rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba yod pa/ gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams/ las dge ba'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba dag yod par gnyis ka blta'i/ de dag gang na ba de
334b6('dul ba): logs su shing rta drongs shig / de nas kha lo sgyur ba ma la gdu/ rgyal po mu khyud kyis ci nas kyang gang na sems can sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba yod pa dang /
334b7('dul ba): gang na sems can dge ba'i las can rnams/ las dag pa'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ba yod pa gnyi ga mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar rgyal po mu khyud ldan gyi shing rta drangs so/ /rgyal po mu khyud
335a1('dul ba): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du phyin nas rgyal po mu khyud lha rnams kyi mdun sa chos bzang du zhugs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu
335a2('dul ba): khyud la stan phyed bstabs nas/ rgyal po mu khyud dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan phyed la 'dug /rgyal po chen po/ rgyal po mu khyud dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan phyed
335a3('dul ba): phyed la 'dug pa na/ khyad par ram/ bsam pa'am/ tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med de/ gzhan du na/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ni/ mig mi 'dzum par zad do/ /de nas rgyal po mu
335a4('dul ba): khyud kyis bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dge las byas dang de bzhin du/ mi dge ba yi las mthong nas/ /mi gang
335a5('dul ba): bag med byed pa de/ /skyes bu tha shal snying re rje/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rgyal po mu khyud la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mu khyud/ khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la dga'
335a6('dul ba): ba spyod cig / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pas rtse mo byos shig /dga' bar spyod cig /dga' mgur spyod cig /des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar snod dang shing
335a7('dul ba): rta dag / brnyas pa re zhig dus yin ltar/ de dang 'dra bar gnas 'di yang / /dbang ni gzhan dag sgyur bas bdag /'di nas mi thi lar song nas/ /dge ba mang po rnams bya zhing / /
335b1('dul ba): bsod nams phun sum tshogs byas nas/ /de nas mtho ris 'ong bar bya/ /de mi thi lar 'ongs nas sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang tshe rgyal
335b2('dul ba): rigs bram ze dang / /rje'u rigs dmangs rigs gdol pa dang / /kla klo phongs la sbyin pa ni/ /sbyin pa dam pa rnams kyis bsngags/ /mu ge'i tshe na sbyin byin zhing / /skye bo dam pa tshim
335b3('dul ba): byas nas/ /ngan song rnams spangs 'di dang ni/ /mtho ris su yang bkur ba yin/ /phan yon 'di ni shes nas kyang / /mkhas pa rnams kyis sbyin pa gtang / /sbyin pa yis ni thar pa dang /
335b4('dul ba): dbang phyug lha gnas 'byor par 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas lha rnams
335b5('dul ba): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi stan phyed dang / lha rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bstabs nas/ des mi thi lar 'ongs nas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs nas sbyin pa dag btang /
335b6('dul ba): bsod nams dag byas pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba gang gis sum cu
335b7('dul ba): rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi stan phyed dang / lha rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bstabs pa yin par gyur te/ nga nyid de nas mi thi lar
336a1('dul ba): song nas/ grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te/ sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sbyin pa'am/
336a2('dul ba): sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
336a3('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /de'i 'og tu rgyal po kun dga' bo zhes bya ba/ mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar te/ de la
336a4('dul ba): bu gcig dang gnyis nas lnga'i bar dag btsas pa las/ de'i bu tha chung gang yin pa de'i gdong me long 'dra bas/ de'i ming me long gdong zhes bya bar grags so/ /de dag thams cad bsrings
336a5('dul ba): bskyed de chen por gyur te/ gzhon nu me long gdong ni/ shin tu des pa dang / shin tu dul ba yin no/ /de dag gzhan ni/ gtum pa/ gzu lums can/ rtsub pa yin no/ /de dag
336a6('dul ba): thams cad pha'i dgos pa zhig gi phyir 'dus na/ shes rab kyis cung zad kyang so sor rtog pa med do/ /gzhon nu me long gdong ni/ /dri ba zab mo dag la/ rang gi shes rab kyis dpyod par
336a7('dul ba): byed do/ /rgyal po kun dga' bo nad kyis thebs nas/ des bsam pa gang rgyal srid byed du gzhug /gal te bdag gis phu bo gong ma bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig /rgyal po byed du bcug na
336b1('dul ba): de rnams gtum pa/ gzu lums can/ rtsub pa yin pas/ tshul ma yin pas yul mi rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te gzhon nu me long gdong rgyal srid byed du bcug na ni/ nye
336b2('dul ba): du rnams kyis da/ rgyal po 'dis/ sras thu bo rnams bzhag nas sras tha chung rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa ci'i tha tshig /ces smod par 'gyur bas/ thabs shig bsham mo/ /snyam nas
336b3('dul ba): des rin po che gsum dang / btsun mo'i 'khor zhes byed pa dang / shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug bzhag nas/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye sna bo dag /nga 'das na/ khyed cag
336b4('dul ba): gis gzhon nu rnams re re nas brtag par bya ste/ sus nor bu'i lham zung bgos na/ 'tsham par 'gyur ba dang / seng ge'i khri la 'dug na/ mi g.yo bar 'dug pa dang / dbu rgyan mgo la
336b5('dul ba): thogs na/ mi g.yo bar 'dug pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor zhes byed pa dang / shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug po/ nang gi gter dang / phyi'i gter dang / phyi nang gi gter dang /
336b6('dul ba): shing gi rtse mo'i gter dang / ri'i rtse mo'i gter dang / chu 'gram gyi gter te/ su 'di dag thams cad dang ldan par gyur pa de/ nga 'das nas khyed cag gis chug cig ces smras nas/
336b7('dul ba): bsags pa kun gyi mtha' 'dzad cing / /mthon po'i mtha' ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba yin pas shi'o/ /blon po de rnams kyis/ gzhon nu phu bo shos la nor bu'i lham zung du bskon
337a1('dul ba): na| ji ltar yang de dang mi 'tsham mo/ /seng ge'i khri la bzhag na/ g.yos so/ /dbu rgyan btags na/ rab tu g.yos so/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyis kyang zhes ma byas
337a2('dul ba): so| |shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug / smras na/ ma shes te/ nu bo phyi ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /gzhon nu me long gdong la nor bu'i lham zung du bskon na/ shin tu 'tsham
337a3('dul ba): par 'dug go / seng+ge'i khri la 'dug na/ mi g.yo bar 'dug go /dbu rgyan thogs na/ spyi gtsug rgyas par 'dug go /btsun mo'i 'khor gyis kyang zhes byas pa dang / blon po rnams
337a4('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ da dung shes rab kyis so sor brtag par bya ba drug po/ nang gi gter dang / phyi'i gter dang / phyi nang gi gter dang / shing gi rtse mo'i gter dang / ri'i rtse mo'i gter
337a5('dul ba): dang / chu 'gram gyi gter shes par bya dgos so/ /me long gdong gis bsam pa/ nang gi gter zhes bya ba/ nang gi gter ci zhe na/ them pa'i nang rol na yod pa'i gter yin no/ /phyi'i
337a6('dul ba): gter zhes bya ba/ phyi'i gter ci zhe na/ phyi'i gter zhes bya ba ni/ them pa'i phyi rol na yod pa'i gter yin no/ /phyi nang gi gter zhes bya ba ni/ ci yin zhe na/ them pa'i 'og na yod pa'i
337a7('dul ba): gter yin no/ shing gi rtse mo'i gter zhes bya ba/ shing gi rtse mo'i gter ci zhe na/ rgyal po de bzhugs pa'i shing de'i grib mas nyi ma'i gung la gang du khyab pa de na yod pa'i gter yin no/ /
337b1('dul ba): ri'i rtse mo'i gter zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po de rol ba'i rdzing de na khrus kyi rdo leb de'i 'og na yod pa'i gter yin no/ /chu 'gram gyi gter zhes bya ba ni/ khyim gyi chu gang du 'bab pa de'i stor khung gi mtha' na
337b2('dul ba): yod pa'i gter yin no/ /blon po de rnams kyis thams cad so sor brtags na de dag byung nas/ de rnams kyis de rgyal por dbang bskur te/ rgyal po me long gdong zhes bya ba/ mthu dang ldan par gyur to/ /
337b3('dul ba): ri bor gzhan zhig na/ bram ze dbyug gu can zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des/ khyim bdag cig las glang dag cig brnyas te/ zhing rmos nas glang de dag ded de khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang / ji
337b4('dul ba): tsam na/ khyim bdag de dro la bab nas/ bram ze dbyug gu can gyis glang phugs su btang ba las/ sgo gzhan zhig nas byung ste seng ngo / /khyim bdag de zan zos nas langs na/ gang na yang
337b5('dul ba): glang mi snang nas/ des dbyug gu can bzung nas/ glang ga re/ des smras pa/ khyim du ma bcug gam/ khyod kyis kho bo'i glang 'phrog gi/ kho bo la glang slar byin cig /des smras pa/ kho
337b6('dul ba): bos ma 'phrog go / des smras pa/ rgyal po me long gdong 'di ni/ shes rab dang ldan pa yin gyi/ de'i drung du dong ba dang / des don 'di mkhas te bdag cag la rigs mi rigs ston par
337b7('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /zhes de gnyis chas pa dang / mi zhig gis rta rgod ma zhig bros nas/ des dbyug gu can la smras pa/ rta rgod ma 'o ni/ kho ga cig /des smras pa/ ji ltar dgag /ci nus pas so/
338a1('dul ba): des rdo ba zhig blangs te/ mgor bsnun pas de shi bar gyur to/ /mi des smras pa/ kho bo'i rta rgod ma khyod kyis bsad kyi kho bo la rta rgod ma gcig byin cig /ci'i
338a2('dul ba): phyir rta rgod ma sbyin/ des smras pa/ tshur shog /rgyal po me long gdong gi gan du 'dong dang / des bdag cag gi zhal che sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de dag der dong ba dang / dbyug gu can
338a3('dul ba): de 'bros par brtsams so/ /des rtsig pa zhig gi kha nas bdag nyid mchongs pa dang / de'i zhod na tha ga pa zhig thags 'thag cing 'dug pa de'i steng du ltung bas tha ga pa shi nas/ dbyug
338a4('dul ba): gu can yang tha ga pa'i chung mas bzung nas/ kho bo'i khyim thab khyod kyis bsad kyi/ kho mo'i khyim thab byin cig /kho bos khyod kyi khyim thab ga la sbyin/ des smras pa/ tshur rgyal
338a5('dul ba): po me long gdong gi drung du 'dong dang / des bdag cag gi zhal che gcod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de rnams chas pa dang / lam gyi bar de na chu bo gting zab mo zhig yod pa de la shing
338a6('dul ba): mkhan zhig kha na ste'u thogs te/ phas tshur brgal ba de la dbyug gu can des smras pa/ chu che chung ji tsam/ ste'u btang ste smras pa/ chu gting zab bo/ /ste'u de chur lhung nas/ des
338a7('dul ba): dbyug gu can da bzung ste/ khyod kyis ba'i ste'u chur bskur ro/ /ngas ma bskur ro/ /tshur rgyal po me long gdong gi drung du 'dong dang / des bdag cag gi zhal che sbyong bar 'gyur
338b1('dul ba): ro| |de rnams ngal bas dbyug gu can khrid de/ chang 'tshong zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa dang / chang 'tshong ma la khye'u zhig bcas pa/ des khye'u de gos kyis bkab ste bsnyal ba de la dbyug gu
338b2('dul ba): can 'dug go / des khye'u yod/ khye'u yod ces smras nas/ ji tsam na bltas na shi bar gyur nas/ des dbyug gu can de bzung nas/ khyod kyis kho mo'i bu bsad kyi/ kho mo'i bu byin
338b3('dul ba): cig / des smras pa/ kho bos ni/ ma bsad pa na/ ci'i phyir kho bos khyed kyi bu sbyin/ des smras pa/ tshur rgyal po me long gdong gi drung du 'dong ngo / /zhes de rnams chas pa dang / ji tsam
338b4('dul ba): na| phyogs gzhan zhig na shing skam la khwa zhig 'dug pa des/ dbyug gu can mthong nas smras pa/ gang du 'gro/ kho bo ni/ mi 'gro na/ 'di dag gis kho bo khrid do/ /gang du/ me long
338b5('dul ba): gdong gi drung du'o/ /'o na kho bo'i 'phrin yang khyer la/ rgyal po me long gdong / phyogs ga ge mo zhig na/ shing lo ma bskams pa zhig mchis pa de la khwa zhig mchis te/ de'i mchid
338b6('dul ba): nas/ shing lo ma sngo zhing snum pa gzhan dag mchis bzhin du de la bdag dga' bar mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di la bdag mchis na bde ba ci las gyur ces gyis shig /de rnams chas pa las/ ri
338b7('dul ba): dwags shig gis dbyug gu can mthong nas des smras pa/ dbyug gu can gang du 'gro/ kho bo ni/ gang du yang mi 'gro na/ 'di dag gis kho bo khrid do/ /gang du/ me long gdong gi drung du'o//
339a1('dul ba): kho bo'i 'phrin yang khyer la/ gnas gzhan dag na gsing ma dang / rtswa sngon po dag mchis bzhin du bdag de dag lam dad pa la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis shig /de
339a2('dul ba): dag chas pa dang / ji tsam na/ sreg pa zhig gis mthong nas smras pa/ gang du 'dong zhes bya ba nas/ 'o na kho bo'i 'phrin yang khyer cig ces bya bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bdag phyogs gcig
339a3('dul ba): tu ni/ sreg pa'i skad 'byin la/ phyogs gzhan du ni/ skad gzhan 'byin pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis shig// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po zhe bzhi pa/ phyogs
339a4('dul ba): gzhan zhig na sbrul zhig gis mthong nas zhes bya ba nas/ 'o na kho bo'i 'phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bdag phug nas ni/ bde bar 'byung la/ slar ni/
339a5('dul ba): sdug bsngal gyis 'jug par 'gyur ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis shig /sbrul zhig dang ne'u le gnyis phan tshun mi mthun zhing 'thab par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'o na bdag
339a6('dul ba): cag gi 'phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bdag cag nyin par gcig gis gcig mthong nas 'thab mo bgyid kyi/ dga' bar mi 'gyur ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis
339a7('dul ba): zhes gyis shig / bag gsar gzhon nu ma zhig gis zhes bya ba nas/ des smras pa/ 'o na bdag cag gi 'phrin yang khyer cig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gang gi tshe bdag
339b1('dul ba): pha'i khyim na mchis pa de'i tshe na/ gyos po'i khyim 'tshal la/ gang gi tshe gyos po'i khyim na mchis pa de'i tshe ni/ pha'i khyim 'tshal ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis zhes gyis shig /de rnams chas nas/
339b2('dul ba): rgyal po me long gdong ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas dbyug gu can gyis/ rgyal po la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ gzhan dag gis kyang rkang pa gnyis la mgo
339b3('dul ba): bos phyag byas te 'khod pa dang / rgyal pos dbyug gu can la dris pa/ khyod ci la 'ongs/ lha/ bdag ni/ khrid do/ /ci zhig gi phyir/ dbyug gu can gyis khyim bdag dang ci zhig las rtsod pa
339b4('dul ba): de thams cad smras so/ /rgyal pos khyim bdag la dris pa/ khyod kyis glang mthong ngam/ mthong lags so/ /dbyug gu can khyod kyis glang phugs su bskrad dam/ lha/ bskrad lags so/ /rgyal
339b5('dul ba): pos smras pa/ gang gis phyir go bar ma byas bas/ dbyug gu can 'di'i lce chod cig /gang gi phyir 'di yang glang ma btags pas mig phyung zhig /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ rnam pa gcig
339b6('dul ba): tu bdag gi glang stor/ rnam pa gnyis su bdag gi mig dbyung ba bas/ dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o/ /mi des smras pa/ lha/ dbyug gu can 'dis/ bdag gi rta rgod ma zhig bkum mo//
339b7('dul ba): ji ltar bsad/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi phyir ji ltar nus pa de bzhin du khog cig /ces smras pas/ mi 'di'i lce chod cig /gang gi phyir rdo bas mi snun
340a1('dul ba): par gzhan gyis dgag mi nus pa med pas/ dbyug gu can 'di yang lag pa chod cig /mi des smras pa/ rnam pa gcig tu bdag gi rta rgod ma bkum/ rnam pa
340a2('dul ba): gnyis su bdag gi lce bcad pa bas/ dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o/ /tha ga pa'i chung mas rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di nyid khyod kyi khyim thab tu khyer cig
340a3('dul ba): des smras pa/ rnam pa gcig tu ni/ 'dis bdag gi sdum thab bkum/ /rnam pa gnyis su ni/ 'di sdum thab tu 'gyur ba bas/ dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o/ /shing
340a4('dul ba): mkhan gyis rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi phyir ste'u chu'i dbus su bor nas tshig smras pas/ shing mkhan 'di lce chod cig /dbyug gu can 'di'i yang
340a5('dul ba): chu'i gting zab par mthong bzhin du shing mkhan la/ dris pas mig dbyung ngo / /shing mkhan gyis smras pa/ rnam pa gcig tu bdag gi ste'u stor/ rnam pa gnyis su bdag
340a6('dul ba): gi lce bcad pa bas/ dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o/ /chang 'tshong mas rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'dis bu thams cad kyi thams cad gos kyis
340a7('dul ba): g.yogs nas bsnyal bas/ chang 'tshong ma 'di lag pa chod cig /dbyug gu can yang ma brtags par gzhan gyi stan la 'dug pas 'di'i mig phyung zhig /des smras pa/
340b1('dul ba): rnam pa gcig tu bdag gi bu bkum/ rnam pa gnyis su bdag gi sug pa bkum pa bas/ dbyug gu can rgyal mi bsngo'o/ /dbyug gu can gyis khwa'i than smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ dbyug
340b2('dul ba): gu can/ khwa de la khyod kyi phyogs de na/ ri bor cig yod pa'i grong gi bdag por gyur pa na shing skam po de'i drung na gter yod kyi/ de 'ga' zhig la byin te song zhig dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /
340b3('dul ba): zhes sgos shig /ri dwags kyi than smras pa dang / khyod kyi ri dwags la/ ri dwags khyod de na shing yod pa de'i kha nas sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag ste/ de zags pas rtswa dang / gsing ma
340b4('dul ba): mang por gyur pa la/ khyod za za ba sbrang ma de song zin gyi/ ro la chags par ma byed cig /tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes smros shig /sreg pa'i than smras pa dang / rgyal
340b5('dul ba): pos smras pa/ gang du sreg pa de sreg pa'i skad 'byin pa'i phyogs de na gter med kyi/ gang du skad gzhan 'byin pa de na gter yod pas/ khyod kyis gter 'ga' zhig la ston la/ tshul ma yin
340b6('dul ba): pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa na mi rung gi gzhan du song zhig ces sgos shig / des sbrul dang ne'u le'i than smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ de gnyis la khyed cag mir gyur pa na spun gnyis
340b7('dul ba): shig tu skyes te/ de na gcig gis smras pa/ nor bgo'o/ /gcig shos ser sna'i zil gyis non pas ma bgos so/ /de la/ gcig ni/ lhag pa'i chags par byas pas sbrul du
341a1('dul ba): skyes so/ /gcig shos kyang nor la then te lhag par chags par byas pas ne'u ler skyes so/ /de bas na/ khyed cag gis nor de dag /dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze dag la
341a2('dul ba): byin la/ gnas de 'or cig dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes sgos shig /sbrul gyi than smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis/ sbrul de la khyod ltogs shing nyam chung bar gyur
341a3('dul ba): pas ni/ phug nas bde bar phyir 'byung la/ kha zas phal mo che zos nas ni/ sdug bsngal bas phug tu 'jug pa yin gyi/ khyod kyis kha zas la ji tsam du spyod pa drod zin par byas na/ khyod
341a4('dul ba): bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes sgos shig /bag gsar gzhon nu ma'i than smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis bag gsar gzhon nu ma de la/ khyod kyi pha ma'i khyim na ni/
341a5('dul ba): 'grogs bshes shig gnas te/ gang gi tshe khyod gyos po'i khyim na 'dug pa'i tshe na 'grogs bshes de 'dod do/ /gang gi tshe pha ma'i khyim na gnas pa de'i tshe na khyim thab 'dod de/ khyod tshul
341a6('dul ba): ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur na/ mi rung gi/ gnas gcig thong la/ gcig legs par bzung bar byos shig ces sgos shig /bag gsar gzhon nu ma de dang / sprul gyis ji skad
341a7('dul ba): bstan pa bzhin byas so/ /sbrul dang ne'u le dag dang / khwas ni/ nor dbyug gu can la byin no/ /lhag ma rnams kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa de bzhin mnyan to/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/
341b1('dul ba): kye ma'o/ /lha la 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang mnga' ba lta/ rgyal po dga' ba dang mgu bas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi rnams su sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs nas sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i mi dag bzhag go /
341b2('dul ba): de'i tshe mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ste/ des mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi kha zas sbyar to/ /des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas
341b3('dul ba): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ blo ldan chos dang mthun pa yis/ nor rnyed bsag par mi bya ste/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /yon gnas la ni yon du dbul/ /dge sbyong bram ze
341b4('dul ba): des pa dang / /phongs pa legs par tshim byas na/ /shes rab can de lus zhig nas/ /lha yi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pas de ltar shes byas nas/ /dad ldan chags pa med
341b5('dul ba): sems kyis/ /yon gnas rnams la byin pa ni/ /dpa' bo ser sna med pas bsngags/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po me long gdong zhes bya ba/ mthu dang ldan pa gang gis
341b6('dul ba): mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma'i kha zas sbyar ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal
341b7('dul ba): po me long gdong zhes bya ba mthu dang ldan pa der gyur te/ ngas mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi kha zas sbyar to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sbyin pa'am/
342a1('dul ba): sbyin pa'i bgo bshang des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang
342a2('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i
342a3('dul ba): phyir sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bzang zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ des grong
342a4('dul ba): khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod
342a5('dul ba): nams dag byas te/ des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ lha dang mi yi nang dag tu/ bdag gi 'byor ba mthong nas ni/ gang gis
342a6('dul ba): phun sum thob pa yi/ /sbyin pa su zhig sbyin mi byed/ /gang gis skyes bu brgya phrag thibs mnan cing / /ser sna dgra bor gyur pa zil mnan nas/ 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pas
342a7('dul ba): sbyin gtong ste/ bdag ni dpa' bo'i dpa' rab yin par sems/ /gang zhig lag na mtshon thogs g.yul ngor 'jug /de ni dpa' bo min zhes thub rnams gsung / /gang dag 'jigs
342b1('dul ba): pa med par sbyin gtong ba/ /de dag dpa' bo yin zhes kun mkhyen gsung / /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bzang zhes bya ba gang gis/ grong khyer brgyad khri
342b2('dul ba): bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa
342b3('dul ba): de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bzang zhes bya ba der gyur te/ nga nyid kyis de na grong khyer
342b4('dul ba): brgyad khri bzhi stong du mchod sbyin gyi gnas brtsigs te/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag
342b5('dul ba): byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sbyin pa'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni/
342b6('dul ba): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du
342b7('dul ba): gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob pa gang yin
343a1('dul ba): pa de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ yul lnga len par rgyal po gnyis byung ste/ byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa dang / lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'o/ /de la/ byang
343a2('dul ba): phyogs kyi lnga len pa nor can zhes bya ba/ grong khyer glang po che'i khyim zhes bya ba na 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab
343a3('dul ba): pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med pa/ nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ chos
343a4('dul ba): kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa dang / chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /grong khyer de na yang mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ ngang pa
343a5('dul ba): dang / ngur pa dang / bya ka ran+da pas mdzes par byas pa/ yid du 'ong ba yod do/ /mtsho de na klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba gnas te/ des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab
343a6('dul ba): pas/ sa gzhi lhag par lo tog phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /yul yang bza' ba dang / btung ba shin tu mod la/ 'jig rten yang sgrib pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang /
343a7('dul ba): ldan pas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams la kha zas sbyin par byed do/ /lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po ni/ chos ma yin pa lhag par gnas pa/
343b1('dul ba): gtum pa/ gzu lums can/ spro thung ba zhig pas/ chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed cing / chad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / 'tshog pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'ching ba dang /
343b2('dul ba): su mi 'dod dang / khong sgril dang / gnod pa sna tshogs kyis yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la rtag tu skrag par byed do/ /de chos ma yin pa la lhag par gnas pas der lha yang dus
343b3('dul ba): dus su char gyi rgyun legs par mi 'bebs so/ /des na skye bo'i tshogs de 'jigs pa dang / yi chad pas rang gi srog la mi lta bar yul yongs su spangs te/ byang phyogs kyi yul
343b4('dul ba): lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i yul du dong nas gnas so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po ri dwags 'chor ba'i tshul du byas nas yul rnams brtag pa'i phyir
343b5('dul ba): byung ba dang / grong rdal dang / grong khyer gang yin pa dag ni/ stong par gyur cing / skyed mos tshal dang / lha khang rnams ni/ zhig ral du gyur pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la
343b6('dul ba): smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci'i phyir grong rdal dang / grong khyer 'di stongs par gyur cing skyed mos tshal dang / lha khang rnams ni/ zhig ral du gyur/ skye bo'i tshogs de dag ni/ gang du
343b7('dul ba): dong / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po nor can gyi yul du mchis so/ /ci'i phyir/ lha/ mi 'jigs pa stsal du gsol/ /shes ldan sbyin gyi/ smros
344a1('dul ba): shig / de nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid bgyid pas/ de'i yul 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang /
344a2('dul ba): lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang zhing / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun ma mchis la/ nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras sA lu dang / bu
344a3('dul ba): ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jig rten la yang sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang ldan pas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa
344a4('dul ba): dang / phongs pa rnams la kha zas stsol bar bgyid do/ /lha ni/ gtum pa/ gzu lums can/ spro thung bas/ chad pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'tshog pa dang / gsod pa dang /
344a5('dul ba): 'dzin pa dang / 'ching ba dang / su mi 'dod dang / khong sgril ba dang / gnod pa sna tshogs kyis yul mi rnams la rtag tu skrag par mdzad pas/ de na/ skye bo'i tshogs de
344a6('dul ba): 'jigs shing yi chad nas byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i yul du mchis lags so/ /lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis na/ skye bo'i
344a7('dul ba): tshogs de/ slar 'ongs nas grong rdal dang / grong khyer 'di dag tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gal te byang phyogs kyi lnga len
344b1('dul ba): pa'i rgyal po bzhin du chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid mdzad de/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / thugs brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyangs na/ ring por mi thogs par skye
344b2('dul ba): bo'i tshogs de slar mchis nas grong rdal dang / grong khyer 'di rnams su gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te de lta
344b3('dul ba): na| ngas kyang byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po bzhin du chos bzhin rgyal srid byas te/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyang bar
344b4('dul ba): bya'i/ khyed kyis ci nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs de slar 'ongs nas grong rdal dang / grong khyer 'di rnams su gnas par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /lha/ yon tan gzhan yang 'di lta bu
344b5('dul ba): mchis te/ grong khyer de na mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ ngang pa dang / ngur ba dang / bya ka ran+da pas mdzes par bgyis pa/ de na klu'i bu skye
344b6('dul ba): ba sna tshogs pa zhes bgyi ba zhig gnas te/ des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/ lo tog lhag par phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /de nas gzhi lhag par lo tog dang /
344b7('dul ba): ldan pas yul yang bza' ba dang btung ba shin tu mod lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gis ni/ klu'i bu de/ 'dir khugs par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod/
345a1('dul ba): lha| rig sngags dang / gsang sngags 'chang dag gis de khugs par 'gyur gyi/ de dag btsal du gsol/ de nas rgyal pos gser gyi thum po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse
345a2('dul ba): mo la bcings nas yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ gang gis byang phyogs lnga len pa'i yul nas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa khugs na/ de la gser gyi thum po 'di sbyin no/ /
345a3('dul ba): bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur sti bya'o/ /ji tsam na/ sprul khas sdigs pa zhig blon po rnams kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ bdag la gser gyi thum po 'di stsal na/ bdag gis
345a4('dul ba): klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa 'phrog ste/ khrid de mchi'o/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di khyer cig /des smras pa/ khyed cag gang la yid ches shing yid brtan pa de'i lag
345a5('dul ba): tu bzhag la/ klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa khrid de mchis nas 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas sprul khas sdigs pa des/ mi yid brtan du rung ba'i lag tu gser
345a6('dul ba): gyi thum po gtad nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song ngo / /de nas des mtsho de'i kho ra khor yug tu brtags nas/ mtshan ma la mkhas pa zhig pas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs
345a7('dul ba): pa de ni/ phyogs 'di kho na nyid na 'dug go /snyam nas/ de nas de gtor ma dang yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ bdag la gtor ma dang yo byad rnams
345b1('dul ba): stsol cig dang / zhag bdun gyi nyin par klu'i bu de 'phrog ste khrid de mchi'o/ /sbrul khas sdigs pa de yang des mthong nas/ de ni/ bdag 'phrog tu 'ongs te/ zhag bdun gyi bar bdag 'phrog
345b2('dul ba): nas/ pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal chen po bdag gis myong bar 'gyur na/ ji ltar bya/ su la skyabs btsal snyam pa dang / yang / mtsho de nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/
345b3('dul ba): rngon pa sran can dang / spang leb can gnyis gnas te/ de gnyis mtsho de'i drung na gnas bcas nas gang dag skam la yod pa'i srog chags ri bong dang / ldang sko ka dang / phag la sogs
345b4('dul ba): pa mtsho de la 'thung du 'gro ba dang / gang yang chu na yod pa nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa la sogs pa bsad cing 'tsho bar byed pa las/ de na yang sran can ni/ shi'o/ /spang leb
345b5('dul ba): can ni/ gsan no/ /klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pas bsam pa/ rngon pa spang leb can ma gtogs pa skyabs gzhan med do/ /snyam nas/ de nas mi'i cha byad du byas te/ rngon pa spang
345b6('dul ba): leb can gyi drung du song nas smras pa/ kye nang rje/ rgyal po nor can gyi yul gyi 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba zhes bya ba nas/
345b7('dul ba): 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / bal glang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ su'i mthu las gyur pa/ ji ga khyod kyis shes sam/ des smras pa/
346a1('dul ba): shes te/ rgyal po de chos dang ldan pas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed de/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis yul
346a2('dul ba): bskyangs pas so/ /des smras pa/ ci de 'ba' zhig gam/ gzhan gyis kyang yin/ rngon pas smras pa/ gzhan gyi yon tan zhig kyang yod de/ mtsho 'di na klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs can
346a3('dul ba): zhes bya ba gnas te/ des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /de na sa gzhi lhag par lo tog dang ldan pas yul yang bza'
346a4('dul ba): ba dang / btung ba mod par gyur to/ /skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis klu'i bu de yul 'di nas 'phrog na/ klu'i bu de cir 'gyur/ rung bar mi 'gyur te/
346a5('dul ba): de pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang yul mis 'phrog na/ de la khyod kyis ji ltar bya/ srog dang dbral bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis klu'i bu de gang
346a6('dul ba): yin pa shes sam/ mi shes so/ /de nyid nga yin na/ lho phyogs lnga len pa'i sprul khas sdigs pa nga 'phrog par byed de/ de gtor ma dang / yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas zhag bdun gyi nyin
346a7('dul ba): par 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'ongs nas mtsho ngogs su seng ldeng gi phur bu grwa bzhir btsugs pa/ tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bres te/ gsang sngags rjod par byed kyi/ de nas ha cang
346b1('dul ba): yang mi ring pa zhig tu khyod mi mngon par 'dug la/ gang gi tshe des cho ga de lta bu bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe mtsho'i nang gi chu khol zhing lud par 'gyur te/ nga yang 'byung gi/ de'i tshe khyod kyis
346b2('dul ba): sbrul khas sdigs pa de'i gnad du mdas bsnun la de ma thag tu drung du song ste gsang sngags slar sdus shig / ma bsdus na/ khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de/ sa la bor ra re zhes
346b3('dul ba): smros shig / gal te des gsang sngags rnams ma bsdus par srog dang bral te shi na ni/ kho bo ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gsang sngags kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro/ /rngon pas
346b4('dul ba): smras pa/ gal te khyod gcig pa la phan thogs na yang de bzhin du kho bo kho nas byas na/ yul mtha' dag la phan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ kho bos skyabs bya'i song zhig/ de nas
346b5('dul ba): klu'i bu des de la dben pa'i phyogs shig bstan nas/ ji tsam na rngon pa de zhag bdun gyi nyin par phyogs dben par bdag nyid gab ste 'dug pa dang / sbrul khas sdigs de yang 'ongs nas/
346b6('dul ba): gtor ma dang yo byad kyi cho ga bya bar rtsom ste/ des phyogs bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi btsugs/ tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bres te gsang sngags brjod do/ /de nas chu de khol du cha ba dang /
346b7('dul ba): rngon pas gnad du mdas bsnun nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste smras pa/ khyod kyis nged kyi yul na gnas pa'i klu'i bu gsang sngags kyis dbrog gam/ gsang sngags slar sdus shig/
347a1('dul ba): ma bsdus na/ khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la bor ra re/ de nas sbrul khas sdigs pas sdug bsngal nyams su myong bas nyam thag cing / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas
347a2('dul ba): skrag nas gsang sngags brtul ba dang / rngon pas de ma thag par de bsad do/ /de nas klu'i bu gsang sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa las thar te/ mtsho nas byung nas rngon pa la 'khyud
347a3('dul ba): de 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod ni kho bo'i ma yin la/ khyod ni/ kho bo'i pha yin te/ 'di ltar/ khyod la brten pas kho bo pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal ma skyes so/ /tshur
347a4('dul ba): shog/ gnas su 'dod ngo / /zhes des de gnas su khrid de song nas/ bza' ba dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas te/ rin po che dag bstabs nas ma dang pha la smras pa/
347a5('dul ba): yab yum/ 'di ni/ bdag gi snying du sdug pa/ skyabs dang gnyen du gyur pa lags te/ 'di'i mthus/ bdag khyed dang / lhan cig pa las bral bar ma gyur to/ /de dag gis kyang de
347a6('dul ba): la dam pa sbyin par byed de/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs byin nas des de rnams khyer te mtsho de nas byung ngo / /mtsho de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na/ bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras bu
347a7('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de/ de na drang srong byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ sems can rnams la sdug par 'dzin pa zhig gnas so/ /de
347b1('dul ba): nas rngon pa de drang srong de'i drung du dus gsum du 'gro bar rtsom zhing / de la klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang lhan cig ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad rgyas par smras so/ /de nas drang srong des smras pa/
347b2('dul ba): khyod la rin po che dang gser ci dgos/ de'i gnas na don yod pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa yod kyi de slongs shig/ de nas rngon pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa la chags pa skyes nas/ drang srong
347b3('dul ba): gi tshig mnyan te slar klu'i gnas su song ba dang / de nas ji tsam na/ klu'i khang pa'i sgo na don yod pa'i zhags pa de mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag 'dod pa'i zhags pa
347b4('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni/ 'di kho na yin no/ /snyam nas/ klu'i gnas su zhugs so/ /de nas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang / klu gzhan rnams kyis yang dag par dga' ba dang mgu ba dag byas nas
347b5('dul ba): rin po che dag bstabs pa dang / des smras pa/ kho bo la ni/ rin po che mi dgos kyi/ 'on kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di kho bo la byin cig /skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa/ khyod la 'di
347b6('dul ba): ci dgos kho bo cag la ni/ dgos pa ste/ gang gi tshe nam mkha' lding gis gnod pa byas pa de'i tshe 'dis kho bo cag srung bar 'gyur ro/ /rngon pas smras pa/ khyed cag la ni/ nam mkha'
347b7('dul ba): lding gi gnod pa lan 'ga' zhig 'byung ba na/ 'di dgos kyi/ kho bo la ni/ dus kun tu dgos kyi gal te legs pa byas pa dang / phan btags pa dran pa lta na/ byin cig/ klu'i bu
348a1('dul ba): skye ba sna tshogs pa 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis bdag la phan cher btags kyi/ pha ma la brtags te sbyin no/ /snyam nas/ des pha ma la brtags te zhags
348a2('dul ba): pa de byin no/ /de nas rngon pa de bdag thob pa bzhin du bde ba dang / yid bde bas tshim nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te/ klu'i gnas nas byung nas rang gi khyim du song ngo / /ji tsam
348a3('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po nor can btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed
348a4('dul ba): pa las/ bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med nas/ lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/ bdag gi khyim du nor zas 'di snyed cig bsags kyang / bdag la bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med pas/
348a5('dul ba): bdag 'das na/ bdag gi rgyud 'chad cing yul 'chor ba dang / bdog pa ril yang rgyal po gzhan gyis dbang bya bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / de
348a6('dul ba): la dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / grogs po dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/ de skabs de/ de rnams la rgyas par
348a7('dul ba): smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rnams la gsol ba mdzod cig dang / khyod la sras mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de bu med de/ bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang / chu lha dang /
348b1('dul ba): lus ngan dang / nor lha la sogs pa la gsol ba 'debs shing / lha'i bye brag gzhan yang / 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / nags tshal gyi lha dag dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang /
348b2('dul ba): sum mdo'i lha dag dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos dang mthun pa dag dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten
348b3('dul ba): na| gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu dang bu mo dag skye'o/ /zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/ de ni/ de lta bu ma yin te/ gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na/ re re la yang 'di lta ste/
348b4('dul ba): dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon par gyur pa las/ bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gsum po
348b5('dul ba): de dag gang zhe na/ pha dang ma dag chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste/ gnas gsum po de dag
348b6('dul ba): mngon du gyur pa las/ bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' zhig btsun mo dam pa
348b7('dul ba): de'i mngal du zhugs so/ /bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa
349a1('dul ba): dang / dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang / mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang / gang las mngal du zhugs pa de yang shes pa dang / khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa
349a2('dul ba): ste| gal te khye'u yin na/ dku g.yas par brten cing 'dug la/ gal te bu mo yin na/ dku g.yon par brten cing 'dug go/ de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas/ khyo la smras pa/
349a3('dul ba): rje'i sras/ bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni/ 'di ltar/ bdag gi dku g.yas par brten cing mchis pa las na/ nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyi/ dgyes pa bskyed du
349a4('dul ba): gsol| de yang yid dga' nas ro stod bsrang ste lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs nas/ 'di skad ces/ kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa bu'i ngo mthong ba dang / kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing
349a5('dul ba): mi mthun par mi skye ba dang / kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang / gsos pas phyir gso ba dang / bgo skal la spyod pa dang / kho bo rigs rgyud la yun ring du gnas par bsgrub pa dang / bdag
349a6('dul ba): cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung du'am/ mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ 'di/ de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur
349a7('dul ba): cig/ ces ming gis yon bsngo ba byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa rjod par byed do/ /de la sems can zhugs par rig nas/ 'di lta ste/ mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin
349b1('dul ba): par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang / dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang / sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas ha cang mi kha ba dang / ha cang mi skyur ba dang /
349b2('dul ba): ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang / ha cang mi mngar ba dang / ha cang mi tsha ba dang / ha cang mi bska ba dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba spangs pa'i zas
349b3('dul ba): dag dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang / khri nas khrir dang / khri'u nas khri'ur dang / zhod kyis
349b4('dul ba): gzhir mi 'bab pa dang / des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par nyam bag tu bzhag go/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/ mdzes
349b5('dul ba): pa| gsal ba/ gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzengs mtho ba/ yan lag
349b6('dul ba): dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de btsas pa na/ kun dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rnga brdungs ba rgyal pos thos nas smras pa/ de ci'i phyir yin/ btsun mo rnams kyis
349b7('dul ba): rgyal po la smras pa/ lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ khyod kyi sras po zhig bltams so/ /de nas rgyal pos grong khyer de thams cad rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo bsal te/ byi
350a1('dul ba): dor byas nas/ tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng / shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag bshams/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs
350a2('dul ba): kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram ste bsgo ba/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin cig/ btson thams cad khye zhig/ de'i phyir nyi ma bdun gsum
350a3('dul ba): nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ khye'u 'di/ rgyal po nor
350a4('dul ba): can gyi sras lags pas/ khye'u'i ming nor bzang du gdags so/ /zhes de'i ming nor bzang zhes bya bar btags so/ /khye'u nor bzang ma ma brgyad po/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis
350a5('dul ba): dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang /
350a6('dul ba): zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis bsring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed
350a7('dul ba): par byed do/ /gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug ste zhes bya ba nas brtag pa brgyad dang / dbye ba dang / klog pa la mkhas pa dang / spyod pa gsal bar gyur to/ /zhes
350b1('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ ljongs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu dang / brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di mngon par rgyal
350b2('dul ba): bar byas te gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ de'i phas chung ma gsum po che ma dang /
350b3('dul ba): 'bring ma dang / chun ma dag bzhag cing gnas pa'i khang pa rnam pa gsum po/ dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi rnams brtsigs nas/ skyed mos tshal rnam pa gsum po/ dgun
350b4('dul ba): gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi dag btsugs so/ /de nas gzhon nu nor bzang steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la skyes pa med par song nas sil snyan rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ dga'
350b5('dul ba): bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rngon pa spang leb can ri dwags tshol zhing de dang de dag tu rgyu ba na/ ri bo gzhan zhig la phyin pa dang / des ri bo de'i
350b6('dul ba): zhod na/ drang srong gi bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs rgyu ba/ de na mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos g.yogs pa/ ngang
350b7('dul ba): pa dang / bya ka ran+da ba dang / ngur bas mdzes pa de mthong nas/ de bsti gnas der 'khyam par brtsams pa las/ ji tsam na/ drang srong skra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo dang / spu rnams
351a1('dul ba): ring ba/ lus rlung dang tsha bas gdungs pa/ shing gos gyon pa zhig shing drung du gnas bcas te/ rtswa'i spyil bu na 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang rkang pa la
351a2('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas dris pa/ legs ldan/ phyogs 'dir khyod bzhugs nas/ yun ji srid cig lags/ lo bzhi bcu lon no/ /khyod kyi yun de srid cig tu phyogs
351a3('dul ba): 'dir lon no/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'ga' lta gzigs pa'am/ gsan pa lta mchis sam/ drang srong zhi ba'i bdag nyid des/ dal bu dal bus smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod
351a4('dul ba): kyis mtsho 'di mthong ngam/ legs ldan mthong lags so/ /'di ni/ /tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing zhes bya ste/ ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba dang / bya sna tshogs kyi
351a5('dul ba): tshogs kyis bsten pa/ kha ba dang / dngul dang / ba mo'i mdog lta bu'i chus shin tu gang ba/ shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog gis bskor ba'i chu'i rdzing 'dir tshes bco lnga la mi'am
351a6('dul ba): ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bya ba/ mi'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas/ mgo khrus dang bsku mnye sna tshogs dang 'ongs nas khrus byed do/ /de khrus byed pa'i tshe
351a7('dul ba): bro gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra nyan pas bya dang / ri dwags kyang yid 'phrog par byed do/ /kho bo yang de'i sgra thos nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba chen pos zhag bdun 'da' bar byed de/
351b1('dul ba): bzhin bzang kho bos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di mthong ngo / /de nas rngon pa spang leb can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis klu las don yod pa'i zhags pa thob pa ste/ de mi'am ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma
351b2('dul ba): la gdab bo/ /snyam nas/ de dus gzhan zhig na/ tshes bco lnga la don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te/ mtsho 'gram dang nye bar me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma tshang tshing zhig tu 'khras nas
351b3('dul ba): gcig tu bsgrims pas bya ra byed cing 'dug go / ji tsam na/ yid 'phrog ma mi'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ de 'dra ba'i 'byor ba nyid kyis tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing du khrus kyi phyir zhugs
351b4('dul ba): pa dang / rngon pa spang leb can gyis de ma thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa btab pa las/ des mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma zin to/ /don yod pa'i zhags pas zin nas/ mtsho'i nang na mchong
351b5('dul ba): brgal zhing 'jigs pa'i sgra yang phyung ba dang / mi'am ci mo'i tshogs lhag mas de thos nas/ phan tshun brgyugs te mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma la brtag par brtsams pa las bzung bar mthong
351b6('dul ba): ngo / /mthong nas kyang skrag nas bros so/ /rngon pa des/ mchog tu gzugs bzang mo/ /blta na sdug pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gzung ba'i phyir drung du gtugs pa dang / des smras pa/ ma
351b7('dul ba): rabs khyod ni nga la ma reg cig / khyod kyi 'di ni thog tu bab ma yin/ /nga ni gzugs bzang rgyal gyi 'os yin pas/ /'dzin pa legs par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /rngon pas smras pa/ gang
352a1('dul ba): de khyod ma bzung na 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ kho mo mi 'bros kyi/ gal te yid mi ches na/ 'di'i mthus kho mo steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro'i gtsug
352a2('dul ba): gi nor bu 'di zungs shig / rngon pas smras pa/ su shes/ des de la gtsug gi nor bu byin nas/ smras pa/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di su'i lag pa na gnas pa de'i dbang du kho mo 'gyur ro/ /
352a3('dul ba): de nas rngon pas nor bu de blangs te/ zhags pas bcings bzhin du khrid de song ngo / /de'i tshe gzhon nu nor bzang ri dwags 'chor du chas pa dang / rngon pa des gzhon nu nor bzang gzugs
352a4('dul ba): bzang po/ /mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni/ rgyal bu gzhon nu yin la/ 'di yang / mchog tu gzugs bzang mo/ /blta na
352a5('dul ba): sdug pa yin te/ gal te 'di mthong na/ btsan thabs su khyer bar 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di skyes kyi tshul du bdag nyid kyis dbul lo/ /snyam nas/ de nas de zhags pas
352a6('dul ba): bcings bzhin du/ rgyal po gzhon nu nor bzang gang na ba der khrid song nas phyin pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis bud med rin po che 'di skyes su 'tshal
352a7('dul ba): te mchis na/ bzhes su gsol/ rgyal bu gzhon nu nor bzang gis/ mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma/ gzugs bzang mo/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ kha dog rgyas pa/ mchog
352b1('dul ba): dang ldan pa/ yon tan thams cad 'dus pa/ bud med kyi mtshan bco brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ yul gyi mi bas bzang pa/ nu ma gser gyi bum pa dang / rus sbal ltar rgyas shing / rlo ba dang /
352b2('dul ba): mkhrang zhing mkhregs pas shin tu legs par zlum pa ltem pa/ mig mthong mthing la rtsa dmar zhing dkyus ring la pad+ma gzhon nu 'dra ba/ sna'i gzegs ring zhing mtho ba/ ma mchu byi ru dang /
352b3('dul ba): nor bu dang / rin po che dang / bim pa'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ 'gram pa ma rnyong zhing yongs su rgyas pa/ mkhur tshos lhag par dga' bar byed pa'i ri mo'i thig le can/ smin ma rim gyis
352b4('dul ba): mdzes shing 'dzar la bung ba'i tshogs ltar gnag pa/ dpung pa zla ba dri ma med pa ltar rgyas la ring ba/ lto gnyer ma zab mo gsum dang ldan zhing yid tsam rnyong ba/ nu ma'i g.yur gyi ro stod bags
352b5('dul ba): kyis 'dud la/ dku shing rta'i yan lag ltar dbyibs shin tu mdzes pa/ lag pa chu shing gi snying po 'dra ba/ brla byin gyis phra ba zlum pas mdzes pa/ rtsa shin tu mi mngon zhing gya gyu med
352b6('dul ba): pas yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ nor bu mang po'i mgo rgyan dang / mgul gdub dang / rkang gdub dang / gdub bu dang / do shal dang / se mo do'i sgras 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ skra gnag
352b7('dul ba): la 'jam pa/ bde sogs ltar rkang pa rkang gdub kyis brgyan cing gser gyi 'og pag can/ lto phyang de ba/ do shal mang po dpyangs pa/ mdog gser gtso ma ltar bzang ba mthong / mthong
353a1('dul ba): ma thag tu gzhon nu nor bzang 'dod chags kyi zhags pa/ chu zla dri ma med cing / gsal ba g.yo ba'i rang bzhin lta bur gzung dka' ba/ rlung chu rlabs dang bcas
353a2('dul ba): pa'i chu srin lta bur rtogs par dka' ba/ nam mkha' lding dang rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar 'gro ba shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur myur du 'gyur ba/ spre'u ltar sa gcig na mi 'dug pas
353a3('dul ba): g.yo zhing gtsab yab can gyis ni dam du zin/ 'dod chags kyi mda' rtag tu nyon mongs bsten pa la goms pa'i 'dod chags kyi bde ba ro myang ba la brkam pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi
353a4('dul ba): yul ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa las mi ldog pa/ bzang mo la rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis shin tu dri ma can du byas pa/ 'phrad pas 'dod pas shin tu dbyung mi bzod pa'i sgra 'byin pa/
353a5('dul ba): tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i gzhus 'phangs pas ni/ snying la phog ste/ me'i nang du phye ma leb bzhin du de nyid du 'gyel to/ /smras pa/ dbyar gyi char sprin nang nas glog ni 'gyu ba ltar/ /
353a6('dul ba): bzhin ras zla ba 'dra de nor bzang gis mthong ste/ /de la chags pa'i 'dod pa steg tshol las byung ba'i/ /'dod chags mda' yis de yi sems la pho ga/ //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po
353a7('dul ba): zhe lnga pa/ de nas rgyal bu nor bzang gis yid 'phrog ma de khrid de glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song nas/ rngon pa de la yang grong khyer mchog gcig byin no/ /de nas gzhon nu nor bzang yid
353b1('dul ba): 'phrog ma dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir dong nas lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed/ yid 'phrog ma'i gzugs dang / na tshod dang / bsnyen bkur
353b2('dul ba): brgya phrag du ma'i yon tan gyis gzhon nu nor bzang gi sems ji ltar de dang skad cig kyang 'bral mi phod pa de ltar 'phrog go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ bram ze gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing
353b3('dul ba): 'ongs pa las/ de las gcig ni/ rgyal po la rten bcas so/ /gnyis pa ni/ gzhon nu nor bzang la'o/ /rgyal po la brten bcas pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal pos mdun na 'don du bcug
353b4('dul ba): ste/ longs spyod kyi skal ba yang byin no/ /gzhon nu nor bzang gi gang yin pa de la ni/ des longs spyod kyi skal ba tsam zhig byin pa dang / smras pa/ gzhon nu gang gi tshe yab 'das nas khyod
353b5('dul ba): rgyal por bcug pa de'i tshe/ bdag la ci zhig bgyi/ gzhon nu nor bzang gis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod kyi grogs po bram ze/ nga'i yab kyis mdun na 'don du bcug pa de bzhin du/ khyod kyang
353b6('dul ba): nga'i mdun na 'don du gzhug go/ zhes bya ba'i gtam de gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/ bram ze mdun na 'don des thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ngas ci nas gzhon nu nyid kyis
353b7('dul ba): kyang rgyal srid mi thob pa de ltar bya na/ mdun na 'don du gzhug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po de'i yul du ri bor pa zhig bsngo bar gyur nas/ rgyal pos de
354a1('dul ba): 'bebs su dmag kha chen zhig btang ba las de bcom/ rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar log go /de bzhin du kha che bdun gyi bar btang ba las/ de rnams kyang
354a2('dul ba): bcom/ rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar lhags so/ /rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du rang gi dpung nyams shing gzhan gyi mthu skyed par mdzad/ gang
354a3('dul ba): yang lha'i yul na mtshon gyis 'tsho ba ji snyed mchis pa thams cad dgug tu gsol/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsam pa/ gzhon nu nor bzang gsad pa'i thabs bya ba'i dus ni/ 'di
354a4('dul ba): yin no/ /snyam nas/ de nas rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha de lta bus ni/ dbab par rngo mi thogs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ji ltar bya/ nga nyid kho na 'gro'am/ mdun na 'don gyis
354a5('dul ba): smras pa/ ci'i slad du lha nyid gshegs/ gzhon nu nor bzang 'di ni/ dar la bab cing mthu rtsal snyems pa dang ldan pa lags pas/ dmag 'di rnams dang lhan cig tu dgyer
354a6('dul ba): gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes/ de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu bkug nas bsgo ba/ gzhon nu/ dmag dang lhan cig tu dengs la ri bor rnams phob cig
354a7('dul ba): lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzang gis rgyal po las mnyan nas btsun mo rnams kyi gan du song ste/ yid 'phrog ma mthong ba dang / des thams cad brjed par gyur
354b1('dul ba): to/ /de nas yang rgyal pos bsgo ba dang / yang / de mthong ma thag tu thams cad brjed par gyur to/ /de nas mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu nor bzang ni/ yid
354b2('dul ba): 'phrog ma la lhag par chags pas mchi bar rngo mi thogs kyi/ dmag bsdogs la gzhon nu btsun mo rnams kyi nang nas byung ba dang / ci nas kyang yid 'phrog ma'i drung du mi mchi bar
354b3('dul ba): thal byung gtang bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /dpung gi tshogs sta gon gyis shig /blon po rnams kyi rgyal po las mnyan nas/ dpung
354b4('dul ba): gi tshogs glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung phun sum tshogs pa/ 'tshog chas go mtshon rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa dag sta gon byas so/ /de nas gzhon nu phyir
354b5('dul ba): byung ba dang bsgo ba/ gzhon nu dpung gi tshogs sta gon byas kyi song zhig /des smras pa/ lha/ yid 'phrog ma la bltas te mchi bar bgyid/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu
354b6('dul ba): thogs par 'gyur gyi ma lta zhig / yab/ gal te de ltar na/ ma la bltas te mchi'o/ /gzhon nu ma la ltos shig /des yid 'phrog ma'i gtsug gi nor bu khyer nas/ ma'i drung
354b7('dul ba): du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yum/ bdag ri bor ba rnams 'bebs su mchi lags kyi/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di/ khyod kyis shin tu dben par sbos la/ yid
355a1('dul ba): 'phrog ma 'gum pa la thug pa ma lags par ji ltar gyur kyang ma stsol cig / ces des de skad ma la bsgos nas mchi phyag byas te/ dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang /
355a2('dul ba): rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang chas te rim gyis yul 'das nas/ ri bor ba de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du btab ste 'dug go /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos
355a3('dul ba): kyi bu 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lam de nas gnod
355a4('dul ba): sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar chas so/ /de la ma de nas chas pa na/ nam mkha'i lam la thogs par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis lam 'di nas
355a5('dul ba): lan mang po zhig tu song na bdag gi bzhon pa lan 'ga' yang thogs par ma gyur na/ gang gis na/ de ltar thogs pa 'di lta rgyu ci yod snyam pa las/ des gzhon nu nor bzang mthong
355a6('dul ba): nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ dmag la chas pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/ 'di'i grogs byas te ri bor
355a7('dul ba): pa 'di rnams srog chags 'ga' yang gnod par mi 'gyur bar dbab po/ /snyam du bsam nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len la smras pa/ lnga len tshur shog /khyod kyis
355b1('dul ba): gzhon nu nor bzang ri bor pa rnams dang g.yul ma bkye bar srog chags 'ga' la yang gnod par mi bya bar phobs cig / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis/ bka' bzhin
355b2('dul ba): 'tshal zhes rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas/ lha'i yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs shing ta la'i tshad tsam gyi skyes pa dang / ri'i tshad tsam gyi glang po che dang / glang po che'i
355b3('dul ba): tshad tsam gyi rta dang / gzhal med khang gi tshad tsam gyi shing rta rnams sprul to/ /de nas ral gri dang / tho ba dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung thung dang /
355b4('dul ba): mda' dang / dgra sta la sogs te/ mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sil dkrol gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pas 'jigs pa chen po ston cing / lnga len mthu chen po tshogs
355b5('dul ba): rnams dang ri bor du phyin pa dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta'i sgra dang / sil dkrol gyi sgra sna tshogs dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi mthus/ ra ba dag ral
355b6('dul ba): bar gyur to/ /de nas ri bor na gnas pa de rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs de dag/ ra ba dag ral ba mthong nas/ mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te dris pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams
355b7('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ myur du sgo phye zhig /gzhon nu nor bzang 'di'i mjug nas 'ong ste/ dpung gi tshogs 'di ni/ de'i yin no/ /gal te myur du ma phye na thams cad rmeg med par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams
356a1('dul ba): kyis/ bdag cag rgyal la mi ldog ste/ /gzhon nu blo dang ldan la min/ /rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho rnams kyis/ /bdag cag 'jigs shing skrag gyur med/ /ces
356a2('dul ba): smras nas/ de rnams kyis sgo phye ste/ de nas rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng nas/ bum pa gang ba dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis gzhon nu nor bzang bsu'o/ /des kyang dbugs phyung
356a3('dul ba): nas de rnams bgrang ba las sna bo bskos te dpya thang bcad/ gte'u yang bzung ngo / /de nas ri bor pa de rnams cham du phab nas/ gzhon nu nor bzang slar log go/ rgyal po nor can gyis
356a4('dul ba): de nyid kyis nub mo rmi lam na bya rgod cig 'ongs te/ rgyal po'i lto dral nas rgyu ma gzangs te grong khyer de thams cad kyi mtha' bskor ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi khyim du 'ongs par mthong nas/
356a5('dul ba): de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag /mi dga' zhing spu zing zhes byed nas/ myur ba myur bar langs te mal chen po la 'dug nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/ gzhi 'di las bdag
356a6('dul ba): rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/ sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las/ de nam nangs nas/ rmi lam de bram ze mdun na 'don la smras
356a7('dul ba): pa dang / des bsam pa/ lhas/ rmi lam de lta bu mthong ba ni/ gdon mi za bar gzhon nus ri bor pa rnams pham par byas kyi/ log pa bzhin du bstan par bya'o/ /snyam nas smras
356b1('dul ba): pa| lha/ khyed kyi rmi lam du gzigs pa ni/ bzang po ma lags te/ gdon mi 'tshal bar gzhi 'di las lha'i rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ sku tshe'i bar chad du 'gyur lags so/ /'on kyang
356b2('dul ba): 'di zlog pa'i thabs mchis te/ de yang bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig las mthong ngo / /zlog pa'i thabs de ci yin/ lha/ skyed mos tshal du rdzing dbyibs legs pa/ tshad la bab pa bgyis la/ de
356b3('dul ba): nas rdo thal gyis byugs te legs par bstar nas/ ri dwags phra mo rnams kyi khrag gis bkang la/ de nas lhas khrus la gshegs pa na/ rdzing de la them skas gcig las 'jug par bgyi'o/ /
356b4('dul ba): gcig las zhugs nas gnyis la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/ /gnyis pa las zhugs nas gsum pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/ /gsum pa las zhugs nas bzhi pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o/ /de nas bram ze
356b5('dul ba): rig byed dang / rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis lha'i zhabs lces bldags la/ mi ma yin pa'i tshil gyi bdug pas bdug go/ de ltar na/ lha'i dngos sdig 'byang zhing yun
356b6('dul ba): ring por rgyal srid skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de dag thams cad ni/ nus na/ 'di ltar/ mi ma yin pa'i tshil bu 'di ni/ shin tu dkon no/ /mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ /lha/
356b7('dul ba): mod pa gang lags pa de/ dkon lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de ji lta bu zhig yin/ mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha/ yid 'phrog ma 'di/ mi ma lags pa ma lags sam/ rgyal pos smras
357a1('dul ba): pa| mdun na 'don/ 'di la gzhon nu'i srog 'dug gi de skad ma smra zhig/ des smras pa/ lha/ khyim gyi phyir ni 'ga' gtang ste/ /grong rdal phyir ni khyim gtang ngo //
357a2('dul ba): yul ljongs phyir ni grong rdal te/ /bdag gi phyir ni sa gtang ngo / /zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam/ rgyal po bdag nyid brtan gyur nas/ /gzhon nu blo ldan de la ni/ /gzhan zhig stsal bar spyod grang
357a3('dul ba): gi / yid 'phrog 'di ni dgum par mdzod/ /bdag nyid la mngon par chags pa ni/ mi byed pa ci yang med pas/ des khas blangs so/ /de nas mdun na 'don gyis ji skad bstan pa
357a4('dul ba): bzhin du bya bar brtsams te/ rdzing brkos nas rngo thal gyis byugs shing legs par bstar nas/ ri dwags phra mo rnams kyi khrag gsog pa la zhugs so/ /sbyor ba de/ nor bzang
357a5('dul ba): gi btsun mo'i skye bos shes nas/ de rnams dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bdag cag lang tsho la bab cing / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/ da ni/ bdag cag
357a6('dul ba): dang / gzhon nu nor bzang du yongs su dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa de dag/ yid 'phrog mas mthong nas dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i phyir
357a7('dul ba): lhag par dga'/ ji tsam na/ gzhan zhig gis yid 'phrog ma la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba skyes nas gzhon nu
357b1('dul ba): nor bzang gi ma gang na ba der song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas snying rje rje skad du sgra gcom chung ngus don de dal bus smras pa dang / des smras pa/ gal te de ltar na/ legs par rtogs shig/
357b2('dul ba): bdag gis kyang brtag go/ yid 'phrog mas brtags nas yang smras pa dang / des brtags na yang bden par mthong nas/ de nas des gtsug gi nor bu de dang gos shig/ yid 'phrog ma
357b3('dul ba): la byin nas smras pa/ bu mo khyod dus la ma bab par ma 'gro zhig/ de ltar na/ kho mo la kham mchu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro /de nas rgyal po ji skad bstan pa'i rim pa bzhin du khrus la
357b4('dul ba): chas te khrag gis gang ba'i rdzing bur zhugs nas byung ba dang / de nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la bram ze rnams kyi lces bldags so/ /ji tsam na/ mi'am ci mo khrid de shog cig ces bsgo ba dang /
357b5('dul ba): de ma thag kho nar yid 'phrog ma nam mkha' la 'phags te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni reg dang 'phrad pa dang / /bdag ni bgad dang brtses pa las/ /bal glang mo btags thar pa ltar//
357b6('dul ba): da ni bdag mo 'gro bar bya/ /rgyal pos kyang nam mkha'i lam nas 'gro ba mthong nas/ de skrag ste mdun na 'don la smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'bad par bya ba de ma grub par/ mi'am ci yid 'phrog
357b7('dul ba): ma bros so/ /mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha/ da ni/ don grub ste/ dngos sdig dang bral lags so/ /de nas yid 'phrog nam mkha'i lam las 'gro ba na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yang
358a1('dul ba): bdag gnas skabs 'di thob pa de ni/ drang srong des bstan pa las gyur gyi/ gal te des ma bstan na ni/ bdag gzung zhing 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba zhig /de lta bas
358a2('dul ba): na/ re zhig drang srong de'i drung du 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ de de'i bsti gnas su song nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas drang srong la smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyod kyis bstan pas/ bdag bzung
358a3('dul ba): ste mchis nas/ mi'i reg pa rnams thob cing srog gi bar chad du cung zhig gis ma gyur to /de bas gsol ba ni/ gal te brgya zhig la gzhon nu nor bzang bdag tshol zhing mchis na/ de la
358a4('dul ba): bdag gi sor gdub stsol la/ 'di skad kyang gsung ba'i rigs so/ /gzhon nu/ lam yang bgrod par dka' ste/ nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi slar bzhud cig /gal te bzlog kyang mchis
358a5('dul ba): su ma btub na/ de la lam bstan pa'i rigs kyi/ gzhon nu yid 'phrog mas bstan pa/ byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum mchis so/ /de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum mo/ /
358a6('dul ba): de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum mchis so/ /de dag brgal ba dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs can mchis so/ /de'i byang phyogs na ni/ ri bo phur pa'i rtse mchis so/ /de nas lam chu sgra
358a7('dul ba): can dang / seng ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / rdo rje can dang / 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang / phur ba'i dbyibs dang / sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang / mi g.yo ba dang / rab
358b1('dul ba): grol te/ ri bo de dag khyod kyis rgol cig /de la ri bo seng ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / phur pa'i dbyibs la ni/ phug nas 'jug /rdo rje can la ni/ bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste/ thabs
358b2('dul ba): 'di dag gis ri bo de rnams brgal bar bgyi'o/ /'khrul 'khor ra gdong can dang / lug lta bu dang / skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag kyang gzhom par bgyi'o/ /phug na sbrul kha
358b3('dul ba): chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/ de ni/ zho shas gzhom par bgyi'o/ /gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig /phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni/ /bdag gi slad du gzhu
358b4('dul ba): brdungs la/ /mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis/ /gang nas lug gnyis phan tshun nas/ /rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni/ /de gnyis rwa re bcag mdzod dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur
358b5('dul ba): lags so/ /'jigs pa che skyed mtshon thogs pa'i/ /lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na/ /de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /srin mo
358b6('dul ba): lcags kyi mchu can zhig / kha 'dzum gdangs par bgyid gzigs na/ /de tshe de yi dpral ba la/ /phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod/ /de bzhin khron pa klong drag 'khyil/ /drug cu'i khru
358b7('dul ba): can la khyod mchongs/ /skra mig seng ge'i ltar ser zhing / /mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang / /gzhu bkang ste ni gsad mdzod la/ /chu srin 'dzin
359a1('dul ba): khris gang ba yi/ /chu bo mang po brgal mdzod cig/ nang gi phye ma leb gdungs dang / /sna tshogs dud mo rgod pa dang / /sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung / /nang ga na ni srin
359a2('dul ba): mo khro/ /phye ma leb na mi ma yin/ /gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang / /sna tshogs can na 'dod rgyur gzugs/ /dud mor ma'i ma ci yi bran/ /rgod pa na ni mi'am ci'i/ mna' ma sbrul mang
359a3('dul ba): sbrul can na/ /'od ma can klung shal ma yi/ /nang ga la ni brtan par bya/ /phye ma leb la brtul phod bya/ /gdungs par 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo / /sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs/ /dud
359a4('dul ba): mo can du yid bde bas/ /rgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i/ /sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod/ /sbrul can du ni sbrul dug gi/ sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can/ /klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa
359a5('dul ba): yi/ /sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod/ /chu bo rnams brgal nas gcan po'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshugs te/ gzhom par mdzod cig/ de nas ni/ mi
359a6('dul ba): 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so/ /zhes gsungs shig/ drang srong de la yid 'phrog mas de skad smras nas/ rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te de nas song ngo / /ji tsam na
359a7('dul ba): gzhon nu nor bzang gis ri bor de phab nas skyes khyer te/ glang po'i grong khyer du 'ongs so/ /zhes rgyal pos thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/ /de nas gzhon nu ngal sos nas/
359b1('dul ba): pha'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas mdun du 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam byas nas smras pa/ gzhon nu/ khyod bde bar 'ong sam/ lha/ khyod kyi bka' drin
359b2('dul ba): gyis ri bor pa phab ste gte'u bzung / sna bo bskos lags te/ dpya dang skyes kyang 'di dag lags kyi/ phyag mdzod du gzhug tu gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ legs par byas kyi
359b3('dul ba): bzhes so/ /de nas gzhon nus pha la phyag byas nas chas pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu skyes la lhan cig kho nar longs spyad kyi 'dug cig /lha/ bdag gis yid 'phrog ma ma
359b4('dul ba): mthong nas yun ring zhig lags pas mchis lags so/ /gzhon nu/ deng 'gro ba bshol la/ sang song zhig/ de gal gyis 'chu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab/ nges par der nyid
359b5('dul ba): bdag mchis lags so/ /rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de nas gzhon nu rang gi khyim du song na/ btsun mo'i pho brang gi sgo dpal gyis stong par mthong nas/ de sems khong du chud bzhin
359b6('dul ba): du zhugs na/ yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas/ snying stor te phan tshun du rgyu zhing / yid 'phrog ma/ yid 'phrog ma zhes sgra phyung ngo / /ji tsam na btsun mo rnams tshogs nas/ btsun mo de rnams
359b7('dul ba): gtam rlung la bskur ba dang / de'i snying la zug rngus zugs pas/ yang nas yang du dris pas/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /de mya ngan gyis yid blong bar gyur to/ /bud med de rnams
360a1('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ lha/ btsun mo'i 'khor 'di na de bas bud med shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na/ ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ des pha snying rje med cing
360a2('dul ba): byas pa chud gzon pa thos nas/ ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ yum/ yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur cing / /gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /
360a3('dul ba): yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na/ /bdag yid 'phrog ma gang du mchis/ /yid kyis rab tu rgyug snyam na'ang / /bdag gi yid ni kun tu rmongs/ /de dang bral bar gyur pa yis/ /snying ni shin
360a4('dul ba): tu gdungs pa nyid/ /bdag gi yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog la/ /yid du 'thad cing yid la dga' ba yi/ /yid 'phrog dang bral bdag lus gdungs pa yi/ /bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di
360a5('dul ba): ni gang nas mchis/ /des smras pa/ bu/ yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur nas kho mos btang ngo / /yum/ ji ltar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad rgyas
360a6('dul ba): par smras pa dang / des pha snying rje med cing byas pa mi gzob yin no/ /zhes smras nas/ yang smras pa/ yum/ gang du mchis/ bshul ni/ gang nas/ des smras pa/ gang du
360a7('dul ba): yid 'phrog song ba yi/ /lam de ri dang drang srong dang / /seng ge dag gis rtag bsnyen cing / /chos kyi rgyal po gnas pa yin/ /de yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi bzad
360b1('dul ba): bar nyam thag cing snying rje rje skad du bla zhing smre sngags 'don pa/ yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur pa'i/ /yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na/ /zhes bya ba nas/ bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas 'ongs/ /
360b2('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas mas smras pa/ bu/ btsun mo'i 'khor 'di na de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i bud med dag yod na/ ci'i phyir mya ngan byed/ gzhon nus smras pa/
360b3('dul ba): yum/ de ma rnyed par bdag dga' bar ga la 'gyur/ des de dbugs phyung yang 'on kyang mya ngan gyis gdungs nas de'i khungs tshol zhing phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams te de'i blo skyes pa/ gang kho na
360b4('dul ba): las thob pa de nyid la re zhig dri'o/ /snyam nas/ des rngon pa spang leb can gyi drung du song ste dris pa/ khyod kyis yid 'phrog ma gang nas rnyed/ des smras pa/ ri bo che ge mo'i ngos la drang srong
360b5('dul ba): zhig gnas te/ de'i bsti gnas na tshangs pa 'du ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing mchis te/ der khrus la zhugs pa las/ drang srong gis bstan nas rnyed do/ /des bsam pa/ de ni/ drang srong
360b6('dul ba): gi drung du song dang de las khungs phyin par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /rgyal pos gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma dang bral bas shin tu yid blong ba'i gtam de thos so/ /de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu
360b7('dul ba): khyod yid blong du ci yod/ da ni/ de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i chung ma sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ yab/ bdag ni/ de ma lags pa'i mchis brang gi 'khor dang mchis par rngo mi thogs lags
361a1('dul ba): so| |rgyal pos de la lan du ma smras kyang ma bzlog go / de nas rgyal pos grong khyer gyi sgo dang / ra ba'i khar ci nas kyang gzhon nu phyir mi 'chor bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu
361a2('dul ba): srung ma dag bkod do/ /de nas gzhon nu ni/ /mtshan thog thag mi nyal bar gyur to/ /lnga po 'di dag ni/ mtshan mo cung zad nyal gyi/ phal cher mi nyal te/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa bud med
361a3('dul ba): la chags pas sems bcings pa dang / bud med skyes pa la chags pa dang / srog chags ngur pa dang / chom rkun pa'i ra bgo dang / dge slong brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/ /zhes
361a4('dul ba): gsungs so/ /de nas gzhon nu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag sgo nas song na rgyal po'i sgo srung gi srung ma gtum po dag yod de/ de rnams kyis bdag chad bas gcod pa'am/ srog
361a5('dul ba): dang bral bar byed par 'gyur gyi/ ci nas kyang ma la bdag srung ma med pa'i lam nas 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ de mtshan mo langs te/ ut+pa la sngon po'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa'i phreng ba
361a6('dul ba): rgyal mtshan la brtags nas/ gang na srung ma'i mi med pa de nas babs pa na zla ba shar to/ /de nas des zla ba la bltas nas yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i smre sngags 'di lta bu dag 'don par byed
361a7('dul ba): de| zla nya rgyu skar rgyal po mtshan mo gsal mdzad kye/ /khyod ni snar ma'i mig tu sdug pa ded dpon bzang / /cig bdag gi sdug pa ut+pal lta bu'i mig /yid 'phrog ces bgyi khyod kyis sa steng
361b1('dul ba): gzigs lags sam/ zhes smras nas/ sngon gyi dga' pa nyams su myong ba dran zhing song ba las/ ri dwags mo zhig mthong nas de la yang smras pa/ kye ma ri dwags mo khyod rtswa chu lo ma za/ khyod ni
361b2('dul ba): legs 'gyur ba der spyod bdag ni rngon pa min/ /ri dwags mo ltar mig dkyus ring bas gzugs bzang ba/ /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /de de nas song ste phyogs
361b3('dul ba): gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu mdzes par byas pa'i snying po la bung ba dag longs spyod pa mthong nas/ de nas bung ba zhig la smras pa/ sbrang rtsi'i bung ba ri bo mthon mthing
361b4('dul ba): lta bu'i mchog / smyug ma'i sbubs dang pad+ma dag la gnas 'cha' ba/ /skra yi tshogs ring kha dog bung ba ltar gnag pa/ /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /phyogs de nas
361b5('dul ba): kyang song ba dang / sbrul zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smras pa/ kye ma'i sbrul nag shing lo lta bur lce g.yo zhing / /mig dang kha yi nang nas dud pa'i tshogs 'byin pa/ /khyod kyi gdug pa'i me dang
361b6('dul ba): 'dod chags mer mi mtshungs/ /bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /de nas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu son pa dang / tshal gzhan zhig na khu byug sgra 'byin pa zhig mthong ngo / /
361b7('dul ba): mthong nas kyang khu byug de la yang smras pa/ kye ma khu byug tshal mchog ljon shing la gnas pa/ /'dab chags tshogs kyi rgyal po bud med yid 'phrog pa/ /ut+pal sngon po lta bur dri med mdzes
362a1('dul ba): pa'i mig / bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ /phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang / shing mya ngan 'tshang bya ba me tog thams cad rgyas pa zhig mthong
362a2('dul ba): nas/ ming gi rnam grangs bkra shis zhes brjod pa/ /ljon pa rnams kyi rgyal po cher gyur pa/ /yid 'phrog mya ngan gyis ni blong ba bdag /thal mo sbyar na khyod kyis mya ngan sol/ /de de
362a3('dul ba): ltar yid blong zhing rim gyis drang srong de'i bsti gnas su phyin nas/ /des drang srong de la dul ba dang bcas pas phyag byas nas smras pa/ bzod 'phags gos su shing shun dang ni g.yang gzhi
362a4('dul ba): mnabs/ |rtsa ba myu gu skyu ru bil ba ka bde gsol/ /drang srong mgos btud phyag 'tshal bdag gi yid 'phrog ma/ /khyod kyis gzigs sam khyod ni bdag la myur du gsungs/ /de nas
362a5('dul ba): drang srong des gzhon nu nor bzang la/ byon pa legs zhes bya ba dang / stan bting bya ba la sogs pa sngar bya bas yang dag par dga' ba byas nas smras pa/ smin ma 'dzar ba'i smin tshugs mthon
362a6('dul ba): mthing bzhin legs mthong na dga' ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/ /bzhin ras zla ba nya 'dra ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i mig de bdag gis mthong / /dpon khyod bag brkyang bzhugs te rtsa ba 'bras bu sna
362a7('dul ba): tshogs gsol bar mdzod cig dang / /slad kyis bde blag 'byon 'gyur 'di la bdag gi yid la the tshom yong ma mchis/ /smin ma bzang mos 'di skad tshig smras te/ /gzhon nu khyod la sred
362b1('dul ba): pas bdag mi bde/ /nags khrod gnas pa'ang sdug bsngal chen po ste/ /gshegs par gyur na nges par bdag mthong ngo / /des sor gdub rgyan 'di byin nas smras pa/ lam yang la bgrod dka' bas nyon mongs
362b2('dul ba): par 'gyur gyi slar log cig / gal te bzlog kyang 'dug tu ma btub na/ de la lam bstan pa'i rigs so/ /des yang 'di skad ces bstan te/ byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod do/ /de dag brgal ba'i
362b3('dul ba): pha rol na yang gsum/ de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum yod de/ de dag brgal ba dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs can zhes bya ba yod de/ phyogs de nas sman 'di dag blang bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ shin
362b4('dul ba): tu 'o ma 'dzag ces bya ba'i sman yod de/ de mar la btsos nas btung bar bya'o/ /des na skom pa dang bkres pa med cing / dran pa dang mthu stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /spre'u zhig kyang bkri bar bya/ gsang
362b5('dul ba): sngags dag kyang bslab par bya/ gzhu mda' dang chas pa dang / nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang / dug gsod pa sman dug sel ba dang / lcags kyi phur pa gsum dang / pi wang yang bcang bar bya'o/ /ri'i rgyal
362b6('dul ba): po gangs can gyi byang phyogs na/ ri bo phur pa'i rtse yod do/ /de nas lam chu sgra can dang / seng ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / rdo rje can dang / 'dod rgyur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang / phur pa'i
362b7('dul ba): dbyibs dang / sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang / mi g.yo ba dang rab grol lo/ /khyod kyis ri de dag brgal dgos te/ de la ri bo seng ldeng can la ni/ phug nas 'jug rgyud gcig pa dang / phur pa'i
363a1('dul ba): dbyibs la yang phug nas 'jug / rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste/ thabs 'di dag gis ri rnams brgal bar bya'o/ /'khrul 'khor nga gdong can dang / lug
363a2('dul ba): lta bu dang / skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag gzhom par bya'o/ /phug na sbrul kha chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/ de ni/ zho shas gzhom par bya'o/ /gang
363a3('dul ba): na sbrul ni nag po zhig/ phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni/ /bdag gi slad du gzhu brdungs la/ /mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis/ /gang la lug gnyis phan tshun nas/ /rdung bar byed
363a4('dul ba): pa mthong na ni/ /de gnyis rwa re bcad mdzod dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /'jigs pa che skyes mtshon thogs pa'i/ /lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na/ /de gnyis las ni gcig
363a5('dul ba): brdegs dang / /lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so/ /srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig /kha 'dzum gdangs par bgyid gzigs na/ /de tshe de yi dpral ba la/ /phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod/ /
