363a6('dul ba): de bzhin khron pa klong khrag 'khyil/ /drug cu'i khru can la khyod mchongs/ /skra mig seng ge'i lhar ser zhing / /mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag/ gzhu bkang de ni
363a7('dul ba): gsad mdzod la/ /chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yi/ /chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig /nang gi phye ma leb gdungs dang / /sna tshogs dud ma dgod pa dang / /sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung / /nang ga na
363b1('dul ba): ni srin mo khro/ /phye ma leb na mi ma yin/ /gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang / /sna tshogs can na 'dod sgyur gzugs/ /ngud mor mi 'am ci yi bran/ /dgod pa na ni mi'am ci'i/ /mna' ma sbrul can sbrul mang
363b2('dul ba): na/ /'od ma can klung shal ma li/ /nang ga na ni brtan par bya/ /phye ma leb la rtul phod bya/ /gdung bar 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo / /sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs/ /dud mo can du yid bde bas/ /
363b3('dul ba): dgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i/ /sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod/ /sbrul can du ni sbrul dug gi /sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can/ /klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa yi/ /sbyor ba kun tu rgal bar
363b4('dul ba): mdzod/ /chu bo rnams brgal nas gcan pa'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran btsugs te gzhom par mdzod cig /de nas ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so/ /
363b5('dul ba): zhes gsungs shig /de nas gzhon nu nor bzang gis ji skad bstan pa'i sman pa dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dug sel gyi sbyor ba rnams btsal ba'i phyir drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag
363b6('dul ba): byas nas song ngo / /de nas des spre'u ma gtogs par ji skad bstan pa thams cad sta gon byas nas/ de nas de rnams khyer te/ yang drang srong de'i drung du song ba dang / des de la spre'u byin nas smras pa/
363b7('dul ba): gzhon nu/ /'bad pa 'dis ci bya/ yid 'phrog ma 'dis ci zhig dgos/ khyod gcig pu ni/ grogs med pas lus gdon mi za bar 'gyur gyi thong / gzhon nus smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bdag
364a1('dul ba): ni| gdon mi za bar mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mkha' la zla ba rgyu ba grogs shig ga las mchis/ /mche ba'i mthu stobs ldan pa'i ri dwags gtso bo dang / /
364a2('dul ba): me yis nags sreg pa na grogs shig ga las mchis/ /bdag lta bu la grogs po mthu ldan ci zhig 'tshal/ /kye ci rgya mtsho che chur 'jug par mi bgyi'am/ /ci lags sbrul gyis zin
364a3('dul ba): ces gso bar mi bgyi'am/ /sems can spungs can gyis bstan brtson 'grus cher brtsams te/ /gal te 'bad de ma rungs 'di la nyes pa med/ /de nas gzhon nu nor bzang yid 'phrog mas
364a4('dul ba): bstan pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs dang chas te/ rim gyis ri dang / chu bo dang / phug dang / g.yang sa la sogs par sman dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dug sel gyi sbyor bas rgyal bar byas nas mi
364a5('dul ba): 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu son pa dang / gzhon nus/ grong khyer dpal dang ldan pa/ skyed mos tshal gyi tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pas mdzes par
364a6('dul ba): byas pa/ bya sna tshogs kyis bsten pa/ rdzing bu dang / mtshe'u ring po dang / gru bzhi dang / mi'am ci mo rnams kyis bskor ba de la/ mi'am ci mo rnams chu len du 'ong ba mthong nas/ de nas
364a7('dul ba): gzhon nu nor bzang gis de rnams la smras pa/ chu mang po 'dis ci zhig bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mi'am/ ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis/ de mi'i
364b1('dul ba): lag tu son par gyur pas de'i mi'i dri bshal ba lags so/ /gzhon nu nor bzang gis dris pa/ ci/ bum pa 'di dag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu de'i steng nas ldugs sam/ 'on te rim gyis/ de
364b2('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ rim gyis so/ /des bsam pa/ thabs 'di bzang ste/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'di bum pa gcig gi nang du gzhug go/ snyam nas/ des mi'am ci mo gcig gi bum par ma tshor
364b3('dul ba): bar bcug nas mi'am ci mo de la smras pa/ khyod kyis bum pa 'dis thog mar yid 'phrog ma la khrus byos shig/ des bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di la dgos pa zhig yod par 'gyur ro/ /snyam
364b4('dul ba): nas/ de nas des bum pa de thog mar yid 'phrog ma'i spyi bor blugs pa las/ ji tsam na sor gdub kyi rgya pang du lhung ba dang / yid 'phrog mas de 'phrigs so/ /de nas mi'am ci mo la dris pa/ 'dir
364b5('dul ba): mi 'ga' zhig ma 'ongs sam/ des smras pa/ mchis so/ /song la de dben pa zhig tu zhog cig /des de nang du khrid nas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go /de nas yid 'phrog mas pha'i rkang pa gnyis la
364b6('dul ba): gtugs te smras pa/ yab/ gal te bdag gi khyim thab bgyid pa/ gzhon nu nor bzang de mchis na/ de la khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/ des smras pa/ de mi yin te/ cir yang mi mkho bas/
364b7('dul ba): ngas de dum bu brgyar byas te phyogs bzhir gtor te gtong ngo / /yid 'phrog mas smras pa/ yab/ mir gyur pas 'dir ga la mchis/ bdag nyid de skad mchi bar bas so/ /de nas mi'am
365a1('dul ba): ci'i rgyal po ljon pa kun nas dkris pa dang bral te/ de kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa/ gal te gzhon nu de 'ongs na/ ngas khyod rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
365a2('dul ba): pa/ nor dang / yo byad mang po dang / mi'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te de la chung ma'i don du sbyin no/ /de nas yid 'phrog ma dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas/ gzhon
365a3('dul ba): nu nor bzang lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas mi'am/ ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bstan to/ /de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ gzhon nu nor bzang gzugs bzang po/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog
365a4('dul ba): rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te de nas de bgam par 'dod nas gser gyi sdong po bdun dang / shing ta la bdun dang / rnga bo che bdun dang / phag bdun
365a5('dul ba): btsugs so/ /gzhon nu nor bzang ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin no/ /lha rnams
365a6('dul ba): kyang de dag la gegs med par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gar dang / glu dang / pi wang dang / 'khar rnga dang / shin tu sgra snyan dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / rdza
365a7('dul ba): rnga la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'i sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra'i khyad par ni/ kun nas 'bud cing / mi'am ci stong phrag du mas ni/ yongs su bskor nas ral gri ut+pa la sngon po'i
365b1('dul ba): 'dab ma 'dra ba thogs te/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mthong bar gser gyi sdong po'i drung du song nas/ chu shing la gcod pa bzhin du sdong po de dum bu dum bur bcag par brtsams te/ de nas de til 'bru
365b2('dul ba): tsam du brlags so/ /mdas ni/ shing ta la bdun dang / rnga bdun dang / phag bdun gtsang mar phyung ste ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo bar gnas so/ /de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang / mi'am
365b3('dul ba): ci'i brgya stong phrag du mas a la la zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra chen po phyung ngo / /mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas mthong zhing thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /de nas mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog
365b4('dul ba): ma 'dra ba sha stag stong gi dbus su yid 'phrog ma bzhag ste gzhon nu nor bzang la smras pa/ gzhon nu/ tshur yid 'phrog ma ngo shes par gyis shig /de nas gzhon nu nor bzang gis/ de
365b5('dul ba): ngo shes par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod ni ljon pa'i bu yin la/ /kho bo'i sdug pa yid 'phrog yin zhes na/ /bden pa 'di yis myur ba kho nar
365b6('dul ba): ni| |yid 'phrog gom pas myur du 'gro bar shog / de nas de ma thag tu gom pas song ba dang / mi'am ci rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu nor bzang 'di ni/ stobs dang / brtson
365b7('dul ba): 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa shin tu tshogs pa lags te/ yid 'phrog ma dang thab rir bab lags na/ ci'i slad du 'di la mtho btsam/ 'di la yid 'phrog ma stsol cig /de nas
366a1('dul ba): mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi'am ci'i tshogs rnams kyi rjes su bsngags pa dang / mi'am ci rnams kyi 'dun pas gzhon nu nor bzang la rjes bkur sti chen po byas nas
366a2('dul ba): yid 'phrog ma lha'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te lag pa g.yon pas bzung / gser gyi bya ma bum lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas/ gzhon nu nor bzang gi drung du song ste smras pa/ gzhon
366a3('dul ba): nu| yid 'phrog ma 'di mi'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/ kho bos khyod kyi chung ma'i phyir byin gyi/ mi rnams ni/ ngo mi rtag pa yin gyi ji ltar yang 'di mi dor cig /yab/
366a4('dul ba): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzang gis/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las mnyan nas/ mi'am ci'i gnas kyi khang pa na yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig skyes pa med par sil
366a5('dul ba): snyan rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de dus gzhan zhig na rang gi yul dran nas pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mya ngan gyis
366a6('dul ba): gdungs par gyur nas/ yid 'phrog ma la smras pa/ pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis non par gyur to/ /de nas yid 'phrog mas/ de ltar gyur pa dag pha la rgyas par
366a7('dul ba): smras so/ /des smras pa/ gzhon nu dang lhan cig song la/ mi rnams ni/ slu bar byed pa yin gyis/ khyod kyis bag yod par gyis shig /de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas nor bu
366b1('dul ba): dang / mu tig dang / gser la sogs pa mang du brdzangs te btang nas/ de yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu steng gi nam mkha'i lam la/ mi'am ci'i shugs kyis chas pa na/ rim gyis glang po'i
366b2('dul ba): khyim gyi grong khyer du phyin to/ /de nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas/ tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dar gyi chun 'phyang dpyangs/ rgyal mtshan
366b3('dul ba): dang / ba dan btsugs/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por ngag bshams/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bkram ste dga' dga' ltar byas so/ /de nas gzhon nu ma'i gtso bo stong phrag du mas yongs
366b4('dul ba): su bskor cing / yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du zhugs so/ /de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal sos nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag khyer te/ pha'i drung du song nas/
366b5('dul ba): rgyal po'i stan gyi glo zhig tu 'dug ste/ mi'am ci'i grong khyer du song ba dang / 'ongs pa rnams rgyas par smras so/ /de nas rgyal po nor can gyis/ 'di ni/ shin tu stobs dang / brtson 'grus
366b6('dul ba): dang / pha rol gnon pa can no/ /zhes bya bar rig nas/ rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /gzhon nu nor bzang gis bsam pa/ gang bdag yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tshogs
366b7('dul ba): pa dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa 'di ni/ sngon byas pa'i rgyu'i khyad par yin gyi/ ma la da yang bdag gis sbyin pa dag ni gtang / bsod nams dag ni/ bya'o
367a1('dul ba): snyam nas/ des glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gzhon nu nor bzang zhes
367a2('dul ba): bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na rgyal po nor bzang zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ngas
367a3('dul ba): gang yid 'phrog ma'i phyir stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon par bstan nas/ lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa des/ ngas bla na med pa yang
367a4('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob mod kyi/ 'on kyang sbyin pa de dang / brtson 'grus de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam/ rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no//
367a5('dul ba): rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/
367a6('dul ba): rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer na/ rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang
367a7('dul ba): rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa rnams rab tu zhi ba zhes
367b1('dul ba): bya ba nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par
367b2('dul ba): byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu 'das nas/ khye'u
367b3('dul ba): gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ dpung pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i
367b4('dul ba): gzengs mtho ba zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /gzhon nu thams cad sgrol dad pa bzang / dge ba'i bsam pa can/ bdag la phan pa
367b5('dul ba): dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/ snying rje can/ bdag nyid chen po/ chos 'dod pa/ skye rgu rnams la byams pa/ thams cad sbyin pa/ thams cad gtong ba/ chags pa med par gtong
367b6('dul ba): ba| gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin no/ /de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thos nas/ dpag tshad brgya nas kyang don du gnyer ba'i skye bo 'ongs te/ thams cad kyang yid la re ba rdzogs par byas nas
367b7('dul ba): gtong ngo / /de nas re zhig cig na/ byang chub sems dpa' shing rta nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / spug dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI las 'bar
368a1('dul ba): bar byas pa/ tsan+dan sa mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa/ seng+ge dang / stag dang / gung gi pags pas g.yogs pa/ rta rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa/
368a2('dul ba): gser dang / dngul gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'khrol pa bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas/ grong khyer dam pa nas skyed mos tshal du mngon du song ngo / /de nas bram ze rig byed
368a3('dul ba): dang / rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol mngon du bsu nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /yang smras pa/ khyod ni 'jig rten
368a4('dul ba): thams cad du/ /thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/ /bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di/ /khyod kyis sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems
368a5('dul ba): dpa' thams cad sgrol/ shing rta de las myur ba myur bar babs te/ snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas bram ze de dag la shing rta de byin nas smras pa/ bdag
368a6('dul ba): gis ji ltar bram ze la/ /mchog tu dga' bas shing rta btang / /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog// //'dul ba gzhi/
368a7('dul ba): bam po zhe drug pa/ de dus gzhan zhig na/ glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba/ me tog kun mu da dang / kha ba dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can
368b1('dul ba): bdun legs par gnas shing / rkang lag legs par gnas pa/ glang po che sa srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/ mthong na bkra shis pa
368b2('dul ba): la zhon nas/ shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang / mdza' bshes dang / g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du sos ka'i dus la bab
368b3('dul ba): pas| shing rnams me tog kha 'bus shing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal
368b4('dul ba): gyi skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba dang / de nas phyir rgol bas rbad pa'i bram ze kha cig gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings pa rings par 'ongs nas/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod
368b5('dul ba): rgyal bar gyur cig ces smras nas/ yang smras pa/ lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ /khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/ /khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni/ /bdag cag
368b6('dul ba): rnams la stsal ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu
368b7('dul ba): dga' ba'i yid kyis de dag la glang po'i mchog de byin nas smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/ /mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang / /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum//
369a1('dul ba): btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis/ khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis glang po'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes
369a2('dul ba): bya ba phyir rgol bas rbad pa'i bram ze rnams la sbyin no/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shin tu khros/ 'khrugs nas/ gzhon nu thams cad
369a3('dul ba): sgrol bkug ste smras pa/ gzhon nu/ khyod nga'i yul na ma 'dug par song zhig/ de nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol phas spangs pa dang bsam pa/ bdag gis byang chub kyi
369a4('dul ba): phyir 'bad pa byas pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pas/ glang po chen po de yang btang ste/ de bas khyim na gnas pas
369a5('dul ba): ni| |ci nus par ni sbyin par gtang / /dka' thub gnas su brten nas ni/ /nges par mchog dag bya ba yis/ /bslangs nas mi sbyin zhes bya ba'i/ /tshig ni smra bar mi phod kyi/ /
369a6('dul ba): de bas bdag ni khyim spangs te/ /dka' thub gnas su rab tu 'gro /byang chub sems dpa' de ltar snying la mna' mtho bcad nas chung ma rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste/
369a7('dul ba): de dag rgyas par smras so/ /de nas rgyags sbyin mas thos ma thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ rje'i sras
369b1('dul ba): gal te de lta na/ bdag kyang dka' thub kyi nags su mchi ste/ bdag ni/ rje'i sras dang bral na/ skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo mi thogs lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nam
369b2('dul ba): mkha' zla bas stongs par gyur pa dang / /ji ltar sa ni lo tog gis stongs dang / /pad+ma chu yis stongs par gyur pa ltar/ /bud med khyim thab kyis stongs de bzhin no/ /byang chub
369b3('dul ba): sems dpas smras pa/ bdag cag mthar gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no/ /khyod ni/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang /
369b4('dul ba): bgo ba mchog la goms pas lus shin tu skyid de ba yin/ dka' thub kyi nags na ni/ rtswa dang / lo ma bting bar ni/ nyal/ rtswa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ni za/ rtswa dur
369b5('dul ba): ba dang / zug rngo dang / rtswa dang / tsher mas gang ba'i sa la ni/ rgyu/ yang dang yang du za gcig pa la ni brten/ bdag nyid skye bo thams cad la ni/ brten dgos/ glo bur du 'ongs
369b6('dul ba): pa thams cad mchod sbyin la ni/ 'bod dgos la/ de na yang gdon mi za bar ci nus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste/ de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod par bya dgos so/ /de bas na/ re zhig
369b7('dul ba): da dung yang legs par soms shig / rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bdag rdo ci thogs kyis rje'i sras kyi rjes su sgrub lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te
370a1('dul ba): de lta na/ dam bcas pa de khyod kyis dran par byos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te/ yab cig bdag gis
370a2('dul ba): sbyin par glang chen stsal/ /nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol/ /bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchis lags kyi/ /mi yi dbang po phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur/ /de
370a3('dul ba): nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs brnangs te skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa/ bu/ sbyin pa'i blo bor la 'dug cig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ri
370a4('dul ba): dang bcas par yang / /gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yi/ /sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las/ /sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do/ /zhes smras nas song ngo / /de nas bu dang / bran mo
370a5('dul ba): dang / chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/ grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rjes su 'brang bzhin song ngo / /de
370a6('dul ba): nas mi zhig gis du zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang thos/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas/ mi zhig la dris pa/ kye nang rje/ skye bo'i tshogs chen
370a7('dul ba): po cho nges 'debs pa 'di rgyu ci las gyur/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ ci/ mi shes sam/ 'di ltar mi yi dbang pos nyid kyi sras po che ba bzang / /brtan pa'i ngang tshul
370b1('dul ba): rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'di ni spyugs/ /de ni bu dang chung mar bcas te nags mthar chags pa las/ /pho brang 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin tu snying rjes cho nges 'debs/ /de nas byang chub
370b2('dul ba): sems dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la ci rigs par mngon du song nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ slar dengs shig/ slar dengs shig/ 'di
370b3('dul ba): ltar/ shin tu yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi za bar 'bral ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur te/ gnyen gyi skye bo dang 'grogs pa ni/ lam kha'i ngal bso
370b4('dul ba): ba'i bsti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang med do/ /mdza' ba rnams dang bral bar 'gyur
370b5('dul ba): bsam nas/ /khyod kyis sa steng 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo brtan par gyis/ /de nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas
370b6('dul ba): bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu/ bdag ni/ khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyi/ khyod
370b7('dul ba): kyis shing rta mchog 'dis bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mchis par bgyi ba'i rigs so/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas/ tshig brlang pos bram ze de la smras pa/ e ma'o nags
371a1('dul ba): na'ang mi dbang sras la slong ba gang / /bram ze 'di ni shin tu brtse ba med pa'i blo/ /mi dbang sras po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa/ /'di la 'dir ni snying rje
371a2('dul ba): jig mi skye'am/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis bram ze ma spyo zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyags sbyin gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na/ /kun sbyin med
371a3('dul ba): par mi gang zhig gis sa steng byang chub 'thob/ /sbyin sogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog can gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog
371a4('dul ba): rtag tu 'thob/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bas yang rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/ bram ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa/ /shing rta rab
371a5('dul ba): tu byin pa 'di yis 'dir/ /bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i/ /zag med chos kyi shing rta che bskor shog /de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i
371a6('dul ba): mchog de yang bram ze la byin nas gzhon nu nag po phrag pa la khyer/ rgyags sbyin ma ni/ gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas dka' thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang / rim gyis dka'
371a7('dul ba): thub kyi nags su phyin to/ /de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub tshal der rang gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs blangs te gnas so/ /ji tsam na rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i
371b1('dul ba): phyir dka' thub kyi nags nas song ba dang / bram ze zhig thams cad sgrol gyi drang du 'ongs nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu/ khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis
371b2('dul ba): pas/ /spar shugs lhan cig 'khyams bgyid na/ /de yi don du bus pa gnyis/ /khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa'
371b3('dul ba): thams cad sgrol/ bu sdug pa gtong ba la chung zhig sems shing 'dug pa dang / de nas bram ze des/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon
371b4('dul ba): nu/ bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'o zhes thos na/ 'di ltar/ khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod/ khyod ni kun ster snying rje yi/ /bdag nyid can du sa steng
371b5('dul ba): grags/ /ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis/ bram ze de la smras pa/ kye
371b6('dul ba): bram ze chen po/ rang gi srog ni btang ba la'ang / /lan 'ga' dpyod pa ma myong na/ /rang gi bu ni btang ba la/ /bdag blo gzhan du gyur ci smos/ /bram ze chen po/ de lta mod kyi/ bdag
371b7('dul ba): gis nags su bskyed pa yi/ /bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na/ /ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/ /'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod/ /gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas/ /bus pa
372a1('dul ba): btang la bdag min zhes/ /kha cig bdag la 'phyar 'ong gi /bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs/ /de nas bram ze des/ thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal
372a2('dul ba): rigs gzhon nu/ rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa
372a3('dul ba): dang / mchod pa dang / bkur stis spos kyi glang po che lta bu/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / glo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod par byed pa/ skye bo bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mgon
372a4('dul ba): med pa dang / ltogs pa yongs su sdud pa/ thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong na don yod pa/ khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa'am/ lam gyis dub
372a5('dul ba): pa| 'bras bu med pa'am/ mthong ba don med pa'am/ re ba dang / yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bru 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ cha ma yin te/ khyod
372a6('dul ba): kyis/ med do/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo'i yid la re ba'i kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na/ myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs
372a7('dul ba): par byas nas gtang ba'i rigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu gter gos su gyon zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa/ /ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/ /grong khyer
372b1('dul ba): grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang / mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs pa'i gtong phod yod ma yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos nas/ bu
372b2('dul ba): la chags pa'i blong bas 'di dag sems par byed de/ gal te re zhig bu gnyis po/ /bram zer byin na bu dang ni/ /bral ba las byung sdug bsngal dag /bdag dang rgyags sbyin gyis thob
372b3('dul ba): 'gyur/ /'on kyang 'di la mi byin na/ /brtul zhugs las kyang nyams 'gyur zhing / /bram ze 'di ni tshi chad de/ /ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro/ nyis na bu bral nyam thag pa'i/ /mya ngan
372b4('dul ba): sa steng bdag gis blangs/ /de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa/ /zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis/ sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges
372b5('dul ba): par gtang bar chad nas smras pa/ kye kho bos/ dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyi/ /rgya mtsho chen pos so sor 'jigs byed pa/ /gting mi dpog par rab tu bying ba dag/
372b6('dul ba): pha rol brgal phyir lam gyi zam stegs bca'/ /zla ba dri med nya ba'i bzhin ras can/ /ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas/ /mchi ma rlan chus mig ni gang gyur pa'i/ /byis pa
372b7('dul ba): gnyis ni bram ze de la byin/ /yang smras pa/ bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas/ /des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya/ /
373a1('dul ba): bus pa gzhon nu dag byin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas sa g.yos pa de/ tshal de na gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams dngangs nas phan tshun
373a2('dul ba): smras pa/ sa ni mi bzad g.yos gyur pa/ /'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin/ /gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba/ /shin tu gsal bar shes par bya/ /de nas gnas 'jog dang rus gcig
373a3('dul ba): pa rgan po dka' thub can/ ltas shes pa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des/ drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa/ gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi nags na 'dug pa'i bu byis
373a4('dul ba): pa/ 'bras bu dang chu 'thung ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis/ thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir spangs te/
373a5('dul ba): des na/ sa g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas/ snying rje rje skad du du zhing thal mo gnyis sbyar nas thams cad
373a6('dul ba): sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yab cig yum ni ma mchis par/ /khyod ni bdag cag stsol bzhed pa/ /re zhig de ni mthong gyur nas/ /de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol/ /
373a7('dul ba): de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngom zum gnag cing / mchi ma 'dzag bzhin de gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa/ bu dag/ nga yi snying du mi sdug min//
373b1('dul ba): snying brtse snying rje med min te/ /'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /yon tan mthong nas btang ba yin/ /ci nas nga yis byang chub mchog /zhi ba rang gis thob nas ni/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho
373b2('dul ba): la gnas pa'i/ /rten med 'jig rten rnams bsgral lo/ /de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas/ pha'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te thal mo
373b3('dul ba): sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang / sma bab pa'i tshig gis dal bus smras pa/ gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na/ /ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi 'phrin/ /khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces/ /yab
373b4('dul ba): cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol/ /yab/ gzhan yang / byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la nongs pa bgyis pa gang / /gal te la lar thugs la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' smras pa'am/ /
373b5('dul ba): gus par mnyan pas yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa/ /de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags zhes bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ /de skad ces smras nas/ pha la phyag 'tshal te lan
373b6('dul ba): gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bla ma la smra bar yid la chags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo / /de nas byang chub sems
373b7('dul ba): dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong nas/ yid kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs so/ /byis
374a1('dul ba): pa gzhon nu dag dong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /lha stong phrag du ma yang bar snang la ca co dang /
374a2('dul ba): gzha'i sgra 'byin cing / e ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che/ /bus pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang / /gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa/ /de yi nges pa rmad gcig go /de nas rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba
374a3('dul ba): dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te bsti gnas logs su chas pa las/ sa che thang du g.yos pa des myur ba kho nar bsti gnas de nyid du song ba dang / lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma byang chub
374a4('dul ba): sems dpa' thams cad thar par bya bar brtson pa byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /snyam nas/ seng+ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag
374a5('dul ba): nas 'dug pa dang / rgyags sbyin mas ri dwags kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa/ ri dwags rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma/ /kho mo'i lam 'di bkag nas ci ste 'dug /ji ltar bdag ni
374a6('dul ba): mi 'phyo nges shes na/ /lam las zur te myur du 'gro bar gyis/ /gzhan yang / khyod kyang ri dwags rgyal po'i chung ma la/ /bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi/ /btsun mo yin pas chos
374a7('dul ba): kyi spun gyur gyi/ /ri dwags rgyal mos bdag gi lam phye zhig /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha seng ge'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo / /de nas
374b1('dul ba): rgyags sbyin mas bkra mi shis pa'i ltas dag mthong nas/ yud tsam zhig bsam pa/ ji ltar bar snang la dud mo'i sgra grags pa dang / ji ltar yang tshal na gnas pa'i lha rnams mya ngan byed pa'i
374b2('dul ba): sgra grags pa las na/ gdon mi za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to/ /snyam nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang / /ji ltar bya skad 'byin pa dang / /ji ltar bdag
374b3('dul ba): ni dogs pa las/ /bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges/ /ji ltar sa 'di g.yos pa las/ /bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang / /ji ltar lus kyang rmya ba las/ /bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges/ /zhes de lta
374b4('dul ba): bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas bsti gnas su zhugs te mi dga' bzhin bltas na/ bu de gnyis ma mthong nas/ de nas rmongs shing snying 'dar nas/ bsti
374b5('dul ba): gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/ phyogs 'di na ni/ gzhon nu nag po sring mo dang lhan cig ri dwags kyi phru gu dang rtag tu rtse rtse/ 'di ni/ de gnyis kyi sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin/
374b6('dul ba): 'di ni/ de gnyis kyi rtse mo'i cha byad yin na/ de gnyis ni/ mi snang na/ gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi /lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas nyal ltar srid dam snyam du de ltar snying la re
374b7('dul ba): zhing bu mthong bar 'dod pas/ rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim thab kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ rje'i sras/ khye'u dang
375a1('dul ba): bu mo gnyis gang du mchis/ thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig /re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur nas/ /bus pa de gnyis de la byin/ /de la
375a2('dul ba): rjes su yi rang rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyags sbyin ma ri dwags mo mda' dug can zhig gis phog pa bzhin du sa la 'gyel nas/ nya chu'i gnas nas byung ba bzhin du ni/
375a3('dul ba): 'gre ldog par byed/ krung krung bu stor ba bzhin du ni/ snying rje rje skad du ngu / ba be'u shi ba bzhin du ni/ 'ba'i sgra tshogs 'don cing smras pa/ pad+ma gzhon nu lta bu'i byad bzhin can/ /
375a4('dul ba): lag pa pad+ma'i 'dab ltar gzhon sha can/ /bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma myong ba/ /'gro ba gang du song nas sdug bsngal gyur/ /ri dwags bu ltar drang zhing ri dwags mig /ri dwags
375a5('dul ba): lhan cig bsti gnas dga' dga' na/ /de ring bdag gi bu gnyis ji lta bur/ /gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing sdug bsngal gyur/ /mig ni mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni/ /snying rjes du ba shin tu
375a6('dul ba): sdug bsngal ba/ /de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas/ /skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tsho/ /de gnyis bdag gi pang nas bskyed bskyed pa/ /zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za/ /bzod
375a7('dul ba): dang gnam pas bla ma brtag dka' ba/ /bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo/ de gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang / /rtsa lag rnams kyis gzu lum spangs pa las/ /skye bo sdig can ngan dang
375b1('dul ba): 'phrad gyur nas/ /bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo/ /skom zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs na/ /de gnyis yid dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bran du gyur pas gdon mi za
375b2('dul ba): bar ni/ /de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal yongs su gzir/ /bdag gis nges par tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/ /srog chags sdug pa brgya dang bral ba yi/ /sdig las shin tu mi bzad 'dir byas pa
375b3('dul ba): des na ba be'u med bzhin cho nges 'debs/ /bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang / /sems can kun la yid ni mnyam gyur pa/ /bden tshig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po/ /bran du gyur pa las
375b4('dul ba): ni thar phar shog / rgyags sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrings pa'i shing gang yin pa de dag lo ma thib be 'dug par mthong nas/ snying du sdug nas 'khyud de smras pa/ bus
375b5('dul ba): pas ril ba chung ngus chu bcus pa'i/ /lo ma rnams las thigs pa 'dzag pa yi/ /ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa bzhin/ /bus pa nu zho ma blud lta bur ngu / /yang bus pa gzhon nu de
375b6('dul ba): gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dwags kyi phru gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste/ snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis dal bus smras pa/ de yi ne'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang / /gnas su
375b7('dul ba): ma tshugs mtshon cing tshol byed pa/ /ri dwags phru gu rgyu ba 'di dag kyang / /bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no/ /de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam de rjes bcad
376a1('dul ba): dang / bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyi rjes drang por ma byung gi /gya gyus gang bar mthong nas lhags par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas smras pa/ ji ltar 'then
376a2('dul ba): pa'i rjes byung dang / /la lar myur du song ba las/ /brdegs te khrid par gdon mi za/ /kye ma bram ze brtse med mchog /mgul ni dbugs kyis brdzangs shing skad kyang 'dzer/ /ma mchu
376a3('dul ba): mdzes pa 'dar zhing bdag gi bu/ /ri dwags bzhin du mig kyang rig rig ste/ /rkang pa 'jam pos ji ltar song zhig gu/ de nas byang chub sems dpas de de ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag
376a4('dul ba): nyid de mthong nas/ mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grangs mang por go bar byas nas smras pa/ kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yis/ /btang ba ma yin sdang bas min/ /
376a5('dul ba): sems can kun la phan don du/ /gtang bar dka' ba'i bu de btang / /mchog tu gtang dka'i bdag nyid dang / /bu nor chung ma rnams btang nas/ /sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du/ /
376a6('dul ba): byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /rgyags sbyin bdag gis gtong ba la brtan gtang dka' ba'i/ /bus pa de gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang / /bdag dang chung ma bzhon dang nor
376a7('dul ba): yang btang byas te/ /kun la thams cad gtang ba'i blo gros nga la yod/ /de nas rgyags sbyin mas sems brtan te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyi/ /khyod blo
376b1('dul ba): gzhan du ma 'gyur zhig / gal te bdag kyang stsol bzhed na/ /dogs pa med par bdag stsol cig /gzhan yang / dpa' bo gang phyir nyid kyi phyir/ /sdug pas chags pa btang ba yi/ /
376b2('dul ba): don de myur du thob nas ni/ /srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dang rgyags sbyin ma brtson 'grus shin tu rmad du byung
376b3('dul ba): ba dang / shin tu bya dka' bar rigs nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te steng gi nam mkha' las bsti gnas der lhags nas snang ba rgya chen pos nags de gsal
376b4('dul ba): bar byas te/ nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa blo ngan gzhung gis bcings pa'i blo gros can/ /longs spyod la chags snying gi
376b5('dul ba): zhags pa bu yis bcings pa'i nang na yang / /khyab bdag khyod gcig chags pa med pas dga' ba bskyed pa'i bu gtong bas/ /nges par go 'phang bde dang zhi ba dri med rga ba med pa 'thob/ /de
376b6('dul ba): skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ 'di gcig pu g.yog dang bral na nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis rgyags sbyin ma bslang
376b7('dul ba): ngo| |snyam nas bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur te byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas/ yang byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ yan lag kun bzang khyim thab las/ /'phyo ba med cing snying nye ba/ /
377a1('dul ba): rigs na bsngags pa'i sring mo 'di/ /bdag la bran mo'i don du stsol/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas/ bram ze la smras pa/ ngo tsha med cing brkam pa
377a2('dul ba): khyod/ /'di na bram ze tha shal te/ /khyod lta 'phyon ma mi byed cing / /dam chos dga' ba nga 'dod dam/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol/ snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis
377a3('dul ba): rgyags sbyin ma la brtag par brtsams pa dang / de nas rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag ni bdag la g.yar ngan med/ /de bzhin bdag la lta ma lags/ /
377a4('dul ba): gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes/ /de ltar khyod slad g.yar ngan bgyid/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ go 'phang mi bzad mya ngan med pa tshol bdag
377a5('dul ba): la/ /sa steng 'dir ni rgyags sbyin mya ngan bya mi dgos/ /khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze 'di rjes 'brongs/ /bdag ni ri dwags 'chi ba bzhin du bsti gnas 'then/ /de skad ces smras
377a6('dul ba): pa dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rab tu dga' bas bsam pa dang / sbyin pa 'di ni nags tshal 'dir/ /bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin/ /rgyags sbyin 'di yang yongs btang nas/ /
377a7('dul ba): yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur/ /snyam du rig nas/ rgyags sbyin ma lag pa nas bzung ste bram ze de la smras pa/ bdag gi mchis brang sdug pa 'di/ /snying nas snying nye bsgo ba nyan/ /ya
377b1('dul ba): rabs tshul can snyan par smra/ /bram ze mchog khyod bzhes su gsol/ /de nas mche ba bzang po yi/ /chung ma byang chub 'dod phyir btang / /chu la gru ni ji lta bar/ /sa ni mtha' dag rnam drug
377b2('dul ba): g.yos/ /de nas rgyags sbyin ma bram ze'i dbang du gyur te/ khyod dang / bu dang / bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dbugs brdzangs pas sgra ngar ngar por 'gag bzhin 'di skad
377b3('dul ba): ces smras so/ /bdag gis tshe rabs snga ma la/ /ci 'dra ba yi las ngan byas/ /de nas ba be'u shi ba bzhin/ /skye bo med pa'i nags nang du/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i
377b4('dul ba): cha byad mi snang bar byas te rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ skal bzang bdag ni bram ze ma yin mi yang ma yin gyi/ /bdag ni lha yi dbang po brgya byin lha min
377b5('dul ba): 'joms byed de/ /khyod kyi 'dul ba mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yi/ /bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis/ /de nas de'i tshig gis rgyags sbyin ma yid bde ba
377b6('dul ba): skyes nas brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ spyan stong ldan pa bdag gi bu/ /bran gyur pa las thar mdzad cing / /mes po'i drung du phyin par yang / /sum cu rtsa gsum bdag pos mdzod/ /
377b7('dul ba): de skad ces smras nas/ yang dbang po chen po bsti gnas su zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste/ rgyags sbyin ma lag pa g.yon pa nas ba zung nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras
378a1('dul ba): pa| bdag gis khyod la rgyags sbyin 'di/ /g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par bya/ /khyod kyis su la'ang ma sbyin cig /bzhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur/ /de nas lha rnams kyi
378a2('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bram ze khye'u dang / bu mo khyer ba de/ ji ltar grong khyer gzhan zhig yin no/ /snyam nas grong khyer de nyid du song nas/ bus pa gzhon nu de dag btsong bar brtsams
378a3('dul ba): pa de lta bur rmongs par byas so/ /ji tsam na blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ khyod kyi dpon po nag po dang / /dra ba can dang de gnyis ni/ /bram ze shin tu ma rungs pas/ /
378a4('dul ba): grong khyer mchog 'dir 'tshong zhing mchis/ /de skad thos nas/ rgyal po de sems mi dga' nas smras pa/ gzhon nu gnyis myur du ston cig /blon po rnams kyis skad phyung ba dang / grong khyer ba
378a5('dul ba): rnams myur du rgyal po'i drung du nye bar lhags so/ /ji tsam na blon po gzhan zhig gis/ rgyal po'i drung du khrid pa dang / mi yi dbang po mngon phyogs khrid pa'i tsha bo gos med cing / /lus rbeg dri ma
378a6('dul ba): can gyi lus de de yis mthong nas ni/ /mod la seng ge'i khri las sa yi steng du lhung gyur te/ /pho brang 'khor mi blon tshogs bud med dag kyang du bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras
378a7('dul ba): pa| gang zhig nags na gnas na yang / /sbyin la mngon par dga' ba'i yid/ /mig bzang de ni myur du 'dir/ /chung ma dang bcas dgug par gyis/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
378b1('dul ba): gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /phyi zhig na rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shi ba dang bram ze dang / blon po dang / grong mi dang / yul mi rnams lhan cig tu
378b2('dul ba): bsti gnas der song nas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol ba btab ste rang gi grong khyer du bos nas rgyal por bcug go/ de nas rgyal po thams cad sgrol thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to/ /des
378b3('dul ba): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / gnyen gshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag sbyin nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
378b4('dul ba): byang chub don du gnyer ba yis/ /rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la'ang / /'jigs pa med par sbyin pa btang / /gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang / /rta dang
378b5('dul ba): nor bu'i rna rgyan dang / /de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la sbyin/ /chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bu dang bu mo yongs btang nas/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol
378b6('dul ba): tu| |mi yi dag pa thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza'
378b7('dul ba): bo dang / nye du dang / gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga
379a1('dul ba): nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba der gyur te/ nga nyid kyis de na dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye
379a2('dul ba): du dang / gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ nga'i sbyin pa'am/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des/ bla na
379a3('dul ba): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen
379a4('dul ba): tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas pa
379a5('dul ba): gang yin pa de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de 'byor pa
379a6('dul ba): dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / byed pa dang / chom rkun dang / nad rab tu
379a7('dul ba): zhi ba/ 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang phun sum tshogs pa ma bu gcig pa la byams pa bzhin du rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/
379b1('dul ba): des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las
379b2('dul ba): khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ dpung pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba zhig btsas te/ de'i nye du rnams
379b3('dul ba): 'dus nas/ khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /shes ldan dag /gzhon nu 'di ni/ rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen gyi bu yin pas/ gzhon nu thams cad sgrol zhes bya
379b4('dul ba): bar gdags so/ /zhes gzhon nu thams cad sgrol du ming btags nas/ ma ma brgyad la gtad de zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga rnams la byang bar gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /de gang ci
379b5('dul ba): slong ba thams cad slong ba po dag la sbyin par byed pas de'i ming thams cad gtong ba/ thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar grags so/ /khams kyi rgyal phran gyi bu mo rgyags sbyin ma zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de/
379b6('dul ba): de'i ched du bslangs nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ ji tsam na khye'u zhig btsas pa dang /
379b7('dul ba): de'i ming nag po zhes bya bar btags/ yang de dang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i ming dra ba can zhes bya bar btags so/ /rgyal po
380a1('dul ba): thams cad kyi bshes gnyen la glang po che'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mthus khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed do/ /des thams
380a2('dul ba): cad sgrol la smras pa/ bu/ bdag gis gang cung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed pa de dag thams cad kyang glang po che'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyi/ khyod thams
380a3('dul ba): cad gtong na yang glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan ni/ zhog cig /khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi mthus na bdag cag thams cad rgyal po thams cad bshes
380a4('dul ba): gnyen 'dis zil gyis mnan/ kha cig gis smras pa/ rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i mthus bdag cag 'dis
380a5('dul ba): zil gyis mnan to/ /de dag gis smras pa/ gang gis na glang po'i mchog de dgug pa'i thabs bzang po lta ci yod/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po thams cad bshes
380a6('dul ba): gnyen gyi bu thams cad sgrol zhes bgyi ba de/ mi sbyin pa'am/ mi gtong ba ci yang ma mchis te/ de ci slong pa de thams cad sbyin pas/ de'i ming thams cad gtong ba/ thams cad
380a7('dul ba): gtong ba zhes bya bar grags kyi/ bram ze dag cig mngags dang de rnams kyis bslangs na/ khugs par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis bram ze dag bkug nas smras pa/ bram ze dag /
380b1('dul ba): dengs la/ thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal na thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba las glang po'i mchog slongs shig /de dag mngags nas/ thams cad kyi grong rdal du dong ngo / /gzhon nu thams cad sgrol
380b2('dul ba): glang po'i mchog / me tog kun da dang / ku mu ta dang / khab dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po'i mdog lta bu mche ba drug pa/ bdun legs par gnas pa/ glang po ches srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro
380b3('dul ba): ba| rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/ mthong na bkra shis pa la zhon nas/ shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang / grogs po dang / g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing / zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis
380b4('dul ba): yongs su bskor ba bzhin/ grong khyer nas byung nas skyed mos tshal logs su song ngo / /de nas mngags pa de dag gis gzhon nu thams cad sgrol mngon du bsus nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs
380b5('dul ba): gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig / yang smras pa/ lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ /khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/ /khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni/ /bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'i
380b6('dul ba): rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i mchog de las babs nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bram ze de dag la glang po'i mchog de
380b7('dul ba): bstan nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng / /bram ze rnams la glang chen gtang / /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /blon po rnams
381a1('dul ba): kyis rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la smras pa/ lha/ khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis/ glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bgyi ba/ phyir rgol bas
381a2('dul ba): mngags pa la stsal to/ /rgyal pos thos nas shin tu khros/ 'khrugs te bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /dengs la/ thams cad sgrol khrid de shog cig /de rnams kyis khrid de 'ongs pa
381a3('dul ba): dang / rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen gyis/ thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ gzhon nu/ kho bos khyod la gang cung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'gong bar byed pa de thams cad ni/
381a4('dul ba): glang po'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyi/ khyod thams cad gtong na yang glang po'i mchog 'di zhog cig ces/ snga mo zhig tu ma bsgo'am/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis glang po'i mchog yongs su btang /
381a5('dul ba): des mnyan nas smras pa/ yab/ bslangs na ji ltar mi stsal/ ci/ ji snyed bslangs pa de thams cad de sbyin nam/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyim na gnas pa'i skyes bu yis/ /
381a6('dul ba): ci rigs par ni sbyin pa gtang / /'on te nags su song na ni/ /nges pa yin ni mchog bya'o/ /yab/ gal te sbyin pa dag gtang / bsod nams dag bgyir ma mchis na/ dka' thub kyi
381a7('dul ba): nags su brtan par bgyi'o/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin du gyis shig /byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyags sbyin ma/ bdag ni/ dka' thub kyi nags
381b1('dul ba): su gnas kyi/ khyod khyim na bag yod par gnas shig /des smras pa/ rje'i sras dang thabs cig dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par bgyi'o/ /rgyags sbyin ma/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/
381b2('dul ba): sbyin pa la dga' bas/ gal te khyod 'ga' zhig slong na/ byin par 'gyur ro/ /rje'i sras/ gal te khyod kyis btang na stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis dam bcas
381b3('dul ba): pa de dran par byos shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' pa'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa/ yab cig bdag gis sbyin slad glang chen btang / /nongs pa gang lags sa bdag
381b4('dul ba): bzod par gsol/ /bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchis lags kyi/ mi dbang khyod kyi phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur/ /de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i blong bas mchi mas brnangs nas smras pa/
381b5('dul ba): bu/ sbyin pa dang / dka' thub kyi nags kyi blo gros 'di zlog cig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ri dang bcas par yang / /gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yi/ /sa bdag bdag ni
381b6('dul ba): sbyin pa las/ /sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do/ /zhes smras nas song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta mchog gi nang du zhugs nas dka'
381b7('dul ba): thub kyi nags su chas so/ /de nas bram ze rig byed dang / rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis/ thams cad sgrol bsus nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur
382a1('dul ba): cig / khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/ thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/ /bram ze dag la shing rta 'di/ /khyod kyis sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces
382a2('dul ba): smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol shing rta'i mchog de las babs nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram ze dag la shing rta'i mchog de bstan nas
382a3('dul ba): smras pa/ ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng / /bram ze rnams la shing rta btang / /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta
382a4('dul ba): la zhon nas rgyags sbyin ma dang lhan cig song ba dang / de nas bram ze rig byed dang / rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol bsus nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu/
382a5('dul ba): khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/ /thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/ /bram ze rnams la rta 'di ni/ /khyod kyis sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces
382a6('dul ba): smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol rta de las babs nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram ze de rnams la rta de bstan nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag
382a7('dul ba): rab dga' bas dang / /bram ze rnams la rta btang ba/ /de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ /btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /de nas byang chub sems dpas ni/ nag po khrid /rgyags
382b1('dul ba): sbyin mas ni/ dra ba can khrid de rkang pas dong nas/ byang chub sems dpas gangs ri'i sul me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bsam
382b2('dul ba): gtan byed do/ /rgyags sbyin mas ni/ 'bras bus bsnyen bkur byed do/ /ri bor gzhan zhig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/
382b3('dul ba): dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ /dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ khye'u mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas pa/ ngan to re
382b4('dul ba): zhes sgra 'byin pas/ de'i ming ngan to re/ ngan to re zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ri bor gzhan zhig na/ bram ze rig byed bzhi shes pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de
382b5('dul ba): dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ ji tsam na bu mo gzugs bzang mo/ mdzes ma/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/ bsrings bskyed nas chen mor
382b6('dul ba): gyur pa dang / bram ze des/ bdag gi bu mo 'di byad gzugs sam/ rigs sam/ bzo'am/ nor gyi phyir ni/ su la'ang mi sbyin no/ /'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed bzhi klog pa zhig
382b7('dul ba): yod na/ bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes dam bcas so/ /de nas ngan to re gsang tshig don du gnyer zhing / gsang tshig tshol ba bram ze de'i gan du song ste phyin nas smras pa/ mkhan
383a1('dul ba): po'i zhabs la bdag bkur sti bgyid par 'tshal lags so/ /ci'i phyir/ rig byed bklag pa'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin du gyis shig /de de las rig byed bklag par brtsams
383a2('dul ba): pa las/ de yid gzhungs pa'i rang bzhin can zhig yin pas/ des ring po ma lon par rig byed rnam pa bzhi la byang bar gyur to/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ bdag gis dam bcas pa ni/ bdag
383a3('dul ba): gi bu mo 'di rigs sam zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ bram ze'i khye'u 'dis bdag las rig byed bzhi byang bar byas pa yin na/ mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/ gal te 'dis bu
383a4('dul ba): mo ma 'dod na ni/ legs so/ /snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ bdag gis bu mo 'di/ byad gzugs sam/ rigs sam/ bzo'am/ nor gyi phyir su la yang mi sbyin te/
383a5('dul ba): 'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed bzhi klog pa zhig yod na/ bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes dam bcas pa las/ bdag las khyod kyis rig byed bzhi byang bar byas pa las/ khyod
383a6('dul ba): la bu mo 'di chung mar sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig /blang bar bgyi'o/ /zhes des de la dpal gyi 'byor ba chen pos bag mar btang nas smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ chung ma
383a7('dul ba): khrid la rang gi khyim du song zhig / des chung ma de khrid de rang gi khyim du song ba dang / des de la smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bdag ni/ shin tu gzhon pas/ las bgyid rngo mi thogs kyi/ bdag la bkol
383b1('dul ba): ba stsol cig / des de la smras pa/ bzang mo/ kho bo la bkol ba ga la mchis/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ thams cad ces bgyi ba'i grong rdal na rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bgyi
383b2('dul ba): ba de'i sras thams cad sgrol zhes bgyi ba de/ gang cung zad ci slong ba de thams cad stsol gyi/ de la bdag gi bkol ba slongs shig /bzang mo/ gal te de lhan lhan cig tu 'dong ngo / /de nas ngan to
383b3('dul ba): re thams cad kyi grong rdal du phyin nas dris pa/ gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gang na/ de dag gis smras pa/ dka' thub kyi nags na gnas so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po zhe bdun pa/ de
383b4('dul ba): nas ngan to re chung ma dang lhan cig dka' thub kyi nags su song ba dang / de'i tshe rgyags sbyin ma me tog dang / 'bras bu'i phyir song ngo / /de nas bram ze ngan to re rgyags sbyin ma me tog dang / 'bras bu'i
383b5('dul ba): phyir song ba dang thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/ chu gter gos su gyon zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa/ /ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/ grong khyer grong rdal bcas
383b6('dul ba): pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang / mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs par gtong phod yod ma yin/ bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pas/ /sba shugs lhan cig 'khyams bgyid na/ /khyod kyis rjes su brtse
383b7('dul ba): bgyis ta/ /bdag la bkol ba stsal ba'i rigs/ /kho bo la bkol ba ga la yod/ de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na nag po dang / dra ba can rtse zhing 'dug pa dang / des smras pa/ bus pa gzhon nu 'o ni
384a1('dul ba): dag sbyin cig / de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bu sdug pa yongs su gtong ba la yud tsam zhig sems par gyur to/ /de nas bram ze des thams cad
384a2('dul ba): sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu/ kho bos khyod thams cad gtong ba'o/ /zhes thos nas de'i phyir kho bo khyod la slong na/ 'di la khyod kyis dpyad du ci zhig yod/ snying rje yi ni bdag nyid
384a3('dul ba): khyod/ /thams cad gtong bar sa steng grags/ /ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/ /khyod kyis sa steng bya ba'i rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bram ze de la 'di skad ces
384a4('dul ba): smras so/ /rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'ang / bdag gis res 'ga'ang ma dpyad na/ /rang gi bu ni gtang ba la/ /bdag blo gzhan 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /bram ze chen po/ de lta mod kyi/ bdag
384a5('dul ba): gis nags su bskyed bskyed pa'i/ /bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na/ /ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/ /'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod/ /gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas/ /bus pa
384a6('dul ba): btang la bdag min zhes/ /kha cig bdag la 'phyar 'ong gi/ /bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs/ /de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal rigs gzhon
384a7('dul ba): nu/ rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur stis
384b1('dul ba): spos kyi glang po che lta bu/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / glo bur dang / skye bo bla ma la mchod pa dang / bkren pa dang / mgon med pa dang / phongs pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa/ thams cad kyi re ba yongs
384b2('dul ba): su rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis/ bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa'am/ lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa'am/ mthong na don med pa'am/ re ba dang / yun ring po nas brnag
384b3('dul ba): pa'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ cha ma yin te/ khyod kyis med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na/ myur du ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/
384b4('dul ba): khyod kyis bdag gi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas te gtang ba'i rigs so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bram ze/ gal te de lta na yongs su gtang ngo / /bus pa gzhon nu dag btang ma thag tu/ stong
384b5('dul ba): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i bar chad byed par
384b6('dul ba): 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /snyam nas seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang / de nas rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/ ri dwags rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma/ /khyod ni ci ste lam
384b7('dul ba): bkag 'dug par byed/ /gal te bdag ni mi 'phyo bden zhe na/ lam las zur te myur du 'gro bar gyis/ khyod kyang ri dwags rgyal po'i chung ma la/ bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi/ /btsun
385a1('dul ba): mo yin pas chos kyi spun gyur gyi/ /ri dwags rgyal po'i chung mas bdag lam phye/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / ri dwags kyi rgyal mo de lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo / /
385a2('dul ba): de nas rgyags sbyin ma bsti gnas gang na pa der song ba dang nag po dang / dra ba can gang na yang ma mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bus pa gzhon nu
385a3('dul ba): gnyis gang na mchis/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig /re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur nas/ /bus pa de gnyis de la byin/ /de la rjes su yi rang rigs/ /de
385a4('dul ba): brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / de la chu mang pos btab nas brtas te smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bus pa gzhon nu dka' thub kyi nags nas bskrun pa bde ba'i bdag nyid can de dag /khyod kyis
385a5('dul ba): ci'i slad du yongs su spangs/ de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi lus las bla gos phud de rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ ci/ nga de gnyis la byams pa med snyam mam/ nga'i ba spu'i
385a6('dul ba): khung ba thams cad nas gas te khrag phyung ba la ltos/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas gal te 'ga'
385a7('dul ba): zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma bslangs te de la byin na/ g.yog byed pa med par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam nas/ bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi cha byad du sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i
385b1('dul ba): mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/ grogs po/ g.yog byin cig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag la g.yog ga la yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rgyags sbyin ma byin cig /byang chub sems dpas
385b2('dul ba): rgyags sbyin ma'i gdong du brtag par brtsams pa dang / rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa shes nas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ gal te khyod kyis bdag nyid btang na/ stsal du gsol/
385b3('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bram ze khyod la sbyin no/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas rang gi cha byad du 'dug nas smras pa/ drang
385b4('dul ba): srong / bdag gi rgyags sbyin ma 'di/ khyod la bcol gyi/ khyod kyis su la yang ma sbyin cig /rgyags sbyin mas brgya byin gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te smras pa/ ko'u shi ka/ ci nas
385b5('dul ba): kyang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis bran nyid du mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams
385b6('dul ba): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bus pa gzhon nu khyer ba'i bram ze ji ltar thams cad kyi grong rdal du 'tshong bar brtsams pa de ltar rmongs par byas so/ /de gnyis rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis mthong
385b7('dul ba): nas de rnams rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bus pa nag po dang dra ba can ni/ bram ze zhig tshong dus na 'tshong zhing mchis lags so/ /des bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /dengs la khrid de shog
386a1('dul ba): cig / de gnyis khrid de 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos srang la gzhal te mnyam du gser gyis blus so/ /rgyal po des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /gang zhig khye'u
386a2('dul ba): dang bu mo yangs su gtang bar byed pa de la gzhan yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba ci yod/ gzhon nu de khug cig dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug go/ blon po rnams kyis de
386a3('dul ba): dka' thub kyi gnas nas bkug ste/ de rgyal po'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag nas des grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi khang pa brtsigs nas lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag
386a4('dul ba): mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te/ des bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin gyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad
386a5('dul ba): de smras pa/ byang chub bsod nams don gnyer bas/ /dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang / /dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la'ang / /'jigs pa med par sbyin pa byin/ /gser dang dngul dang ba
386a6('dul ba): lang dang / /rta dang nor bu rgyan rnams dang / /de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran/ /tshul khrims ldan pa rnams la sbyin/ /chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas/ /'jig rten 'di
386a7('dul ba): dang pha rol tu/ /mi yi dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis bu dang chung ma yongs su btang ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/
386b1('dul ba): khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur te/ ngas de na bu dang chung ma yongs su btang ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ /ngas bu dang chung ma yongs su btang
386b2('dul ba): ba des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang sbyin pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen
386b3('dul ba): tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa
386b4('dul ba): de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/ de 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / zhes bya ba nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal
386b5('dul ba): srid byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ji tsam na ltas mkhan dag gis wA ra NA sir lo bcu gnyis su char pa mi 'bab bo/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis rang gi yul du dril
386b6('dul ba): sgrog tu bcug pa/ de'i yul na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer ba dag nyon cig /ltas mkhan dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan gyi/ khyed cag las gang dag la lo bcu gnyis su
386b7('dul ba): bza' ba dang btung ba yod pa de rnams ni/ 'dug cig /gzhan rnams ni/ bza' ba dang btung ba mod pa'i yul du dengs shig /lo legs par gyur pa dang slar yang shog cig /de'i tshe wA ra NA si'i
387a1('dul ba): grong khyer na khyim bdag 'dum byed ces bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam
387a2('dul ba): thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /des mngan bkug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje/ bang ba na bdag 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas pa lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub pa yod dam/ 'on te med/
387a3('dul ba): des smras pa/ jo bo/ mchis so/ /de nas khyim bdag 'dum byed 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ 'dug go/ skye bo'i tshogs gzhan ni/ bza' ba dang btung ba mod pa'i yul du dong ngo / /sangs rgyas
387a4('dul ba): 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/ bas mtha'i gnas mal dag la dga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur
387a5('dul ba): bas/ ji tsam na wA ra NA si de'i phyogs gcig tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas so/ /phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya'o/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po dag snga dro sham thabs
387a6('dul ba): bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te khyim bdag 'dum byed ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / khyim bdag 'dum byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag /khyod kyis rab tu byung ba lnga

387b3('dul ba): bar nus sam zhes bslangs pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /khyed cag la g.yar gyis blangs lags na/ yang bslang ci 'tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ de dag kyang

387b7('dul ba): tshod brjod pa dag kyang bskos te/ des nyi ma re re zhig rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug go /mu ge de yang lo bstud ma kho nar bar ye ma chad nas/ de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs
388a1('dul ba): rgyas rnams la zhus pa/ 'phags pa dag /lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur ram/ char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis sa bon stsal tam/ thob cig /de dag gis sa
388a2('dul ba): bon btab bo/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni/ 'og tu 'jug pa yin gyi/ des bsam pa/ 'jig rten na yon gnas gang ji snyed pa de rnams kyi mchog ni/ rang sangs

388a4('dul ba): gyis dbang po chen po'i char phab pa dang / lo tog de rnams ku bar skyes so/ /de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la zhus pa/ 'phags pa dag/ bdag cag gi lo tog

388a7('dul ba): ji tsam na de rnams smin nas gas pa dang / gang gis sa bon ji lta bu btab pa de de'i kho na lta bu sha stag gis gang bar gyur to/ /de nas mu ge rgyun chad nas lo legs par gyur nas yul phyogs
388b1('dul ba): sna tshogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / srog chags gang dag mu ges 'jigs skrag nas dong ba rnams kyang yul wA ra NA sir 'ongs so/ /de nas mu ge rgyun chad de lo legs par gyur nas/

388b3('dul ba): pa/ blo ldan mkhas pas nor dang ni/ /dad pa shes rab rnyed nas ni/ /skyes bu de yis rtag par yang / /'dod chags bral la yon dbul lo/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing

388b6('dul ba): bsod snyoms sbyar cing / de'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyim bdag 'dum

389a1('dul ba): chen po/ nga'i sbyin pa'am/ sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang

389a3('dul ba): sreg ne tso dang / /ston mo rus sbal sde bzang dang / /ded dpon tshogs su bsdus pa yin/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir
389a4('dul ba): sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun pa rab tu mang po dag cig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te rgya mtsho
389a5('dul ba): chen por 'jug par 'dod nas/ de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste gcig la gcig phan thogs par mngon pa med kyi/
389a6('dul ba): ma la bdag cag nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa/ rkyal gyi cha spyad dag khyer te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o/ /zhes de ltar chad bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs
389a7('dul ba): pa na dgos pa/ rkyal gyi cha byad/ kha cig gis ni/ shing shal ma la'i spang leb/ kha cig gis ni/ ras sgye nang tshangs can/ kha cig gis ni ku ba brgyus pa/ kha cig gis ni/ ra rkyal khyer te rgya
389b1('dul ba): mtsho chen por zhugs so/ /de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang chu srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bshig go /gru bo che ba shig pa dang de rnams rkyal pa re re la zhon te chu ji lta ba bzhin du
389b2('dul ba): khyer te dong ba las/ de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rlung byang phyogs nas langs te/ des lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang / de na bud med gzugs bzang mo/ mdzes ma/ blta na
389b3('dul ba): sdug pa dag yod de/ de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /jo bo dag /tshur spyon/ bzhin bzang dag /tshur spyon/ bdag cag jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang / khyim thab ma mchis pa rnams kyi
389b4('dul ba): khyim thab dang / gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas dang / gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi gling dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang / skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / rten ma
389b5('dul ba): mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig / 'di dag ni khyed kyi zas kyi khang pa dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / gnas mal gyi khang pa dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang /
389b6('dul ba): dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang / 'dzam bu gling gi rin po che rab tu mang bo 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru
389b7('dul ba): dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba dag lags kyi/ khyed tshur spyon/ bdag cag dang lhan cig tu rtsed mo bgyi/ dga' bar
390a1('dul ba): bgyi/ dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o/ /khyed cag la su yang smos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du ma bzhud cig /de dag bud med de rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
390a2('dul ba): byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de dag de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so/ /de nas tshong pa mkhas
390a3('dul ba): pa'i rang bzhin can zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir bud med de dag gis lho phyogs kyi lam lhag par srung bar sems/ ma la bdag gis bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de mal du gnyid
390a4('dul ba): log par rig nas/ bags kyis dal bu dal bus mal nas babs la lho phyogs kyi lam du 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ de de ltar nges par byas nas bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de gnyid kyis log
390a5('dul ba): par rig nas/ bags kyis dal bu dal bus mal nas babs te ral gri rnon po mchan du thogs nas lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang / de de na skye bo'i tshogs chen po smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra/
390a6('dul ba): kyi hud ma/ kyi hud pha/ kyi hud sring mo/ kyi hud spun/ kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling bkra bas spangs sam/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na re skyid ces sgra 'byin pa dag thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'jigs
390a7('dul ba): par gyur/ rmongs par gyur/ skyi bung zhes byed par gyur to/ /de nas tshong ba mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can des/ 'jigs pa dang / skyi bung zhes byed pa de shin tu legs par bsal nas lho phyogs
390b1('dul ba): kyi lam de kho na'i rjes su song ba dang / des de na lcags kyi mkhar chen po mtho zhing rgya che ba zhig mthong nas/ des grong khyer de'i mtha' kho ra khor yul tu bskor na/ ci nas kyang sgo cung zad cig rnyed
390b2('dul ba): grang snyam nas/ des grong khyer de'i mtha' kho ra khor yug tu bskor ba dang / chung du na byi la'am sprul 'dzul pa'i sgo tsam yang ma rnyed do/ /de na shing shi ri sha zhes bya ba spom la ring ba zhig mthong nas/
390b3('dul ba): de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can des/ shing shi ri sha de la pags kyis de dal bu dal bus 'dzegs nas skye bo'i tshogs chen la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag /ci'i phyir kyi hud ma/ kyi hud pha/
390b4('dul ba): kyi hud sring mo/ kyi hud spun/ kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling bkra bas spangs sam/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na re skyid ces shin tu smre sngags 'don/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje/ bdag cag 'dzam
390b5('dul ba): bu'i gling gi don 'thun nor tshol ba rab tu mang po dag cig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'dod pa las/ bdag cag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag /bdag cag
390b6('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gcig la gcig phan 'dogs par mngon pa med kyi/ ma la bdag cag nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa/ rkyal gyi cha byad dag khyer te rgya
390b7('dul ba): mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o/ /zhes de ltar chad bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rkyal gyi cha byad/ kha cig gis ni/ shing shal ma la'i spang leb/ kha cig gis
391a1('dul ba): ni| ras sgye nang tshangs can/ kha cig gis ni/ ku ba brgyus pa/ kha cig gis ni/ ra rkyal khyer te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/ /bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa
391a2('dul ba): dang chu srin nya'i rigs kyis gru po che bshig go / gru bo che bshig nas bdag cag rkyal pa re re la zhon te chu ji lta ba bzhin khyer te dong ba las/ bdag cag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i
391a3('dul ba): rlung byang phyogs nas langs te/ des bdag cag lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang / de na bud med gzugs bzang mo/ mdzes ma/ blta na sdug pa dag yod de/ de dag gis 'di skad ces smras
391a4('dul ba): so| |jo bo dag tshur spyon/ bzhin bzang dag tshur spyon/ bdag cag jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang / khyim thab ma mchis pa rnams kyi khyim thab dang / gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas
391a5('dul ba): dang / gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi gling dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang / skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / rten ma mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig /'di dag ni
391a6('dul ba): khyed kyi zas kyi khang pa dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / gnas mal gyi khang pa dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang / dga' bar 'gyur
391a7('dul ba): ba'i rdzing dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po
391b1('dul ba): dang / sbug dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba dag lags kyi/ khyed tshur spyon/ bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi/ dga' bar bgyi/ dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o/ /khyed
391b2('dul ba): cag las su yang smyos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du ma bzhud cig / bdag cag bud med de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ bdag cag de dag dang
391b3('dul ba): lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ khye'u dang bu mo dag btsas te/ ji srid 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun gzhan rnams kyi rgya mtsho'i gru bo che zhig go/ zhes
391b4('dul ba): ma thos pa de srid du bud med de dag dang bdag cag lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ gang gi tshe bud med rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu
391b5('dul ba): mang po gzhan dag kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang / chu srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bshig go /zhes thos nas/ de nas bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs te kha cig ni/ zos so/ /
391b6('dul ba): skyes pa za bar byed pa na lhag rol skra'am/ spu'am/ sen mo'am/ so lus pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par za bar byed do/ /de rnams za bar byed pa na khrag dron po'i thigs pa sa la lhung ba
391b7('dul ba): gang dag yod na yang de dag kyang sor mo'i rtse mo rnams kyis brud de sa dang bcas par khar 'jug par byed do/ /bdag cag kha cig ni/ lcags kyi mkhar 'dir bcug go/ /kye nang rje/ 'di dag ni/ mi'i
392a1('dul ba): bud med ma yin te/ srin mo yin gyi 'di dag las bdag nyid srung shig /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ skye bo'i tshogs chen
392a2('dul ba): po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gis na/ khyed cag dang / bdag cag legs pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs 'ga' ci yod/ de rnams kyis 'di skad ces
392a3('dul ba): smras so/ /kye nang rje/ re zhig bdag cag gang gis na/ legs pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs ni/ cung zad kyang kho bo cag la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal
392a4('dul ba): te bdag cag gis 'di snyam du/ kye ma bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di las brgal te 'bros so/ /snyam du bsam na/ de'i nyis 'gyur ram/ de'i sum 'gyur gyis mthon por 'gyur ro/ /gal
392a5('dul ba): te bdag cag gis 'di snyam du/ kye ma bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di las brgal te 'bros so/ /snyam du bsam na/ de'i nyis 'gyur ram/ de'i sum 'gyur gyis zheng du skye bar 'gyur te/ de
392a6('dul ba): ltar re zhig bdag cag legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs bdag cag la med do/ /'on kyang gang gis na/ khyed cag ni/ slar legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling
392a7('dul ba): du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod de/ 'di na bdag cag gi bar snang la rgyu ba'i lha rnams/ kye ma 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rnams gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la/ byang phyogs kyi gseb lam
392b1('dul ba): gang na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu za ba/ bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams tshim pa/ mgo 'phang bstod de pha rol tu 'gro ba ni/
392b2('dul ba): su yod/ su ni/ pha rol du bkri/ su ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling du legs pa dang bde bar phyin par bya zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yod par mi 'gro ba ni/ byis pa'o/ /zhes sgra 'byin pa thos kyi/
392b3('dul ba): khyed de'i drung du dengs la 'di skad ces/ bdag cag pha rol tu mchi'o/ /bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol du bkri zhing legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du
392b4('dul ba): gsol zhes smros shig / de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po des smras pa shin tu legs par bzung ste chub par byas nas/ bags kyis dal bu dal bus shing
