392b5('dul ba): shi ri sha las babs nas g.yas phyogs kyi lam de nyid du song ste bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de/ mal na gnyid kyis log par rig nas/ bags kyis dal bu dal bus nyal lo/ /de nas tshong pa
392b6('dul ba): mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / nang par sngar langs nas 'dzam bu gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi don
392b7('dul ba): mthun rab tu mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dang / re zhig gang na skyed mos tshal dben pa yod pa zhig tu shog cig dang / kho bos khyed cag dang lhan cig gsang ste gleng dgos
393a1('dul ba): pa cung zhig yod kyi/ khyed su yang smyos kyang khye'u'am bu mo ni/ khrid de ma 'ongs shig /shes ldan dag/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang
393a2('dul ba): po rnams kyis mnyan to/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don mthun rab tu mang po rnams skyed mos tshal rab tu dben pa gang na ba der dong pa dang / de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis skye
393a3('dul ba): bo'i tshogs chen po de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed gleng pa de dag / 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po rnams la rgyas par smras nas 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ 'di dag ni/ bud
393a4('dul ba): med ma yin te/ 'di dag srin mo yin gyi/ shes ldan dag /'di las bdag nyid srung bar gyis shig /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po rnams de bzhin du gso sbyong bco lnga pa
393a5('dul ba): nyid la byang phyogs gseb lam gang na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu za ba/ bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams tshim pa/
393a6('dul ba): mgo 'phang bstod de pha rol tu 'gro ba ni/ su zhig yod/ su ni/ pha rol tu bkri/ su ni/ legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yod par song ba
393a7('dul ba): dang / tshong pa rta rdzi'i rigs shig gis rta'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi shugs can rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
393b1('dul ba): shes ldan dag /rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can ni/ pha bi yin te/ pha bi'i drung du dong la 'di skad ces/ bdag cag pha rol tu mchi'o/ /bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol tu
393b2('dul ba): bkri zhing / bdag cag legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smra'o/ /de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis don 'thun rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras
393b3('dul ba): so| |shes ldan dag/ bdag gis ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs chen po des smras pa'i don go ba ltar na/ 'di ni/ bdag cag gis rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can de'i drung du dong nas 'di skad ces/ bdag
393b4('dul ba): cag pha rol du mchi'o/ /bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol tu bkri zhing / bdag cag legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smra ba'i dus la bab pa
393b5('dul ba): ma yin no/ /'on kyang gang gi tshe rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu zos nas zhes bya ba nas 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de
393b6('dul ba): ni/ bdag cag rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi drung du dong la 'di skad ces/ bdag cag pha rol tu mchi'o/ /bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol tu bkri zhing / bdag cag legs pa dang bde
393b7('dul ba): bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes de skad du smra ba'i dus la bab pa yin no/ /de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu zos nas zhes bya ba nas su ni/
394a1('dul ba): legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
394a2('dul ba): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te rta'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi shugs can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag
394a3('dul ba): cag pha rol tu mchi'o/ /bdag cag pha rol tu mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol tu bkri zhing / bdag cag legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi
394a4('dul ba): shugs can gyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po la legs par rab tu gtams shing rjes su bstan pa/ shes ldan dag /bud med de dag lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par mdzes
394a5('dul ba): pa/ lhag par blta na sdug par byas na khye'u dang / bu mo rnams khrid de 'ongs shing / de rnams 'di skad ces/ jo bo dag tshur spyon/ bzhin bzang dag tshur spyon zhes bya ba nas bdag cag dang lhan
394a6('dul ba): cig rtse bar bgyi/ dga' bar bgyi/ dga' mgur spyod bar bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /'on te khyed cag la 'ga' zhig gis cung zad smras te bdag cag mi dgos na/ rang rang gi bu
394a7('dul ba): dag khrid de dengs shig ces zer ba de la/ khyed cag las gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gi chung ma'am/ bu pho'am/ bo mo'am/ bdag gi zas kyi khang pa'am/ skom gyi khang pa'am/ gos kyi khang
394b1('dul ba): pa'am/ gnas mal gyi khang pa'am/ dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba'am/ dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing ngam/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai
394b2('dul ba): DUr+ya dang zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sems phan chad/ de dag kho bo'i rgyab bam/ ro stod la zhon yang shing tog gi 'bras bu smin pa rtsa ba chad pa bzhin du ltung
394b3('dul ba): bar 'gyur zhing / bud med de rnams 'ongs nas za bar 'gyur te/ de dag skyes pa za bar byed pa na/ khrag dron po'i thigs pa sa la ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sor mo'i rtse mos sa dang bcas te brud nas
394b4('dul ba): khar 'jug go/ khyed cag las gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag gi chung ma'am/ bu'am/ bu mo'am zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du mi sems na/ de rnams kho bo'i
394b5('dul ba): spu'i rtse mo bye ba'i cha la brten kyang lhung bar mi 'gyur te/ de dag legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa rab
394b6('dul ba): tu mang po la legs par rab tu gtams shing rjes su bstan nas rgyab smad do/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa rab tu mang pos rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la/ kha cig ni/ ro stod du/ kha cig ni/ rgyab
394b7('dul ba): tu/ kha cig ni/ gnya' bar ro/ /kha cig ni/ mjug ma la 'jus so/ /de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed nas
395a1('dul ba): de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' la song ba dang / de nas bud med lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par blta na sdug pa rnams kyis khye'u dang bu mo rnams khrid de
395a2('dul ba): lhags nas 'di skad ces/ jo bo dag tshur spyon/ bzhin bzang dag tshur spyon zhes bya ba nas bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi/ dga' bar bgyi/ dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong
395a3('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o/ /'on te khyed cag la 'ga' zhig cung zad smras te kho mo cag mi dgos na/ rang rang gi khye'u dang bu mo rnams khrid de dengs shig ces smra ba de la gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag gi chung ma'am/ bu
395a4('dul ba): pho'am/ bu mo'am/ bdag gi zas kyi khang pa'am zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sems bskyed pa de dag ni/ rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi ro stod dang rgyab tu
395a5('dul ba): zhon yang / shing tog gi 'bras bu smin pa rtsa ba chad pa bzhin du de nas slar lhung bar gyur ba dang / bud med de rnams de dag gi drung du dong ste phyin nas za bar byed de/ skyes pa rnams za bar byed pa na/ lhag ma lus
395a6('dul ba): pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ skra'am zhes bya ba nas sa dang 'dren mar brud de khar 'jug par byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag gi chung ma'am/ bdag gi bu pho'am
395a7('dul ba): bdag gi bu mo'am/ zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de ltar mi sems pa rnams ni/ 'di ltar/ rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi spu'i rtse mo'i cha shas la 'jus pa
395b1('dul ba): yang / legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag ni/ mig yin no/ /mig ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ rna ba dang / sna dang /
395b2('dul ba): lce dang / lus dang / yid yin no/ /yid ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ gzugs yin no/ /gzugs ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / bdag ni/ chos yin no/ /
395b3('dul ba): chos ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ sa'i khams yin no/ /sa'i khams ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / bdag
395b4('dul ba): ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ gzugs kyi phung po yin no/ /gzugs kyi phung po ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /bdag ni/ tshor ba dang /
395b5('dul ba): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / bdag ni/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po yin no/ /rnam par shes pa ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /snyam du sems na/ de rnams sdug bsngal 'thob par 'gyur te/ srin mo'i nang du tshong
395b6('dul ba): pa bzhin/ rgyal po chen po/ gang dag 'di snyam du/ bdag ni/ mig yin no/ /mig gi ni/ bdag gi yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni bdag gi yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
395b7('dul ba): du ste/ de ltar mi sems na/ de rnams bde ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ sprin gyi shugs kyis tshong pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas bstan la blun po'i mi/ /gang dag dad par mi byed pa/ /de rnams sdug bsngal 'thob
396a1('dul ba): 'gyur te/ /srin po'i nang du tshong pa bzhin/ /shes rab can gyi mi gang dag/ sangs rgyas bstan la dad byed pa/ /bde bar pha rol 'gro 'gyur te/ /sprin gyi shugs
396a2('dul ba): kyis tshong pa bzhin/ /rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can du gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang
396a3('dul ba): nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe ngas sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
396a4('dul ba): pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs
396a5('dul ba): tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rjes su bzung bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal
396a6('dul ba): po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ /yul wA ra NA si dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can/ sems can la byams pa zhig gnas so/ /de'i bsti gnas dang ha cang
396a7('dul ba): yang mi ring ba zhig na/ khyim bdag zhing pa gnyis shig zhing rmed pa las/ de gnyis phan tshun rtsod pa byung bar gyur te/ de na gcig khros pa dang gcig shos kyang slar khros so/ /gcig gis brgyab pa
396b1('dul ba): dang gcig shos kyis kyang slar brgyab bo/ /de gnyis ka yang drang srong gi drung du dong nas/ drang srong de la gcig gis dbang btsugs pa dang / gcig shos kyis kyang btsugs so/ /de gnyis rgyal
396b2('dul ba): po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos de gnyis la smras pa/ khyed gnyis la dpang su yod/ gcig gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag gi dpang drang srong lags so/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag gi dpang yang
396b3('dul ba): de kho na lags so/ /de nas rgyal pos drang srong bos te dris pa/ drang srong chen po/ 'di gnyis sngar gang gis nyes/ drang srong gis smras pa/ lha/ gal te 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bka' khrims kyis zhal
396b4('dul ba): che bcad na/ de lta na bdag gis dbang bgyi'o/ /gzhan du ni ma lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas drang srong gis smras pa/ lha/ gcig khros pa dang gcig bshos kyang slar khros
396b5('dul ba): so/ /gcig gis brgyab pa dang gcig shos kyis kyang slar brgyab bo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'o na gnyis ka chad pas gcad do/ /drang srong gis smras pa/ lha/ khyod la bdag gis sngar lha gal te 'khor
396b6('dul ba): los bsgyur ba'i bka' khrims kyis zhal che bcad na/ de lta na bdag gis dbang bgyi'o/ /gzhan du ni ma lags so/ /zhes ma gsol tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
396b7('dul ba): zhal che ji ltar gcod/ drang srong gis smras pa/ lha/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ gnod pa las zlog cing / phan pa la sbyor bar bgyid do/ /de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gnyis ka dengs la da
397a1('dul ba): phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig / rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ drang srong du gyur pa gang gis chos bzhin gyis dbang byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar
397a2('dul ba): mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na zhes bya ba nas nga nyid kyis chos bzhin gyis dbang de byas so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas chos bzhin gyis dbang byas
397a3('dul ba): ba des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs so/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas chos bzhin gyis dpang byas pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
397a4('dul ba): pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i
397a5('dul ba): phyir ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na rang gi srog yongs su btang nas sems can mang po rjes su bzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ nags tshang tshing zhig na seng
397a6('dul ba): ge ral pa can zhig gnas so/ /lam de nas don 'thun lnga brgya tsam dong nas de dag gi ca co'i sgras dus bskul bas/ sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhes bya ba zhig glo bur du langs nas/ des don 'thun
397a7('dul ba): tshong dpon dang bcas pa bskor ba dang / de rnams skrag nas sgra 'byin cing / zhi ba dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa lha rnams la gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas seng ges
397b1('dul ba): sgra de thos so/ /thos nas kyang phyogs der 'ongs pa dang / ji tsam na sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhas bya bas/ don 'thun lnga brgya tsam bskor ba mthong ngo / /de dang ha yang mi ring ba zhig na/ glang po'i
397b2('dul ba): phru gu zhig kyang rgyu zhing 'dug pa dang / de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ grogs po/ sbrul chen po zhags pa lta bu zhes bya bas don mthun lnga brgya bskor na/ de rnams kyi don gyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su
397b3('dul ba): gtang bar khyod spro'am/ ji lta bu zhig bya/ bdag gi rkang pa khyod kyi klad par bzhag la thal mo sbrul chen po la bsnun pa dang / bdag gi rkang pa brtan pa'i shugs kyis ni/ khyod 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /
397b4('dul ba): thal lcag gis ni/ sbrul lo/ /sbrul chen po'i kha chus reg pas ni/ bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /glang po che'i phru gus/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes khas blangs nas/ seng ges glang po che'i phru gu'i
397b5('dul ba): steng du rkang pa bzhag nas thal mos sbrul chen po la bsnun pa dang / seng ges rkang pa brtan pa'i shugs kyis ni glang po che'i phru gu shi /thal mos kyang sbrul chen po shi /sbrul chen po'i kha chus kyang ri dwags
397b6('dul ba): kyi rgyal po seng ge shi ste/ 'gro ba gsum char yang ngo / /don 'thun gyi tshogs chas pa dang lha zhig gis smras pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpas khyed kyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su btang nas
397b7('dul ba): skyabs byas kyi/ re zhig de'i lus la mchod pa byos la phyir dengs shig/ de nas de rnams kyis de'i rus pa bsregs te rus pa la mchod pa byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ri dwags kyi
398a1('dul ba): rgyal po seng ge zhes bya ba nas ngas don 'thun lnga brgya po de dag sbrul chen po las rang gi srog btang nas thar par byas so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po/
398a2('dul ba): ngas sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ zhes bya ba nas ngas sems can rnams rjes
398a3('dul ba): su bzung ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang /
398a4('dul ba): ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir gsod pa la yang byams pa bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ nags khrod cig
398a5('dul ba): na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa/ bya mgo gnyis la sems tha dad pa zhig tu gyur to/ /de la/ gcig ni/ chos can zhes bya'o/ /gcig shos ni/ chos min zhes bya'o/ /
398a6('dul ba): ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ chos can gyis bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu zhig zos so/ /chos min gyis ni/ dug gi 'bras bu zhig zos pa las/ gnyis ka yang dug gi mthus kun tu myos par gyur nas phan
398a7('dul ba): tshun rtsod par brtsams pa dang / gcig gis log par smon lam btab pa/ khyod kyi skye ba gang dang gang du skyes pa'i skye ba de dang der gsod pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bor gyur cig ces
398b1('dul ba): byas so/ /gcig shos kyis kyang smras pa/ bdag ni/ khyod la thams cad du byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems su gyur cig ces byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de
398b2('dul ba): ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos can gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /chos min gang yin pa de ni/ lhas sbyin yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ nga'i byams pa'i sems des bla na med pa
398b3('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i byams pa'i sems de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang /
398b4('dul ba): tshogs tsam yin no// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po zhe brgyad pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can gyi
398b5('dul ba): skyabs byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ chu gling zhig gi 'gram na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na/ chu sreg rnams kyi nang du skyes nas chu sreg
398b6('dul ba): lnga brgya'i dpon du gyur to/ /ji tsam na chu sreg rgan po zhig /chu sreg de rnams kyi sgo nga dang / phru gu rnams thabs kyis sngar zos nas/ dal bu dal bus 'chag cing / res 'ga' bya ba med pa na rkang pa
398b7('dul ba): gcig bskums nas 'dug go / de nas chu sreg de rnams bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas dpon po'i drung du song ste/ ris mthun pa'i skad gnyug mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang /
399a1('dul ba): de nas dpon pos rang gi khyu rnams de ltar sdug bsngal bar mthong nas chu gling kun nas byul bar brtsams pa dang / chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ lus kyis
399a2('dul ba): rnam par ltung bar 'gyur gyi/ sems kyis ni/ ma yin pas/ des chu sreg rgan pa de dal bu dal bus 'chag cing / phyogs gcig tu song nas rkang pa gcig btsugs te gnas pa mthong nas/ byang chub
399a3('dul ba): sems dpas 'phrigs pa/ 'di ni/ rang gi rigs kyi phyir rgol ba/ rang bzhin ngan pa yin no/ /snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi sgo nga phru gu dang / /rus chags rnams kyang zos
399a4('dul ba): nas ni/ /rkang pa gcig btsugs 'dug pa de/ /kye ma khyod kyi brtul zhugs yin/ /kha cig smra ba yang bden te/ /gom pa dal bus 'dor byed cing / /dal bu dal bus smra ba dang / /gnya' ba gyur gyur byed
399a5('dul ba): pa ni/ /de ni ngan g.yo'i mtshan nyid yin/ /des bsam pa/ dpon po 'dis ni/ bdag gi rgyus shes so/ /snyam du rig nas de nyid la skyabs su song ngo / /de nas dpon pos smras pa/ khu gu/ nam
399a6('dul ba): chu sreg gi tshogs rnams 'khrugs par ma gyur pa de'i bar du khyod kyi sems bde bar gyis shig / de nas chu sreg rgan po de bros nas chu sreg de rnams bde bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe
399a7('dul ba): de'i dus na chu sreg gi dpon por gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chu sreg gi dpon po der gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sems
399b1('dul ba): can rjes su bzung ba des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
399b2('dul ba): pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rjes su bzung
399b3('dul ba): bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ nags tshang tshing zhig na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na/ ne tso mi skad smra ba zhig tu gyur to/ /de'i tshe wA
399b4('dul ba): ra NA sir rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de/ chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /de nas ne tso nyin re zhing rgyal po de'i khang pa'i pu shu'i steng na yib cing / rgyal po chen po/ chos ma yin
399b5('dul ba): pas rgyal srid ma mdzad cig ces smra'o/ /rgyal po de de dang lhan cig gcugs par gyur pa dang / de nas des rgyal po de dka' thub kyi gnas lnga la rab tu bzhag nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed pa la zhugs
399b6('dul ba): nas/ de ri dwags dang / bya thams cad la mi 'jigs pa byin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ne tsor gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i
399b7('dul ba): dus na/ ne tso mi skad smra ba de yin par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta
400a1('dul ba): ste| 'on kyang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po
400a2('dul ba): chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir gsod pa la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung
400a3('dul ba): ba/ yul ka shi zhes bya ba na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed de/ de rtag tu lus 'phags kyi yul 'dod pa kho na'i phyir lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang mi mthun par gyur to/ /lus
400a4('dul ba): 'phags kyi rgyal po de ni/ de bas khyad zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan yang yul de mi 'dod pas/ rtag tu de la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / snying brtse bas gnas so/ /'on kyang de
400a5('dul ba): sred pas 'khol bas yul de kho na 'dod pa'i phyir de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir chas so/ /de nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos
400a6('dul ba): thos nas/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi lam bstar du bcug ste/ grong khyer de thams cad rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo bsal nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni/ bsgrengs/ dar gyi chun 'phyang
400a7('dul ba): mang pos ni/ dpyangs/ dri zhim po'i pog phor ni/ bshams/ tsan+dan gyi chu'i chag chag gis btab cing / me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza'
400b1('dul ba): ba rab tu mang po dag sta gon byas te/ grong mi dang / blon po rnams bsur bkye nas mgu bar 'gyur ba brgya phrag dag spring ba thos pa dang / rgyal po tshangs sbyin kun nas dkris pa dang bral te/ de nas bsam pa/
400b2('dul ba): lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la so sor yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba zhig byas te slar ldog go /snyam du bsam nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos bkur sti chen
400b3('dul ba): pos bsus nas nang du khrid de/ kha zas bsod pa rnams kyis tshim par byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal dbang bdag la bzod par mdzod/ /khyed la bdag ni rtag tu 'dud/ /bdag ni grogs por
400b4('dul ba): gyur lags na/ /khyed kyis bdag ni brtse bar mdzod/ /des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bzod pa yi ni gzhu brdungs nas/ /khro dang nga rgyal 'joms pa yi/ /yon tan ldan pa'i mda' gcig gis/ /khyod
400b5('dul ba): kyis bdag cag ril bcom mo/ /de nas de gnyis phan tshun yid gcugs par gyur nas/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang rang gi yul du song ngo / /lus 'phags kyi yul mi rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bral
400b6('dul ba): bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal por gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de
400b7('dul ba): yin par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas yid kyi dregs pa bcom pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i yid kyi dregs pa
401a1('dul ba): bcom pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa
401a2('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can gyi don chen por byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la
401a3('dul ba): gnas pa na rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gyi dpon po zhig tu gyur to/ /ji tsam na ded dpon 'khor lnga brgya pa nor tshol ba zhig /rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na gru
401a4('dul ba): de chu srin nya'i rigs kyis bshig nas tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /de nas rus sbal des tshong pa lnga brgya rgyab tu bskyon nas rgya mtsho chen po las bsgral to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i
401a5('dul ba): dus na/ rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gyi dpon por gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gyi dpon po der gyur to/ /
401a6('dul ba): rgyal po chen po/ ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba ni/
401a7('dul ba): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
401b1('dul ba): byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po lnga brgya byung ba las/ de na sde can dang / sde bzang
401b2('dul ba): zhes bya ba spun gnyis shig blon po'i gtso bo byed pa las/ sde can gyis sde bzang la rtag tu klan ka tshol zhing gnod pa bya ba la zhugs so/ /sde bzang ni/ de la rtag tu phan par bya ba la zhugs so/ /
401b3('dul ba): rgyal po'i blon po dang / grong mi rnams kyis kyang sde bzang gi ched du sde can dang sdums byas kyang gnas skabs thams cad du gnod pa byed pa las ldog tu ma btub bo/ /de nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal
401b4('dul ba): pos mang po zhig spyos nas yul nas bskrad do/ /de wA ra NA sir song nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis blon po'i gtso bor bcug go/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na long bar gyur to/ zhes nu bo sde bzang gis
401b5('dul ba): thos nas/ rgyal po la gsol ba byas te wA ra NA sir song nas mig phye ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen pos/ sde bzang 'di lta bu/ gang gis na mthus phu bo long bar bya ba'i rigs na/ snying rje dang ldan
401b6('dul ba): pa 'dis de'i mig phye'o/ /zhes sde bzang la sems dga' bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ blon po'i gtso bo sde bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gzhan zhig yin snyam na zhes bya ba nas 'on kyang ngas
401b7('dul ba): sems can rjes su bzung ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na
402a1('dul ba): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rjes su bzung bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ tshong khang zhig na/
402a2('dul ba): ded dpon gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / nyo tshong la dgon pa'i lam zhig tu zhugs pa dang / de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag dgon pa'i nang nas 'dod pa
402a3('dul ba): rnams 'di lta ste/ gcig la gcig phan 'dogs par mngon pa med kyi/ ma la bdag cag gis shing rta pa'i 'gron pa rabs gnyis su bcad la/ dgon pa'i lam du 'jug par bya'o/ /snyam nas/
402a4('dul ba): de gnyis kyis shing rta pa'i 'gron pa rabs gnyis su bcad nas dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so/ /de la ded dpon gcig ni/ shing rta pa lnga brgya dang dgon pa'i lam gyi mgon 'dug go/ ded dpon
402a5('dul ba): gcig shos ni/ shing rta pa lnga brgya dang dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so/ /ded dpon gyi mi tshong ba'i mdun nas 'gro bas/ skyes bu nag po mig che la dmar ba/ bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/ 'khor lo
402a6('dul ba): rdzab kyis g.yogs pa/ gos rlan pa/ skra gsher ba/ me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa/ mgo 'dren dang / dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras
402a7('dul ba): pa/ kye nang rje/ ci/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu gsar pa mang du skyes sam/ kye nang rje/ bden te/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu gsar pa bskyed kyi/ shes
402b1('dul ba): ldan dag/ rtswa dang / chu rnying pas khal rnams dub par ma byas par 'or cig /khyed cag rtswa dang / chu gsar pa la longs spyod dang / bde ba dang / legs par dgon pa'i lam ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol
402b2('dul ba): bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ded dpon gyi mi 'gron pa gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / 'gron pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag/ shes par gyis shig /kho bo tshong pa rnams kyi mdun
402b3('dul ba): nas 'gro ba na/ 'di na skyes bu nag po/ mig che la dmar ba/ bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/ 'khor lo rdzab kyis g.yogs pa/ gos rlan pa/ skra gsher ba/ me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings
402b4('dul ba): pa/ mgo 'dren pa dang / dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces/ kye nang rje/ ci/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang / chu gsar pa mang du skyes sam zhes
402b5('dul ba): byas pa dang / des 'di skad ces/ kye nang rje/ bden te/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu gsar pa bskyed kyi/ shes ldan dag /rtswa dang / chu rnying pas khal rnams dub par ma byas par
402b6('dul ba): 'or cig / khyed cag rtswa dang / chu gsar pa la longs spyod dang / bde ba dang / legs par dgon pa'i laM ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer gyi/ bdag cag gi khal rnams ma dub par
402b7('dul ba): rtswa dang / chu bor la/ bdag cag rtswa dang / chu gsar pa la longs spyad nas/ bde ba dang / legs par dgon pa'i laM ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis rtsa dang / chu rnying pa bor te
403a1('dul ba): dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las/ de rnams dong nas zhag gcig lon yang / rtswa dang / chu gsar pa ma rnyed do/ /zhag gnyis dang gsum dang / bdun gyi bar du song
403a2('dul ba): yang rtswa dang / chu gsar pa ma rnyed do/ /de nas 'gron pas zhag bdun lon pa dang / gnod sbyin mi zan gyis tshul ma yin pas kha btag go/ de nas ded dpon gcig shos 'di snyam du sems
403a3('dul ba): te/ tshong pa dag dong nas deng du zhag bdun lon snyam du bsam nas dgon pa'i lam der zhugs pa las/ ded dpon gyi mi tshong pa'i mdun nas 'gro bas skyes bu nag po mig che la dmar ba/ bong
403a4('dul ba): bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/ 'khor lo rdzab kyis g.yogs pa/ gos rlan pa/ skra gsher ba/ me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa mgo 'dren dang / dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa
403a5('dul ba): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye nang rje/ ci/ dgon pa'i nang du lhas char phab nas/ rtsa dang / chu gsar pa dag mang du skyes sam/ kye nang rje/ bden te/ dgon pa'i lam du
403a6('dul ba): lhas char phab nas/ rtswa dang chu gsar pa mang du bskyed kyi/ shes ldan dag/ rtswa dang / chu rnying pas khal rnams dub par ma bya bar 'or cig /khyed cag rtswa dang / chu gsar pa la longs spyod dang /
403a7('dul ba): bde ba dang / legs par dgon pa'i lam ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ded dpon gyi mi de/ 'gron pa gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / 'gron pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
403b1('dul ba): shes ldan dag/ shes par gyis shig /kho bo tshong pa'i mdun nas 'gro ba na/ 'dir skyes bu nag po zhes bya ba nas mgo 'dren dang / dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas
403b2('dul ba): kyang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ 'di skad ces/ kye nang rje/ ci/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang / chu gsar pa mang du skyes sam zhes byas pa dang / de 'di skad ces/ kye
403b3('dul ba): nang rje/ bden te/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas zhes bya ba nas rtol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du'o/ /shes ldan dag/ re shig bdag cag gis ji srid rtswa dang /
403b4('dul ba): chu gsar pa ma rnyed kyi bar du rtswa dang chu rnying pa mi 'dor ro/ /de rnams dong nas zhag gcig lon na yang rtswa dang chu gsar pa ma rnyed do/ /zhag gnyis dang / gsum dang / bdun gyi bar du song na yang rtswa
403b5('dul ba): dang / chu gsar pa ma rnyed pa las/ ded dpon gyi mis mdun na 'gron pa gnod sbyin mi zan gyis tshul ma yin pas kha btag pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces kye ma'o/ /ded dpon gyi mi ni/
403b6('dul ba): bus pa ste/ des 'gron pa tshul ma yin pas kha btag gi med do/ /zhes smras so/ /de ni/ bde ba dang legs par dgon pa'i lam rtol bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon phyi ma shos gang yin
403b7('dul ba): pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas sems
404a1('dul ba): can rjes su bzung ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /sdom la/ mche ba drug dang
404a2('dul ba): ri bong dang / /pha dang ma dang chu skyes dag/ tshal tshig glang po klu dang ni/ /yul 'khor skyong la sogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
404a3('dul ba): chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de/ nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ nags tshang tshing ri dang 'bab chu mang pos gang ba/
404a4('dul ba): rtswa sngon po dang / gel ba dang / shing sA la dang / pa la shas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs shig na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug
404a5('dul ba): pa zhig tu gyur to/ /de'i chung ma ban glang mo bzang mo zhes bya ba/ ban glang mo thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu byung ba de dang / de lhan cig khyu las gar te phyogs gzhan zhig tu dga' mgur rgyu zhing
404a6('dul ba): gnas pa las/ ji tsam na ban glang mo mchog /mchog tu yid 'phrog ma gzhan zhig yid la'ang mi bsam pa las/ glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa'i drung du phyin to/ /de nas de yang
404a7('dul ba): mkhas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa zhig pas glang po che de ji ltar de la chags pa'i sems dang 'brel bas/ de 'gro na yang phyis bzhin 'brang / 'dug na'ang 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur bsnyen
404b1('dul ba): bkur byas so/ /de nas ban glang mo bzang mo/ phrag dog gi skyon gyis mi bzod pa skyes nas ban glang mo de la klan ka tshol bar gyur/ glang po che mche ba drug pa la yang shin tu tshig pa za'o/ /gnas skabs
404b2('dul ba): thams cad du nam yang glags ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ smon lam log par gdab par brtsams pa/ gang du glang po che byas pa chud gson pa 'di'i srog gcod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig/ ces smon
404b3('dul ba): lam btab nas des ri kha nas bdag nyid mchongs te shi ba las/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes nas/ zla ba dgu 'das nas bu mo zhig btsas te skyed bsrings nas chen mor
404b4('dul ba): gyur to/ /gang gi tshe bag mar gtang ran pa de'i tshe yul ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs sbyin la byin te/ des btsun mo dam par byas so/ /des tshe rabs sngon ma'i sha 'khon yod pas/ bya ra ba rnams kyis glang po
404b5('dul ba): che mche ba drug pa bya ras sod par byed du bcug ste/ de nas des rgyal po tshangs sbyin la smras pa/ lha/ phyogs che ge mo zhig na/ glang po che mche ba drug pa mchis zhes mchi na/ de'i mche ba bdag la 'tshal ba
404b6('dul ba): zhig mchis kyi/ lhas grong mi rnams la bka' stsal tu gsol/ de nas rgyal pos yul thams cad na gnas pa'i rngon pa rnams bkug ste bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ dengs la/ phyogs che ge mo
404b7('dul ba): zhig na/ glang po che mche ba drug pa zhig 'dug pa de'i mche ba dgos kyi/ myur du khyer te shog cig/ lha/ bka' bzhin du 'tshal zhes rngon pa de rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs sbyin las mnyan to/ /de nas
405a1('dul ba): rngon pa de rnams kyi sde dpon gang yin pa des/ rngon pa de rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ rang rang gi las la 'bad cing 'dug cig dang kho bo kho na 'gro'o/ /zhes/
405a2('dul ba): des gtor ma'i cho ga byas/ go bgos/ mda' dug can lag la thogs/ gzhu brdungs te glang po che tshol zhing song ba las/ phyogs der phyin pa dang des/ de khyu las gar te chung ma dang lhan cig
405a3('dul ba): dga' mgur rgyu zhing bag brkyang ste 'dug pa mthong ngo / /smras pa/ ut+pal pad+ma bdo ba'i chu ldan yul phyogs su/ /glang chen dam pa me tog kun da zla ba dang / /ba yi 'o ma dang ni ba mo'i mdog can
405a4('dul ba): de/ /gangs ri brtsegs pa 'gro ba lta bur de yis mthong / /glang chen mchog gi dbang po zla ba 'dra ba de'i/ /mche ba drug po zla ba'i 'od zer ltar spa ba/ /pad+ma dkar po'i phung chen gyen du 'phags
405a5('dul ba): pa la/ /pad+ma'i rtsa lag dri med sdug cig rten ko lta/ /de nas rngon pa des lus la gos ngur smrig bgos/ mda' gzhu mchan du bcug nas 'khri shing tshang tshing gi nang nas 'jab cing gom pa brtan te
405a6('dul ba): dal bus nye bar song ba dang / de nas ban glang mo des rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas des/ khyim thab de la smras pa/ lha/ tshur spyon/ mi zhig mchi yi gzhan du bzhud do/ /des smras pa/ mi
405a7('dul ba): ci 'dra ba zhig / des smras pa/ gos ngur smrig can zhig go /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te de lta yin te/ ci ste de la ngur smrig yod na/ bag ma tsha zhig /ngur smrig las ni/ mi
405b1('dul ba): dge ba mi 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di na snying rje'i bdag nyid byams pa'i yid ldan pa/ /gzhan gsod dga' ba spangs pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/ /zla bas sim pa 'ba' zhig byed kyis gdung min
405b2('dul ba): ltar/ /'di las 'jigs pa mi 'byung 'di las zhi ba thob/ /de nas ban glang mo de dang byang chub sems dpa' de yang bag tsha ba med par rgyu bar brtsams pa las/ de nas rngon pa des tshang tshing gi nang
405b3('dul ba): du zhugs nas mda' dug can gyis gnad du bsnun to/ /de nas ban glang mo des byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ lha/ ci/ da chos gos can las bsnyengs pa byung ngam ma byung / byang chub sems
405b4('dul ba): dpas smras pa/ snying gi sdug pa ma byed ma byed cig/ nyes 'di thub pa'i na bza' 'di'i min gyi/ /nyes 'di nyon mongs dbang du song ba yi/ /sems ldan snying rje rnam par spangs pa yi/ /skye bo ma rmongs
405b5('dul ba): sems ldan rtog pa can/ /su yis gser gyis g.yogs pa'i lcags la ni/ /mi rnams slu bar byed ces bsam nas su/ /gser de lcags dang 'dra ba nyid du lta/ /'di yi mda' dang gzhu dang yid gdug
405b6('dul ba): pa/ /gang yin de ni gdug pa nyid du shes/ /ngur smrig mchog tu zhi ba 'di yang ni/ /rtag tu zhi ba nyid du blo yis rtogs/ /de nas ban glang mo de mi bzod pa skyes nas khyim thab la smras pa/ bdag ni/
405b7('dul ba): tshig 'di dag gis bde bar bskrun pa khyod gsod pa btang snyoms su bgyid rngo mi thogs pas/ bdag gis 'di'i yan lag dang / nying lag rnams sprugs g.yeng dbug gsheg gzhom par bgyi'o/ /de
406a1('dul ba): nas byang chub sems dpas 'dzum phyung ste smras pa/ e ma'o/ nyon mongs pa'i 'byung po gso ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chung ma'i mngon par zhen pa rung ba ma yin no//
406a2('dul ba): ci/ 'di yang mi shes sam/ 'byung po gdon gyis thebs pa sems rmongs pa/ /nad pa des ni sman pa mi bkur te/ /de la sman pa gnod pa mi byed kyi/ /'byung po de nyid zil gyis mnan nas
406a3('dul ba): 'joms/ /de bzhin nyon mongs gdon gyis thebs pa yi/ /skye bo sems rmongs 'di ni sdig rab byed/ /de la bdag shes nyon mongs gnod byed kyi/ /nyon mongs pa yis pham byas rnams la
406a4('dul ba): min/ /lhan cig spyod ma bdag gis byang chub thob nas srid gsum 'di/ /grags pas kun bkang nyon mongs g.yo can dran 'dul brtan pa dang / /drang po 'joms byed khyer ? brlags bcad da
406a5('dul ba): ng btags cing bskams pa dang / /rab tu bskams pas ring po mi thogs shin tu tshar gcad bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshig rnams kyis ba na glang mo de snying rtse bri bar byas pas
406a6('dul ba): cang mi smra bar 'dug go / de nas glang po che'i tshogs de/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bsam pa/ glang po che 'di dag gis 'di nyid du rngon pa 'di la
406a7('dul ba): gnod pa bskyed na mi rung ngo / /snyam mo/ /'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ lus kyis log par ltung bar 'gyur gyi/ sems kyis ni ma yin
406b1('dul ba): pas/ de rngon pa de'i mdun du song nas/ mi'i skad kyis ma 'jigs shig ces smras te/ dbugs phyung nas brang 'og tu sbas te 'dug go/ glang po che de rnams kyang snyad cig btags nas phyogs de
406b2('dul ba): nas gzhan du btang ngo / /glang po che rnams dong ba dang / des rngon pa la smras pa/ kye nang rje/ shes par gyis shig /glang po che rnams dong gi/ da ni/ rang gi dgos pa byos shig /rngon pas bsam pa/
406b3('dul ba): bdag 'dra ba'i mi ni/ tha shal yin te/ bdag la dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su song ba 'dis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag gis dad pa bskyed do/ /snyam nas/ de skad phyung ste ngus pa dang / de nas byang chub sems
406b4('dul ba): dpas smras pa/ kye nang rje/ ci'i phyir du/ rngon pas smras pa/ brgyab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi dga' nas bsam pa/ ma la bdag gis skyabs byas pa'i tshe gnod par gyur pa'am/ ban glang
406b5('dul ba): mo 'dis bdag gsod pa la mi bzod pa skyes pas/ 'di la mi dga' ba cung zad cig byas par gyur tam snyam nas/ rngon pa de la smras pa/ kye nang rje/ khyod su zhig gis brgyab/ de nas rngon pa de mig
406b6('dul ba): mchi ma'i dba' rlabs kyis gang bzhin du smras pa/ glang chen dbang po khyod kyi ni/ /lus la bdag gi mda' yis brgyab/ /khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi mdas/ /bdag gi sems la brgyab par gyur/ /
406b7('dul ba): dug can mda' yis phog pa yi/ /lus rnams skyes par 'gyur ba ste/ /yon tan gyi ni mdas phog pa'i/ /mi mkhas rnams ni skye mi 'gyur/ /gshed ma la yang snying rje ba/ /'di 'dra gang la yod
407a1('dul ba): gyur pa/ /yon tan rgya mtsho khyod kyi ni/ /yon tan deng brjod su yis nus/ /mdor na bdag ni mi snyam pa'i/ /blo yang bdag la mi 'byung gi/ bdag lus yon tan gyis stong
407a2('dul ba): pa| |'di la tshig ba za ba skyes/ /mi yi sha tshugs ldan yang bdag /dud 'gro'i skye gnas song ba yin/ /glang chen mchog khyod dud 'gro yi/ /skye gnas sha tshugs 'chang yang mi/ /sha tshugs tsam
407a3('dul ba): gyis dud 'gro'am/ /mir yang brtsi ba ma yin gyi/ /gang la yon tan nyer dmigs pa/ /de ni mi zhes bya bar dran/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ yon tan gyis bstod par byed pa'i tshig gis
407a4('dul ba): gtam gyi bar chad byed pa thong la/ don ci zhig gi phyir khyod kyis nga la mdas bsnun pa myur du smros shig /des smras pa/ rgyal po'i nan tur gyis bdag gis bya ba ma yin pa 'di byas te/
407a5('dul ba): khyod las dgos pa zhig yod do/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te de lta na dal bus thong la/ lag pa gnyis ni myur rkyong la/ /ci 'dod pa ni blang bar gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa'
407a6('dul ba): rnams la ni/ /mi gtong cung zad med pas longs/ /bdag gi sha 'di bcad nas 'khyer ba'am/ /mche ba rnams kyang 'dod par byed la rag /'di ni gzhan la brtse ba'i phyir bskyed pas/ /lus
407a7('dul ba): 'di la ni ji ltar dga' bar gyis/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer 'jug nus kyang / /'khor ba bgrod dka' bdag ni zhugs pa gang / /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhir gyur pa/ /gzhan la
407b1('dul ba): brtse ba de yi rgyu yin no/ /de nas rngon pa de ngo tsha ba skyes kyang / rgyal po'i nan tur la bsam nas smras pa/ khyod kyi mche ba rnams dgos lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ dal gyis phyung la
407b2('dul ba): khyer cig / des smras pa/ khyod nyid kyis thugs dpag mdzod cig /bdag ni khyod kyi mche ba 'byin mi phod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /khyod kyi mche ba rnams phyung
407b3('dul ba): na/ /byams pa'i me yis nges bsregs nas/ /bdag gi lag gnyis mi ltung ngam/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ nga nyid kyis phyung la sbyin no/ /zhes de nas des mche ba rtsa ba shin
407b4('dul ba): tu ring du zug pa dag phyung ba dang bdag nyid chen po de las khrag phyung ste/ de mthong nas gzhan dag gis dper byas pa/ mche ba bton pa las byung khrag gis mthong ka kun nas bshos pa de'i/ /me tog ku
407b5('dul ba): mu ta bkram mdog lta bu yi lus de dpal ldan rnam par mdzes/ /ri steng kha bas khebs pa'i ri bo 'od zer mdzes dang ldan gyur pa'i/ /rtse mo tshon rtsi btsag gis kha bsgyur chu yis gsab gseb gtor ba
407b6('dul ba): bzhin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid spro bsring ba'i phyir smras pa/ snying khyod da ni brtan par mnos shig rmongs su ci zhig yod/ /phongs par gyur dang mgon med 'jig rten la yang blta bar
407b7('dul ba): gyis/ /khyod ni skye bo 'chi ba'i dbang du song ba rnams kyi mgon/ /de ltas 'dir ni de zhum bya ba'i cha ma yin/ /bar skabs der nam mkha'i ngos kyang ya mtshan gyis yid rangs pa'i lha rnams kyis gang / ya
408a1('dul ba): mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byung ngo / /de nas lha zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i las shin tu dka' ba spyod pa de mthong nas smras pa/ grogs po/ bdag nyid chen po'i gnas gang yin pa 'di ni/ ya mtshan
408a2('dul ba): che ste/ mche ba rnams ni phyung ba yi/ /tshor bas nyam thag gyur kyang de/ /lhag pa'i bsam dang ldan pa'i sems/ /byang chub las kyang mi ldog go /de nas lha gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa/ mche ba
408a3('dul ba): phyung ba las byung ba'i/ /sdug bsngal rang gis myong yang de'i/ /snying rje dmyal ba la gnas pa'i/ /sems can rnams la mngon 'phel ba/ /gang dag yin pa de yi sems/ /byang chub las ldog ga la
408a4('dul ba): 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas mche ba de dag phyung nas rang nyid thogs te cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas rngon pa mi dga' ba skyes te/ ci/ 'dis rang gi mche ba de dag bzung nas sbyin par gtong mi
408a5('dul ba): 'dod dam snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i bsam pa shes nas/ me tog kun da lta bu'i sna mngon du brkyangs nas/ grogs po/ bag ma tsha zhig ces smras te/ ku mu ta dang zla ba dang / pad+ma'i
408a6('dul ba): rtsa 'dra mche ba'i mchog/ drug po 'di dag khyod sbyin zhes/ /bdag gis bzung gi bde bar 'dug /skad cig tsam zhig sdong cig dang / /len pa po dang nye bar ni/ /de yi bar gyi sdug bsngal gyis/ /gdungs pa'i
408a7('dul ba): yid rab dang bar bya/ /gal te khyod ni ci ste bdag brtags nas/ /khyod kyis sems ni rab tu dang bar bya/ /bdag ni gsod 'khu g.yon can ngo tsha med/ /de la go bar gyis shig snyam sems na/ /khyod kyi
408b1('dul ba): nyes spyad gdug dang gzhu gdug pa/ /de dang mda' rnon khyad du bsad nas ni/ /ngur smrig 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan gyur pa de/ /mthong nas yid ni rab tu dang bar bya/ /sbyin pa kha cig len pa las 'dag
408b2('dul ba): ste/ /de bzhin gzhan ni sbyin pa po las 'dag /de yi phyir na 'dir ni rang sems las/ /yon gyi dag pa yang dag bskyed par 'bad/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di ni/ 'dod chags dang bral
408b3('dul ba): ba'i rgyal mtshan yin no/ /snyam nas/ ngur smrig de nyid la rtog cing sems rab tu dang bar byas te/ mche ba rnams rang gi lag nas byin nas smras pa/ dug can mda' yis phog nas bdag gi snying
408b4('dul ba): la ni/ /mi dga' cung zad ma gyur bden pa gang yin pa'i/ /bden pa de yis yang dag byang chub mchog thob nas/ /'gro ba nyam thag sdug bsngal dag las yongs thar bya/ /rgyal po chen po/ de ji snyam
408b5('dul ba): du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba
408b6('dul ba): drug pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po/ de na ngas byams pa'i sems nye bar bsgrubs pa dang / bya dka' ba'i sbyin pa yongs su btang bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
408b7('dul ba): bo snyam na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid byams pa'i sems dang / gtang dka'i sbyin pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam
409a1('dul ba): yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir ri bong du gyur pa na/ drang srong la bdag nyid kyi sha byin pa
409a2('dul ba): gang yin pa de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ 'das pa na ri khrod chu mig dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig na drang srong dka' thub drag po can/ 'bras
409a3('dul ba): bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chu spyod pa/ g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun gyon pa/ sbyin sreg byed pa zhig gnas so/ /drang srong de'i grogs po ri bong mi skad du smra ba zhig yod de/ de nyin par drang srong gi
409a4('dul ba): drung du song nas son pa dang phyag byas te/ gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par mgu bar byed pas/ de gnyis pha dang bu kho na bzhin sdug pas gnas par gyur to/ /ji tsam dus 'das pa
409a5('dul ba): dang than chen byung ste/ des 'bab chu dang / klung rnams chu chung bar gyur cing / shing rnams me tog dang / 'bras bur mi ldan par gyur to/ /de nas drang srong de bsti gnas de na kha zas dang bral ba
409a6('dul ba): lhag par dga' bar ma gyur nas/ de g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun rnams bsdu bar brtsams so/ /de nas ri bong gis de de lta bu la zhugs pa mthong nas dris pa/ drang srong chen po/ gang du bzhud/
409a7('dul ba): drang srong gis smras pa/ grong 'dab tu song la der bcos pa'i bsod snyoms kyis 'tsho bar bya'o/ /de nas des drang srong gi tshig thos nas gdung ba skyes te pha ma dang bral bar sems shing / rkang pa
409b1('dul ba): gnyis la gtugs nas/ drang srong de la smras pa/ bdag ma dor cig /gzhan yang khyim na gnas pa ni/ nyes pa du mas dkrugs pa lags la/ dgon pa na gnas pa ni/ yon tan du ma phun sum
409b2('dul ba): tshogs pa lags so/ /des lan du ma smras na yang ldog tu ma btub nas de nas ri bong gis smras pa/ gal te des na/ 'on kyang re zhig deng la gzhes la/ ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du sang bzhud cig /de nas
409b3('dul ba): drang srong de/ 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis de ring nges par bdag kha zas la mgron du 'bod par 'dod de/ 'di ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags 'di dag ni/ gsog pa la brtson pa
409b4('dul ba): yin no/ /snyam nas/ des de la khas blangs so/ /de nas me'i spyad pa byas nas kha zas kyi dus la bab pa dang / ri bong song nas drang srong de la bskor ba byas te bzod par gsol bar brtsams pa/ drang
409b5('dul ba): srong chen po/ bdag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pas blang ba dang / dor ba ma 'tshal nas khyod la nongs pa cung zad ci bgyis pa bdag la bzod par mdzod cing / ces smras nas de ma thag tu me'i nang du mchongs
409b6('dul ba): so| |de nas drang srong de mi dga' ba skyes te/ ngom zum gnag la mchi ma zag cing bu sdug pa gcig pu la bya ba bzhin du 'khyud nas smras pa/ bu/ 'di ci zhig byed par brtsams/ ri bong gis smras pa/
409b7('dul ba): drang srong chen po/ dgon par dgyes par mdzod la/ bdag gi shas nyin zhag gcig gi 'tsho ba mdzod cig /gzhan yang / nags su skyes pa'i ri bong la til dag dang / mon sran sde'u dang / 'bras
410a1('dul ba): thug chen po ci ma mchis/ bdag gi lus ni zhugs su legs par bsgral ba 'di/ /'di ru gsol la deng la dka' thub nags su bzhugs par mdzod/ /de nas drang srong des
410a2('dul ba): ri bong gi tshig thos nas mi dga' ba skyes te smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ khyod dga' ba ltar ci byung ba byung / 'di nyid du srog dor bar byas te grong gi mthar mi 'gro'o/ /ri bong gis tshig de thos nas/
410a3('dul ba): yid dga' bar gyur te/ mgo bstod nas nam mkha'i ngos logs su bltas te gsol ba 'debs par zhugs shing smras pa/ dgon pa la ni gnas bcas te/ /bdag nyid dben pa la dga' na/ /
410a4('dul ba): bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis ni/ /dbang chen lha yis char phob cig/ ces smras pa'i mod la/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus dbang po chen po'i gnas g.yos par gyur to/ /lha rnams kyi shes pa
410a5('dul ba): mthong ba ni/ 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas ci las gyur bltas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin nas/ ji tsam na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang phyug chen po'i char phab ste/ des bsti
410a6('dul ba): gnas de slar rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /de nas drang srong des dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri bong la brten nas de na gnas te/ mngon par
410a7('dul ba): shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas drang srong gis smras pa/ kye ri bong / bya dka' ba'i brtson 'grus 'di dang / snying rje 'di lta bus ci zhig don du gnyer/ des smras pa/ 'jig rten long ba/
410b1('dul ba): 'dren pa med pa/ yongs su 'dren pa med pa/ sems can ma bsgral ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma byin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan
410b2('dul ba): las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de nas drang srong des tshig 'di thos nas ri bong la smras pa/ gang gi tshe khyed sangs rgyas su gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la yang
410b3('dul ba): dgongs shig / ri bong gis smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ri bong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid
410b4('dul ba): yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ri bong der gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ de na ngas bya dka' ba bdag nyid yongs su btang bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on
410b5('dul ba): kyang nga'i de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don
410b6('dul ba): du gnyer ba'i phyir pha dang ma long ba phrag pas khyer ba gang yin pa de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/
410b7('dul ba): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/
411a1('dul ba): 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa la chos kyi rgyal po/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed do/ /de'i mdun na 'don gyi
411a2('dul ba): bram ze'i bu ljang gu zhes bya ba/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/ snying rje can/ pha
411a3('dul ba): dang ma la sri zhu byed pa yod de/ bu ni/ gcig pu der zad la/ pha dang ma de dag kyang rgas nas mig nyams te ldongs la thug pa dang / de nas de'i pha mas rgyal po tshangs sbyin la gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po/
411a4('dul ba): gzhon nu ljang gu 'di mdun na 'don du dbang bskur du gsol/ bdag cag dka' thub kyi nags su mchi lags so/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis ljang gu la smras pa/ ljang gu /khyod mdun na 'don gyis
411a5('dul ba): shig / des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag mdun na 'don mi 'tshal te/ bdag ni/ rgas pa/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa rnams kyi rim gro 'tshal ba lags so/ /de nas ljang gus khyim na gnas
411a6('dul ba): pa dang mdun na 'don mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du spangs nas pha ma'i grogs su nags na gnas so/ /de nang par langs nas sngar pha ma gnyis la so shing dang / chu gtsang mas bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de
411a7('dul ba): nas de'i 'og tu lha la me'i sbyin sreg gis mchod sbyin byas nas phyis 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba'i phyir nags khrod du 'jug go /de nas 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chu bsil ba khyer te pha ma la byin nas/ de'i
411b1('dul ba): 'og tu phyogs gcig tu song nas bsam gtan la brtson par gnas te/ rim pa de lta bus dus 'da' bar byed do/ /ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la nang par sngar langs te/ pha dang ma'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas
411b2('dul ba): gsol te/ rmi lam du yang mthong ba rig par byed cing smras pa/ bdag gi g.yar lam sbrul nag pos/ /bdag lus shin tu zos pa dang / /bdag ni zhags pa nag po yis/ /bcings nas lho phyogs khrid
411b3('dul ba): pa rmis/ /g.yar lam 'jigs byed mthong dag gi /snying la dogs pa deng bdag la/ /bla ma dang bral shin tu ni/ /mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur snyam bgyid/ /ji tsam na pha ma de gnyis kyis dbugs
411b4('dul ba): phyung nas nyi ma la kha bltas te 'dug nas/ bden pas gsol ba btab ste ril ba khyer nas chu len du song ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin ri dwags 'chor du chas te dka' thub kyi nags der zhugs pa dang / rgyal
411b5('dul ba): po de sgra grags par phog pa zhig ste/ des ri dwags kyi sgra lta bu zhig thos nas gzhu rna drung du bkang ste mda' 'phangs pas/ ljang gu'i snying gar phog par gyur to/ /de nas mda' gnad du phog pas sa la 'gyel kyang
411b6('dul ba): de rang gi sdug bsngal khyad du bsad nas pha ma kho na'i mya ngan byed cing smras pa/ mda' gcig bsnun pas bdag dang ni/ /dbang po nyams par gyur pa yi/ /pha dang de bzhin ma dag dang / /bdag cag skye bo gsum
411b7('dul ba): bsad do/ /de nas rgyal pos de thos nas 'ongs te dris pa/ ci ste nga'i mda' gcig bsnun pas skye bo gsum bsad/ de nas ljang gus snying rje rje skad du dus nas rgyal po la smras pa/ bdag pas ches ni
412a1('dul ba): nyam chung ba'i/ /pha ma yang ni ldongs par gyur/ /bdag kyang mda' yis bsnun pas na/ /skye bo gsum ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag la dngangs nas
412a2('dul ba): ljang gu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ ngas nyes pa byas te/ ma shes nas mda' 'phangs kyi/ nga la dmod pa 'dor du mi gzhug par pha ma la gsol ba bya ba'i rigs so/ /de nas ljang
412a3('dul ba): gus gus pa dang bcas pas/ rgyal po dbugs 'byin par byed de/ rgyal po chen po/ bdag dang nye bar mchis pa rnams la dbang zhig mchis na/ snying rje can dang / skye bo la byams pa dang / 'jig
412a4('dul ba): rten pha rol la blta ba lags pas/ dmod pas ma bsnyengs shig /yang smras pa/ bdag gi bla ma gang na bar/ /ril ba 'di ni snoms mdzod cig /de dag gi ni rkang bkru ba/ /tha ma 'di ni lags
412a5('dul ba): par 'gyur/ /bdag gi tshig gis rkang pa la phyag mdzod la 'di skad/ ring por mi thogs par mthar ni/ gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes kyang gsungs shig /de nas rgyal po rang kho nas
412a6('dul ba): ril ba khyer te nags khrod du chas pa dang / de'i tshe phyogs bzhir mi ma yin pa che thang du 'khrugs par gyur to/ /de nas long ba de gnyis gcig la gcig smras pa/ ljang gu 'di ni/ mtsho'i 'gram
412a7('dul ba): du ring mo zhig lon no/ /de nas de'i mas smras pa/ da ltar kho mo'i ljang gu de/ /pad+ma ut+pal gang ba'i mtsho/ /ngang pa sgra snyan 'byin pa na/ /ri dwags lhan cig rtse bar byed/ /de nas rgyal pos drung du
412b1('dul ba): phyin pa dang / de'i rting sgra las drang srong de dag gis smras pa/ snying du sdug cing mthong dga' ba/ /ljang gu ci ste nang du 'jug /pha ma nyam chung bkres pa yis/ /nyam thag pa la ci zhig gtse/ /de yid ma
412b2('dul ba): dga' nas snying rje rje skad du smras pa/ kho bo ni/ ljang gu ma yin gyi/ kho bo rgyal po tshangs sbyin no/ /byon pa legs tshur khyod bde'am/ /gdan 'di la ni bzhugs shig dang / /ljang gu chab dang 'bras bu
412b3('dul ba): dag / thogs nas de'u re 'dir mchi'o/ /mi dbang ljang gu zhes bgyi ba/ /yon tan rnams ldan rang bzhin byams/ /de yi byams pa'i stobs kyis 'dir/ /ri dwags dang ni bya rnams gnas/ /de nas
412b4('dul ba): rgyal pos drang srong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/ mchi ma zag cing skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa/ ljang gu ni/ nags tshal 'di'i nang du snying la mdas phog ste/ srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus shing
412b5('dul ba): 'dug go / ril ba chus bkang ba 'di ni/ des bskur te/ 'dis khyed gnyis kyi rkang pa'i khrus tha ma mdzod cig /de gnyis kyis thos nas brgyal te sa'i steng du 'gyel to/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis chus
412b6('dul ba): gtor nas bslang ba dang / de gnyis snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de 'gum pas bdag cag kyang 'gum du bas so/ /de lta mod kyi/ phyogs gang na mchis pa der bdag cag khrid cig
412b7('dul ba): dang / ci nas bu de ma gum pa la reg par bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyal pos khyo shug gnyi ga khrid de phyogs der phyin pa dang / de'i srog gi lhag ma cung zhig lus nas/ de nas de'i pha mas/ ljang gu'i lus la kun du
413a1('dul ba): byugs nas smras pa/ sdug pa 'di ni su yis bskyed/ /ljon shing dam pa su yis bcad/ /de nas rgyal pos rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ kho bos sdig pa'i
413a2('dul ba): las kyis su/ /nags tshal nang nas rgyu ba na/ /khyed cag gi ni bu gcig pa/ /'di ni mda' yis bsnun par gyur/ /de nas de'i pha ma dag snying rje rje skad du smre zhing bden pas gsol par byed pa/ bu
413a3('dul ba): khyod kyis ni pha ma la/ /bsnyen bkur lha la me yi ni/ /sbyin sreg byas pa'i bden pa gang / /des ni dug kyang zhi bar shog/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas g.yos par gyur nas/ des
413a4('dul ba): sa g.yos pa 'di ci las gyur ces brtags na/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' gnad du mdas phog ste/ dug gis glongs pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong ngo / /de nas gnas
413a5('dul ba): nas babs nas bdud rtsi btab ste pha ma'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po'i mthu gang yin pa dang / zug rngu phyung ba gang yin pa des/ rma yang rub/ dug gi shugs de yang zhi nas
413a6('dul ba): ljang gu sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar nas yun ring por pha dang ma gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i
413a7('dul ba): dus na ljang gu zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin te/ rgyal po chen po/ ngas pha ma gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /snyam na/
413b1('dul ba): khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po zhe
413b2('dul ba): dgu pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de nyon cig /'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyis pha ma dag smyung ba la 'jog par byed/ mer 'jug pa dang / chur 'jug par
413b3('dul ba): byed pa/ dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de/ ngas thams cad kyi thams cad du bcad do/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer pa'i phyir nyan thos du ma mngon
413b4('dul ba): par shes pa lnga la bkod pa gang yin pa nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ 'das pa'i dus na wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa
413b5('dul ba): dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing / nad rab tu zhi ba/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing
413b6('dul ba): gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin de'i chung ma ni/ tshangs ldan ma zhes bya'o/ /rdzing ni/ tshangs ldan zhes
413b7('dul ba): bya'o/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod nas/ zhi ba dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i khyad par la gsol ba 'debs shing / 'di lta ste/ kun
414a1('dul ba): dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / tshal gyi lha dag dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dag dang / sum mdo'i lha dag dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos mthun
414a2('dul ba): pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten na gang dag gsol pa 'debs pa'i rgyu las/ bu pho dang / bu mo dag skye'o/ /zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod do/ /
414a3('dul ba): de ni/ de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na/ re re la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang gnas gsum
414a4('dul ba): po dag mngon du gyur pa las/ ma'i mngal du bu 'chags par 'gyur te/ gsum po de dag gang zhe na/ pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang / ma yang rung zhing zla mtshan dang
414a5('dul ba): ldan pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas pa ste/ gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las/ bu pho dang / bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na/ bla na med
414a6('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/ dam bcas pa la brten pa'i sems can zhig /sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos te/ btsun mo tshangs ldan ma'i mngal du zhugs so/ /
414a7('dul ba): bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la/ ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral pa shes pa dang / dus shes shing zla
414b1('dul ba): mtshan shes pa dang / mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang / gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang / khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yin na/ dku g.yas par brten
414b2('dul ba): cing 'dug la/ gal te bu mo yin na/ dku g.yon par brten cing 'dug go /de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas khyim thab la smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa na/ 'di ltar/
414b3('dul ba): bdag gi dku g.yas par brten cing mchis pas/ nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyi/ dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ de yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i bu'i ngo bo
414b4('dul ba): mthong ba dang / kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing / mi mthun par mi skye ba dang / kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang / gsos pas phyir gso ba dang / bgo skal la spyod pa dang / kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas
414b5('dul ba): bar sgrub pa dang / bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung ngu'am/ mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/ 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing / rjes
414b6('dul ba): su 'gro bar gyur cig / ces ming gis yon bsngo bar byed par gyur cig /ces ched du rjod par byed do/ /de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste/ mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par
414b7('dul ba): bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang / dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang / sman pas bcas pa'i kha zas ha cang mi grang ba dang / ha cang mi dro ba dang / ha cang mi kha ba dang /
415a1('dul ba): ha cang mi skyur ba dang / ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang / ha cang mi mngar ba dang / ha cang mi tsha ba dang / ha cang mi bska ba dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar
415a2('dul ba): ba dang / tshwa ba dang / bska ba dag rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang / khri
415a3('dul ba): nas khrir dang / khri'u nas khri'ur rgyu zhing / shod kyi sa gzhir mi 'bab pa dang / des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du bcug go /de nas
415a4('dul ba): btsun mo tshangs ldan ma dus gzhan zhig na 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/ kye ma'o/ /lhas grong khyer gyi shar sgor sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams byas shing / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
415a5('dul ba): dang / byang phyogs dang / dbus dang / sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas la/ btson thams cad thar par byas kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / de nas rgyal po
415a6('dul ba): tshangs sbyin gyis/ btsun mo tshangs ldan ma las mnyan nas/ grong khyer gyi shar sgor sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas so/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo dang /
415a7('dul ba): grong khyer gyi dbus dang / sum mdo rnams su yang sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas btson thams cad thar par byas so/ /gzhan yang / btsun mo tshangs ldan ma 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes
415b1('dul ba): te| kye ma'o/ bdag lha dang thabs cig gru bo che'i lding khang du zhugs te tshangs ldan gyi rdzing du rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / de nas rgyal po
415b2('dul ba): tshangs sbyin gyis btsun mo tshangs ldan ma las mnyan na/ btsun mo tshangs ldan ma dang thabs cig tu gru bo che'i lding khang du zhugs nas tshangs ldan gyi rdzing na rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga'
415b3('dul ba): mgur spyod par byed pa las/ gru de nyid du khye'u gzugs bzang po/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo bo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral
415b4('dul ba): ba'i dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzengs mtho ba/ skye ba dran pa zhig btsas so/ /de btsas pa na de'i nye du dag lhags shing 'dus nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i
415b5('dul ba): btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes de'i ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u 'di ni/ chu'i nang du btsas pa yin pas/ khye'u chu skyes zhes bya bar btags so/ /gzhon nu chu skyes
415b6('dul ba): ma ma brgyad po/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do/ /de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o
415b7('dul ba): ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu /dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis bsring bar byed/ skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur
416a1('dul ba): du skyed par byed do/ /de nas gzhon nu chu skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gang nas shi 'phos snyam na/ sems can dmyal ba nas so/ /las ci zhig byas na/ des na
416a2('dul ba): sems can dmyal bar skyes snyam na/ rgyal tshab lo drug cu byas pas so/ /da lta gang du skyes snyam na/ mi'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes te/ gal te slar yang rgyal srid byas na/ slar yang sems can
416a3('dul ba): dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas/ ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang thabs shig bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des 'phye bor rdzus te 'dug go/ gang gi nyi ma la gzhon nu chu skyes btsas pa de nyid kyi nyin par
416a4('dul ba): blon po lnga brgya'i bu yang btsas so/ /de nas nyin re zhing gzhon nu rnams rgyal po tshangs sbyin blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo / /de nas dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu de rnams mchong ba dang / rgyug nus par gyur to/ /
416a5('dul ba): de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te gzhon nu chu skyes 'phye bor ma gyur na/ de yang de tsam mchong ba dang / rgyug nus par gyur pa zhig /'on kyang bdag gis 'di 'phye bor
416a6('dul ba): gyur bzhin rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag go/ snyam mo/ /de nas gzhon nu chu skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po 'di ni/ don med pa la gtsigs cher 'dzin pas/ ma la bdag
416a7('dul ba): lkugs pa nyid du rdzu'o/ /snyam nas/ des thabs bya bar lkugs pa nyid du rdzus te 'dug go /de nas dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu de rnams smra shes par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs
416b1('dul ba): sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te gzhon nu chu skyes lkugs par ma gyur dang / de yang de tsam smra shes par gyur pa zhig snyam mo/ /de'i ming gzhon nu chu skyes/ gzhon nu chu skyes bya ba de nub par
416b2('dul ba): gyur cing / gzhon nu lkugs 'phye/ gzhon nu lkugs 'phye zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa
416b3('dul ba): dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'di 'dra ba thob pa na/
416b4('dul ba): bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med pas nga shi na gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur la/ bu gcig yod pa gang yin pa de yang lkugs shing 'phye bor gyur na/ da nga nyid ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par
416b5('dul ba): mi 'gyur/ blon po dag gis sman pa rnams bsdus te/ sman pa rnams kyis bltas nas smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu 'di ni/ dbang po gsal zhing / 'di la nad kyi rigs cung zad kyang ma mchis
416b6('dul ba): par mthong na/ 'on kyang skrag pa zhig mdzod cig /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gshed ma pa bkug nas gsang ste bsgo ba/ nga'i gzhon nu lkugs 'phye skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i mngon sum
416b7('dul ba): du spong gi/ khyed cag rnams kyis ma gsod cig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ de nas gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs sbyin la mnyan nas/ gzhon nu lkugs 'phye shing rtar
417a1('dul ba): bcug ste/ wA ra NA si'i dbus thog thag khrid pa dang / de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes wA ra NA si 'byor cing rgyas pa mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci/
417a2('dul ba): wA ra NA si 'di stong pa yin nam/ 'on te gnas pa zhig yod/ gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rgyal po la phul nas/ lha/ gzhon nu 'dis ni/ 'di skad kyi
417a3('dul ba): tshig smras so/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu lkugs 'phye pang du blangs nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /su zhig gsad/ su zhig srog dang dbral/ su la ci zhig sbyin /de
417a4('dul ba): skad ces smras na/ gzhon nu lkugs 'phye cang mi smra'o/ /yang rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gshed ma pa rnams la smras pa/ ngas gzhon nu yongs su spangs so/ /lha/ bka' bzhin
417a5('dul ba): 'tshal zhes gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis slar yang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye shing rtar bcug nas wA ra NA si'i dbus thog thag khrid pa dang / gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes mi ro zhig mi bzhis
417a6('dul ba): khyer ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ci/ shi ba nyid shi'am/ 'on te gson po shi/ gshed ma rnams kyis slar yang gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rgyal po la
417a7('dul ba): phul nas/ lha/ gzhon nu 'dis ni/ 'di skad kyi tshig smras so/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis yang gzhon nu pang du blangs nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /su zhig gsad/ su zhig gtag /
417b1('dul ba): su zhig srog dang dbral/ su la ci zhig sbyin/ de skad ces smras na/ gzhon nu lkugs 'phye cang mi smra'o/ /yang rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gshed ma pa rnams la smras pa/ ngas gzhon nu yongs su spangs
417b2('dul ba): so/ /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis slar yang gzhon nu zha bo lkugs pa shing rtar bcug nas wA ra NA si'i dbus thog thag drangs pa dang / gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes 'bras kyi
417b3('dul ba): phung po chen po zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/ /'bras kyi phung po chen po 'di/ gal te dang po nyid nas ma zos dang drung zug par 'gyur ba zhig/ gshed ma pa rnams kyis
417b4('dul ba): slar yang / gzhon nu zha bo lkugs pa rgyal po la phul nas/ lha/ gzhon nu 'dis ni/ 'di skad kyi tshig smras so/ /slar yang rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhon nu lkugs 'phye pang du blangs nas
417b5('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so/ /su zhig gsad/ su zhig srog dang bral/ su la ci zhig sbyin/ de skad ces smras na/ gzhon nu lkugs 'phye cang mi smra'o/ /yang rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gshed ma
417b6('dul ba): pa rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ngas gzhon nu yongs su spangs kyi/ deng la myur du gzhon nu tshal gyi nang du dong brkos te chug cig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gshed ma pa'i
417b7('dul ba): mi rnams kyis gzhon nu lkugs 'phye shing rtar bcug nas dur khrod chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / dong rko bar brtsams so/ /de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
418a1('dul ba): kha lo sgyur khyod ci yi phyir/ /dong ni myur du rko byed pa'i/ /dong de ci bya zhes dri yi/ /myur du nga la smra bar gyis/ /kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ rgyal po'i sras bo btsas pa ni/
418a2('dul ba): zha bo lkugs pa smra mi shes/ /des 'di tshal khrod myur du ni/ /dong brkos chug ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phye 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag ni/ gdug pa/ lag
418a3('dul ba): dmar gsod pa dang gcod pa la chags pa/ gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa/ pha rol gyi srog gcod par byed pas 'tsho bar byed pa yin no/ /snyam nas/ de 'jigs shing brgyal na/ 'di dag
418a4('dul ba): gis bdag gsad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du rig nas/ gshed ma pa rnams la smras pa/ lhas gal te bdag la mchog cig gnang na/ bdag rkang gis grong khyer du 'jug cing
418a5('dul ba): tshig kyang smra'o/ /gshed ma pa'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po'i drung du song nas rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te gzhon nu rgyal srid 'dod na yang / ngas deng gzhon nu la sbyin
418a6('dul ba): par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin yid dga' zhing / /yid dga' nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /dengs la grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo
418a7('dul ba): rnams myur du sol la/ pog gi dud pa dang / phye mas 'khrigs par byas te/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sgreng la/ me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma khrom zhig ces bsgo'o/ /sa bdag rnams
418b1('dul ba): ni| tshig gis 'grub la/ lha rnams dang / rnal 'byor pa rnams ni/ sems bskyed ma thag tu thams cad 'grub ces bya bas/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las
418b2('dul ba): mnyan nas/ grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal cing / pog gi dud pa dang / phye mas 'khrigs par byas nas/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste/ me tog sna tshogs
418b3('dul ba): kyi sil ma bkram mo/ /gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rkang pas grong khyer du 'jug pa na/ ya mtshan skyes pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'dus so/ /de nas gzhon nu lkugs phye rkang gis
418b4('dul ba): grong khyer du zhugs nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mi dbang bdag ni lkugs 'phye
418b5('dul ba): dang / /blun po blo mi gsal ma lags/ /rnam par gsal bar bgyid pa yis/ /tshig gis gsal bar bgyid pa lags/ /mi dbang bdag ni lkugs 'phye dang / /blon po blo mi ldan ma lags/ /dbang
418b6('dul ba): po rnams ni tshang ba dang / /gsal ba dag dang ldan pa lags/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ ci'i phyir chig mi 'byin cing rkang gis mi 'gro/ /lha/ de'i slad nas gson cig /bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs
418b7('dul ba): dran/ /lo ni drug cu'i bar du ni/ /mi yi nang na rigs brgyud pa'i/ /rgyal tshab bdag gis bgyis pa gang / /lo ni drug khri'i bar dag tu/ /dmyal ba'i nang du mi bzad smin/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi
419a1('dul ba): bzad pa/ /drag po 'jigs byed de dran nas/ /dmyal bar yang mchi mi rung bas /rgyal srid la ni mngon mi dga'/ /yab cig gnang bar mdzod cig dang / /da ni rab
419a2('dul ba): tu dbyung bar bgyi/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ /bu/ drang srong rnams kyis gang dka' thub cung zad ci byas pa dang / mchod sbyin dang sbyin sreg ci byas pa de dag thams cad ni/ rgyal srid kyi phyir
419a3('dul ba): yin na/ khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs pa spangs te rab tu 'byung / de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kim pa'i 'bras bu 'dra ba yi/ /
419a4('dul ba): 'dod pa rnams ni spyod mi 'tshal/ /bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro lta bu'i/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ bde ba gang ci nyams su myong ba de thams cad ni/ rgyal
419a5('dul ba): srid kyi yin na/ ci'i phyir khyod rgyal srid kyi bde ba spangs te rab tu 'byung / gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang las sdug bsngal rab 'byung ba'i/ /bde de
419a6('dul ba): bde'i snyam mi bgyi/ /gang las bde bar rab skyes pa'i/ /sdug bsngal sdug bsngal snyam mi bgyid/ /yab cig bdag la gnang bar mdzod/ /dka' thub nags su mchi bar bgyi/ /rgyal
419a7('dul ba): pos smras pa/ bu/ re zhig khang bzang gi gzhi pog gi dud pa dang phye mas 'khrigs pa/ me tog sna tshogs bkram par mal 'jam po steng g.yogs bzang po can bshams pa la/ gang
419b1('dul ba): nas kyang 'jigs pa med par ni/ nyal/ rol mo'i sgra snyan pas ni/ sad/ gos 'jam po ni/ bgo/ zas zhim po ni/ za/ btung ba zhim po ni/ btung bar bya'o/ /dgon par ni/ rab tu byung bas
419b2('dul ba): rtag tu shing drung du rtswa'i gding ba dang / lo ma'i gding ba la/ 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems kyis gcan gzan gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig nyal/ lce spyang gi sgras ni/ sad/ g.yang gzhi
419b3('dul ba): dang / shing shun gyi gos ni gyon/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bu ni/ za/ chu dron po dang / chu rnyog ma can gyi btung ba ni/ btung dgos na/ khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung / de nas gzhon
419b4('dul ba): nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nags na shing shun g.yang gzhi gyon cing 'bras bu za/ /gcan gzan gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig gdug pa bla'i/ /mkhas pa 'jig
419b5('dul ba): rten pha rol dag gis 'jigs pa yis/ /rgyal srid phyir ni gsod dang rdeg dang 'ching mi rung / /yab cig bdag la gnang bar mdzod/ /dka' thub nags su mchis par bgyi/ /rgyal pos
