441b3('dul ba): skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo / /bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes de ltar rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa lnga po/ sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa/ shes rab nyam chung bar byed
441b4('dul ba): pa/ gnod par byed pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar byed pa rnams spangs nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa
441b5('dul ba): rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te/ khyab pa nas/ rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin
441b6('dul ba): du bzhi pa dang / bla dang / 'og dang / thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di thams cad byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya
441b7('dul ba): chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon
442a1('dul ba): med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas
442a2('dul ba): rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa dang / bla dang / 'og dang / thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di thams cad btang
442a3('dul ba): snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par
442a4('dul ba): byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi ming / bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes zhes bya ba'i ming gang
442a5('dul ba): yin pa de nub par gyur cing / ston pa gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas ston pa gnag lhas skyes 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor brgya
442a6('dul ba): stong phrag du ma dang / grong rdal nas grong rdal dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de'i tshe skye pa'am/ bud med dag las nyes pa 'ga' byung na/ ston pa gnag lhas
442a7('dul ba): skyes phyogs gang na 'dug pa'i phyogs de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag
442b1('dul ba): 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod do/ /mdun na 'don bdun 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ ral gris
442b2('dul ba): 'tsho dang tshangs sbyin dang / /sna tshogs za dang de bzhin sa/ /rdul can yul 'khor skyong gnyis gnyis/ /de tshe skye bo de bdun 'byung / /ka ling+ka na mche ba'i khyim/ /rdo mang na ni skem byed de/ /srung byed na ni
442b3('dul ba): ma he ldan/ /ang+gar tsam pa ris su bcad/ /lus 'phags na ni mi thi la/ /stang zil can na ma rungs pa/ /wA ra NA sir ka shi ste/ /gnag lhas skyes kyis ris bcad de'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam
442b4('dul ba): du sems/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ston pa gnag lhas skyes gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
442b5('dul ba): bo/ /snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
442b6('dul ba): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thog mar thugs gang du bskyed lags/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba/ rgyal po 'od ldan zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i yul du glang po rin po che/ me tog ku mu
442b7('dul ba): ta'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis/ glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas
443a1('dul ba): bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhas pa des pa/ khyod kyis glang po che dam pa 'di/ myur du legs par dul bar byos la nga la phul cig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal
443a2('dul ba): zhes glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pas/ rgyal po 'od ldan las mnyan nas glang po che dam pa de/ 'dul bar byed de/ de dul bar rig nas rgyal po 'od ldan la phul te/ lha'i glang po che dam pa ni/
443a3('dul ba): dul lags pas/ lha/ da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas rgyal po 'od ldan glang po che dam pa de la zhon te/ glang po 'dul mkhan yang gong du zhon nas ri dwags 'chor du
443a4('dul ba): song ngo / /ji tsam na glang po che des/ nags kyi bal glang mo'i dri tshor nas/ des dri de'i rjes bzhin rgyugs so/ /de nas rgyal po glang po che rlung ltar mgyogs pas khyer ba dang / glang po che 'dul mkhan
443a5('dul ba): la smras pa/ kye glang po 'dul mkhan/ /nam mkha' 'gul ba 'dra zhing phyogs kun myur du 'dul bar 'gro ba 'dra/ sa ni mtha' dag 'khor lo bzhin 'khor shing rnams mkha' la 'khor
443a6('dul ba): ba 'dra/ glang po'i dbang po gangs ri 'gro ba lta bu 'di rgyug mthong nas ni/ /ri bo 'di rgyugs snyam nas ri rnams gya tshom myur du rgyug pa 'dra/ /kye glang po che 'dul mkhan glang po che'i dbang po thul
443a7('dul ba): cig / thul cig /glang chen dbang po tshar gcad par/ /bzang po rab tu 'bad par gyis/ /glang chen gnya' rengs khyer ba yis/ /kho bo jir 'gyur gtol med khyer/ /glang po che 'dul bas
443b1('dul ba): smras pa/ lha/ drang srong dam pas smras pa'i gsang sngags bzlas bgyi zhing / /'di la lcags kyus tshar bcad 'bad pa yang bgyi na/ 'chi bar nges par rnams kyis tshe yis man bzhin du/ /glang po 'di ni bdag
443b2('dul ba): stobs zil gyis mnan nas mchi/ /mi yi dbang po lcags kyu'am/ /zhags pa'am yang na lcags gis kyang / /'dod chags gnya' rengs khyer ba'i sems/ /tshar gcad nus pa ma lags so/ /'dod
443b3('dul ba): chags sems kyi zug rngu ni/ /ji zhig ltar na skye 'gyur te/ /tshul 'ga' zhig gis rgyas 'gyur la/ /'ga' zhig gis kyang zhi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi tshe glang po'i 'dul mkhan des glang po che dam pa de/
443b4('dul ba): gnas thams cad du bzlog par ma nus pa de'i tshe rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ glang po che 'di ni/ 'khrul gyi/ shing gi yal ga la 'jus mdzod cig /de nas rgyal po dang 'dul mkhan shing gi yal ga la
443b5('dul ba): 'jus te 'dug go / de nas de'i shi ba las thar te bde bar gyur nas/ rgyal pos 'dul mkhan la smras pa/ khyod kyis glang po che dam pa ma thul bar nga la phul lo/ /des smras pa/ lha/ 'di bdag
443b6('dul ba): gis shin tu dul bar bgyis te/ 'on kyang nags kyi bal glang mo'i dri tshor nas nyan du ma btub lags so/ /lha de lta lags mod kyi/ dpyad dran nas ring por mi thogs par mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /
443b7('dul ba): de nas glang po che de myos pa dang bral bar gyur nas/ zhag bdun lon pa dang dpyad rjes su dran nas rang nyid gnas su 'ongs te 'dug go /de nas glang po che 'dul mkhan gyis/ rings pa rings par
444a1('dul ba): rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ glang po che de ni/ mchis lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis ni/ 'di ma thul to/ /lha/ thul lags so/ /ci mngon/ lha'i spyan sngar bab
444a2('dul ba): par bgyi'o/ /zhes des lcags kyi thu lum so mal du tshos par bsregs pa zhig dpyad kyi sar khyer te len du gzhug par brtsams so/ /de nas des bag tsha ba med pas blang bar brtsams pa dang /
444a3('dul ba): glang po 'dul mkhan gyis smras pa/ lha/ len du ni btab na/ 'on kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ kye mkhas pa/ de ltar shin tu dul ba 'dis bdag cag gi g.yengs pa 'di la rgyu ci
444a4('dul ba): zhig yod/ lha/ bdag gis sngar lus thul gyi/ sems ni/ ma lags so/ /zhes ma gsol tam/ bdag ni/ lus 'dul ba lags kyi/ sems 'dul ba ni/ ma lags so/ /rgyal pos
444a5('dul ba): smras pa/ sems 'dul ba 'ga' yod par khyod kyis mthong ngam/ de lhas bskul nas smras pa/ lha/ lus 'dul ba sems 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
444a6('dul ba): mchis so/ /'dod pa'i rgyus byung nyes gzhom phyir/ /mang po brtsams par byed mod kyi/ /mi nus par ni shes nas kyang / /brtson 'grus nyams nas ldog par byed/ /de dang der ni de lta bu'i/ /
444a7('dul ba): 'bad pa rnam pa mang byas kyang / /'dod pa'i 'dod chags nags tshal gyi/ /rtsa nas phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa gzhom par 'dod pa ni/ /kha cig yul rnams spong bar byed/ /de gzhom 'dod
444b1('dul ba): pa gzhan dag ni/ /dga' bzhin dbang po tshim par byed/ /lha dang lha min mi dang seng ge stag dang sbrul dag dang / /srin bu phye ma leb dang 'jig rten 'di dag kun/ /'dod pa'i zhags pa shin tu phra mo rnams kyis
444b2('dul ba): yid bcings nas/ /srid 'gro'i thibs po 'dir ni 'khor lo bzhin du shin tu 'khor/ /bdag ni sna tshogs thabs kyi 'di lta bur/ /gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs pa'i glang po 'dul/ /rgyal po gzugs can ma
444b3('dul ba): lags phra sems ni/ /drang srong chab rlung 'tshal bas ma thul to/ /glang chen 'dul ba gzugs med phra ba'i sems/ /drang srong chu rlung za bas ma thul na/ /gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur de/ /
444b4('dul ba): mi yi 'jig rten dag na yod dam kye/ /gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur te/ /lha gcig mi yi 'jig rten na mchis te/ /rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas mthu bo che/ /nyon mongs spangs pa dpa' bo stobs
444b5('dul ba): ldan pa/ /de dang gang dag de 'drar rjes 'brang ba/ /de dbang 'dir ni gzugs med sems 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi brtson 'grus dang stobs thos nas/
444b6('dul ba): sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa rgya chen gyur pa 'di yis su/ /'gro bar rang byung sangs rgyas gyur nas ni/ /sngon
444b7('dul ba): gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyi ma bsgral ba/ /skye bo'i tshogs dag bdag gis bsgral bar bya/ /bdag gis skye rgyu legs bskyabs las byung ngam/ /btang ba las byung ba bsod nams yod pa gang / /des ni
445a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas nyid thob 'jig rten dag / 'dod pa'i rims nad las ni thar par bya/ /rgyal po chen po/ ji tsam du sems/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyis rgyal po 'od ldan du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i tshe
445a2('dul ba): de'i dus na nang nyid de yin te/ /ngas der thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du
445a3('dul ba): gnyer ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la thog mar bsod snyoms phul lags/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba yangs pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od
445a4('dul ba): ces bya ba zhig byung ngo / /de'i tshe ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe mchog zung dang / bzang po zung ni/ shA ri'i bu dang /
445a5('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu zhes bya'o/ /rim gro byed pa ni/ dge slong kun dga' bo zhes bya'o/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs
445a6('dul ba): pa'i grong khyer du byon pa dang / de rlung shas ches pa'i snyun gyis thebs nas/ des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od las mar dang / til mar dang / bu ram chu khyer te
445a7('dul ba): shog cig / btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od la 'di skad
445b1('dul ba): ces smras so/ /yangs pa'i 'od shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das rlung shas che ba'i snyun gyis thebs te/ de la mar dang / til mar dang / bu ram chu dgos so/ /de nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od kyis tshe dang
445b2('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan nas mar dang / til mar dang / bu ram chu khyer te bu dang lhan cig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / mar dang / til mar gyis
445b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis sku byugs nas/ chu 'jam pos sku khrus byas te bu ram chu'i btung ba gsol to/ /des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzod cing 'tsho bar gyur to /de nas rdza mkhan yangs
445b4('dul ba): pa'i 'od kyis de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ bdag kyang rab tu sbyin pa 'di yis/ shAkya'i rigs skyes pa/ yon tan rigs dang rus dag mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid gyur
445b5('dul ba): cing / /bdag gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar gyi nyam thag 'chi ba yi/ /pha rol zhi ba rgya chen 'jigs pa med par sgrol bar shog /de'i bus kyang smon lam btab pa/ bdag kyang las 'dis ni/ gzugs med
445b6('dul ba): pa'i chos rnams rtogs pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro byed par 'gyur cig / ces byas so/ /rgyal po chen po/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang yin pa de ni/ nga
445b7('dul ba): nyid yin te/ der ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la thog mar bsod snyoms phul lo/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyis bu gang yin pa de ni/ kun dga' bo yin no// //
446a1('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nga gcig pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i slad du yang dag par
446a2('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis lags/ rgyal po chen po/ re zhig grangs med pa dang po la/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas/ /'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar/ /de'i bar bdun khri lnga
446a3('dul ba): stong gi / sangs rgyas rnams ni ngas mchod do/ /grangs med gcig ni 'das pa yi/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod pa'i phyir/ /nga la skyo ba'i sems med do/ /rgyal po chen po/
446a4('dul ba): grangs med pa gnyis pa la ni/ sangs rgyas mar me mdzad nas ni/ /dbang po'i rgyal mtshan thub pa'i bar/ /bdun khri drug stong dag gi ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod/ /grangs
446a5('dul ba): med gnyis po tshang par ni/ /rgyal ba nga yis mchod byas te/ skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /nga la skyo ba'i sems med do/ /grangs med pa gsum pa la yang / /sangs rgyas legs mdzad nas bzung ste/ /
446a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas 'od srung bar dag tu/ /bdun khri bdun stong nga yis mchod/ /grangs med gsum po de la ni/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na/ /de'i tshe nga la skyo sems
446a7('dul ba): med/ /nga ni byang chub sems dpa' na/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni de dag mchog /'jig rten 'dren pa de kun gyis/ /nga ni sangs rgyas nyid du bstan/ /ngas ni sngon bsam gang yin pa/ /nga yi smon
446b1('dul ba): lam thams cad rdzogs/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas khur bor te/ sems can rnams ni rjes su bzung / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'
446b2('dul ba): ste/ rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun
446b3('dul ba): dga' bos zhus pa/ 'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /thub pa khyod kyi byang chub thugs/ /thog mar gang du bskyed pa dag /skal ldan chen po bdag la gsungs/ /khyod sngon byang chub spyod pa na/ /
446b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas ji snyed dus gang du/ /ji lta bur ni bsnyen bkur mdzad/ /mi mchog de ni bdag la gsungs/ /kun dga' bo yi tshig gsan nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'gro la thugs
446b5('dul ba): rje mdzad nas su/ /thub pas byang chub spyod pa gsungs/ /sangs rgyas 'dod chags bral thos shing / /glang po dregs pa'i shes chen dang / /'jig rten sdug bsngal gyur mthong nas/ /ngas ni byang chub sems
446b6('dul ba): bskyed do/ /mi dbang 'od ldan gyur pa na/ ngas ni byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ /ngas ni brtan por dam bcas te/ /sngon med pa yi sbyin pa btang / /nga ni rdza mkhan gyur pa na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub mthong
446b7('dul ba): nas/ /byang chub phyir ni thog mar ngas/ /mar dang til mar gyis mchod do/ /sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu/ /tshong dpon bu mor gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas kau di n+ya mthong nas/ /ngas ni mar me'i sbyin pa byas/ /
447a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas gzhan gyis ma thul ba'i/ /nga sngon sde snod gsum pa las/ dge slong dge 'dun rtsod pa la/ /dge 'dun la ni bud med smras/ /tshig gi nyes byas byung bas
447a2('dul ba): na| |mod la bud med nyid du gyur/ /slar yang sems dad byas pas ni/ /skyes pa nyid ni thob par gyur/ /sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu/ /nga ni rgyal po'i sras gyur tshe/ /gcen po rin chen gtsug tor
447a3('dul ba): la| |mar me'i sbyin pas mchod byas shing / /ngas ni zla gsum drug cu ru/ /bde mdzad kyi ni zham ring byas/ /ngas ni mya ngan 'das pa de'i/ /mchod rten la ni nor kun phul/ /nga ni tshong dpon
447a4('dul ba): gyur pa na/ /sgra brnyan dbyangs la zla gsum mchod/ /de yi mchod rten mthong po ni/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig rtsig tu bcug /nga ni bram zer gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas dpal 'byung mthong nas dga'/ /
447a5('dul ba): legs par thal sbyar de nas yang / /mi mchog la ni mchod pa byas/ /nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na/ /bstan bcos du ma 'jigs med tshe/ /sangs rgyas phan par bzhed mdzad pa/ /nga yi stan la
447a6('dul ba): spyan drangs so/ /sngon ni dka' thub ldan pa yi/ /drang srong chos la gnas gyur tshe/ /sangs rgyas kau'u ni n+ya mthong nas/ /ngas ni ri bo'i kha nas mchongs/ /drang srong gyur na'ang yid dga' bas//
447a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas blta na sdug mthong nas/ /rtsa ba dang ni 'bras bu'i phyir/ /bsti gnas bzhugs pa ngas spyan drangs/ /'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la/ /drang srong gyur tshe bkur sti byas/ /shing
447b1('dul ba): shun yid du 'ong ba yis/ /ngas ni mi yi mchog bkab bo/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung spangs nas/ /byang chub 'dod pa'i ched du ngas/ /yul 'khor skyong gi zham 'bring byas/ /sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
447b2('dul ba): nas/ /'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar/ /bdun khri dang ni lnga stong gi/ /sangs rgyas la ni nga yis mchod/ /grangs med gcig ni 'das pa yi/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe nga la skyo
447b3('dul ba): sems med/ /grangs med pa dang po'o/ /bram ze'i khye'ur gyur de'i tshe/ /'od dang grags par ldan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong nas/ /ut+pal sngon po bdun gyis mchod/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /dka'
447b4('dul ba): thub spyod ces bya ba yi/ /sangs rgyas mtshan mnga' mthong nas ni/ /mi mchog la ni bla res mchod/ /rgyal por gyur tshe mun 'joms pa'i/ /skal chen la ni rin po che/ /sna tshogs bkra ba'i rol mo yis/ /mchod pa dag
447b5('dul ba): gis bzhengs gsol to/ /kun dga' mi dbang gyur pas/ /seng+ge seng+ge'i rta la mnga' la/ /rin chen yu ba can gdugs kyis/ /mi mchog la ni mchod pa byas/ /rgyal por gyur tshe grong khyer ni/ /stong phrag drug cu
447b6('dul ba): rnams su yang / /mi yi nyi ma bde mdzad ni/ /spyan drangs nas ni mchod pa byas/ /'jig rten 'dren pa mi dbang la/ /bsro khang las dang de bzhin du/ /a kar nag po'i dri dag gis/ /bram zer gyur tshe zham
447b7('dul ba): 'bring byas/ /grong khyer rgyal srid 'phel bar ni/ /bram ze'i sangs rgyas sum cu po/ /gtsug tor can zhes 'jig rten grags/ /rgyal por gyur tshe mchod pa byas/ /grong khyer 'bras 'phel dag tu ni/ /sangs
448a1('dul ba): rgyas nyi shu rtsa lnga la/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /tshangs par spyod pas mchod pa byas/ /grong khyer dga' ba de nyid du/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas gtsug
448a2('dul ba): tor 'jig rten grags/ /gtsug lag khang gis mchod pa byas/ /tshong dpon gyur te rgyal ba drug /mchod phyir glang chen rta gser dang / /bud med rnams dang nor bu yi/ /rgyan gyis skyed mos tshal byas so/ /rgyal
448a3('dul ba): por gyur tshe ngang pa yis/ /grong khyer yid 'ong de nyid du/ /byang chub don du gnyer ba ngas/ /gtsug tor can la skra bregs so/ /kun dga' bram zer gyur pa na/ /thub chen ma 'gag de la ni/ /byang chub don du gnyer
448a4('dul ba): ba ngas/ /'bras bu mchog gis mchod pa byas/ /tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/ /'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la/ /nor bu rin chen gyis mchod cing / /gtsug lag khang na nyams dgas mchod/ /ded dpon du
448a5('dul ba): ni gyur pa na/ /byang chub shing gi drung na ni/ /sangs rgyas legs 'khrugs bzhugs mthong nas/ /thog mar bsod snyoms la spyan drangs/ /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ byang chub shing drung thub pa ni/ /'jig
448a6('dul ba): rten dga' mdzad blo bzang mthong / /'khor ni stong dang rab tu byung / /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas tsan+dan 'od dpag med/ /chu 'jam dang ni til mar dang / bu ram la ni spyan drangs so/ /kun
448a7('dul ba): dga' rgyal por gyur pa na/ /tshangs sbyin grags pa chen po pa/ /'dren pa la ni zhal zas dang / /thams cad sbyin pas mchod pa byas/ /bram zer yang ni gyur pa na/ /thugs rje chen po 'od zer can/ /thub
448b1('dul ba): pa rkang gnyis mchog mthong nas/ /smra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis mchod do/ /rgyal por gyur nas sangs rgyas ni/ /don dam gzigs pa grong mchog tu/ /'jug pa de la ta la yi/ /lo ma'i bsil yab mchod pa byas/ /nga ni
448b2('dul ba): tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /'jig rten gsal mdzad sangs rgyas ni/ /shAkya thub pa me tog gi /sil ma sna tshogs dri sbyar mchod/ /grong khyer mchog tu mthor 'phags pa'i/ /mi mchog 'jug par mthong nas ni/ /rol mo rnams
448b3('dul ba): kyi sgra dag dang / /me tog rnams kyi mchod pa byas/ /rgyal por gyur tshe dad pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dam pa zhes bya ba/ /srid pa'i mtsho las brgal ba la/ /thog mar shing rta dag gis bstabs/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /gtso
448b4('dul ba): bo'i ched du lam bstar cing / /dpag tshad brgya ni gang bar yang / /me tog khang brtsegs mchod pa byas/ /sangs rgyas dgra zhi mdzad pa ni/ /grong khyer gshegs zhes ngas thos nas/ /lam ni rgyal mtshan yongs bkang ste/ /
448b5('dul ba): rgyal po'i 'byor bas bsu ba byas/ /nga ni mnyan par gyur pa na/ /shing rta'i yan lag chu 'gram du/ /byon pa ngas ni mthong nas ni/ /thub pa chu yi rgyun las bsgral/ /ded dpon gyur tshe dad pa yi/ /shing rta skal ldan chen po
448b6('dul ba): ni/ /ngas ni gru zam btags nas kyang / /mtsho chen las ni bsgral ba byas/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas ni/ /tshangs pa tsan+dan sa mchog gi/ /ka bar ldan pa'i khang pas mchod/ /rgyal por gyur
448b7('dul ba): tshe sangs rgyas ni/ /bcom ldan tshangs pa'i tshe mchod cing / /sman sbyin rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas ni/ /ngas ni yams kyi nad zhi byas/ /tsan+dan ldan la char med tshe/ /rgyal po lta bu'i sku khrus byas/ /de tshe lhas ni char phab
449a1('dul ba): pas| |skye bo rnams ni skyabs su dong / /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan zla ba la/ /mchod nas ngas ni byams bsgoms pas/ /bdud kyis btang ba'i yams nad zhi/ /
449a2('dul ba): mi yi dbang por sngon gyur tshe/ /ngas ni byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul ba la/ /cho 'phrul phyir ni gsol ba btab/ /rgyal po dag tu gyur pa na/ /rin chen ri bo 'od chen ldan/ /'khor
449a3('dul ba): ni brgya stong phrag mang po/ /mthong nas lo lngar mchod pa byas/ /bram zer gyur tshe dad pa yis/ /sangs rgyas don kun bsgrubs pa ni/ /mtshan dang ldan pa mthong nas kyang / /ngas ni bstod pa lnga brgya byas/ /bram zer
449a4('dul ba): gyur tshe yid dga' bas/ /sangs rgyas dbang po rgyal mtshan mthong / /ngas ni thal mo legs sbyar te/ /dam pa stsol ba'i 'od ces gsol/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa nas/ /thub pa dbang po rgyal mtshan bar/ /bdun
449a5('dul ba): khri dang ni drug stong gi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod/ /grangs med gnyis pa tshang bar ni/ /rgyal ba nga yis mchod byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na/ /de tshe nga la skyo sems med/ /grangs med pa gnyis pa'o/
449a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas bde mdzad dam pa la/ /rgyal por gyur tshe mchod byas nas/ /mya ngan 'das nas mchod rten brtsigs/ /rgyal srid rab tu zhi bar byas/ /rgyal por gyur tshe dang bas ni/ /sangs rgyas gang po re skong la/ /tshul dang
449a7('dul ba): 'dra bar mchod byas te/ /chos kyi rgyal po zhes bsgrags so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe legs par ni/ /rim gro byas shing mi mchog la/ /de bzhin gser gyi me tog gtor/ /nga
449b1('dul ba): ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can/ /thub chen grong mchog gshegs de la/ /gser gyi dra bas mchod pa byas/ /nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na/ /pad+ma dam pa dpa' chen po/ /rgyal por
449b2('dul ba): grags pa'i grong mchog tu/ /dngul gyi me tog sil mas gtor/ /nga ni bram zer gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas grags mchog slob mi yi/ /dge 'dun gyis ni mdun bltas pa/ /mthong nas mi mchog gnas kyis mchod//
449b3('dul ba): nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na/ /legs gsung byang chub shing drung du/ /bzhugs pa ngas mthong glang po rta/ /shing rta dpung bu chung gis bsrungs/ /sangs rgyas dri med thub chen la/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe bsro khang dang / /mchod
449b4('dul ba): rten las dang mar mes ni/ /de yi tshe na rnam par mchod/ /sangs rgyas sad mdzad rdo leb steng / /snyoms par bzhugs pa mthong nas ni/ /dad pas rol mo'i sgra kun dang / /rgyal po'i 'byor pas bzhengs gsol to/ /
449b5('dul ba): tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/ /'jig rten dga' mdzad dgra thul ba/ /sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pa na/ /lam ni sna tshogs brgyan pas mchod/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe yid dga' bas/ /gnas mchog gshegs pa
449b6('dul ba): thos nas ni/ /skyed mos tshal ni brgyan byas nas/ /ngas ni gtsug lag khang brtsigs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan skar 'od la/ /byang chub 'dod pa'i dad pas ngas/ /rgyal po'i mdzod ni thams cad las/ /nor
449b7('dul ba): bu rin chen rnams kyis mchod/ /nga ni rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ /tog gis bdud rnams bcom byas nas/ /chos kyi rgyal srid bsgrags pa na/ /ngas ni rgyal mtshan kho na btsugs/ /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza blo ldan pa/ /bram ze mya
450a1('dul ba): ngan 'das pa la/ /rgyal po ngas ni ril ba dang / /dbyug gu gtsug lag khang chen byas/ /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas 'dren pa don gzigs pa/ /gser dang nor bu mu tig dang / /dri
450a2('dul ba): yi snying po rnams kyis mchod/ /sangs rgyas don kun grub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pa na/ /rgyal por gyur tshe dpung dag gis/ /tshogs kun gyis ni mchod pa byas/ /sangs rgyas don dam gzigs
450a3('dul ba): pa ni/ /grong khyer dam par gshegs pa na/ /rgyal por gyur tshe rol mo dang / /me tog kun gyis mchod pa byas/ /nga ni ded dpon gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas skar rgyal rkang gnyis mchog /dri yi snying po de bzhin du/ /
450a4('dul ba): rtsa ba'i dri rnams rab tu gtor/ /rin chen bkra ba'i phug na yang / /sangs rgyas skar rgyal la ni ngas/ /de tshe tshigs bcad gcig bstod pas/ /bskal pa dgu ni phyir bsnyil to/ /'bru tshong du ni gyur pa na/ /sangs
450a5('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan rnam gzigs la/ /de tshe byang chub spyod pa'i phyir/ /mud ga spar gang phul bas mchod/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe ngas mchod pa/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni gtsug tor can/ /thub pa nyan thos tshogs bcas
450a6('dul ba): pa| |zhal zas kyis ni zla gsum mchod/ /tshong dpon du ni gyur pa'i tshe/ /'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad skyob/ /skal chen nyan thos bcas pa la/ /zhal zas kyis ni gus par mchod/ /tshong dpon gyur tshe
450a7('dul ba): dad pa yis/ /sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig pa ni/ /bdog pa kun la spyan drangs nas/ /tshangs par spyod phyir blo gros bskyed/ /tshong dpon du ni gyur pa na/ /yang dag sangs rgyas gser thub la/ /gtsug
450b1('dul ba): lag khang brtsigs dad pa yis/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bram ze'i khye'u ni bla ma'i tshe/ /dga' skyong gi ni tshig thos nas/ /'od srung rkang gnyis mchog las ni/ /rab tu 'byung ba'i blo bskyed do/ /
450b2('dul ba): byams pa drang srong gyur pa na/ /rgyal por gyur nas rim gro byas/ /byas pa gzo ba rjes dran nas/ /de nas nga la slar mchod do/ /gang yang sangs rgyas bde mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung bar du ni/ /
450b3('dul ba): ngas ni bdun khri bdun stong gi/ /rgyal ba rnams ni mchod pa byas/ /grangs med gsum po tshang bar ni/ /rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te/ /sngon ni byang chub spyod pa na/ /nga la skyo ba'i sems med do/ /nga ni
450b4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni de rnams mchod/ /nga ni de dag thams cad kyis/ /'jig rten mdun du lung bstan to/ /ngas ni sngon bsam gang yin pa/ /nga yi smon lam thams cad
450b5('dul ba): rdzogs/ /nga ni sangs rgyas khur bor te/ sems can rnams ni rjes su bzung / /shi bi'i rgyal por nga gyur te/ /sbyin pa dag ni thams cad btang / /nga ni dus dpog gyur pa'i tshe/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/ /rgya mtsho'i
450b6('dul ba): tshong bar gyur pa na/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin don du/ /srog chags rnams ni ma btang zhing / /ngas ni rang gi sha btang ngo / /nga sngon drang srong gyur pa na/ /bzod pa'i pha rol rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /yan lag rnams ni
450b7('dul ba): gtubs pa yis/ /nga yi bzod pa yongs su rdzogs/ /mi ma yin mo'i skyes rabs dang / de bzhin rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / /de bzhin bdag ni bden dga' ba'i/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/ /sman chen blon
451a1('dul ba): por gyur pa dang / gnag lhas skyes su nga gyur tshe/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs nas/ /de bzhin rnga bo che yang bsgrags/ /bram ze rab 'bar gyur pa na/ /ral par 'dab chags
451a2('dul ba): tshang bcas kyang / /bsam gtan las ni ma langs par/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin brtson byas/ /snying rje yongs su bsgoms byas shing / /pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs pas/ /khur lci ba ni ngas bor te/ /dam
451a3('dul ba): bcas pa yang rdzogs par byas/ /nga dang sangs rgyas gang phrad nas/ /mchod pa byas pa'i mi mchog ni/ /de kun mya ngan 'das par gshegs/ /nga ni byang chub la bzhag go /rgyal po 'od ldan dbang po nas/ /
451a4('dul ba): thub pa dbang po rgyal mtshan bar/ /sems can bye ba phrag stong ni/ /srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral ba byas/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ rdzogs sangs rgyas te lha mir bcas/ /'jig rten 'di ni
451a5('dul ba): bsgral ba dang / /sgrol bar mdzad pa smos ci dgos/ /ngas ni 'jig rten don gyi phyir/ /mya ngan 'das na'ang chos kyi gru /brtan pa dag ni bca' byas te/ /brgya stong phrag ni bsgral bar bya/ /mi gang sangs
451a6('dul ba): rgyas skyabs song zhing / /mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas la/ /bya ba byed pa'i skyes bu de/ /'jig rten dag ni skyid de ba/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs rgyal la/ /bya ba cung zad byed pa na'ang de/ /mtho ris
451a7('dul ba): sna tshogs bgrod nas ni/ /bdud rtsi'i go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /yang dag ji bzhin 'di thos nas/ /dge ba bungs ni bskyed de bya/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'khyams sa re/ /
451b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas mang po'i skabs rdzogs so/ /sangs rgyas 'od ldan dang / shAkya thub pa dang / ko'u di n+ya dang / 'jig rten 'dren dang / gzhan gyis mi thub dang / rin chen gtsug tor dang / bde
451b2('dul ba): mdzad dang / sgra snyan dang / dpal 'byung dang / phan bzhed dang / ko'u di n+ya dang / blta na sdug pa dang / spyan mdzes dang / yul 'khor skyong dang / mar me mdzad dang / dka' thub mdzad dang / mun sel dang / bde mdzad dang /
451b3('dul ba): dbang chen dang / gtsug tor can dang / ma 'gag pa dang / spyan mdzes dang / legs 'khrungs dang / yid bzang dang / tsan+dan dang / tshangs sbyin dang / 'od zer can dang / don dam gzigs dang / shAkya thub pa dang /
451b4('dul ba): mthor 'phags dang / dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / dgra zhi mdzad dang / shing rta'i yan lag dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i tshe dang / tsan+dan dang / dbang po dang / dbang po 'dul dang / rin
451b5('dul ba): chen ri bo dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / tha ma dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / bzod pa mdzad dang / rdzogs ldan dang / thams cad zil gnon dang / rin chen gtsug phud dang / pad+ma dam pa dang / grags pa
451b6('dul ba): dam pa dang / gsung snyan dang / dri ma med dang / sad mdzad dang / dgra thul dang / gnas 'jog dang / skar 'od dang / tog dang / drang srong dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang / don gzigs dang / don dam gzigs dang / don
451b7('dul ba): thams cad gzigs dang / rgyal dang / skar rgyal dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa dang / tha ma
452a1('dul ba): byams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin
452a2('dul ba): du ste/ de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can/ kun tu rgyu rab tu mang
452a3('dul ba): po rtog khang du lhags shing 'dus par gyur nas skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig /sngon ni/ bdag cag la rgyal po dang / blon po dang /
452a4('dul ba): bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong mi dang / yul pa dang / tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas pas/ gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /
452a5('dul ba): gnas mal dang / nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyang rnyed pa las/ da ni/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung ba la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed ces bya ba nas sman
452a6('dul ba): dang / yo byad rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /des na de ltar bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad na/ de la bdag cag gis ji ltar bya/ de na kha cig gis
452a7('dul ba): smras pa/ tshangs par spyod pa la mi tshangs par spyad pa skyon yin pas/ de la skyon 'di gdags so/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ ji lta bu zhig bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang
452b1('dul ba): mo/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de la/ sring mo dag /tshur dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur ba thob cig ces spro bar bya'o/ /bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang mo/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa gang yin
452b2('dul ba): bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi yin no/ /de la spro ba bskyed do/ /zhes de rnams kyis de pho nyas bkug ste smras pa/ sring mo shes par gyis shig /sngon ni/ bdag cag gis bkur sti dang zhes bya ba nas nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo
452b3('dul ba): byad rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /da ni/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung bas/ 'jig rten de la bkur sti byed pas bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad par gyur na/
452b4('dul ba): khyod kyis yal bar 'dor ram/ bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis de la ji ltar bgyi lags/ sring mo/ khyod kyis nye du rnams kyi ched du dge sbyong go'u ta ma la kho mo dang lhan
452b5('dul ba): cig tu mi tshangs par spyad do/ /zhes khyod skur pa 'debs par spro'am/ de lta na/ bdag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti sngon gyi bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mis/ gzhan mu
452b6('dul ba): stegs can dang / kun tu rgyu rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ba dag /dge sbyong go'u ta ma la ni/ skur pa 'debs par bdag mi spro'o/ /sring mo/ khyod ji tsam du dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa
452b7('dul ba): 'debs par mi spro ba de tsam du bdag cag dang gtam 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya/ blta bar mi bya/ rnam par blta bar mi bya zhing / khyod gnas thams cad du 'dug tu mi gzhug ste/ 'gyod pa de nyid
453a1('dul ba): kyis dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do/ /bud med ni/ shes rab chung ba yin pas/ de skrag nas smras pa/ 'phags
453a2('dul ba): pa| bdag gis ji ltar bu zhig bgyi/ sring mo/ tshur khyod rgyal bu rgyal byed tshal du rgyun du song la dus thag gi tsam lon nas dge sbyong go'u ma la skur pa thob cig /de nyi ma re re zhing langs te rgyal bu
453a3('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /ji tsam na lto la snod gcig bcings nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs
453a4('dul ba): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mi rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/
453a5('dul ba): rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams/ gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtswa mi/
453a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas gsol pa/ bdag ni 'di ru sbrum bgyis nas/ /chags par 'gyur zhing dga' 'gyur ba/ /snyan cing 'jebs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ /da ltar chos ni
453a7('dul ba): gsung mdzad dam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag min pa smra ba dmyal bar 'gro /bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mis gsol pa/ gang gis byas nas ma byas zhes smra ba'ang / /bcom ldan
453b1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dman pa'i chos can mi ni de gnyi ga /pha rol dag tu 'dra bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o/ /bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi
453b2('dul ba): 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la yun ring po nas mtho 'tsham par byed do/ /snyam du bsam nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis snod de sa la lhung bar byas so/ /de nas bram ze'i bu mo rtswa mi
453b3('dul ba): skyengs nas rings pa rings par slar song ngo / /de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la
453b4('dul ba): chos kyi dbang du bgyi ba'i bka' mchid kyang bka' stsal/ gang du thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa yang lung bstan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
453b5('dul ba): ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa yang bka' stsal lags pas/ ci nas bdag cag mtsho chen po ma dros par mchis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par
453b6('dul ba): bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi gdon mi za bar
453b7('dul ba): mdzad pa ni/ bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ ji srid sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa dang / sems can 'gas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar
454a1('dul ba): bya ba thams cad btul ba dang / nyan thos kyi mchog zung gcig tu bstan pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sku tshe'i lnga cha btang ba dang / mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen
454a2('dul ba): po rnam par bstan pa dang / grong khyer gsal bar lha las gshegs pa bstan pa dang / yab dang yum gnyis bden pa dag la bkod pa dang / mtsho chen po ma dros par nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
454a3('dul ba): thabs cig tu sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba bstan pa ma mdzad pa de srid du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /don 'di la ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
454a4('dul ba): 'dun dang thabs cig mtsho chen po ma dros par sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag /mtsho chen po ma dros pa gang na bar 'dong / der
454a5('dul ba): rang rang gi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga
454a6('dul ba): brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te mtsho chen po ma dros par gshegs so/ /gnod sbyin gtum po mi bzad gnas pa yid 'ong zhing / /me tog sna tshogs
454a7('dul ba): shing gis rnam par mdzes byas pa/ /de las rgya mtsho dug can dag tu 'gro ba yi/ /chu bo chen po bzhi po 'di dag phyogs bzhir 'bab/ /gang ga sin+d+hu de bzhin pak+Shu dang / /si ta de dag rdzu 'phrul
454b1('dul ba): stobs thob pa/ /ma gtogs mi rnams kyis ni mi bgrod pa/ /der ni thub pa dge 'dun bcas par bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ chos nyid kyis/
454b2('dul ba): gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur yan chad kyi sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par
454b3('dul ba): 'gyur bas/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bsam pa/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam na/ mtsho chen po ma dros par las
454b4('dul ba): kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed par mthong ngo / /de nas de gnyis kyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/ shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam/ bzang po thams cad gser las byas pa/ sdong
454b5('dul ba): po ni/ rin po che/ ge sar ni/ rdo rje las byas pa/ pad+ma stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba zhig sprul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la pad+ma'i snying po de la bzhugs so/ /dge
454b6('dul ba): slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang pad+ma gzhan rnams kyi snying po la 'khod do/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la snam sbyar 'drub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
454b7('dul ba): pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal ba/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ song la rab tu byung ba'i zla bo khrid de shog cig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal chen po ma dros pa nas
455a1('dul ba): mi snang bar gyur cing / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ston pa dgra bcom
455a2('dul ba): pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu mtsho chen po ma dros pa na sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas khyod la gzhes kyi/ tshur shog /'dong / des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
455a3('dul ba): dgal gyi bu chen po/ re zhig snam sbyar drubs la/ de nas phyis 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ grogs bya'o/ /de bzhin du gyis shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis sor
455a4('dul ba): mo lnga char gyis drub par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ 'o na lta bu drub zin tu zad mo/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gal te
455a5('dul ba): khyod mi 'gro na/ mthus bkur bar bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ ske rags rgya cang phrol nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi
455a6('dul ba): mthu can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ re zhig khyod kyis 'di khyer la/ de nas phyis kho bo khyer cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
455a7('dul ba): bsam pa/ 'di ni mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas/ gal te 'di 'khyer bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do/ /snyam nas/ des de bya rgod phung po'i ri'i spyi la btags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
455b1('dul ba): chen pos de drangs pa dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'gul bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ 'dis bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri yang 'khyer bar 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab la
455b2('dul ba): gdags so/ /snyam nas/ des de ri'i rgyal po ri rab la btags pa las/ yang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dag kyang
455b3('dul ba): g.yos par gyur/ ma dros pa yang kun nas 'khrugs shing / dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang ldeg par gyur nas pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug bzhin du de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/

455b5('dul ba): po gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'di yang 'khyer bar 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i sdong po la gdags
455b6('dul ba): so/ /snyam nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i sdong po la btags pas ma 'gul bar 'dug go /gang gi tshe de'i rdzu 'phrul la rdzu 'phrul gyis rdugs pa de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
455b7('dul ba): smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtses pa byas zin gyi tshur shog /'dong / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po song zhig dang / kho bo 'ong ngo / /zhes byas nas
456a1('dul ba): j i srid tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ma phyin pa de'i bar du tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngar phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
456a2('dul ba): phyag 'tshal te pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug pa dang / de'i 'og tu tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po phyin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'ongs sam/ tshe
456a3('dul ba): dang ldan pa/ kho bo 'ongs so/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi
456a4('dul ba): bu chen po ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
456a5('dul ba): slong dag / da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang bzos pham par byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ yul dbus su ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung ngo / /de dgos
456a6('dul ba): pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir yul dbus nas yul nas can zhes bya bar song ngo / /de de na 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa las/ de de nyal ba'i rim gro bar 'khrul 'khor las bu mo
456a7('dul ba): zhig byas nas btang ngo / /des de'i rkang pa gnyis bgrus nas 'dug go/ de nas des song zhig ces smras na/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ des bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di bdag dang dga' mgur spyod
456b1('dul ba): pa'i phyir btang ngo / /snyam nas/ des de'i lag pa nas bzung ste drangs pa las/ ji tsam zhig nas shing brul gyi phung por gyur to/ /de skyengs nas bsam pa/ bdag gcig pu zhig tu skyengs par byas kyi/ ma la
456b2('dul ba): bdag gis ni/ 'di rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des sgo'i ngos logs la rang gi gzugs brnyan 'gegs pa zhig bris te/ sgo phag tu yib nas 'dug go /de ldang
456b3('dul ba): ba'i dus gang yin pa de las bral ba dang / de nas 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon gyis bsam pa/ ring zhig lon na/ ci'i phyir de sgor ma byung snyam du sems te/ der song ba las/ ji tsam na 'gegs
456b4('dul ba): te shi ba mthong ngo / /des bsam pa/ ci'i phyir 'dis bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byas snyam pa las/ des 'khrul 'khor zhig nas shing brul gyi phung por 'dug pa mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems
456b5('dul ba): te/ bdag nyid skyengs pas 'gegs so/ /snyam mo/ /yul nas can gyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang su'i khyim yang rung / der mi glo bur ba shi na/ ji srid rgyal po la ma mthol ba de srid du des de la rim
456b6('dul ba): gro mi byed do/ /de nas de rgyal po'i drung du song ste mthol ba/ lha/ yul dbus nas ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig mchis te/ de bdag gis sdum par gnas pa las/ de la bkur sti bgyi ba'i slad du
456b7('dul ba): bdag gis 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig bgyis te btang ba dang / des de lag pa nas bzung ste drangs pas shing gi phung por mchis pa dang / de skyengs nas bdag nyid 'gegs lags na/ lha/ de la g.yar
457a1('dul ba): snga 'brim pa zhig gtang du gsol/ de nas bdag gis rim gro bgyi lags so/ /de nas rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/
457a2('dul ba): dengs la g.yar snga rims shig /de rnams dong nas de mthong ngo / /des bsam pa/ bdag gis ji ltar zung nga las dbab par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'gegs thag chod/

457a7('dul ba): ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gnyis shig byung ba las/ rtsod par gyur te gcig gis smras pa/ nga ni/ bzo legs par shes so/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ nga ni/ de bas kyang lhag par legs
457b1('dul ba): par shes so/ /de gnyis phan tshun 'gran par gyur nas rgyal po'i drung du dong ste/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gcig gis smras pa/ lha/ bdag ni/ bzo legs par 'tshal to/ /

458a1('dul ba): de nas des slar yol bas bar bcad nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ 'di ni/ ri mo'i las ma lags te/ 'on kyang rtsig ngos bstar ba lags so/ /de nas
458a2('dul ba): rgyal po de ya mtshan skyes nas smras pa/ 'di ni/ bzo la lhag par mkhas pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ gang gis zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar ba de ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin

458b1('dul ba): mi 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin dang / skye bo'i tshogs des bris pa la gsol ba btab nas des gsol ba byas te lhas char phab bo/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus

458b6('dul ba): bdag gi mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /bris pas de la smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ 'ji ba las byas pa'i mgo zhig byos shig /ji tsam na 'ji ba las dung gi mgo zhig byas pa las/ nyi ma shar ba dang gas par
458b7('dul ba): gyur to/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ dung gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/ /bris pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin te/ de na yang 'dis pham
459a1('dul ba): par byas so/ /gzhan yang / ji ltar pham par byas pa de nyon cig /yul dbus su bso mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung nas/ ba so 'bras tsam bre'u chung gang khyer nas yul nas
459a2('dul ba): can du song ste/ de ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs na/ de yang stong par 'dug na de'i chung ma la smras pa/ grogs po'i chung ma/ 'bras bre'u chung gang po 'di tshos la byin cig/ ces
459a3('dul ba): de bzhag ste song ngo / /des btso bar brtsams pa las/ shing zad par gyur kyang ma tshos so/ /de nas de'i khyim thab 'ong nas smras pa/ bzang mo/ 'di ci zhig yin/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des de brtags pa
459a4('dul ba): las/ ba so 'bras tsam sha stag tu mthong nas/ des de la co 'dri bar smras pa/ bzang mo/ 'di tshwa chu yin gyi/ chu bzang po gzhan zhig khyer te 'ongs dang / des 'bras 'di tshos par 'gyur ro/ /des ba so mkhan
459a5('dul ba): gyi slob dpon la/ chu bzang po zhig khyer te shog cig ces smras pa/ des de la smras nas/ des phyogs gzhan zhig tu rdzing bu zhig bris te/ der khyi ro bam ba zhig kyang bris so/ /de nas ba so mkhan gyi slob
459a6('dul ba): dpon de bum pa khyer nas rdzing bu yin no/ /snyam nas/ phyogs der phyin te khyi ro bam pa mthong ba dang / des sna bkab nas brtag par brtsams pa las/ ji tsam na de'i chu snod de chag nas ba so mkhan gyi slob
459a7('dul ba): dpon de skyengs par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/ /ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni/
459b1('dul ba): dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin no/ /'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas brnyes pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming yang rang sangs rgyas
459b2('dul ba): rnams kyis mi shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang dge slong shA ri'i bus mi shes so/ /dge slong shA ri'i bus thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang
459b3('dul ba): dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bus mi shes so/ /dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bus thob pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming yang nyan thos gzhan rnams kyis mi shes te/ dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu bas/ dge slong shA
459b4('dul ba): ri'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che mod kyi/ des mang du gnas pa la dgongs nas ngas rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu'i le'u'o// //de nas
459b5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de smras pa/ de ni der song sngon nas spyad pa dang / /rje mthun tshig dag shin tu sgrog pa na/ /gang zhig byas pas 'bras bu che myong ba/ /
459b6('dul ba): chung ngu gcig pu de ni myur dran nas/ /ji ltar seng ge ri yi phug gnas pa/ /'jigs pa med par spyod yul 'gro ba ltar/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i nyan thos 'od srung de/ /sngon gyi gnas nas spyad pa sgrog
459b7('dul ba): byed pa/ /zag med tha ba med pa rnam grol sems/ /nyon mongs med par gnas pa skyon med yid/ /de la chos mchog yod par yid ches nas/ /de yi chos la yid kyis smon byas te/ /rang sangs
460a1('dul ba): rgyas la bdag gis yon du ni/ /khre rgod bre'u chung gang zhig rab phul bas/ /de 'dra ba dang kun tu phrad gyur cing / /smon pas sgra mi snyan du skyes pa ni/ /las de gcig
460a2('dul ba): pu nyid kyi 'bras bu yis/ /lus can bdag gir 'dzin med tshe ring ba/ /khyad par 'gro zhing spyod pa mi dman pa/ /sgra mi snyan du lan stong skyes par gyur/ /las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bu yis/ /lan
460a3('dul ba): stong sum cu rtsa gsum par skyes te/ me tog phreng rgyan byug pa sna tshogs dang / /mthu chen lus mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur/ /de nas 'phos bdag sgra mi snyan du skyes/ /slar yang lha dge dga' bar
460a4('dul ba): byed pa dang / /sems kyi smon lam dbang gis slar yang bdag/ mi ni dge ba rnams kyi nang du skyes/ /las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bus bdag/ bram ze sA la chen po'i rigs skyes te/ /nor
460a5('dul ba): mang skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bkur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga don mi gnyer yang / /bdag gis ston pa lan 'ga' ma mthong zhing / /mtshungs med nyan thos bdag gis ma mthong nas/ /
460a6('dul ba): bdag gis seng ras tshem gyon 'jig rten na/ /dgra bcom rnams la phyag 'tshal rab tu byung / /bdag ni de ltar rab tu byung ba dang / /rgyal ba bu mang mchod rten na bzhugs mthong / /thub zhabs
460a7('dul ba): phyag 'tshal bcom ldan bdag gi ston/ /bdag ni khyod kyi nyan thos gyur ces gsol/ /'od srung ji skad smras bzhin byas te 'dir/ /khyod ston nga yin nga yi nyan thos khyod/ /gal te sdug
460b1('dul ba): bsngal kun las thar 'dod na/ /khyod kyis snyan par bshad pa'i chos snyan nyon/ /gang yang dag la skyes mchog skyob pa ni/ /thugs rje chen po yis ni chos bshad pa/ /bsam gtan bzhi stobs dbang po
460b2('dul ba): byang chub kyi/ /yan lag lam gyi yan lag rnam par thar/ /de dag bsgom pa bdag gis dga' mgur thob/ /zag pa zad cing lus kyi tha ma bzung / /lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa rdul med pa/ /drang po 'di dag dang
460b3('dul ba): ni bdag gir phrad/ /de bzhin gshegs rgyal phun sum tshogs pa gsungs/ /tshul khrims ldan pa gang 'dod 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag gi yid la ci dang ci bsam pa/ /thams cad grub ste srid pa'i tha ma
460b4('dul ba): 'di/ /bdag gi skye ba zad cing 'ching ba dang / /sred pa kun nas langs pa nyid bcad de/ /bdag ni chos rgyal thugs las skyes pa'i sras/ /nyon mongs tshogs rnams zad pas mya ngan 'da'/ /bdag ni
460b5('dul ba): thams cad gzigs pa yis/ /sbyangs la gnas pa mchog tu bsten/ /zag pa med cing nyes pa bsal/ /go 'phang mi g.yo bdag gis thob/ /gnas brtan 'od srung de lta bur/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen
460b6('dul ba): du| |dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /'od srung gi le'u ste/ /dang po'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nga gnyis pa/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas
460b7('dul ba): brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus las ci zhig byas na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ shes rab chen po dang / spobs pa chen po dang ldan par
461a1('dul ba): gyur/ des smras pa/ bdag gis dgon par rang sangs rgyas/ /drang srong dge sbyong zhir gyur pa/ /skal dang ldan pa chos gos ni/ /de tshe rnying pa gyon pa mthong / /de la bdag gis sems
461a2('dul ba): dad pas/ /bang brgyugs nas kyang chos gos ni/ /drubs shing kha bsgyur de bzhin du/ /de la yang dang yang du gtugs/ /de nas bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /de ni bar snang la 'phags nas/ /rang gi gzi
461a3('dul ba): brjid kyis 'bar zhing / /de nas mkha' la gshegs par gyur/ /bdag gis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /ji ltar bdag ni 'di 'dra bar/ /dbang rnon shes rab cher shog ces/ /de lta bu ni smon lam btab/ /
461a4('dul ba): bdag ni phyug po'i rigs su 'am/ /ma rabs dag tu mi skye bar/ /bar ma'i rigs su skye 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu rab byung mang bar shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag /bdag ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang / /
461a5('dul ba): mi yi rnyed pa thob nas ni/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa
461a6('dul ba): la| |bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur ba'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /btsun pa bdag gis zla phyed kyis/ /'gro ba'i pha rol phyin pa thob/ /dge slong dge 'dun
461a7('dul ba): gung bzhugs nas/ /ston pas bdag ni mngon sum du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba/ /shes rab can gyi gtso bor bstan/ /shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun nas/
461b1('dul ba): ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
461b2('dul ba): chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ni/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ da ni/ khyod kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/
461b3('dul ba): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag sngon drang srong gyur pa'i tshe/ /nags mtha'i dgon par
461b4('dul ba): gnas pa na/ /der ni skyes pa zhig 'ongs nas/ /bdag la rab byung gsol ba 'debs/ /bdag gis rgyugs nas de yi skra/ /bregs nas kyang ni chos gos dag /kha dog bsgyur nas de la byin/ /de yid dga' gyur
461b5('dul ba): de yi tshe/ /phyogs gcig tu ni nyer song nas/ /skyil mo krung bcas 'dug nas des/ /rang byang chub ni reg gyur te/ /de nas mkha' la song bar gyur/ /bdag gis dad bskyed nyer song ste/ /de nas thal mo
461b6('dul ba): legs sbyar te/ /de nas rdzu 'phrul mchog gsol zhing / /smon lam gdab pa byas pa ni/ /drang srong che 'di ci 'dra ba'i/ /bdag gi rdzu 'phrul de 'drar shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/ /gang dang gang du
461b7('dul ba): skyes par ni/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi srid pa tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes
462a1('dul ba): par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa ni bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas rdzu
462a2('dul ba): 'phrul can/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /dge ba chung ngu byas pas ni/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /mi dge ba yi las gang yin/ /bdag gis lung bstan mnyan par gyis/ /grong mchog
462a3('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab tu ni/ /bdag ni tshong dpon khye'u gyur nas/ /khyim gyi phyi rol rtse rtse nas/ /zan gyi phyir yang zhugs pa las/ /de na pha ma gnyis ka ni/ /dben par 'dug pa bdag gis mthong / /de
462a4('dul ba): gnyis mthong nas bdag brdegs shing / /skyengs pas kyang ni spyo ba byas/ /pha dang ma ni gnyis ka la/ /yid kyi nyes pa byas pa ni/ /gang tshe chen por gyur pa na/ /'dam bu bcom pa bzhin gsad snyam/ /bdag
462a5('dul ba): gi yid kyis nyes byas kyi/ /lus kyis byas pa ma yin na/ /bdag ni dmyal ba thig nag tu/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad nyams su myong / /de yi las kyi lhag ma yi/ /bdag gi srid pa tha ma 'dir/ /mu stegs
462a6('dul ba): gzhan gyi dge sbyong gis/ /'dam bu bcom bzhin bdag gtog 'gyur/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal de nyid kyis/ /shi bar gyur te de nas ni/ /las rnams kyi ni lhag ma yang / /tha ma zad par 'gyur ba yin/ /
462a7('dul ba): de bas pha dang ma dag la/ /sems ni rab tu dad par bya/ /sems dad pa yi rgyu yis ni/ /sems can 'gro ba bzang por 'gro /de ltar gnas brtan pang nas skyes/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas//
462b1('dul ba): ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /pang nas skyes kyi le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan la
462b2('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan/ tshe dang ldan pang nas skyes kyi rang gi las kyi rgyu ba bstan zin gyi/ da ni/ tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan
462b3('dul ba): pa mdzes ldan gyis/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa/ dge 'dun kun dgar bdag son na/ /khyams de'i phyag dar mthong nas ni/ /bdag gis phyags ma blangs nas su//
462b4('dul ba): de tshe dga' bas phyag dar byas/ /de nas bdag gi sems dad pas/ /khyams de gtsang mar mthong nas ni/ /ji ltar khyams de gtsang ba ltar/ /nyon mongs med par gyur cig smras/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis na/ /
462b5('dul ba): gang dang gang du skyes par yang / /bdag gi gzugs ni bzang ba dang / /blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur/ /de yi las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi lus ni tha ma la/ /bdag gi pha dang ma gnyis kyis/ /bdag
462b6('dul ba): ming mdzes ldan kho nar btags/ /mdzes ldan bdag ni btsas gyur te/ /gang tshe gnyen tshogs mdun phyin pa/ /de tshe gnyen ni thams cad kyis/ /mgu zhing yid dga' bkur sti byas/ /rdzogs sangs bla na
462b7('dul ba): med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis nyon mongs med gyur ces/ /smon lam btab pa gang yin pa/ /bya ba
463a1('dul ba): byas te nyon mongs med/ /dgra bcom zag pa med pa yin/ /'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad kyang / /ka shi'i gos kyis phyags pa bas/ /gang gis 'dod chags bral ba
463a2('dul ba): yi/ /drang srong 'chag gcig phyags pa'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling na drang srong gi/ 'chags thams cad phyags pa bas/ /gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi/ /re lde tsam dag phyags pa'o/ /'dzam
463a3('dul ba): bu'i gling na dge 'dun gyi/ /kun dga' ra ba kun phyags pas/ /gang gis rgyal ba'i mchod rten ni/ /khru gang tsam zhig phyags pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyis ni gang rtogs pa'i/ /khyad par de dag shes byas
463a4('dul ba): nas| |bde gshegs mchod rten phyags nas ni/ /sems kyang rab tu dang bar gyis/ /de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /yon tan mang po shes pa yis/ /mchod rten rnams la bkur sti byos/ /
463a5('dul ba): 'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur/ /btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/ /gang byas dran pa 'di lags te/ /de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang / /'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong / /de bas rgyal ba'i mchod
463a6('dul ba): rten la| |mchod pa dag ni bzang po gyis/ /btsun pa 'di ni bsod rnams zhing / /dam pa bla na med pa yin/ /rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos
463a7('dul ba): la| |sems ni rab tu dang byas pa'i/ /yon ni chung ngur 'gyur ma yin/ /de ltar gnas brtan mdzes ldan gyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi
463b1('dul ba): las ni lung bstan to/ /mdzes ldan gyi le'u ste/ bzhi pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe
463b2('dul ba): dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog / tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ da ni/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /sna ma'i me tog rna rgyan byas/ /mgo la
463b3('dul ba): me tog phreng bcings nas/ /ne'u zla rnams kyis yongs bskor te/ /skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su byung / /de na thub pa chen po pa/ /rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen thams cad
463b4('dul ba): nas| |legs par mchod pa bdag gis mthong / /de nas ne'u zla rnams khrid nas/ /rang rang gi ni phreng ba kun/ /sems ni dad par byas nas su/ /mchod rten de la gdags pa byas/ /de na bdag gis
463b5('dul ba): de dag dang / /skye bo mang po gzhan mthong nas/ /sna ma rna ba las phral te/ /de tshe mchod rten gdags pa byas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag /gang dang gang du skye bar yang / /bsod nams byas pas
463b6('dul ba): mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa ni bdag gis thob/ /me tog
463b7('dul ba): gcig ni btang bas na/ /lo ni bye ba brgya phrag tu/ /bdag gis lha yi longs spyad nas/ /de yi lhag mas mya ngan 'das/ /btsun pa gal te sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon tan phal cher 'tshal gyur nas//
464a1('dul ba): sems ni shin tu dang ba yis/ /phyir zhing bsnyen bkur bgyis pa zhig /de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon tan mang po shes pa yis/ /mchod rten rnams la
464a2('dul ba): bkur sti byos/ /'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur/ /rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos la/ /sems ni rab tu dang byas pa'i/ /yon ni chung bar 'gyur
464a3('dul ba): ma yin| |btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/ /gang byas dran pa 'di lags te/ /de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang / /'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong / /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /yang srid skye
464a4('dul ba): pa zad pa dang / /nyon mongs bcom nas bsil gyur pa'i/ /bdag ni dgra bcom mya ngan 'das/ /bdag ni yang srid nyal ba dang / /'khor ba gang du 'ang nyal ba yin/ /bdag gi skye ba tha
464a5('dul ba): ma ni| |'di yin len pa med par 'gyur/ /de nyid kyi ni rgyu yis bdag /sna ma'i me tog ming 'di gdags/ /sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol zhing / /srid pa'i mtsho las brgal bar
464a6('dul ba): gyur/ /de ltar gnas brtan sna ma ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /sna ma'i me tog gi le'u ste/ lnga
464a7('dul ba): pa'o/ / //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa/ /tshe dang ldan
464b1('dul ba): pa sna ma'i me tog gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang da ni/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pas las ci zhig byas na/ las des/ bcom
464b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/ des smras pa/ rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la/ /rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/ /bdag gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi/ /
464b3('dul ba): gnas khang gcig cig brtsigs nas ni/ /bdag gis gnas khang de yi gzhir/ /ras phran rnams kyis sa gzhi g.yogs/ /sems dga' ba dang yid bde bas/ /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /rdzogs
464b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas ni mnyes byas te/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa phyogs zhi ba/ /rga med go 'phang reg par shog /bdag gi bsod nams des ni bdag /bsod nams byas pas mdzes
464b5('dul ba): pa yi| |bskal pa dgu bcur lha dang ni/ /mi rnams su ni 'khor bar gyur/ /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi lus ni tha ma la/ /tsam par tshong dpon mchog gi yang / /bu gcig par ni
464b6('dul ba): bdag skyes so/ /bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang / /pha yis thos nas 'dun gyur pa/ /gzhon nu la ni bdag gi nor/ /bye ba nyi shu sbyin par bya/ /bdag gi rkang mthil gnyis ka'i spu/ /shin tu
464b7('dul ba): phra zhing mnyen pa dang / /reg na bde zhing 'jam pa yi/ /shing bal 'dab lta'i sor bzhi skyes/ /'das pa'i bskal ba dgu bcu dang / /bskal pa gcig 'di lhag par ni/ /sa gzhi gding
465a1('dul ba): bas ma g.yogs par/ /rkang pa 'jog ni ma myong ngo / /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom
465a2('dul ba): pa yang bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas brtson 'grus can/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /zag med nyes pa spangs pa yi/ /go 'phang mi g.yo bdag gis thob/ /gnas
465a3('dul ba): brtan bye ba nyi shu pa/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /de ltar ma dros mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /bye ba nyi shu pa'i le'u ste/ drug pa'o// //de nas
465a4('dul ba): dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang / tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin
465a5('dul ba): gyi| tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / des smras pa/ 'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcur ni/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha rnams dang ni mir skyes te/ /bdag
465a6('dul ba): gis ngan 'gro mi shes so/ /bdag gis dge ba mi shes te/ /phan tshun zla ltas 'bab zhig gis/ /rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ni/ /mthong nas de tshe bsnyen bkur byas/ /'gron bu
465a7('dul ba): drug cu rnams kyis ni/ /dri dang phreng ba byug nyos te/ /mchod rten la ni gdags byas pas/ /bdag na ni log par ltung ma gyur/ /dge ba chung ngu byas pas ni/ /bde ba mang po nyams
465b1('dul ba): su myang / /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /gal te rdzogs sangs rgyas gyur la/ mchod rten de la bdag gis su/ /bkur sti byas par gyur na ni/ /
465b2('dul ba): legs par mang byed 'gyur ba zhig /de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon tan mang po shes pa yis/ /mchod rten bkur sti byos shig dang / /'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur/ /thams cad
465b3('dul ba): gzigs pas mang thos dang / /sna tshogs gtam dang dge ba yis/ /spobs ldan tshigs bcad byed pa ni/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /de ltar gnas brtan ngag dbang ni/ /dge
465b4('dul ba): slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ngag dbang gi le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan
465b5('dul ba): gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len la tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang gis rang gi las
465b6('dul ba): kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ /tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni tshong dpon bur
465b7('dul ba): gyur nas/ /pha yi khyim na dbang byed tshe/ /bdag gis pha ni yid bsrubs shing / /ma la log pa mi mthun byas/ /pha dang sring mo spun dang ni/ /bran dang las byed rnams la yang / /zas
466a1('dul ba): dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang / /ma la spyo ba byas nas su/ /bdag ni ser snas zil non pas/ /ma la zas ni ma byin par/ /khros pas tshig tu smras pa ni/ /zas su rdo ba zo
466a2('dul ba): zhig byas/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /rab tu tsha dang thig nag gi /dmyal bar lan mang lhung nas ni/ /sdug bsngal mi nyung thob par gyur/ /dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas/ /mi yi srid
466a3('dul ba): pa thob pa nas/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /bdag ni rdo ba za bar gyur/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /bdag gi rdo ba ma zos shing / /de bzhin bkres skom sdug bsngal gyis/ /bdag ni 'chi
466a4('dul ba): ba'i dus byas so/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi srid thob pa 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung
466a5('dul ba): thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas seng ge yi/ /sgra sgrog pa yi mchog tu bstan/ /bdag gis nyon mongs thams
466a6('dul ba): cad spangs/ /nyon mongs bral bas zag pa med/ /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /de ltar rdzu 'phrul ldan lags na/ /phug na bdag gi zas mchis pa/ /rdo ba nyid du gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bdag
466a7('dul ba): gis sdig pa ni/ /gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ /las rnams chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /b+ha ra d+hA dza bsod snyoms len/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas//
466b1('dul ba): ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len gyi le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang
466b2('dul ba): ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs/ tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs
466b3('dul ba): kyis kyang nga rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/ /tshong dpon bu phor gyur nas
466b4('dul ba): ni| |bdag ni nor dang 'bru mang zhing / /skye bo'i tshogs kyis bkur ba dang / /rgyal po dang ni grong mi dang / /gsang tshig brjod pa rnams kyis bkur/ /blta na sdug cing mdzes pa dang / /dar la bab pa
466b5('dul ba): gzugs kyis rgyags/ /de nas bdag ni shing rtar zhugs/ /skye bo'i tshogs kyis mdun byas nas/ /'dod pa kun dang ldan gyur cing / /skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su byung / /skyed mos tshal der dge sbyong
466b6('dul ba): ni| |dbang po legs par bsdams pa dang / /dbang po zhi bas rgyu byed pa/ /chos gos rnying pa can zhig mthong / /dge sbyong de mthong bdag gis ni/ /yid mi bde ba skye gyur te/ /de skyon med kyang mi
466b7('dul ba): sdug nas/ /smad cing spyo ba byas nas ni/ /kha dog ngan cing 'jigs par snang / /mdze can lus ni lus rma can/ /sha bri ngan cing rtsa thon pa/ /rab tu byung 'di su yi yin/ /ngag gi nyes pa spyad pa
467a1('dul ba): dang / /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /de nas shi 'pho'i dus byas nas/ /dmyal ba rnams su skye bar gyur/ /dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag /kha dog ngan cing
467a2('dul ba): sdug bsngal ldan/ /mdze can lus ni lus rma can/ /sha bri ngan cing rtsa thon gyur/ /lag na gyo mo thogs shing rgyu/ /sha ni ras kyi smad g.yogs byon/ /phyag dar phung po'i steng na nyal/ /gnas
467a3('dul ba): med mgon med skyob pa med/ /zas kyi ched du sprang ba na/ /gang dang gang du song na yang / /dbyug pa can gyis phyir ldog cing / /de dag bdag la smod par byed/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /gang
467a4('dul ba): dang gang du skyes pa der/ /bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /sems can kun gyis bdag gi ming / /nyes 'ongs pa zhes smad pa byas/ /kun gyis yid du mi 'ongs
467a5('dul ba): pas/ /de tshe smad pa byed par gyur/ /bdag gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun gyis byas/ /skye bo'i tshogs ni chen po la/ /dam pa'i gnas ni ston pa mthong / /skye bo'i tshogs
467a6('dul ba): de mthong nas ni/ /ji tsam 'dod pa'i zas dang skom/ /rnyed par gyur na ster snyam nas/ /myur du rgyugs te phyin pa dang / /skye bo'i tshogs ni chos kyi phyir/ /'dug pa de ni mthong nas kyang / /zas sbyin pa ni
467a7('dul ba): med do zhes/ /bdag ni re chad slar log go /de nas thub pa thugs rje can/ /mgon pos bdag la bka' stsal pa/ /'ongs pa legs tshur khyod bde 'am/ /stan 'di la ni khyod 'dug cig /bdag
467b1('dul ba): ni dga' ba thob gyur nas/ /thal mo legs sbyar de'i 'og tu/ /ston pa'i zhabs la phyag byas nas/ /phyogs gcig tu ni bdag 'dug go /de nas ston pa thugs rje can/ /go'u tam rjes su thugs brtse bas//
467b2('dul ba): rim pa bzhin gyi gtam gsungs pas/ /bdag ni bden pa mthong bar bgyis/ /bden pa mthong nas thub chen la/ /de nas bdag gis rab 'byung gsol/ /go'u tam thugs rje chen pos bdag /rjes su brtse bas
467b3('dul ba): rab tu byung / /'jig rten gyi ni 'dren pa yis/ /bdag ming legs 'ongs zhes btags shing / /me yi khams la snyoms 'jug pa/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /de ltar gnas brtan legs 'ongs
467b4('dul ba): kyis| |dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /legs 'ongs kyi le'u ste/ dgu pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas
467b5('dul ba): brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis
467b6('dul ba): kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ grong mchog rgyal po'i khab tu ni/ /tshong dpon phyug por gyur pa na/ /de
467b7('dul ba): na mu ge byung gyur nas/ /drang srong rnams ni gso skal bgos/ /de nas bdag gi gso skal du/ /skal dang ldan pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /zag pa med pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /drang srong mdzes pa gcig cig byon//
468a1('dul ba): sems ni ser sna'i skyon can gyis/ /bdag gi sdig pa bsam pa ni/ /da lta'i dus su dge sbyong 'di/ /lo bdun du ni su zhig gso/ /khyi yi gcin ni bskol ba yis/ /de
468a2('dul ba): nas 'bras kyi chan btsos te/ /de na drang srong za ru bcug /de tshe de ni 'chi dus byas/ /sdig pa'i las ni de byas pas/ /bsdus gzhom dang ni ngu 'bod dang / /de bzhin tsha ba rab tsha ba'i/ /dmyal
468a3('dul ba): ba rnams su yun ring btsos/ /dmyal ba las ni shi 'phos bdag /mi yi srid pa thob na yang / /nad bu can la gzhan dbang dang / /sdug bsngal gyis ni bdag dus byas/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga
468a4('dul ba): brgyar ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /mi sdug nad dang mi bzad pas/ /rtag tu bdag ni dus byas so/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /
468a5('dul ba): ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gi rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /btsun pa da ltar
468a6('dul ba): na yang bdag / rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing zag med kyang / /nad bu can la 'gre ldog pa/ /de lta bus ni bdag 'tsho'o/ /de ltar gnas brtan dga' yod kyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug
468a7('dul ba): nas| |ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ma 'gag pa'i grogs po dga' yod kyi le'u ste/ bcu pa'o// //sdom ni/ 'od srung shA ri'i bu dang ni/ /mo'u
468b1('dul ba): dgal bu dang mdzes ldan dang / /sna ma gro bzhin ngag dbang dang / /bsod snyoms legs 'ongs dga' yod do/ /de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pa la 'di skad
468b2('dul ba): ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
468b3('dul ba): grags pas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon dgon pa'i drang srong gyur/ /grong du bsod snyoms phyir song na/ /rnam par sngos pa'i bam pa yi/ /bud med kyi ni ro zhig mthong / /
468b4('dul ba): bdag gis tshul bzhin brtag byas te/ /skyil mo krung bcas 'dug nas ni/ /rtse gcig shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /der ni mi sdug sgom pa byas/ /bdag 'dug pa las de yi lto/ /rdol nas 'jigs pa'i sgra
468b5('dul ba): byung ba| |thos par gyur nas bdag kyang ni/ /ting nge 'dzin la langs par gyur/ /de yi lto na yod pa yi/ /ngan skyugs dang ni khrag dang ni/ /rul pa'i dri dang mi gtsang ba/ /kun nas rab tu 'dzag pa mthong / /rgyu ma
468b6('dul ba): gnye ma mkhal ma dang / /snying dang de bzhin glo ba dang / /srin bu brgya phrag za byed nas/ /slar yang sems ni mnyam par bzhag /de ci 'dra bar 'di de 'dra/ /'di ci 'dra bar de de 'dra/ /phyi yi ro ni mthong gyur
468b7('dul ba): nas| |rang gi lus la gtod par byed/ /de nas ting 'dzin las langs nas/ /bsti gnas su ni slar log ste/ /de tshe bsod snyoms ma spyad de/ /zas kyang bza' ba ma byas so/ /gang tshe bdag yang grong khyer du//
469a1('dul ba): zas kyi ched du zhugs pa na/ /yid 'phrog pa yi gzugs mthong nas/ /de la mi gtsang bsgoms byas pa/ /de yi ro ni ci 'dra bar/ /gzugs gtogs de kun de 'dra ste/ /
469a2('dul ba): khog pa mi gtsang bas gang ba/ /thams cad smad pa yin no zhes/ /de ltar yang dang yang bsgoms pas/ /bdag gis 'dod chags bral ba thob/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshad med pa/ /bzhi po legs
469a3('dul ba): par bsgoms byas pas/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ /tshangs pa yi ni 'jig rten skyes/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten shi 'phos bdag /wA ra NA si'i grong du skyes/ /tshong dpon mchog gi bu
469a4('dul ba): gcig par/ /dpal dang bdag nyid der skyes te/ /kun la sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ /mthar phyin gnas ni thob par gyur/ /bdag ni nyin mo yongs rgyu zhing / /mtshan mo dag nyi nyal bar byed/ /myur
469a5('dul ba): bar de nas langs pa na/ /de na bud med mang po dag/ /rdza rnga dang ni rnga chen dang / /'khar rnga'i pi wang sngas btsugs nas/ /sgren mor bla rdol byed pa dang / /lag brkyang nas ni gnyid log mthong //
469a6('dul ba): de nas bdag gi sngon gyi rgyu/ /mthu chen po ni skyes par gyur/ /bdag la de nas bud med la/ /dur khrod mi gtsang 'du shes byung / /de nas skyo bar gyur nas ni/ /bdag gis sdang ba'i tshig
469a7('dul ba): smras pa| |grogs pos bdag ni gces gyur te/ /kun nas 'tshe bas reg par gyur/ /de nas mal nas langs nas ni/ /khang bzang nas ni shod du babs/ /lhas ni rjes su snying brtse bas/ /bdag
469b1('dul ba): gi sgo ni rnam par phye/ /grong khyer nas ni mngon byung nas/ /'bab chu'i ngogs su nye bar song / /bdag gis pha rol 'gram na ni/ /dge sbyong dbang po bsdams pa mthong / /bdag gis dge sbyong de
469b2('dul ba): mthong nas/ /sgra gsang bstod de smras pa ni/ /dge sbyong dag ni gtses gyur te/ /grogs po bdag la 'tshe bas reg /de nas ston pas bdag la yang / /de tshe bdud rtsi'i tshig gsungs pa/ /gzhon
469b3('dul ba): nu ma 'jigs khyod tshur shog / 'dir ni khyed la 'tshe ba med/ /bdag gis nor bu'i lham phud de/ /'bab chu yi ni ngogs brgal nas/ /sangs rgyas gang zag zla med pa/ /thugs rje can gyi spyan
469b4('dul ba): sngar song / /de nas bdag sgom thugs chud nas/ /gang zag zla med ston pa des/ /snyan pa'i chos ni bka' stsal pa/ /de ni so sor bdag gis rtogs/ /de nas bdag gis bden mthong nas//
469b5('dul ba): thub chen rab byung gsol ba btab/ /go'u tam thugs rje chen po yis/ /thugs brtse ba yis rab tu phyung / /mtshan gcig lon nas de nas ni/ /nyi ma 'char kha tsam na ni/ /bdag gi zag pa kun
469b6('dul ba): zad cing / /bdag ni bsil gyur mya ngan 'das/ /de ltar gnas brtan grags pa ni/ dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gnas
469b7('dul ba): brtan grags pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tsho dang ldan pa dpal skyed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dpal
