470a1('dul ba): skyed| tshe dang ldan pa grags pas/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis kyang nga rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /
470a2('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis/ de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du/ /ston pa 'od srung mya ngan 'das/ /rgyal po kri kris rin chen las/ /byas pa'i
470a3('dul ba): mchod rten chen po brtsigs/ /rgyal po kri kri'i grags ldan bu/ /bdag ni thu bor gyur pa na/ /bdag gis thog mar gdugs kyis ni/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten la gdags byas/ /dge ba'i las
470a4('dul ba): ni de byas pas/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /bsod nams byas pa'i mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /phyug cing longs spyod che ba dang / /nor dang 'brur ni ldan
470a5('dul ba): pa yi| |bdag ni yon bdag chen por gyur/ /bdag gis tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /sbyin pa mi nyung btang byas te/ /slong ba pa dang dge sbyong dang / /bram ze so sor tshim par byas/ /shin tu dad pa'i
470a6('dul ba): sems kyis ni/ /'dod chags bral zhing zag med pa/ /tha ba med pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /lnga brgya po dag tshim par byas/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /srid pa tha ma 'di la ni/ /shAkya phyug
470a7('dul ba): po'i rigs su skyes/ /btsas ma thag tu tshig smras pa/ /khyim 'di na ni nor 'bru dag /ji ga cung zad cig yod dam/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ngas btang ngo / /dbul po rnams su tshim par byas/ /dbul
470b1('dul ba): po rnams la zas byin dang / /gtong bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med/ /ji ga nor lta yod dam khyed/ /bdag la myur du legs par smros/ /de dag bdag gi tshig thos nas/ /yid skyo bar ni gyur nas su/ /
470b2('dul ba): ma ma gtogs par phyogs dang ni/ /phyogs su rnam par rgyug par byed/ /ma ni bu la byams pa yis/ /de tshe bdag la 'di skad smras/ /lha'am mi 'am gnod sbyin nam/ /khyod su bdag la myur du
470b3('dul ba): smros| / ma gcig khyod kyi bu bdag ni/ /mi lags srin po ma lags te/ /sbyin bdag tshe rabs dran pas na/ /rtag tu sbyin pa gtong la spro/ /bdag gi tshig de mas thos nas/ /yid ni dga' bar
470b4('dul ba): gyur nas kyang / /dbugs 'byin byed cing smras pa ni/ /bu gcig ci dgar sbyin pa mthong / /yo byad mang po rnams kyis kyang / /bdag la mas ni gso ba byas/ /kun la sdug cing yod 'ong ba/ /bdag ni
470b5('dul ba): lta bas ngoms mi myong / /bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang / /khyim de nor dang 'bru rnams dang / /gser dang bran dang las byed pa/ /rnams kyang rtag tu 'phel bar gyur/ /dpal skyed khye'u zhig btsas
470b6('dul ba): gyur la| |btsas ma thag tu smras pas na/ /bdag gi ming ni gnyen rnams kyis/ /dpal skyed ces ni bya bar btags/ /de nas bdag gis sbyin btang zhing / /dbul po rnams ni tshim byas te/ /rdzogs
470b7('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bdag ni 'tsho med 'jigs pa'am/ /bu lon nyen pas rab byung min/ /de tshe dad pas rab byung nas/ /mngon shes drug po bdag
471a1('dul ba): gis thob/ /bdag ni rgyal po blon po dang / /de bzhin grong mi rnams kyis mchod/ /zas dang btung ba gos dang ni/ /gnas mal yang ni rnyed par gyur/ /de ltar gnas
471a2('dul ba): brtan dpal skyed kyis/ dge slong gnas brtan mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /dpal skyed kyi le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// //der
471a3('dul ba): dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang po rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la/ tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba
471a4('dul ba): lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa ba ku las kyang / da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba ku las/ de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i pho brang
471a5('dul ba): bshes ldan du/ /bdag sngon spos 'tshong gyur pa la/ /rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab kyi/ /dge slong dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/ /khyed cag ji snyed bzhed pa yi/ /snyun sman bdag gis dbul
471a6('dul ba): bgyis te/ /shun pa rtsa ba 'bras bu'i sman/ /dge 'dun bdag gis tshim par bgyis/ /dge 'dun g.yar ni spyan drangs nas/ /bdag la dge slong gcig cig gis/ /a ru ra gcig ma gtogs
471a7('dul ba): par| |de nas 'ga' yang slong ba med/ /bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/ /bdag ni log par ltung ma gyur/ /sman sbyin pa yi rnam smin ni/ /mthu chen 'di la blta bar gyis/ /dge ba chung ngu
471b1('dul ba): byas pas ni/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /a ru ra ni gcig byin pas/ /yun ring mtho ris rnams su dga'/ /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/ /yul 'khor bsod snyoms len
471b2('dul ba): pa dag / slob pa na yang ma myong ngo / /nub gsum kho nas rig pa ni/ /gsum po bdag gis mngon sum byas/ /ngan ngon gyis ni 'tsho byas shing / /phyag dar khrod kyi chos gos 'chang / /khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba
471b3('dul ba): dang / |bdag ni 'dres par mi gnas te/ /bdag gi tshe ni lo brgya dang / /drug cu lhag cig lon na yang / /de tsam bar du'ang bdag gis ni/ /na bar mngon par mi dran te/ /btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni/ /
471b4('dul ba): chung ngu bgyis pa 'di dran te/ /de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong 'dod/ /bde ba byung ba nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan pa ku las/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi
471b5('dul ba): las ni lung bstan to/ /ba ku la'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan zhes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras
471b6('dul ba): so| |tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan/ tshe dang ldan pa ba ku las/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan
471b7('dul ba): pa gnas brtan zhes bya bas/ de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su/ /bdag ni lham mkhan gyur pa na/ /mu ge byung nas de na bdag /ko ba'i ras ma
472a1('dul ba): rnams 'tshod do/ /bza' bar bya ba kho na'i phyir/ /ko ba'i ras ma 'tshod pa las/ /dge sbyong gzhan zhig zas kyi phyir/ /bsod snyoms la ni byon pa dang / /de la bdag
472a2('dul ba): gis sems dad pas/ /ko ras kyi ni thug pa byin/ /dge sbyong des ni longs spyad nas/ /de ni nam mkhar 'phags par gyur/ /bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /thal mo legs par sbyar byas
472a3('dul ba): te| |de nas gang dang gang du ni/ /song ba kun tu 'brang byas so/ /dga' ba rgya chen thob nas kyang / /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dang bdag/ lhan cig 'dug par
472a4('dul ba): gyur par shog / dge slong 'di yi las gyis ni/ /dri med chos ni gang reg pa/ /bdag gis chos de reg gyur ces/ /de tshe smon lam btab par gyur/ /kha dog ldan pa ma yin zhing / /dri ni
472a5('dul ba): sman par gyur pa dang / /ro dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i/ /sbyin pa de tshe bdag gis btang / /dge ba chung ngu byas pas kyang / /bde ba mang po myong bar gyur/ /bsod nams byas pa'i mdzes pa yis//
472a6('dul ba): lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /bdag gi smon lam gang btab pa'i/ /
472a7('dul ba): byang chub dam pa 'di reg ste/ /bdag gis da ltar bsil gyur pa'i/ /mya ngan 'das pa legs par thob/ /de nas gnas brten chen po ni/ /gnas brten zhes bya mthu chen gyi/ /ma dros pa yi
472b1('dul ba): mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gnas brtan zhes bya'i le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng
472b2('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa gnas brtan gsum la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /gnas brtan gnas brtan zhes bya bas/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa
472b3('dul ba): dag gis kyang / da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas de rnams kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par brtsams pa/ bdag cag gsum ni spun gyur nas/ /lhan cig tshong dpon gyur
472b4('dul ba): pa na| |'od srung mchod rten ral pa la/ /shag shig 'dus pa mthong gyur nas/ /tshong pa thams cad bsdus nas ni/ /des na slar yang gsar par brtsigs/ /spun rnams dag ni lhan cig tu/ /
472b5('dul ba): gdugs gsum zhig ni gdags par byas/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /mtho ris gnas su yun ring dga'/ /mi rnams su ni slar 'ongs nas/ /phyug po'i rigs can dag tu skyes/ /rdzogs
472b6('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas ma mthong nas/ /mu stegs gzhan las rab tu byung / /ne rany+dza na'i chu ngogs su/ /cho 'phrul mdzad pa mthong nas ni/ /de nas de la rab byung phyir/ /bdag cag gis kyang gsol ba
472b7('dul ba): btab| |de nas thugs rje can gyi ni/ /thugs brtses bdag cag rab tu phyung / /bdag cag ga yas mgor son nas/ /go'u ta ma yi bstan pa thos/ /de nas brtson 'grus brtsams pas ni/ /mya ngan
473a1('dul ba): 'das pa dam pa thob/ /de ltar ston pa bkur byas shing / /de tshe mchod rten mngon btud pas/ /bdag cag kun ni rab byung nas/ /bsil bar gyur te mya ngan
473a2('dul ba): 'das| |lteng rgyas dang ni chu klung dang / /ga ya 'od srung gnas brtan gsum/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /lteng rgyas dang / chu klung dang / ga ya 'od srung rnams kyi
473a3('dul ba): le'u ste| bco lnga pa'o/ / //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
473a4('dul ba): lteng rgyas dang / chu klung dang / ga ya 'od srung rnams kyis/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang / da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang
473a5('dul ba): ldan pa grags pas kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon dri 'tshong gyur pa na/ /dri rnams 'tshong la mkhas gyur pas/ /de ni de tshe nyo ba'i phyir/ /bud med
473a6('dul ba): gzhon nu ma dag 'ongs/ /der ni bdag gi gzugs ldan ma'i/ /bud med 'ongs pa mthong nas ni/ /'dran brkyang gi ni tshig smra zhing / /chags pa'i sems kyis reg par byas/ /'du zhing
473a7('dul ba): lhan cig 'khod pa'am/ /mi tshangs spyod pa spro med kyang / /ma brtags gzhan gyi bud med la/ /lag pas reg par byas pas na/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams
473b1('dul ba): su skyes/ /slar yang ming ni 'ongs pa na/ /lag pa g.yas pa bskams par gyur/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /rtag tu bdag gi lag pa ni/ /g.yas pa zha zhing
473b2('dul ba): rnam par bskams/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /mya ngan 'das pa bder gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /btsun pa bdag gis mi dge ba/ /
473b3('dul ba): gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ /las rnams chud mi za bas ni/ /de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /da dung du yang bdun pa dag/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul ldan gyur na'ang / /lag pa g.yas 'di ji lta
473b4('dul ba): bar| |g.yon pa de lta ma lags so/ /skyes pa'am bud med gang yang rung / /byi ba byed pa gang yin pa/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes gyur nas/ /de ni sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /mkhas pa blo dang
473b5('dul ba): ldan pa'i mis/ /rab 'bar me ni ji lta bar/ /gzhan gyi bud med rnams spang zhing / /rang gi chung mas chog par gyis/ /gzhan gyi bud med mthong nas ni/ /skyes pa gang zhig de la chags/ /dmyal ba'i
473b6('dul ba): tshor bas nyen pa yis/ /sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis de ltar sdig byas pas/ /sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/ /yun ring dmyal ba de yi ni/ /'bras bu mi nyung nyams su myong //
473b7('dul ba): bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di/ /bla na med pa'i gnas thob nas/ /sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol zhing / /bsil bar gyur cing mya ngan 'das/ /de lta bas na bde 'dod cing / /sdug bsngal nyid ni mi 'dod
474a1('dul ba): pas| |gzhan gyi bud med bgrod mi bya/ /de ltar sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnas brtan grags pa ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa
474a2('dul ba): yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gnas brtan grags pa'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa
474a3('dul ba): me skyes la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa me skyes/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyi kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston
474a4('dul ba): cig |de nas tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyi/ de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du/ /rnam par gzigs kyi tshangs spyod tshe/ /nyon mongs med ces
474a5('dul ba): bya ba yi| |tshong dpon nor mang zhig tu gyur/ /thub chen rnam par gzigs pa yi/ /'khor ni stong phrag brgya dag dang / /drug cu rtsa gnyis yod par gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po bshes ldan dang / /
474a6('dul ba): bdag gis mi yi khyu mchog ni/ /zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas/ /phyir zhing bshos thang bskyed pa yis/ /tshogs dang bcas te tshim par byas/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas zla gsum du/ /bshos
474a7('dul ba): gsol de nas bshes ldan gyis/ /de tshe rjes gcod ston mo ni/ /bza' bca' dang ni na bza' dang / /gnas mal dag dang ldan pa gsol/ /de nas skyed mos tshal bstar ba/ /rgyal po des
474b1('dul ba): ni phul bar gyur/ /de bzhin dge slong re re la/ /gos kyis kun nas g.yogs pa'i stan/ /brgya stong dag dang de yi tes/ /gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa yi/ /glang po shin tu legs brgyan pa/ /mi nyung ba dag sbyin
474b2('dul ba): par btang / /dge slong re re'i spyi bor ni/ /de tshe gdugs kyang 'dzin par byas/ /de na bud med legs brgyan bus/ /tsan+dan a ka rus bskus pa/ /de tshe dge slong re re la yang / /bsnyen bkur dag ni byed du bcug/
474b3('dul ba): rgyal po de ni de lta bu'i/ /rjes gcod pa yi bkur sti byas/ /drang srong gtso bo rnam par 'dren/ /rgyal pos tshim par byas pa dang / /stan de phun sum tshogs mthong nas/ /de nas bdag gis bsam pa ni/ /bdag la
474b4('dul ba): bza' dang bca' yod kyang / /'di 'dra ba yi stan med de/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra dang / /glang po bdag la ga la bdog /lha yi dbang po dbang bsgyur ba/ /brgya byin bdag gi drung du 'ongs/ /de nas brgya
474b5('dul ba): byin bdag la smras/ /khyod kyi grogs ni ngas bya zhes/ /des ni lha yi skyed mos tshal/ /mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba sbrul/ /lha yi gdan ni bshams nas ni/ /lha yi g.yogs pa rnams kyis g.yogs/ /de
474b6('dul ba): nas bdag gis bcom ldan 'das/ /rnam gzigs 'jig rten gyis bkur ba/ /mi mchog de ni nyan thos bcas/ /gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs nas/ /sa srung la sogs glang po rnams/ /lha yi rgyan gyis
474b7('dul ba): legs brgyan pa/ /dge slong re re'i spyi bor ni/ /de tshe gdugs dag 'dzin par byas/ /de nas rnam par 'dren pa ni/ /lha yi zhal zas rnams kyis bstabs/ /thub pa nyan thos thabs cig la/ /bdag gis lha
475a1('dul ba): yi gos kyis g.yogs/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /bsod nams byas pas lha dang ni/ /mi yi nang du mdzes gyur pa/ /bskal pa dgu bcu
475a2('dul ba): rtsa gcig tu/ /ngan 'gro bdag gis mi shes so/ /rnam par gzigs pa dpal ldan pa'i/ /drang srong chen po bsnyen bkur bas/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di/ /rgyal po'i khab tu bdag skyes so/ /
475a3('dul ba): gzugs can snying po'i grong khyer du/ /nor chen phyug po'i khyim du ni/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni/ /de tshe bdag rjed bkur sti byas/ /blon po rnams dang grong mi la/ /kun nas sdug cing
475a4('dul ba): yid du 'ong / /lha yi 'dod pas rtag tu ni/ /srid pa 'dir ni bdag tshim byas/ /mir gyur na yang lha rnams kyi/ /'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong / /de nas ded dpon bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rnam
475a5('dul ba): par 'dren pa po/ /thub pa chen po thugs brtse bas/ /rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs par gyur/ /sangs rgyas shes rab chen po ni/ /rgyal po'i khab byon bdag gis thos/ /bcom ldan thub de gang
475a6('dul ba): na bar| |dga' ba'i yid kyis song ba dang / /'jig rten gsal ba 'od mdzad pa/ /sgron ma 'dzin pa mthong nas ni/ /de tshe babs te rkang pas ni/ /thub pa'i spyan sngar song nas kyang / /thub pa che
475a7('dul ba): la bdag mgu bas/ /zhabs gnyis la ni mgos phyag byas/ /skyes mchog la ni phyag byas nas/ /phyogs gcig tu ni 'dug nas su/ /'gro bas bsnyen bkur byas pa yi/ /dpal chen bdud kyi
475b1('dul ba): 'ching ba bcad / ded dpon mi yi nyi ma la/ /ring por ma thogs mnyes par byas/ /'jig rten ston pa bla na med/ /des ni bdag la thugs brtse bas/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bshad de/ /de
475b2('dul ba): tshe bdag gis so sor rtogs/ /de nas bdag gis thugs rje can/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'di skad gsol/ /dpa' bo bdag ni rab 'byung zhing / /bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob par 'tshal/ /de nas shes
475b3('dul ba): rab dam pa can/ /sangs rgyas gang zag zla med pas/ /dge slong tshur shog ces gsungs pas/ /bdag ni bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur/ /des na bdag ni bag yod cing / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan
475b4('dul ba): brtan po yis/ /bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das zhi ba'i/ /gnas kyi dam pa reg par gyur/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom
475b5('dul ba): pa yang bdag gis thob/ /srid par 'khor bar skye ba dang / /'chi ba rnams las bdag grol zhing / /mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa las/ /thams cad du ni bdag grol to/ /de ltar gnas brtan me skyes
475b6('dul ba): kyis| |dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /me skyes kyi le'u ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan
475b7('dul ba): gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe
476a1('dul ba): dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed
476a2('dul ba): de| ka sha'i yul 'khor dar byed pa/ /rgyal po kri kri zhes bya byung / /rgyal po kri kri'i bu tha chung / /de yi tshe na bdag gyur to/ /'od srung dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /mchod rten chen po brtsigs pa dang / /pha
476a3('dul ba): yi yid ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /de la gdugs bu chung zhig phul/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod rten la/ /gdugs ni gdags pa byas pa des/ /rab byung rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /lhan cig 'grogs
476a4('dul ba): gyur smon lam btab/ /dge ba'i las ni de byas pas/ /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di/ /bang mdzod stug
476a5('dul ba): por bdag skyes te/ /der yang tshong dpon khyim du skyes/ /rigs kyi bu gcig bur gyur te/ /mi dbang ko'u rab bya dang ni/ /de bzhin kun sdug yid du 'ong / /de bzhin yul mi rnams dang ni/ /bdag ni
476a6('dul ba): gnyen tshogs yid du 'ong / /mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang / /gzugs bzang shin tu dbyibs legs shing / /mi yi 'byor pa rnams kyis ni/ /'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /ston pa dga'
476a7('dul ba): zhing yid 'ong ba/ /bang mdzod stug por gshegs pa ni/ /bdag gis mthong nas sems dad pa/ /rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab/ /ston pa gang zag zla med de/ /bsam pa kun la mkhas gyur
476b1('dul ba): pas| |bdag gi bsam pa des mkhyen nas/ /rab tu byung ba las bzlog pa/ /pha ma dag gis ma gnang ba'i/ /gang zag dge yang sangs rgyas rnams/ /rab tu 'byin par mi mdzad kyi/ /song la bdag nyid
476b2('dul ba): thar par gyis/ /de nas khyim du bdag song nas/ /pha ma gnyis la smras pa ni/ /yab cig gnang bar mdzod cig bdag /khyim ma mchis par rab phyung ngo / /pha mas bdag las thos nas ni/ /de tshe yid mi
476b3('dul ba): bder gyur nas/ /bu gcig khyod ni bdag cag gnyis/ /shi bar gyur na'ang mi gnang ngo / /de thos nas ni bdag gis su/ /gal te mi gnang 'di nyid du/ /zas mi 'tshal bar bdag 'gum zhes/ /sa
476b4('dul ba): la yang ni nyal bar byas/ /de tshe dkar po'i chos dag gis/ /bskul nas rab 'byung don gnyer zhing / /thar par 'dod pas zhag drug tu/ /zan ma zos par 'dug pa dang / /de nas bdag dang mdza' ba
476b5('dul ba): yi| |ne'u zlas pha ma la smras pa/ /'di ni gnang bar gyur na legs/ /khyed la shi bas ci zhig bya/ /gal te 'di ni rab byung bar/ /dga' na phyis kyang khyed cag gis/ /gson po nyid du bltas pas
476b6('dul ba): chog |shi bar gyur na ci zhig rung / /gal te rab tu byung ba la/ /'di ni dga' bar ma gyur na/ /khyed kyir zad mod pha ma las/ /gzhan ni bu gnas ga la yod/ /bdag gi snyan smra ne'u zla la/ /
476b7('dul ba): pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa ni/ /gal te rab byung lta byed na/ /de lta na gtang gzhan du min/ /de nas ne'u zla bdag gi drung / /nye bar 'ongs nas smras pa ni/ /mkhas pa khyod ni pha ma yis/ /rab tu
477a1('dul ba): 'byung bar gnang ba ni/ /khyod la pha ma gnyis na re/ /gal te rab tu byung nas khyod/ /phyis kyang lta bar byed na ni/ /bu gcig song la rab tu byung / /legs zhes
477a2('dul ba): bdag gis mnyan byas te/ /de nas nyams ni rtas byas nas/ /ston pa'i spyan sngar song nas ni/ /'di skad ces ni tshig gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni gnang lags na/ /thub chen khyod kyi bstan pa la/
477a3('dul ba): bde gshegs rab 'byung gsol 'debs na/ /rgyal ba bdag ni rab tu byung / /de nas bdag ni rab byung nas/ /ston pa'i bstan la 'di ltar gnas/ /bdag gi kun sbyor thams cad zad/ /zag pa
477a4('dul ba): rnams ni bcom par gyur/ /bdag gis gdugs gcig btang bas ni/ /bde ba mang por myong bar gyur/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /thams cad gzigs
477a5('dul ba): pas dgon pa pa/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur ba'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /de ltar thugs rje che rgyal la/ /yid ni rab tu dang byas
477a6('dul ba): te| |mchod rten la ni bkur sti byos/ /'jigs pa che las rnam thar gyis/ /gnas brtan phyag dar khrod pa ni/ /yul 'khor skyong zhes grags pa yis/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi
477a7('dul ba): las ni lung bstan to/ /yul 'khor skyong gi le'u ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nga gsum pa/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan
477b1('dul ba): pa sa ga la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas gas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pas gas
477b2('dul ba): de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i khab kyi tshong dpon gyi/ /gtso bo nor chen bdag gyur to/ /dbyar gyi dus su drang srong ni/ /lnga brgya dag ni nye bar byon/ /der ni tshong dpon lnga brgya
477b3('dul ba): yang | |thams cad 'dus par gyur nas ni/ /kun gyi drang srong re re zhig /khyim khyim du ni bgo bar bya/ /rang gi don du kha zas ni/ /ji lta bu dag g.yo byed pa/ /dka' thub can de re re la'ang / /rtag tu
477b4('dul ba): de 'dra kho na sbyin/ /de'i nang drang srong rgan po gang / /de ni bdag gi skal bar 'ongs/ /tshong dpon mchog la de bzhin du/ /thub pa mchog de 'tsham par gyur/ /bdag la lnga brgya ba yi zas/ /snod gang
477b5('dul ba): nas ni 'dren byed pa/ /de 'dra ba yi kha zas nyid/ /bdag gis dge slong de la byin/ /de nas de la bdag la ni/ /ser sna shin tu mi bzad skyes/ /'di lta bu yi kha zas ni/ /bdag gi chung mar byin ma
477b6('dul ba): myong | |sring mo ma yin de bzhin du/ /bu dang bu mo dag dang ni/ /phu nu la'ang ma byin na/ /dge slong 'di la zla gsum du/ /sbyin pa lta zhig smos ci dgos/ /bdag ni lnga brgya po dag gis/ /god tshegs
477b7('dul ba): chen po 'dir 'gyur gyi/ /ma la bdag gis dge sbyong 'di/ /gsad pa la ni brtson byas te/ /'di ni shi ba'i dus byas na/ /bdag la 'god pa mi 'byung zhes/ /de nas bdag gi sdig sems kyis/ /rta
478a1('dul ba): yi gcin ni bskol byas te/ /nyes med par ni gsad bya bar/ /kha zas rnams dang lhan cig byin/ /der ni zos ma thag tu yang / /mi bzad pa yi nad
478a2('dul ba): langs te/ /rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma dag/ /ro smad nas ni zags par gyur/ /thub pa chos kyi yon tan dga'/ /shes bzhin de nas dus las 'das/ /lha dang gnod sbyin gcig la
478a3('dul ba): gcig |sgra ni shin tu sgrog byed pa/ /kye ma'o tshong dpon 'di re sdig /'di yis thub pa rang sangs rgyas/ /bsil bar gyur cing zag med pa/ /dbang ldan 'di ni grongs par gyur/ /nye du rnams
478a4('dul ba): kyang 'khrugs nas ni/ /de nas bdag la smod byed pa/ /gang phyir thub pa 'di bsad pas/ /khyed kyis bsod nams min mang bskyed/ /nye du rnams kyi tshig thos nas/ /bdag kyang yid
478a5('dul ba): mi bder gyur nas/ /drang srong de dag bsags nas ni/ /de nas bdag gis nyes pa bshags/ /bzod pa gsol nas de nas yang / /nyes pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /lnga brgya la ni
478a6('dul ba): zhal zas kyis/ /gus dang bcas pas tshim par byas/ /bdag gis sdig pa de bshags nas/ /bzod gsol drang srong de dag ni/ /zas dang btung bas tshim byas nas/ /de tshe smon lam
478a7('dul ba): btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di 'dra dag dang ni/ /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /ji ltar 'di kun grol gyur pa/ /de bzhin 'ching las grol bar shog /bkren pa rnams kyi
478b1('dul ba): khyim du bdag / lan 'ga'ang skye bar ma gyur cig /bdag gi sems ni lan 'ga' yang / /ser sna skye bar ma gyur cig /bdag gis rang sangs rgyas bsad pa'i/ /shin tu mi bzad las byas
478b2('dul ba): pas| |de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/ /dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas ni/ /yun ring lo ni stong dag tu/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong / /slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na/ /phyug cing nor
478b3('dul ba): chen gyur pa dang / /'jig rten rnams kyis mchod bkur na'ang / /bdag ni myur du 'chir 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu bdag ni nang grol dag /'dzag pas shi ba'i dus byas so/ /khyim pa'i rtags
478b4('dul ba): rnams spangs nas ni/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /bstan la brtson 'grus byas pas na/ /'dod chags thams cad yang dag bton/ /gang tshe len pa med pa yi/ /mya ngan 'das par bdag gyur
478b5('dul ba): na'ang | |rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma nang / /de dag kyang ni 'dzag par gyur/ /bdag gis sdig las byas pa dang / /dge ba'i las byas gang yin pa/ /dge dang sdig pa de dag gi /'bras bu de
478b6('dul ba): dag nyams su myong / /mnyan yod dbus na skyes pa yi/ /dge slong mthu chen sa gas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan
478b7('dul ba): to| |sa ga'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan
479a1('dul ba): pa 'od srung byin pa can/ dge slong sa gas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ da tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston
479a2('dul ba): cig |de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can gyis/ de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ mu ge dag ni byung ba na/ /grong khyer ba ni mtha' dag gis/ /lo bdun tshang bar dge slong
479a3('dul ba): gi |dge 'dun dag ni spyan drangs so/ /de nas bdag gi skal bar ni/ /rang sangs rgyas ni skal ldan pa/ /bsil bar gyur cing zag med pa'i/ /thub pa mdzes pa gcig cig 'ongs/ /bdag gis
479a4('dul ba): dam bcas byas pa ni/ /las mi byed na bu dang ni/ /nang mi yang rung su la yang / /bdag gis zan ni mi sbyin no/ /de ltar rnam par bsam nas ni/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i blo bsam pa/ /dge slong las
479a5('dul ba): mi byed pa 'di/ /bdag gis ci ste zas sbyin zhes/ /de nas drang srong bdag 'grogs nas/ /zhing las mtha' rnams blta ba'i phyir/ /mtha' dag tu ni bskor nas su/ /de yi 'og tu zas zar bcug/
479a6('dul ba): las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /bsdus gzhom dang ni tsha ba yi/ /dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas ni/ /sdug bsngal kho na'i tshor ba thob/ /dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos bdag /gang dang gang du skyes
479a7('dul ba): par ni/ /de tshe brtson pa mang byas na'ang / /sdug bsngal kho nas zas rnyed do/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par
479b1('dul ba): byas| |yang dag dad pas rab byung nas/ /bdag gi zag pa rnams bcom ste/ /bdag gi mngon shes drug reg nas/ /dgra bcom nyid kyang thob par gyur/ /da dung du yang btsun pa bdag /'di ltar rdzu
479b2('dul ba): 'phrul ldan lags na'ang / /da lta lan mang song nas ni/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni zas bsgrub bo/ /lam ni ring por song nas kyang / /bdag ni zas dag sgrub pa na/ /gang tshe bdag ni dub gyur nas/ /
479b3('dul ba): de yi 'og tu zas 'grub bo/ /rus ni 'od srung las kyi ming / /byin pa can ni mthu chen po/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /'od srung byin pa can gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu
479b4('dul ba): pa'o/ / //sdom ni/ grags ldan dang ni dpal skyed dang / /ba ku la dang gsum grags dang / /mi skyes dang ni yul 'khor skyong / /sa ga 'od srung byin pa can/ /de nas dge slong
479b5('dul ba): gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung byin pa can gyis/ /rang gi las
479b6('dul ba): kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan gyis/ de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon
479b7('dul ba): gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su/ /bdag ni phag rdzir gyur pa na/ /phag rnams kha ni bcings nas su/ /'bab chu las ni sgrol bar byed/ /'bab chu las ni bsgral ba'i phyir/ /bdag gis chu dbus
480a1('dul ba): phyin pa dang / /bskyod par gyur pas dbugs bsubs nas/ /phag rnams thams cad shi bar gyur/ /skyob pa med cing mgon med pas/ /bdag kyang 'bab chus khyer ba
480a2('dul ba): las| |drang srong rjes su brtse ba dag / 'ongs nas bdag ni phyung bar gyur/ /de dag gis bdag de las bsgral/ /de nas bdag gis rab tu phyung / /bdag gis gdams ngag med par ni/ /
480a3('dul ba): 'du shes med la snyoms par zhugs/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ /lha rnams su ni bdag skyes te/ /lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob/ /rdzogs
480a4('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /rmongs shing g.yer po ma yin pas/ /bshad pa bdag gis ma rtogs so/ /btsun pa bdag gis zla gsum du/ /tshigs
480a5('dul ba): bcad gcig la zhugs nas ni/ /tshig bzhi pa yi rkang pa gcig /rtogs pas 'dod chags kun bton to/ /btsun pa de ltar bdag gis ni/ /las gang bgyis pa dran lags te/ /bskal
480a6('dul ba): pa mi nyung yun ring du/ /'khor ba 'di ni bdug gis brgyugs/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /lam phran bstan gyis dkar nag las/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /lung bstan
480a7('dul ba): pa ni byas pa yi/ /lam phran bstan gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu gcig pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sbrul khol la 'di skad
480b1('dul ba): ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sbrul khol/ tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan gyis/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang
480b2('dul ba): ldan pa sbrul khol gyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sangs rgyas 'od srung mya ngan 'das/ /thog mar byung ba'i dge sbyong ni/ /sde snod gsum ldan mang du thos/ /chos kyi ser sna can
480b3('dul ba): du gyur/ /dge slong gzhan dag shes gyur nas/ /bdag dang mtshungs par 'gyur 'ong zhes/ /bdag gis dge slong rnams la chos/ /ma bton cing ni ma bshad do/ /bdag gi drung du dge slong gang //
480b4('dul ba): nye bar 'ongs nas 'di byed na'ang / /thams cad gdams ngag ma byin par/ /thams cad du ni spyos shing bkye/ /dge slong rnams ni nyer 'ongs nas/ /de tshe bdag la bkur sti byed/ /chos ni rab tu
480b5('dul ba): mi ston pa/ /khyod kyi de ni bzang min zer/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus bab tshe/ /bdag gis chos ni gzhan dag la/ /ma bstan de ni legs min zhes/ /bdag ni yid la 'gyod par gyur/ /tshe yi lhag
480b6('dul ba): ma nyung ngu zhig / zhag bdun lus nas bdag gis ni/ /rab tu byung ba rnams bsags te/ /de nas nyes pa bshags par byas/ /bdag gis nyes pa bshags byas shing / /ser sna de ni rnam
480b7('dul ba): bsal nas/ /de tshe bdag gis nub bdun du/ /don bzang po yi chos bshad do/ /bdag gi blo la ci lcogs pas/ /legs par bshad pa'i chos thos nas/ /phan tshun 'doms shing gcig la
481a1('dul ba): gcig / smra bar yang ni byed du bcug /de tshe bdag gis nub bdun du/ /chos ni cung zad cig bshad pas/ /'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa yi/ /lha yi
481a2('dul ba): 'jig rten dag tu dga'/ /lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos te/ /bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi dag tu/ /shAkya'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes/ /nor chen longs spyod
481a3('dul ba): chen po dang / gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa dang / /thams cad la thug yid 'ong zhing / /phun sum tshogs pa'i mthar phyin to/ /khyim re nas ni skyes pa re/ /khyim med par ni rab byung
481a4('dul ba): las| |'dod pa'i longs spyod 'byor pas na/ /bdag ni rab byung ma btub po/ /rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pas/ /bdag nyid la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/ /yang dang yang du rab byung
481a5('dul ba): ba/ /yang dag len par skul ma mdzad/ /de nas ded dpon bla med pa/ /sangs rgyas la ni bdag gis gsol/ /re zhig bdag gis lo bdun du/ /sbyin pa mi nyung gtang bar bgyi/ /
481a6('dul ba): bdag gis sbyin pa dag btang nas/ /lo bdun lon par gyur pa dang / /shes rab mchog can khyod las ni/ /de nas bdag gis rab tu 'byung / /lo bdun dag ni thogs ches la/ /tshe ni
481a7('dul ba): cung zad tsam yin pas/ /sang nyid 'chi yang sus shes kyi/ /de ring nyid du brtul te gyis/ /bdag gis gus pas sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsung ni slar ldog ma byas par/ /btsun pa bdag
481b1('dul ba): ni dgung bdun na/ /thugs brtses rab tu byung bar mdzod/ /bdag gis zhag bdun sbyin btang ste/ /phongs pa dag ni tshim byas nas/ /bdag gi phyir ni nye du dag /grong khyer du ni mel tshe
481b2('dul ba): btsugs/ /snang ba chen po rnams kyis ni/ /grong khyer mchog ni gsal bar byas/ /skye bo dag gis ma tshor bar/ /rab byung phyir ni sngon du byung / /bdag ni dad pas rab byung nas/ /rgyal ba'i
481b3('dul ba): bstan la brtson byas te/ /lo ni nyi shu lnga lon yang / /sems mnyam pa yang ma thob bo/ /de nas bdag gis sdig pa'i sems/ /'dod la zhen pa skyes pa ni/ /bdud rtsi rtogs par ma gyur
481b4('dul ba): gyi| |dman par slar ni bdag ldog snyam/ /de nas ngo tsha khrel yod pa/ /don chen dag ni skyes gyur pa/ /bdag la nye du'i tshogs smod cing / /skyon du yang ni bgrang 'gyur ba/ /des ni bdag dang
481b5('dul ba): 'tsham min zhing / /de ni bzang po ma yin gyi/ /bdag lta gson na'ang ci ru rung / /mtshon gyis gdab par bya'o snyam/ /mtshon rnon bdag gis blangs nas su/ /skyil mo krung ni bcas nas kyang / /mtshon
481b6('dul ba): ni skye la gtad pa las/ /de nas sems ni rnam par grol/ /bdag sems tha ba las grol nas/ /yang dang yang du brjod pa ni/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun/ /e ma'o chos nyid e re bzang / /
481b7('dul ba): sngon ni bdag gi 'du shes gang / /so so'i skye bo shi bla snyam/ /bdag gis srog la ma bltas pas/ /zhi ba dam pa thob par gyur/ /sngon ni 'khums par gyur pa yis/ /dam chos ser sna byas pa
482a1('dul ba): gang | |btsun pa de yi 'bras bu ni/ /sdug bsngal ba yis rnam par grol/ /bdag gis 'chi ba'i dus na chos/ /dam pa rab bstan gang yin pa'i/ /las kyi rnam par
482a2('dul ba): smin pa des/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol phyin/ /shAkya'i bu pho dbang po rtul/ /sbrul khol mthu chen ldan pas ni/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /sbrul khol gyi
482a3('dul ba): le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa/ /tshe
482a4('dul ba): dang ldan pa sbrul khol gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pas rang gi las kyi
482a5('dul ba): rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon ni phrag khur khyer ba yi/ /rtswa 'thun dbul por gyur pa na/ /bdag gis dge sbyong grags ldan pa/ /nyon mongs bcom la bsod snyoms phul/ /shAkya'i rigs la
482a6('dul ba): bdag skyes na'ang / /bdag ni ma 'gag yin par shes/ /rol mo glu la mkhas gyur pa/ /pheg sgra phyad pas bslang ba na/ /rdzogs sangs ga las bsnyengs med pa/ /ston pa bdag gis mthong
482a7('dul ba): bar gyur/ /mthong nas bdag ni sems dad pas/ /khyim med par yang rab tu byung / /bdag gis de yi gsung thos nas/ /bstan la dga' bas gnas gyur te/ /rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan
482b1('dul ba): zhing | |gzab pa'i bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtsams/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa mthar phyung nas/ /rig pa gsum ni rjes su thob/ /bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi/ /sngon gyi gnas ni shes gyur te/ /sum
482b2('dul ba): cu rtsa gsum lha rnams su/ /bdag gis lan bdun skye ba blangs/ /slar yang mi yi nang du ni/ /mi yi dbang po lan bdun byas/ /de tshe 'dzam tshal dbang phyug gi /rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur to/ /
482b3('dul ba): 'dir ni bdun dang der bdun to/ /bdag gi lan ni bcu bzhir 'khor/ /bdag sngon gang na 'dug pa yi/ /gnas ni sngon du shes gyur te/ /las kyi 'bras bu de lta bu/ /bdag gis de tshe nyams su
482b4('dul ba): myong / /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /dga' ba dag gis rgyu bar byed/ /sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / /'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba dang / /'di lta bu dang gzhan gyur shes/ /'phags pa'i yan
482b5('dul ba): lag lnga ldan dga'/ /yan lag lnga pa'i ting 'dzin la/ /zhi ba phyogs gcig goms byas shing / /shin tu sbyangs thob lam gyis ni/ /lha yi spyan ni rnam par sbyangs/ /ston pa 'jig rten bla
482b6('dul ba): med kyi/ /bdag gi kun rtogs mkhyen nas kyang / /yid las byung ba'i sku yis ni/ /bdag drung rdzu 'phrul gyis byon nas/ /ston pa spros med la dgyes pas/ /spros pa dang ni bral ba bshad/ /
482b7('dul ba): bdag gis de yi gsung thos nas/ /bstan la dga' bas gnas gyur te/ /rtag par pha rol gnon brtan zhing / /gzab pa'i bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtsams/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa mthar phyung
483a1('dul ba): nas| |rig pa gsum ni rjes su thob/ /'chi ba'ang mngon par mi dga' zhing / /'tsho ba'ang mngon par ma dga' ste/ /shes bzhin dran dang ldan pa yis/ /dus la so
483a2('dul ba): sor rtog par byed/ /yangs pa'i 'od ma'i grong khyer gyi/ /'od ma tshang tshing de'i drung du/ /bdag gi srog ni zad nas kyang / /zag med mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis bsod snyoms
483a3('dul ba): byin pas ni/ /'bras bu thob pa 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa'i/ /ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byas/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag
483a4('dul ba): gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas bsod nams can/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /de ltar gnas brtan ma 'gag pas/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi
483a5('dul ba): mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ma 'gag pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa ri
483a6('dul ba): dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag po la 'di skad ces smras so / tshe dang ldan pa nag po/ /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pas/ /rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba
483a7('dul ba): lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag pos de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bu ram sbyor ba'i khang pa na/ /bur ma shing rnams btsir ba las/ /rang sangs
483b1('dul ba): rgyas ni skal ldan pa/ /nad pa gsor rung zhig 'ongs nas/ /bdag gis thub pa nub bdun du/ /bu ram til mar bsnyen bkur byas/ /skal ldan zhag bdun 'das pa dang / /de nas de yis mkha' la 'phags/ /
483b2('dul ba): de nas bran de nyer 'ongs nas/ /bdag la smras par gyur pa ni/ /yon gnas rab tu byung gyur ba/ /de lta bu ni song bar gyur/ /drang srong mkha' las song ngo zhes/ /bdag gis de la tshig thos nas/ /sems
483b3('dul ba): mgu ba dang yid bde bas/ /de yi tshe na dad par byas/ /sems rab dang ba de dang ni/ /bu ram sbyin par btang ba des/ /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba
483b4('dul ba): tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yis/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur
483b5('dul ba): pa'i| |dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /bdag gis chos gos bsod snyoms dang / /yo byad dang ni gnas mal gyi/ /rnyed pa mang po rnyed par gyur/ /bdag ni chos gos
483b6('dul ba): 'drub pa na/ /bu ram btung ba blud pa'i phyir/ /bdag la bu ram snod bzhi zhig /dgos so snyam du bsam pa dang / /rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ /de nas lha yis smras pa ni/ /ri dwags 'dzin bu
483b7('dul ba): nag po la/ /bu ram btung ba byin cig dang / /mi yi dbang po khyod kyis ni/ /bu ram btung ba don chen 'gyur/ /'tsho byed a mra'i tshal du ni/ /ri dwags bu la bu ram skyol/ /rgyal po'i mchog ni mthu chen
484a1('dul ba): po| |gzugs can snying po bdag la ni/ /snod chen bu ram gyis bkang ba/ /bzhi po dag ni bskur bar gyur/ /de nas des ni bu ram dag /ro dang ldan pa khyer 'ongs nas/ /stong
484a2('dul ba): ni nyis brgya lnga bcu yi/ /dge slong dge 'dun tshim par byas/ /ri dwags 'dzin bu dgra bcom pa/ /mngon shes drug ldan mthu chen po/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ri dwags
484a3('dul ba): 'dzin gyi bu nag po'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgra
484a4('dul ba): gcan zin/ tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags 'dzin gyi bu nag pos rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
484a5('dul ba): sgra gcan zin gyis/ de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ /bdag sngon lus 'phags mi thi la'i/ /bdag po rgyal por gyur pa na/ /dgos pa zhig gi phyir 'dug nas/ /skye bo rjes su bstan
484a6('dul ba): pa na/ /de nas drang srong dka' thub che/ /gzi brjid mchog 'jigs 'ongs gyur te/ /de ni nye bar 'ongs nas kyang / /bdag la 'di skad tshig smras so/ /sa bdag bdag ni rkun ma ste/ /bdag gis ma byin
484a7('dul ba): chab 'tshal gyi/ /rkun po'i chad pa ji lta bar/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gcad du gsol/ /drang srong chos kyi yon tan dga'/ /de la bdag gis der smras pa/ /khyod la chu ni gnang bar byas/ /khyod ni song la ci bder
484b1('dul ba): spyod| |rgyal po bdag gi 'gyod pa ni/ /de ltas bsal ba'i rngo mi thogs/ /bdag la chad pas gcad mdzod dang / /'gyod pa dag dang 'phral bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis de ni skyed mos tshal/ /gzhir ni zhag drug spang ba
484b2('dul ba): byas| |de ni zhag drug lon nas phyir/ /rang gi bsti gnas gnas su song / /zhe sdang med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sdig pa bdag gis byas pas kyang / /rab tu tsha dang thig nag tu/ /lo ni drug cu rnams su btsos/ /de nas
484b3('dul ba): las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi lus ni tha ma la/ /ma yi mngal du lo drug ni/ /tshang par yang ni 'dug par gyur/ /bdag ni zhe sdang med bzhin du/ /lus dang ngag gi las byas pas/ /las rnams chud mi za bas
484b4('dul ba): na| |de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan sgra gcan zin/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /sgra can zin gyi le'u ste/ nyi
484b5('dul ba): shu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis rang gi
484b6('dul ba): las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rnam par gzigs
484b7('dul ba): kyi gsung rab la/ bdag gis lan gcig khrus byas te/ dge slong dge 'dun khrus byas nas/ de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /dag
485a1('dul ba): cing dri ma med pa dang / /nyon mongs med cing zag bral shog /kha dog bzang po dag dang ni/ /gzugs bzang gyur cig smon lam btab/ /de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/ /lha rnams
485a2('dul ba): su ni skyes par gyur/ /bdag ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba'i/ /mi dang lha ni rnams su gyur/ /gang dang gang du skyes bar ni/ /longs spyod chen pos shin tu gnas/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni/ /shin
485a3('dul ba): tu dkar po bdag gis brtsigs/ /de nas byug pas thams cad ni/ /ser por gyur pa de ltar byugs/ /de nas mtshan rnams 'dod pa'i phyir/ /gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur pa dang / /gser bzang dbyibs
485a4('dul ba): ni legs 'gyur bar/ /smon lam du ni gdab pa byas/ /dag pa'i las ni de byas pas/ /grong khyer wA ra NA sir ni/ /ka shi'i rgyal po kri kri yi/ /bu pho 'bring por bdag skyes so/ /'od srung mchod rten
485a5('dul ba): mthong nas ni/ /de nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ /mchod rten de la bdag gis ni/ gdugs 'bring zhig ni gdags pa byas/ /khrus de dang ni bsro gang dang / /yung gi byug pas byugs pa
485a6('dul ba): dang | |gdugs ni gdags pa byas pa yi/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi yang srid tha ma 'dir/ /shAkya'i rgyal po'i rigs skyes nas/ /sangs
485a7('dul ba): rgyas skyob pa'i mched du gyur/ /bdag gi lus ni 'di la yang / /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yod pa/ /sum cu lhag pa ma yin pa'i/ /sum cu dman pa ma yin pa'o/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la//
485b1('dul ba): bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /thams cad gzigs pas mdzes pa yi/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to/ /nyes bsal
485b2('dul ba): zag pa zad nas ni/ /go 'phang dam pa thob par gyur/ /de ltar gnas brtan dga' bos ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /dga' bo'i
485b3('dul ba): le'u ste| nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o/ / //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor/ /tshe dang ldan pa dga'
485b4('dul ba): bos rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed
485b5('dul ba): de| 'di nas bdag sngon tshong pa ni/ /nya pa zhes ni bya bar gyur/ /tshong pa'i lam du zhugs pa na/ dbang du gyur cing zag med pa/ /nyon mongs med pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /drang srong zhig ni mgron par
485b6('dul ba): 'ongs/ /de yi bar du bdag gis ni/ /rtag par zas la mgron du bos/ /gang du brang ni 'debs 'gyur pa/ /der ni gding ba dag kyang bshams/ /rkang pa'i chu dang til mar dang / /de yi mar me dag kyang bshams/ /
485b7('dul ba): ji srid lam yod de srid du/ /bdag gis de la bkur sti byas/ /tshong pa rnams kyis rim bzhin du/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / /dge slong gru drung nyer 'ongs nas/ /bdag gis de la smras pa ni/
486a1('dul ba): btsun pa rgya mtsho 'di la ni/ /nor gyi slad du bzhud dam ci/ /btsun pa bdag cag phongs pas na/ /'dod pa dag gi phyir yang ni/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i tshu tshogs la/ /nyen can du
486a2('dul ba): ni 'jug par byed/ /bdag la dge slong des smras pa/ /bdag ni mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /khyed cag gnyen kun lhan cig tu/ /nor chen bsod nams che bder gyur/ /de tshe de la bdag gis ni/ /rab
486a3('dul ba): dgas chos gos bzang po phul/ /mgo bos phyag ni byas nas yang / /de la bskor ba dag byas so/ /de nas bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /de ni chos gos blangs nas ni/ /de dag thams cad blta
486a4('dul ba): bzhin du/ /de yi 'og tu mkha' la 'phags/ /cho 'phrul byed pa de mthong nas/ /de tshe bdag ni skyo gyur nas/ /bdag gis thal mo sbyar byas te/ /de nas smon lam btab pa ni/ /gnas brtan
486a5('dul ba): 'di lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /'di yi chos ni gang dag thob/ /de dag bdag gis thob par shog /rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byed cing / /rab tu byung ba thob pa
486a6('dul ba): dang | / dge 'dun la yang rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /rnam 'phrul bkur sti byed par shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten rab tu dga'/ /mi yi 'thob pa thob nas kyang / /bde ba rgya chen
486a7('dul ba): nyams su myong / /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /bdag ni nor chen phyug pa dang / /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur/ /bskal pa tha ma 'di la ni/ /srid pa tha ma 'di
486b1('dul ba): la yang / /ku shi zhes bya'i gyad rnams kyi/ /gyad kyi bur ni bdag skyes te/ /blta na sdug cing mdzes pa dang / /gzugs bzang spyod pa mdzes pa dang / /thams cad la sdug yid 'ong zhing / /phun sum
486b2('dul ba): tshogs pa mthar phyin to/ /sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge ni/ /bla na med pa mnyes par byas/ /mthong nas bdag sems dad byas te/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /ma ga d+ha yi ri rgyud nas/ /'od ma'i tshal
486b3('dul ba): du gnas bcas nas/ /dge slong dge 'dun mtho 'tsham pa'i/ /nyan thos dag cig der lhags te/ /gnas mal dag ni bskos na yang / /dge slong rnams la spyo byed de/ /rnam par 'tshe zhing skrod pa
486b4('dul ba): dang | |yang dang yang du gshe bar byed/ /tshangs pa mtshungs spyod rnams mthong nas/ /bdag ni snying rje bar gyur te/ /bdag ni zag pa zad gyur kyang / /nyid kyis dge slong bsnyen bkur bya/ /bdag gis brtson
486b5('dul ba): 'grus brtsams nas ni/ /bstan pa 'di la brtson byas pas/ /dgra bcom bdag gis thob nas ni/ /mngon shes drug la dbang byas so/ /ston pa'i spyan sngar song nas ni/ /thub la mgo bos phyag byas te//
486b6('dul ba): thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas su/ /skyes bu dam pa la gsol ba/ /'dod chags gti mug gis ma lags/ /byams sems gus dang bcas pa yis/ /thub pa bdag ni dge slong gi /rim gro bgyid pa
486b7('dul ba): gnang bar mdzod/ /pha rol sems la mkhas pa yi/ /ston pas bdag gsol mkhyen nas ni/ /nyid kyis dge slong dge 'dun mdun/ /gnyug ma'i rim gro byed du bcug /byams pa'i lus kyis
487a1('dul ba): las dang ni/ /de bzhin ngag dang yid kyis kyang / /bdag gis rtag tu sems smad nas/ /dge slong dge 'dun rim gro byas/ /spyod pa la ni zhugs pa dang / /lam nas
487a2('dul ba): 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag / bdag gis mthong nas dga' ba dag /so sor yid ni bde gyur na/ /til mar rab 'bar lta bu yi/ /bdag gis sor lnga'i sgron ma yi/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan
487a3('dul ba): byas nas/ /gnas mal dag ni 'cha' bar byed/ /dge slong gang dag bdag gi ni/ /cho 'phrul 'di ni blta 'dod na/ /nam ni sros par gyur pa dang / /mun khung bdag drung lhags nas ni/ /
487a4('dul ba): de rnams la ni ci rigs par/ /byams sems gus dang bcas pa yi/ /gnas mal dag ni 'cha' byed cing / /skye bo mang po skyo ba bskyed/ /bdag gis bsam pa gang yin dang / /bdag gis smon
487a5('dul ba): lam gang btab pa/ /bdag gi bzang po de grub cing / /go 'phang mi g.yo bdag gis thob/ /de lta bur ni gyad bu nor/ /zag pa med cing dbang gyur pas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las
487a6('dul ba): ni lung bstan to/ /gyad bu nor gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu bdun pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan
487a7('dul ba): pa nye sde| tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes de'i tshe rang gi las
487b1('dul ba): kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ /'das pa dag gi dus na bdag /rngon pa dag tu gyur pa na/ /nags chen nyams dgar byul ba dang / /ri dwags rnam pa sna tshogs mthong / /dug gis bskus pa'i mda'
487b2('dul ba): rnams dang / /gzhu yi tshogs dag blangs nas ni/ /ri dwags mang po'i ri yi rdzong / /de dang der ni bdag gis rgyus/ /bdag gis ri dwags rnams mthong nas/ /gdug pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag
487b3('dul ba): nas| |dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnams kyis/ /ri dwags mang po rab tu bsnun/ /bdag gi lag na gzhu dang ni/ /dug gis bskus pa'i mda' sel bzhin/ /rang sangs rgyas shig ljon shing gi/
487b4('dul ba): drung na bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur/ /bdag gi dge sbyong de mthong nas/ /de tshe yid ni mi bder gyur/ /de nas thub pa gnod med pa'i/ /lus la mdas ni bsnun par gyur/ /de yi 'og tu dge slong de/ /mda'
487b5('dul ba): yi zug rngu'i sdug bsngal ldan/ /shing de nyid kyi drung du ni/ /len pa med par mya ngan 'das/ /rtsub pa'i las de byas pas na/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes nas ni/ /de la lo ni stong phrag tu/ /bdag gis
487b6('dul ba): sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /de nas dmyal las shi 'phos nas/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas song nas ni/ /ri yi rdzong ni de nyid du/ /bdag ni ri dwags rnams su skyes/ /rtag tu 'jigs shing bag tsha zhing / /
487b7('dul ba): bkres shing skom pas nyen pas na/ /rid cing shin tu sdug bsngal pas/ /bdag ni de dang der rgyu'o/ /rdzong der rngon pa gdug pa ni/ /shin tu mi bzad pa rnams kyis/ /dug gis bskus pa'i mda'
488a1('dul ba): rnon gyis/ /bdag gis lus la bsnun par gyur/ /bdag 'gyel de dag gis mthong nas/ /bdag ni gson zhing 'gul bzhin du/ /mtshon gyis yan lag rnams kyi sha/
488a2('dul ba): bcad nas de rnams khyer zhing 'dong / /bdag ni sa phyogs de nyid du/ /sha yi ched du bsad byas te/ /de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni/ /sdug bsngal mang po bsgrubs pa yin/ /ri bo de nyid ngos nas ni/ /
488a3('dul ba): dka' thub ldan la mthu che zhing / /rdzu 'phrul che gzi mi bzad pa'i/ /drang srong rab tu mang po mthong / /bdag gis drang srong de mthong nas/ /de nas byams pa'i sems bsgoms te/ /blo bzang byams
488a4('dul ba): dang ldan pa la/ /yang dang yang du blta byas so/ /dka' thub ldan pa de rnams la/ /bdag gis gus bcas sems dad byas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/ /bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob/ zas don
488a5('dul ba): gnyer ba'i slong ba ni/ /rang sangs rgyas shig mthong nas ni/ /gus pa yis ni rtag par de/ /bdag gis zas mal spyan drangs so/ /btsun pa de tshim byas nas su/ /de tshe smon lam btab pa ni/ /drang
488a6('dul ba): srong 'di lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byed cing / /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /'jigs shing skrag pa med pa yi/ /zag pa med la
488a7('dul ba): gnas par shog / dge ba'i las de byas pas na/ /lha yi 'jig rten rab tu dga'/ /mi nyid rnyed pa thob nas kyang / /phyug cing nor ni mang bar gyur/ /rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pa/ /ston
488b1('dul ba): pa bdag gis mnyes par byas/ /bdag gis shAkya thub mthong nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /dad pas rab tu byung nas kyang / /bstan la dga' bas gnas byas pas/ /bdag gis dgra bcom
488b2('dul ba): thob nas ni/ /mngon shes drug la dbang byas so/ /da dung du yang btsun pa dag /bdag ni thams cad dbang gyur na'ang / /phug gi nang du zhugs nas su/ /'chi bar nye bar gyur pa na/ /sbrul dug shin
488b3('dul ba): tu mi bzad pa/ /bdag gi lus la 'bab par gyur/ /btsun pa bdag gis nyes spyad pas/ /gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te/ /las ni chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /de ltar
488b4('dul ba): gnas brtan nye sde yis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /nye de'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas
488b5('dul ba): brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan/ tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa bzang
488b6('dul ba): ldan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan shAkya'i rgyal pos/ de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ dgon pa shin tu 'jigs chen gyi/ /mu ge dag ni
488b7('dul ba): byung ba na/ /rang gi zas ni don gnyer ba/ /slong ba po ni lnga brgya yi/ /de rnams kun gyi dpon gyur cing / /de dag kun gyis gtsor bkur te/ /de rnams kun gyis bslangs pa yi/ /zas ni bdag la dbul bar
489a1('dul ba): byed| |de dag bzang ngam ngan pa'ang rung / /thob pa bdag la 'ged par byed/ /bdag gis tshig gis gnas pas na/ /de dag bdag la brnyas mi byed/ /mi zhig snum khur zhig khyer
489a2('dul ba): nas| |tshong 'dus nang nas 'gro ba las/ /bdag gis de la mthus 'phrog ste/ /khyer nas de nas song ba dang / /de nas bdag gis brgyugs pa dang / /phyi bzhin du ni bsnyegs ma byung / /smyag bcad
489a3('dul ba): bros par gyur pa na/ /de dag gis ni bzung ma nus/ /'bab chu'i pha rol brgal nas ni/ /bdag ni phyogs gcig 'dug nas su/ /'ga' zhig 'ong bar 'gyur snyam nas/ /mtha' dag tu ni lta bar
489a4('dul ba): byas| |snum la g.yos legs byas zin pa'i/ /snum khur bdag gis zos nas ni/ /de nas bdag gis lto 'grangs pas/ /nyin zhag gcig ni thub 'gyur snyam/ /de nas skal ldan rang sangs rgyas//
489a5('dul ba): yang srid skye ba zad gyur pa/ /rdzu 'phrul che gzi mi bzad pa/ /drang srong 'jigs pa zhig 'ongs so/ /bdag gi sems la bsam pa ni/ /sdug bsngal bkren par gyur pa ni/ /sngon chad bsod nams
489a6('dul ba): ma byas pas/ /des bdag 'di ltar bkren par gyur/ /ma la bdag gis dge sbyong 'di/ /snum khur gtsang ma 'di sbyin te/ /bdag ni ltogs pas shi bla yi/ /'di ltar bkren pa mi rung ngo / /de la
489a7('dul ba): bdag sems dad byas nas/ /yid mgu ba dang rangs pa yis/ /dge slong dam pa mchod 'os pa'i/ /yon gnas de la snum khur phul/ /skal ldan gyis ni de blangs nas/ /bdag nyid la ni snying
489b1('dul ba): brtse'i phyir/ /de nyid du ni longs spyad nas/ /de nas mkha' la 'phags par gyur/ /de nas smon lam btab pa ni/ /bdag ni bkren par mi 'gyur zhing / /kha dog bzang po rnams dang ni/ /rigs btsun
489b2('dul ba): pa yang don du gnyer/ /gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang / /bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /khyod nyid kyis ni gang rtogs pa/ /de 'dra'i chos ni shes par shog /dge ba'i las de byas pas
489b3('dul ba): na| |bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi/ /lha dang mi rnams su yang gyur/ /lha dang mi yi rgyal srid kyang / /bdag gis mang po nyams su myong / /las de yis ni lan
489b4('dul ba): 'ga' yang / /bdag ni ngan 'gror ma song ngo / /de nas las kyi lhag mas ni/ /bdag gi yang srid tha ma 'dir/ /shAkya rnams kyi grong mchog tu/ /rigs btsun par ni bdag skyes so/ /bdag gi skye
489b5('dul ba): ba tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bla med pa/ /shAkya seng+ge 'di mnyes byas/ /gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /nye du gnas su gshegs pa na/ /de tshe bdag ni
489b6('dul ba): nye du yi/ /mdun du bdar nas rab tu byung / /bdag gi smon pa gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag gis yongs rdzogs te/ /mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /rgyal
489b7('dul ba): po'i rgyud las rab byung ba/ /sangs rgyas nye du bzang ldan gyis/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu dgu pa'o// //de
490a1('dul ba): nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang / tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i rgyal po
490a2('dul ba): bzang ldan gyis/ rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mdzes bzang gis de'i tshe rang gi
490a3('dul ba): las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ /skyob pa log par dad sel gyi/ /mchod rten zhig ni brtsigs pa na/ /de tshe bdag ni mkhar lan pa/ /gla mir gyur te de nas ni/ /bdag gis mchod rten
490a4('dul ba): brtsigs pa la/ /yang dang yang du dpyad pa ni/ /mchod rten 'di ni che ches pas/ /nam zhig na ni thar par 'gyur/ /mchod rten 'di ni dpangs dma' zhing / /chung ngu zhig tu byas gyur na/ /
490a5('dul ba): 'god pa chung zhing nyon mongs med/ /myur du mthar yang phyin par 'gyur/ /las kyi rnam smin de dang ni/ /ngag gi nyes pa spyad pa des/ /de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas te/ /dmyal ba rnams su
490a6('dul ba): skyes par gyur/ /dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /kha dog ngan cing bong chung la/ /bdag ni yongs kyis smad par gyur/ /'od srung gi ni gsung rab che/ /sngon ni khu
490a7('dul ba): byug phor gyur nas/ /wA ra NA si'i lam gyi bar/ /tshal stug po yi nang na gnas/ /de na 'jig rten rabs gsal mdzad/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun byas te/ /bdag gis 'jam dbyangs skad phyung
490b1('dul ba): zhing | |nam mkha' las ni de bskor to/ /ji tsam yang dag sangs rgyas ni/ /bsod snyoms don phyir gshegs mthong nas/ /'byung ba dang ni gshegs pa las/ /rtag tu yang ni bskor ba byas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba
490b2('dul ba): de yis ni/ /bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla med pa/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa
490b3('dul ba): bsil gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag ni thams cad gzigs pa yis/ /'jam dbyangs rnams kyi mchog dang ni/ /mang du thos dang chos 'dzin dang / /dge ba'i spobs pa can du bstan//
490b4('dul ba): lha'am yang na mi yang rung / /'khor bzhi po dag bdag las ni/ /snyan cing 'jebs pa'i chos thos nas/ /thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /dge ba nyung ngu byas pa dang / /mi dge mang po byas pa yi/ /las
490b5('dul ba): rnams chud mi za bas na/ /de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas brtan mdzes bzang gis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan
490b6('dul ba): to| |mdzes bzang gi le'u ste/ sum cu pa'o// //sdom ni/ lam phran sbrul khol ma 'gag dang / /nag po lnga pa sgra gcan dang / /dga' bo nor dang nye sde dang / /bzang ldan dang ni mdzes bzang
490b7('dul ba): ngo|| ||de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can/ /tshe dang ldan pa mdzes
491a1('dul ba): bzang gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis kyang / da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
491a2('dul ba): gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis/ de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag ni sngon ni yangs pa yi/ /spra chen spre'u dbang gyur pa na/ /lhung bzed mang po mthong nas ni/ /rgyal ba'i lhung
491a3('dul ba): bzed blangs pa las/ /dge slong rnams kyis bdag bkag nas/ /de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/ /'di ni lhung bzed mi gcog gi /dge slong rnams kyis ma dgag cig /ston pa'i lhung
491a4('dul ba): bzed khyer nas ni/ /shing gi khar ni 'dzegs nas ni/ /sbrang rtsis yongs su bkang nas kyang / /dal bus rim gyis babs nas ni/ /lhung bzed sbrang rtsi can thogs te/ /ston pa la ni phul ba las//
491a5('dul ba): ston pas srog chags bcas par ni/ /mkhyen te bdag las ma bzhes nas/ /bdag gis phyogs gcig song nas ni/ /de la srog chags yod mthong nas/ /srog chags med par gtsang
491a6('dul ba): byas te/ /ston pa la ni phul ba dang / /'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /bdag las sbrang rtsi ma bzhes pa/ /ma brtags thugs su chud nas ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas ma bzhes
491a7('dul ba): snyam/ /de nas lhung bzed sbrang rtsi can/ /de tshe bdag gis chus btab nas/ /sems ni mgu bar dga' ba yis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la phul ba las/ /de nas gang zag zla med pa/ /ston pa'i
491b1('dul ba): phyag 'jam gnyis kyis su/ /bdag las lhung bzed bzhes nas ni/ /de ni nyan thos rnams la gtad/ /bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /thal mo legs par sbyar byas te/ /de nas chos rgyal spyan
491b2('dul ba): snga nas| |gar byed cing ni de nas song / /de nas smon lam btab pa ni/ /mi nyid dag ni thob nas su/ /ston pa 'di la bsten nas su/ /byang chub dam pa 'di reg shog /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag/
491b3('dul ba): mi yi srid pa thob nas ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla med pa/ /ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas/ /shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la/ /bdag gis rab byung thob nas kyang / /mya ngan 'das pa bsil
491b4('dul ba): gyur pa'i/ /dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag ni dgra bcom dbang sgyur cing / /mngon shes drug ldan rdzu 'phrul che/ /dge slong rnams kyis bdag la ni/ /gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi
491b5('dul ba): can du shes/ /bsod nams byas pas grags ldan pa/ /bdag ni rtag tu bkur zhing mchod/ /dge slong dge 'dun yongs bskor nas/ /bdag ni rgyu zhing song ba na/ /de nas dgon pa'i lam du
491b6('dul ba): ni| |dge slong dge 'dun skom gyur nas/ /de ni sems la smon pa ni/ /de ring sbrang rtsi rnyed gyur cig /de nas mi ma yin rnams kyis/ /bdag son shes te phyogs bzhi nas/ /sbrang rtsi khur
491b7('dul ba): gyis blangs nas su/ /de dag tu ni 'bul bar byed/ /bdag gis sbrang rtsi ci dgos pa/ /bzang po dag las blangs nas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun tshim byas te/ /des ni lhag par legs par gyur/ /'das
492a1('dul ba): ma thag pa'i skye ba la/ /spre'u'i rgyal po de byas pas/ /log par ltung nas bdag 'phos nas/ /'chi med go 'phang rig gyur te/ /ji skad bdag gis smon pa yis/ /thams cad
492a2('dul ba): 'byor ba nyid du gyur/ /ston pa bkur sti byas pa 'dir/ /rang gi don ni yongs su rdzogs/ /btsun pa bdag gis dge ba gang / /bgyis pa dran pa 'di lags te/ /de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang / /bde 'byung
492a3('dul ba): 'dod pa nyams su myong / /de ltar gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyi le'u
492a4('dul ba): ste| sum cu gcig pa'o/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nga bzhi pa/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan
492a5('dul ba): pa rgyu can/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis
492a6('dul ba): de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bshes ldan grong du bdag gis sngon/ /bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ /sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs pa ni/ /grong khyer dam par 'jug pa
492a7('dul ba): mthong | |thugs rje che ldan mthong nas ni/ /me tog sil mas gtor nas der/ /me tog rtsa bas yar bteg cing / /gyen du kha bltas khang bzang gnas/ /de nas bdag ni rab dga' bas/ /thub pa'i
492b1('dul ba): zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/ /thal mo legs par sbyar nas ni/ /de la bskor ba byas par gyur/ /bdag gis chos ni ma thos shing / /bdag ni skyabs su ma song bar/ /sems dad nyin gcig byas
492b2('dul ba): nas ni/ /bde gshegs drung nas bdag song ngo / /mthu chen rnam par gzigs pa la/ /dge ba'i las de byas pa na/ /bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/ /ngan 'gro mngon par mi shes so/ /bdag ni lha
492b3('dul ba): lus rab dga' zhing / /lha yi 'dod pa yang dag 'byor/ /mi nyid rnyed pa thob nas kyang / /bdag ni nor chen phyug por gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni/ /mi yi srid thob 'di yin te/ /nor che longs spyod che ba
492b4('dul ba): yi| |bram ze rnams kyi rigs su gyur/ /sgra nges sbyor dang shes gsal bcas/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ni/ /tshig gi don bcas ston pa yi/ /gsang tshig rnams kyi pha rol phyin/ /bram ze lnga
492b5('dul ba): brgya rnams la ni/ /tshal du gsang tshig brjod pa'i phyir/ /bram ze rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /bdag ni khyim nas byung ba las/ /bdag gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun
492b6('dul ba): bdar nas/ /dpa' bo chen po ma ga d+ha'i/ /grong mchog tu ni 'jug pa mthong / /bdag gis thugs rje ldan mthong nas/ /yid dga' bar ni gyur pa dang / /sngon gyi rgyu ni de dag gis/ /mtshan rnams la ni
492b7('dul ba): brtags pa las/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs rdzogs shing / /dpe byad rnams kyis mdzes pa yi/ /grags dang ldan pa mthong bar gyur/ /mtshan dang ldan pa
493a1('dul ba): de mthong nas/ /mgo bo yis ni phyag byas te/ /phyogs gcig 'dug nas gus pas ni/ /'dren pa de la mngon bstod pa/ /ji ltar gsang tshig la gda' ba/ /khyod la de
493a2('dul ba): bzhin de gda' bas/ /khyod sangs rgyas par the tshom med/ /'jig rten gyi ni ston pa mchog /khyod ni tshangs pa brgya byin khyod/ /khyod las lhag pa ma mchis te/ /khyod ni nyi ma khyab 'jug
493a3('dul ba): lags/ /khyod ni 'jig rten bla na med/ /rgyal ba khyod 'dra'ang ma mthong na/ /lhag pa lta zhig ga la zhig /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /khyod ni rgyal ba bdud zil gnon/ /khyod ni
493a4('dul ba): mgon med rnams kyi gnas/ /rten med rnams kyi skyabs kyang lags/ /khyod kyi nyan thos nyid du mchis/ /khyod ni bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig /de nas gser gyi mchod sdong lta'i/ /phyag ni de
493a5('dul ba): yis brkyang mdzad de/ /rgyal ba'i phyag ni sman mdzad nas/ /bdag gi mgo la kun du byugs/ /yid ni rab tu dad byas pas/ /khyod kyis bsod nams mang po bskyed/ /sems ni rab tu dang
493a6('dul ba): rnams kyis/ /yon chung bar ni mi 'gyur ro/ /yon gnas bla na med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas la ni khyod kyis bsten/ /bram ze'i khye'us mchod sbyin phyag /zhing rab la ni sa bon btab/ /ngan song gi
493a7('dul ba): ni lam bcad pas/ /khyod la ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med/ /bram ze'i khye'u'i bdud rtsi yi/ /sgo phye bar ni dogs med byos/ /khyod ni rab tu 'byung 'dod na/ /ral pa kun ni myur spongs te/ /nga yi spyan sngar
493b1('dul ba): rab byung la/ /bram ze tha ba med par gyis/ /bdag ni chos nyid la dga' nas/ /de na slob ma'i tshogs smra ba/ /khyod ni bram zer gyur zin ni/ /ji ltar dge sbyong mgo reg 'gyur/ /dkar po'i rigs 'di spangs nas ni/ /
493b2('dul ba): nag pa'i rigs 'di khas len nam/ /'jig rten na ni bram ze gtso/ /pha rol phyin cing tshangs pa yi/ /snying dang kha nas skyes pa yi/ /bram ze tshangs pas sprul pa yin/ /khyed cag kun ni mi shes pa/ /'di na bdag cag
493b3('dul ba): gsang tshig gi / de ring reg cing pha rol phyin/ /bdag ni shes rab mtha' yas kyis/ /gsungs pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin/ /de bzhin du ni bdag byed kyi/ /gang dag der 'gro mi 'dod pa/ /ci sems ji ltar 'dod pa
493b4('dul ba): bzhin/ /gar dgar de ni 'dong la rag /bdag ni gsang tshig don mi gnyer/ /ltos par yang ni mi byed do/ /de nas bdag gi slob ma'i tshogs/ /mchi mas brnangs shing ngu bzhin gyis/ /snying rje rje skad smras nas
493b5('dul ba): ni| |de nas de rnams phyogs phyogs dong / /de nas thugs rje che ldan pa'i/ /thub pas bdag la gsungs pa ni/ /dge slong tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /bdag ni bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur/ /khyim rnams nas
493b6('dul ba): ni khyim med par/ /yang dag dad pas rab tu byung / /sangs rgyas bstan pa chub byas nas/ /mngon par shes kun reg gyur te/ /sngon gyi gnas ni rjes su dran/ /lha yi mig ni rnam par dag /bdag sngon gang na
493b7('dul ba): 'dug pa yi/ /'chi 'pho skye ba shes par gyur/ /zag pa zad pa thob pas na/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul mngon du byas/ /de ltar gnas brtan rgyu can gyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi
494a1('dul ba): mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /gnas brtan rgyu can gyi le'u ste/ sum cu gnyis pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe
494a2('dul ba): dang ldan pa ko'u Di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa ko'u Di n+ya/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyu can gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa ko'u Di n+yas kyang / da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung
494a3('dul ba): ston cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa ko'u Di n+yas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ sngon ni mthu chen 'od srung gi /dam pa'i chos ni nub pa na/ /nyan thos thams cad 'dus nas su/ /phan
494a4('dul ba): tshun dag tu smras pa ni/ /ston pa thugs brtse 'od srung ni/ /mya ngan 'das pas nges par yang / /rab tu byung ba srab gyur cing / /dam chos kyang ni ston mi 'gyur/ /bdag cag ji skad thos pa'i chos/ /
494a5('dul ba): phan tshun yang dag gsal byas nas/ /sangs rgyas bstan la spro ba dang / /brtson 'grus brtsams pas gnas par bya/ /de dag ri la 'dzegs nas ni/ /zag pa zad pa ma thob par/ /re zhig 'di nas
494a6('dul ba): mi ldang zhes/ /rtswa yi gding ba dag la 'khod/ /srog la yang ni mi blta bar/ /brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa na/ /bdun gyis mngon par shes la reg /dge slong dag ni mya ngan 'das/ /de yi
494a7('dul ba): bdun pa bdag yin te/ /dbang po rtul zhing bsod nams chung / /snyoms med sbyor la brtson pa yi/ /so so'i skye bos 'chi dus byas/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus ma btang zhing / /de bzhin rab tu
494b1('dul ba): brtson gnas pas/ /dga' ldan rnams dang skul mnyam pa'i/ /lha yi 'jig rten rnams su skyes/ /de nas shAkya seng ge yi/ /thub chen byang chub sems dpa' mthong / /thub pa lha yi tshogs la ni/ /skyo
494b2('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba'i chos ston mdzad/ /bdag gis de yi chos bshad pa/ /thos nas rtse gcig yid gyur te/ /dam chos yid la byed pa ni/ /lan 'ga'ang rnam par ma spangs so/ /lha yi 'jig rten bdag son
494b3('dul ba): nas| |grong khyer ser skya zhes bya ba'i/ /ko'u Di n+ya rus bram ze yi/ /rigs can du ni skyes par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ldan/ /zas gtsang sras por gyur nas ni/ /dad pas byung nas dka'
494b4('dul ba): spyod pa/ /spyad par gyur pa de yi tshe/ /rgyal po'i mchog ni zas gtsang gis/ /bdag bkug nas kyang smras pa ni/ /rab tu byung ba 'dod par gyis/ /der ni de yi nad g.yogs byos/ /de tshe bdag gis yid dad pas/ /
494b5('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa'i rim gro byas/ /lam 'di rnam dag 'gyur min zhes/ /yid byung nas ni gshegs par gyur/ /gang tshe shAkya thub pas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /kun gyi thog mar bdag gis
494b6('dul ba): ni| |de yi dam chos rtogs par gyur/ /'od srung gi ni gsung rab la/ /tshangs par spyod la bdag gis gnas/ /sangs rgyas bdag gis mnyes byas shing / /zag pa zad pa thob par gyur/ /de ltar gnas
494b7('dul ba): brtan ko'u Di n+yas/ /dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /rang gi las ni lung bstan to/ /ko'u Di n+ya'i le'u ste/ sum cu gsum pa'o// //de nas dge slong gnas brtan
495a1('dul ba): gnas brtan rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor/ /tshe dang ldan pa ko'u di n+yas rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi/
495a2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis kyang de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag ni sngon gyi tshe rabs na/ /
495a3('dul ba): wA ra NA si'i rgyal khab tu/ /rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba'i/ /'breg mkhan du ni gyur pa na/ /de yi skra dang kha spu rnams/ /'breg cing 'chos par byed pa na/ /de nas mngon par rangs gyur nas/ /bgo ba
495a4('dul ba): dag ni bdag la phyin/ /gus dang bcas pa'i sdug sems kyis/ /rgyal po'i rim gro byed pa na/ /mnyes nas de nas de la ni/ /ma thos pa yi tshigs bcad bsgrags/ /'dod pa rnams ni mnog chung zhing / /sdig
495a5('dul ba): pa'i rtsa ba mya ngan rtsa/ /rnam par smin pa rtsub pa yi/ /bram ze'i khye'u gang zhig gis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan spangs nas ni/ /rab byung thob pa legs thob yin/ /ma thos tshigs bcad de thos nas/ /de nas
495a6('dul ba): skyo bar gyur pa dang / /rgyal po bdag la gnang bar mdzod/ /khyim ma mchis par rab 'byung ngo / /de nas rgyal pos bdag la smras/ /gal te rab tu byung nas kyang / /phyis kyang bdag la lta ba yi/ /
495a7('dul ba): khas blangs pa ni bya ba'i rigs/ /rgyal dbang khyod la bdag gis ni/ /de bzhin bgyi bar dam bca' yi/ /bdag rab byung nas slar yang ni/ /blta bar bdag la thugs ches mdzod/ /de nas
495b1('dul ba): rgyal pos gnang nas ni/ /bdag gis dgon pa'i nags song nas/ /gzhung can drung du nyer song ste/ /khyim med par ni rab tu byung / /ji ltar rigs par rab byung nas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yi/ /
495b2('dul ba): tshad med pa la rab bsgoms pas/ /bdag gis 'dod chags bral ba thob/ /rgyal po de yi tshe la ni/ /de tshe bdag ming gang+gA skyong / /'byor pa che zhing mthu yang che/ /skye bo'i tshogs kyis mchod par gyur/ /
495b3('dul ba): gzhung can drung du song nas ni/ /mgo bo yis ni phyag byas te/ /bdag gis phyogs gcig 'dug nas ni/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/ /slob dpon bdag gi tshig gson cig /mi yi dbang po tshangs
495b4('dul ba): sbyin la| |slar yang blta bar bgyi ba yi/ /dam bcas pa ni cung zhig mchis/ /gnang bar bya'o bram ze khyod/ /wA ra NA si'i grong khyer song / /khyod ni brdzun du mi 'gyur bar/ /dam bcas pa yis mthar
495b5('dul ba): phyung zhig / gnang bar bya yi khyod song la/ /kho bo yi ni tshig bzhin gyis/ /'di nas song la mi'i dbang po/ /tshangs sbyin dad pa bskyed par gyis/ /gzhung can gyis ni bdag gnang nas/ /drang srong
495b6('dul ba): bskor ba byas nas ni/ /wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du/ /rim bzhin du ni song ba las/ /de bzhin der ni bdag 'ongs zhes/ /tshangs sbyin nyid kyis thos nas ni/ /rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen pos ni/ /bdag
495b7('dul ba): gi drung dru nye bar 'ongs/ /shing rta las babs bdag gi ni/ /rkang pa gnyis la mgos phyag byas/ /phyogs gcig tu ni 'dug par gyur/ /'dod pa rnams las brgal gyur pas/ /de la chos ni bshad pa
496a1('dul ba): dang / /rgyal pos thos nas yid dga' ba/ /'dod pa don du mi gnyer gyur/ /rgya che'i sems dang yid dga' nas/ /tshangs sbyin gyis ni 'di skad smras/ /bdag 'dod don du gnyer
496a2('dul ba): min pas/ /bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bya/ /rgyal po tshur spyon dgon pa'i nags/ /dben pa dag tu bzhud par bgyi/ /bram ze drang srong gzhung can gyi/ /drung du nye bar bzhud par mdzod/ /rgyal po
496a3('dul ba): des ni bu thu bo/ /'jigs med rgyal srid la bzhag ste/ /rgyal mchog rgyal srid spangs nas ni/ /khyim med par yang rab tu byung / /nang mi dang ni blon chen dang / /grong khyer ba ni thams cad dang / /
496a4('dul ba): gnyen gyi tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas/ /rab tu 'byung phyir mngon du byung / /gzhung can drung du song nas ni/ /mgo bos phyag ni byas nas kyang / /rgyal pos thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /rab tu 'byung bar
496a5('dul ba): gsol ba btab/ /stong phrag dag ni du ma dang / /khyim med par yang rab tu byung / /skra dang kha spu bregs nas kyang / /ngur smrig gos ni bgos par gyur/ /gzhung can shin tu mnyam bzhag pas//
496a6('dul ba): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten skye 'gyur ba/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yi/ /chos ni kun la bshad par byas/ /gus dang bcas pa'i byams sems kyis/ /rgyal po de yi rim gro byas/ /de nas
496a7('dul ba): 'chi 'pho'i dus byas te/ /'od gsal rnams su song bar gyur/ /'od gsal nas ni shi 'phos nas/ /slar yang 'dir ni 'ongs pa na/ /gang dang gang du skyes par ni/ /nor che ba dang phyug por gyur/ /lha
496b1('dul ba): rnams dang ni mi rnams kyi/ /bde ba mang po nyams su myong / /dus kyi mtha' ma 'di la ni/ /bdag gi lus kyi tha ma la/ /shAkya rnams kyi yul du ni/ /grong khyer ser skya zhes byar skyes/ /spyod yul spyod pa phun tshogs
496b2('dul ba): pa'i/ /shAkya rnams kyi 'breg mkhan gyur/ /shAkya sras thugs brtse'i bdag nyid can/ /nyan thos bcas la rim gro byas/ /rgyal po chen po'i 'byor pas ni/ /rab tu byung bar mngon byung ba/ /de rnams bdag
496b3('dul ba): gis skra bregs nas/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/ /dpon po 'tsho ba ma stsal na/ /bdag ni ji ltar 'tsho bar gyur/ /de yi rgyan ni gang yin dang / /gos rnams gyon pa gang yin pa/ /'di ni khyod kyi 'tsho ba
496b4('dul ba): zhes/ /des ni kun dga' bdag la byin/ /rin chen mang po btags nas ni/ /de la bdag ni skyo gyur nas/ /'di dag thams cad spangs nas ni/ /bdag ni rab byung gsol ba bya/ /bkren pa bdag la 'di
496b5('dul ba): lta bu'i/ /rin chen rnams kyis ci zhig bya/ /gzhan 'ga' zhig gis thos na ni/ /srog la gdon lto za bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis nyid kyi snod spyad ni/ /gang yin shing la btags nas su/ /bor nas bdag
496b6('dul ba): gis khyim dag nas/ /byung ste nges par 'byung bar byas/ /bdag ni rin chen don gnyer min/ /bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar byas/ /bdag gis tshig de shAkya yi/ /rgyal pos thos nas 'di skad smras/ /
496b7('dul ba): khyed ni thog mar rab byung dang / /rgan pa nyid du khyod 'gyur ro/ /rjes su thugs brtser dgongs nas ni/ /bdag la dge slong tshur shog gsungs/ /bdag ni thog mar rab tu byung / /de nas rgyal rigs
497a1('dul ba): rab byung nas/ /bdag gi rkang la phyag byas pas/ /shAkya de rnams nga rgyal bor/ /de ltar bdag ni rab byung bas/ /mngon par shes pa drug la reg /dgra bcom mngon shes
497a2('dul ba): drug ldan zhing / /bdag ni 'dul ba'i pha rol phyin/ /ston pa nyid kyis 'dul ba 'dzin/ /rnams kyi mchog tu bsngags pa ste/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du/ /nye bar 'khor gyis las lung bstan/ /
497a3('dul ba): nye bar 'khor gyi le'u ste/ sum cu bzhi pa'o// //de nas 'jig rten mgon pos ni/ /gnas brtan 'od byed la gsungs pa/ /khyod kyis sngon byas gang yin pa'i/ /rang gi las ni lung
497a4('dul ba): ston cig / rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs thos nas ni/ /sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis pa'i/ /rang gi las ni dran pa gang / /de nas thub pa'i spyan sngar gsol/ /'jig rten gtso bo skyob pa po/ /
497a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas pad+mo bla ma yi/ /mchod rten tshal stug bzhugs pa yi/ /ri dwags gdug pa rnams kyis bsten/ /mchod rten de la phyag bgyid pa/ /rngo thogs pa ni 'ga' ma mchis/ /mi de rnams ni
497a6('dul ba): bsod nams dang / /sdig pa rab tu ma 'tshal to/ /bdag gis song nas shing rnams dang / /rtswa rnams bsal ba bgyis nas ni/ /phyags ma dag ni blangs nas kyang / /de nas thams cad phyag
497a7('dul ba): dar bgyis/ /bskor ba brgyad dang phyag bgyis te/ /mchod pa bgyis nas slar log lags/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag/ lha rnams su ni skyes pa na/ /'dod pa thams cad 'byor gyur
497b1('dul ba): cing / /sum cu rtsa gsum rnams su dga'/ /lha yul lha yi rgyal srid ni/ /sum cu rtsa drug bar du bgyis/ /de nas bdag gi gnas mchis pa/ /gser gyi 'od ni shin tu gsal/ /rgyar ni dpag
497b2('dul ba): tshad sum cu drug / khor yug dpag tshad drug cu tham/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/ /ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/ /mi yi nang du mi dbang ni/ /lan bdun bar du bgyis par gyur/ /
497b3('dul ba): rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas/ /ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni/ /bdag gi lus kyi gzi brjid ni/ /gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten de phyags nas /ngo mtshar byung
497b4('dul ba): ba gzhan yang ni/ /bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang / /rigs gnyis su ni bdag skyes lags/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyags nas ni/ /bdag la ngo mtshar gzhan byung ba/ /khyogs dang glang
